data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 인공위성용 비축 삼반사 망원경의 조리개 위치에 따른 광학계 연구를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a study of the optical system according to the aperture position of the off-axis tri-reflection telescope for satellites was conducted.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, an optical system study according to the aperture position of an off-axis TMA (Three Mirror Anastigmat) telescope for satellites was conducted.

data.source_sentence: 인공위성 광학 탑재체로 주로 사용되는 비축 삼반사 망원경은 높은 해상도와 넓은 화각을 가져야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Off-axis tri-reflection telescopes, which are mainly used as satellite optical payloads, must have high resolution and wide field of view.
data.target_sentence: Used primarily as a satellite optics payload, an off-axis three-view Anastimat telescope must have high resolution and a wide field of view.

data.source_sentence: 광학계가 구조적으로 비축상에 위치하여 조립이 어려우므로 넓은 공차범위를 가져야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the optical system is structurally located on the off-axis, it is difficult to assemble, so it must have a wide tolerance range.
data.target_sentence: Because the optical system is structurally located off-axis, assembly is difficult, so the tolerance must be wide.

data.source_sentence: 조리개의 위치 선정에 따라 광학계의 성능 차이 이외에도 민감도의 차이가 있어, 사용 목적에 따른 적합한 조리개의 위치 선정이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the position selection of the aperture, there is a difference in sensitivity in addition to the difference in performance of the optical system, so it is important to select a suitable position of the aperture according to the purpose of use.
data.target_sentence: Depending on the location of the aperture, there is a difference in sensitivity in addition to the performance difference of the optical system, so it is important to select the proper aperture location according to the purpose of use.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 조리개 위치가 각각 다른 비축 삼반사 망원경을 설계하고 성능 및 민감도 분석을 진행하여 적합한 조리개의 위치를 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, an off-axis trireflection telescope with different diaphragm positions was designed and performance and sensitivity analysis were performed to suggest a suitable diaphragm position.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we designed an off-axis three-diameter anastimat telescope with different aperture positions and performed performance and sensitivity analysis to suggest appropriate aperture positions.

data.source_sentence: 광학적 성능을 만족하기 위해 인공위성에 주로 탑재되는 망원경 광학계로는 Maksutov Cassegrain, Ritchey-Chrétien Casseg-rain, off-axis three-mirror-anastigmat (비축 삼반사) 등다양한 타입의 망원경이 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: To satisfy optical performance, telescopic optical systems, which are mainly mounted on satellites, use a variety of types of telescopes, including Maksutov Cassegrain, Ritchey-Chrétien Casseg-rain, and off-axis three-mirror-anastigmat.
data.target_sentence: The telescope optics, which are mainly mounted on satellites to satisfy optical performance, use various types of telescopes, such as Maksutov Cassegrain, Ritchey-Chrétien Casseg-rain, and off-axis three-mirror-anastigmat.

data.source_sentence: 최근 우주 산업의 발전과 함께 인공위성의 시장이 확대되면서 인공위성 탑재체와 관련된 연구도 활발히 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As the market for artificial satellites expands with the development of the space industry, research related to satellite payloads is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: As the satellite market expands with the development of the space industry, research on spacecraft payloads is being actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라 지상을 관측할 수 있는 망원경을 탑재하는 인공위성 역시 증가하고 있으며, 지표 변화 관측, 재난재해 대응, 안보 및 군용 장비 등 다양한 목적으로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, satellites equipped with telescopes capable of observing the ground are also increasing, and are being used for various purposes such as surface change observation, disaster response, and security and military equipment.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the number of satellites equipped with telescopes capable of observing the ground is increasing, and they are being used for various purposes such as observing changes in the surface of the earth, responding to disasters, and security and military equipment.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 조리개의 위치에 의해 광학계의 성능이 영향을 받으며, 조리개의 영향을 비교 및 분석하기 위해 조리개 위치가 각각 다른 비축 삼반사 망원경의 광학계 설계를 진행하였다
data.mt_sentence: As such, the performance of the optical system is affected by the position of the diaphragm, and in order to compare and analyze the effect of the diaphragm, the optical system design of an off-axis trireflector telescope with different diaphragm positions was carried out.
data.target_sentence: As such, the performance of the optical system is affected by the position of the aperture, and in order to compare and analyze the effect of the aperture, the optical system of the off-axis trireflector telescope with different aperture positions was designed.

data.source_sentence: 표 1은 해외에서 설계 및 연구한 비축 삼반사 망원경 중 실제 인공위성에 탑재된 망원경 모델의 광학 사양을 비교한 표이다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 compares the optical specifications of telescope models mounted on actual satellites among stockpiled trireflection telescopes designed and studied abroad.
data.target_sentence: <Table 1> compares the optical specifications of telescope models mounted on real satellites among the external three-view Anastimat telescopes designed and studied abroad.

data.source_sentence: 그 중에서 삼반사 타입의 망원경은 구면 수차, 비점 수차, 코마 수차 등을 상쇄시킬 수 있어, 근래에 들어 많은 연구가 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, three-reflective telescopes can offset spherical aberrations, boiling-point aberrations, and Koma aberrations, so many studies have been conducted in recent years.
data.target_sentence: Among them, the three-reflection telescope can cancel spherical aberration, boiling point aberration, and coma, so many studies have been conducted in recent years.

data.source_sentence: 특히 조리개는 빛의 양을 조절해주는 요소로, 조리개의 크기와 위치에 따라 광학계의 성능과 크기에 영향을 미치므로 적합한 조리개 위치를 선정하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the aperture is an element that controls the amount of light, and it is important to select an appropriate aperture position because it affects the performance and size of the optical system depending on the size and position of the aperture.
data.target_sentence: In particular, the diaphragm is a factor that controls the amount of light, and it is important to select an appropriate diaphragm position because the size and position of the diaphragm affects the performance and size of the optical system.

data.source_sentence: 표를 통해 두 망원경이 조리개의 위치가 서로 다름을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The table shows that the two telescopes have different positions of aperture.
data.target_sentence: The table shows that the aperture positions of the two telescopes are different.

data.source_sentence: 같은 사양에 각 조리개 위치만 변경시킨 비축 삼반사 망원경을 설계하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: We want to design an off-axis tri-reflector telescope with the same specifications and only the position of each diaphragm is changed.
data.target_sentence: We want to design an off-axis 3-mirror anastimat telescope with the same specifications, only the position of the diaphragm changes.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4는 광학계의 성능 지표를 나타내는 MTF, 파면 오차, spot diagram, distortion grid이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4 shows the MTF, wavefront error, spot diagram, and distortion grid representing the performance indicators of the optical system.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the MTF, wavefront error, spot diagram, and distortion grid representing the performance indicators of an optical system.

data.source_sentence: 두 광학계의 Zernike 계수 비교를 통해 5 mm 광학계의 비점 수차 및 코마 수차가 크게 발생함을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By comparing the Zernike coefficients of the two optical systems, it can be confirmed that the astigmatism and coma aberration of the 5 mm optical system are large.
data.target_sentence: Comparing the Zernike coefficients of the two optical systems, it can be seen that the astigmatism and coma of the 5mm optical system are large.

data.source_sentence: 광학계는 FOV 10°×2°, 고도 800 km에서 GSD 4.3 m의 성능을 만족할 수 있도록 초점거리, f-number 등의 광학적 사양을 도출하여 설계를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optical system was designed by deriving optical specifications such as focal length and f-number to satisfy the performance of GSD 4.3 m at FOV 10°×2° and altitude of 800 km.
data.target_sentence: The optical system was designed by deriving optical specifications such as focal length and f-value to satisfy the performance of GSD 4.3m at FOV 10°×2° and altitude of 800 km.

data.source_sentence: 설계한 광학계의 이미지가 지정한 상면 크기 안에 형성될 수 있도록 광학계의 초점거리를 결정해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The focal length of the optical system must be determined so that the designed optical system image can be formed within the specified image plane size.
data.target_sentence: The focal length of the optics must be determined so that the designed optics image can be formed within the specified image plane size.

data.source_sentence: GSD는 이미지 센서의 한 픽셀당 취득할 수 있는 지표면 측정거리로, 인공위성용 광학계의 해상도를 나타내는 지표이다.
data.mt_sentence: GSD is a surface measurement distance that can be obtained per pixel of an image sensor, and is an indicator of the resolution of an optical system for satellites.
data.target_sentence: GSD is the surface measurement distance that can be obtained per pixel of the image sensor, and is an index indicating the resolution of the optical system for satellites.

data.source_sentence: 한 픽셀이 취득하는 거리가 짧을수록 더 정밀한 거리와 면적을 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The shorter the distance a pixel acquires, the more precise the distance and area can be calculated.
data.target_sentence: The shorter the pixel acquisition distance, the more accurately the distance and area can be calculated.

data.source_sentence: GSD는 식 (1)을 통해 계산할 수 있으며, 그 값은 4.3 m로 도출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: GSD can be calculated through Equation (1), and its value was derived as 4.3 m.
data.target_sentence: GSD can be calculated through Equation 1, and the value was derived as 4.3m.

data.source_sentence: 광학계에서 조리개의 역할을 비교하기 위해 광학계의 상세사양을 토대로, 조리개를 entrance, M1, M2, M3에 각각 위치시킨 비축 삼반사 망원경의 광학계 설계를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to compare the role of the diaphragm in the optical system, based on the detailed specifications of the optical system, the optical system design of the off-axis trireflector telescope was carried out with the diaphragm positioned at the entrance, M1, M2, and M3, respectively.
data.target_sentence: To compare the role of the diaphragm in the optical system, based on the detailed specifications of the optical system, the optical system design was performed with the diaphragm located at the entrance of the optical system, M1, M2, and M3, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 각 광학계는 이와 같은 방식으로 설계를 진행하고 광학 성능 지표를 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Each optical system proceeded with the design in this way and compared optical performance indicators.
data.target_sentence: Each optical system was designed in this way and the optical performance index was compared.

data.source_sentence: 각 광학계는 광경로와 각 반사경의 y축 사이 간격을 30 mm 이상으로 배치함으로써 구조적인 광의 차폐가 발생하지 않도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In each optical system, the distance between the optical path and the y-axis of each reflector was arranged to be 30 mm or more, so that structural light shielding did not occur.
data.target_sentence: In each optical system, the distance between the optical path and the y-axis of each reflector was arranged to be 30 mm or more to prevent structural light blocking.

data.source_sentence: 광학계에서 조리개가 위치하지 않은 반사경의 tilt와 decenter를 보상자로 선정하였고, 추가로 이미지 센서의 거리를 보상자로 선정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the optical system, the tilt and decenter of the reflector where the aperture was not located were selected as compensators, and additionally, the distance of the image sensor was selected as compensators.
data.target_sentence: In the optical system, the inclination and de-center of the reflector where the diaphragm is not located were selected as compensators, and the distance of the image sensor was additionally selected as compensators.

data.source_sentence: 반사경의 공차 분석은 공차 범위를 적용한 후 1000번의 Monte-Carlo 시뮬레이션을 통해 파면 오차 0.07 λ 이하를 만족하도록 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Tolerance analysis of the reflector was conducted to satisfy the wavefront error of 0.07 λ or less through 1000 Monte-Carlo simulations after applying the tolerance range.
data.target_sentence: The tolerance analysis of the reflector was performed to satisfy the wavefront error of 0.07 λ or less through 1000 Monte Carlo simulations after applying the tolerance range.

data.source_sentence: 표 7은 각 광학계의 4가지 항목의 공차 범위를 정리한 표로, entrance에 조리개가 있는 광학계에 대해서만 entrance의 거리 공차 항목을 추가로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 7 is a table that summarizes the tolerance ranges of four items of each optical system, and additional distance tolerance items of entrence are identified only for optical systems with aperture in entrence.
data.target_sentence: Table 7 is a table that summarizes the tolerance range of the four items of each optical system, and only the optical system with an iris at the entrance identifies the additional distance tolerance at the entrance.

data.source_sentence: M2 조리개 광학계가 가지는 여유로운 공차 범위는 광학계 제작에 있어 다른 광학계보다광학적으로 더 유리함을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the wide tolerance range of the M2 diaphragm optical system is optically more advantageous than other optical systems in optical system manufacturing.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the wide tolerance range of the M2 aperture optical system is optically more advantageous than other optical systems in optical system manufacturing.

data.source_sentence: 조리개 위치에 따른 비축 삼반사 망원경 광학계의 비교 분석을 통해 M2에 조리개가 위치한 경우에 크기와 광학적 성능이 우수함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through comparative analysis of the off-axis trireflection telescope optical system according to the position of the diaphragm, it was confirmed that the size and optical performance were excellent when the diaphragm was located in the M2.
data.target_sentence: Through comparative analysis of the off-axis 3-diameter Anastigmat telescope optical system according to the position of the diaphragm, it was confirmed that the size and optical performance were excellent when the diaphragm was positioned at M2.

data.source_sentence: 민감도 분석으로부터 M2에 조리개가 위치한 설계의 공차 범위가 다른 광학계에 비해 상대적으로 더 넓은 공차 범위를 가지는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: From the sensitivity analysis, it was confirmed that the tolerance range of the design where the diaphragm is located in M2 has a relatively wider tolerance range compared to other optical systems.
data.target_sentence: Through sensitivity analysis, it was confirmed that the tolerance range of the design where the diaphragm is located in the M2 has a relatively wide tolerance compared to other optical systems.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 광학계 설계에 있어 조리개의 위치가 광학적 성능 이외에도 광학계의 민감도에 영향을 주는 것을 확인하고, 비축 삼반사 망원경에 적합한 조리개의 위치를 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it was confirmed that the position of the diaphragm affects the sensitivity of the optical system in addition to the optical performance in the design of the optical system, and the position of the diaphragm suitable for the off-axis trireflector telescope was suggested.
data.target_sentence: Through this, it is confirmed that the position of the aperture affects the sensitivity of the optical system in addition to the optical performance in the design of the optical system. In addition, the location of the aperture suitable for the off-axis trireflector telescope was proposed.

data.source_sentence: 이 논문은 2020년도 BBB의 재원을 지원받아 수행되었습니다(초소형위성 광학 탑재체 연구).
data.mt_sentence: This paper was conducted with the financial support of BBB in 2020.
data.target_sentence: This thesis was written with financial support from BBB in 2020.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 LED 광원 모듈과 시준용 프레넬 렌즈를 이용하여 항공기 장애등 광학 시스템을 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, an optical system such as an aircraft failure was designed using an LED light source module and a Fresnel lens for collimation.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, an optical system such as an aircraft failure was designed using an LED light source module and a collimating Fresnel lens.

data.source_sentence: 설계된 광학계는 국토 교통부 항공기 경고 등의 수직 양각 중심 광도 20,000 cd와 발산각 광도 규격 조건을 만족시키기 위해 프레넬 렌즈를 모듈별로 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For the designed optical system, Fresnel lenses were designed for each module to satisfy the vertical embossed central luminous intensity of 20,000 cd and divergent angle luminous intensity standards of the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, such as aircraft warnings.
data.target_sentence: The designed optical system was designed with a Fresnel lens for each module to satisfy the luminous intensity standards of the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, such as vertical embossed central luminosity of 20,000cd and aircraft warning.

data.source_sentence: LED 광원 모듈과 프레넬 렌즈의 위치와 기울기를 조정하여 광학 시스템을 최적화하였으며, 이렇게 설계된 광학계의 배광 특성을 분석하고 비교하여 최적의 성능을 가진 항공기 경고등 광학계를 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optical system was optimized by adjusting the position and inclination of the LED light source module and Fresnel lens, and an aircraft warning light optical system with optimal performance was designed by analyzing and comparing the light distribution characteristics of the designed optical system.
data.target_sentence: The optical system was optimized by adjusting the position and inclination of the LED light source module and Fresnel lens, and an aircraft warning light optical system with optimal performance was designed by analyzing and comparing the light distribution characteristics of the designed optical system.

data.source_sentence: 항공장애등은 고층 건물이나 아파트 등의 건축물이 급속도로 늘어남에 따라 항공기 운항에 지장을 초래하는 위험 요인을 미리 알리기 위하여 사용되는 등화를 총칭한다.
data.mt_sentence: Aviation obstruction lights are a general term for lights used to inform in advance of risk factors that impede the operation of aircraft as buildings such as high-rise buildings and apartments increase rapidly.
data.target_sentence: Aviation obstruction light is a generic term for lights used to inform in advance of risk factors that interfere with aircraft operation as buildings such as high-rise buildings and apartments increase rapidly.

data.source_sentence: 항공기의 안전한 운행을 위하여 항공법에 따라 60 m∼150 m 높이 이상의 건축물과 구조물에는 항공장애등의 설치를 의무화하고 있으며 항공장애등의 중요성이 커짐에 따라서 신뢰성 있는 최적화된 제품개발의 필요성이 부각되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For the safe operation of aircraft, according to the Aviation Act, it is mandatory to install aviation obstacles on buildings and structures with a height of 60 m to 150 m or more.
data.target_sentence: For the safe operation of aircraft, it is compulsory to install aviation obstruction lights in buildings and structures with a height of 60 m ~ 150 m or more in accordance with the Aviation Act. As the importance of aviation obstacles increases, the need for reliable and optimized product development is emerging.

data.source_sentence: LED 광원이 조명에 적용된 이래로 다양한 분야뿐만 아니라 대부분의 항공장애등의 광원 역시 LED로 대체되고 있으며 급격하게 확장 및 보급되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the LED light source has been applied to lighting, not only various fields but also most of the light sources of aviation obstacles are being replaced by LEDs, and they are rapidly expanding and spreading.
data.target_sentence: As the LED light source is applied to lighting, not only various fields but also most of the light sources of aviation jammers are being replaced by LEDs, and they are rapidly expanding and spreading.

data.source_sentence: 정부에서는 항공장애등을 국토교통부 관할로 지정하여 관리를 하고 있으며, 성능 기준을 보완하여 이러한 문제를 해결하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The government designates and manages aviation disorders under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, and solves this problem by supplementing performance standards.
data.target_sentence: The government designates and manages aviation obstacles under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport, and is solving these problems by supplementing performance standards.

data.source_sentence: 이와 관련된 구체적인 배광 규격을 표 1에 나타내었으며 여기서 수직앙각은 수평면과 이루는 각도를 기준으로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Specific light distribution specifications related to this are shown in Table 1, where the vertical angle of elevation is based on the angle formed with the horizontal plane.

data.source_sentence: 항공장애등의 색도 규격은 CIE의 권고에 기초하고 있으며, KS W 8311 규격에 따른 색도 범위를 만족하여야 한다.

data.source_sentence: 이상을 기준으로 하여 LED 광원에서 방사되는 빛을 제어하여 배광 규격을 만족하도록 하는 렌즈를 설계할 필요가 있다.

data.source_sentence: 항공장애등의 배광 규격을 고려하였을 때 양각으로 출사하는 광선이 많아져야 함을 알 수 있으므로 본 연구에서는 LED 광원을 광축으로부터 수직 아래로 배치하는 방법을 이용하여 광학계 설계를 진행하였다.

Therefore, in this study, the optical system was designed using the method of arranging the LED light source vertically below the optical axis.

data.source_sentence: 최적화는 intensity slice chart를 이용하여 배광 규격에 제시되어 있는 수직앙각 별 광도 값을 지정하고 광축을 기준으로 상단은 발산각 ±1˚, 하단은 발산각 ±2.5˚를 목표로 최적화를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For optimization, the intensity value for each vertical elevation angle suggested in the light distribution standard was designated using the intensity slice chart, and the divergence angle was set to ±1˚ at the upper end and ±2.5˚ at the lower end based on the optical axis.

In the meantime, the distance in the vertical downward direction from the optical axis of the 28 LED PKG was designated as a variable, and the outer diameter of the optimization was designated as a variable, and optimization was performed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 수직앙각 –1˚, 3˚에서의 여유있는 광도 확보를 위해서 후초점거리를 62 mm로 defocus 하여 시뮬레이션을 진행하였다.

data.target_sentence: It can be seen that when only the LED light source module is configured, the luminous intensity distribution of 2,100cd is increased by 11.6 times by collimator Fresnel lens collimation.

data.source_sentence: 배광 규격의 만족을 위한 두 가지의 최적화된 결과를 적용하여 시뮬레이션을 진행하였으며, 결과를 표 5에 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The simulation was performed by applying two optimized results for satisfying the light distribution standard, and the results are summarized in Table 5.

data.source_sentence: 두 가지 방법 모두 중심 광도 20,000 cd 이상을 구현하고, 각수직앙각별 광도값 역시 규격을 만족하였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 주기적 분극된 비선형 결정(periodically poled potassium titanyl phosphate; PPKTP)에서 자발매개하향변환(spontaneous parametric down conversion; SPDC) 과정으로 생성된 예고된 단일 광자 광원을 이용하여 레겟-가르그 부등식(Leggett-Garg inequality; LGI)의 위배를 실험적으로 모사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, we experimentally experimentally experimentally perform Legget-Garg inequality (Legget-Gargine) with a predicted single photon light source generated by a spontainous parametric down conversion (SPDC) process in periodically polarized nonlinear crystals (PPKTP).
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we experimentally perform the Leggett-Garg inequality with a predicted single-photon light source generated by a spontaneous parametric down conversion (SPDC) process from periodically polarized potassium titanyl phosphate (PPKTP).

data.source_sentence: 생성된 광자의 편광 방향에 따라서 편광된 광자 수를 측정하여 n-측정 수에 따른 레겟-가르그 부등식을 모사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By measuring the number of polarized photons according to the polarization direction of the generated photons, the Regget-Garg inequality according to the n-measured number was simulated.
data.target_sentence: By measuring the number of polarized photons according to the polarization direction of the generated photons, the Leggett-Garg inequality according to the number of n-measurements was simulated.

data.source_sentence: 양자 역학의 결과는 일상에서 일어나는 자연 현상을 이해하는 직관으로는 이해되기 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of quantum mechanics are difficult to understand with the intuition of understanding natural phenomena occurring in everyday life.
data.target_sentence: The results of quantum mechanics are difficult to understand with intuition to understand natural phenomena occurring in everyday life.

data.source_sentence: J. S. Bell은 1964년에 얽혀있는 전자쌍의 스핀 측정을 기반으로 한 이론을 발표하였다.
data.mt_sentence: J. S. Bell published a theory based on spin measurements of entangled electron pairs in 1964.
data.target_sentence: J. S. Bell published a theory based on measurements of the spins of entangled electron pairs in 1964.

data.source_sentence: 그는 양자역학에서 직관적으로 이해하기 힘든 부분을 고전적인 가정을 바탕으로 한 ‘벨 부등식(Bell inequality)’으로 설명하였고, 그 가정으로는 국소성과 실재성이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: He explained the part that is difficult to intuitively understand in quantum mechanics as 'Bell inequality' based on a classical assumption, and that assumption has locality and reality.
data.target_sentence: The part that is difficult to intuitively understand in quantum mechanics was explained with the 'species inequality' based on classical assumptions, and that assumption has locality and reality.

data.source_sentence: 살아있는 상태와 죽은 상태로 동시에 있는 슈뢰딩거 고양이(Schrodinger’s cat)는 거시적 결맞음에 대한 구체화된 예이다.
data.mt_sentence: Schrodinger's cat, both alive and dead, is a concrete example of macroscopic coherence.
data.target_sentence: Alive or dead, Schrödinger's cat is a concrete example of macroscopic consistency.

data.source_sentence: 여전히 슈뢰딩거 고양이의 예는 일상의 거시적인 세계에서는 직관적으로 이해되지 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: Still, the example of the Schrödinger cat is not intuitively understood in the macroscopic world of everyday life.
data.target_sentence: However, the example of the Schrödinger cat is not intuitively understood in the macro world of everyday life.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 거시적 결맞음에 대한 실험적 구현 가능성과 비고전성을 확인할 수 있는 방법을 발표하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA published a method to confirm the experimental feasibility and non-classicalness of macroscopic coherence.
data.target_sentence: AAA published a method to confirm the experimental validity and non-classicity of macroscopic consistency.

data.source_sentence: 그들은 벨 부등식의 가정을 수정하여 여러 가지의 부등식을 통해 양자역학에서 직관적으로 이해하기 힘든 부분을 설명하고자 했다.
data.mt_sentence: They modified the assumption of Bell's inequality to explain what is intuitively difficult to understand in quantum mechanics through various inequalities.
data.target_sentence: The assumption of Bell's inequality was modified to explain what is difficult to intuitively understand in quantum mechanics through various inequalities.

data.source_sentence: 레겟-가르그 부등식 Logic은 공간적으로 분리된 계에서의 얽힘 상태를 증명한 벨 부등식과는 다르게, 단일계의 서로 다른 시간에서의 상관관계를 측정한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Unlike Bell's inequality, which proves the entanglement state in a spatially separated system, the Reggett-Garg inequality logic measures the correlation at different times in a single system.
data.target_sentence: Unlike Bell's inequality, which proves entanglement in spatially separated systems, the Leggett-Garg inequality logic measures correlations at different times in a single system.

data.source_sentence: 거시실재성(macro-realism)으로 벨 부등식의 실재성과 마찬가지로 모든 물체는 이미 측정을 하기 전에 구별 가능한 거시적인 물리량을 가지고 있다는 의미이다.
data.mt_sentence: As with macro-realism, like the reality of Bell's inequality, it means that every object already has a distinguishable macroscopic physical quantity before measurement.
data.target_sentence: Like macrorealism, like the reality of Bell's inequality, it means that every object already has a distinguishable macroscopic physical quantity before its measurement.

data.source_sentence: 측정의 독립성(non-invasive measurability)으로, 측정을 하더라도 시스템의 거시적인 상태는 변하지 않고, 두 측정은 서로 독립적이라는 가정이다.
data.mt_sentence: With the non-invasive measurability of measurement, it is assumed that the macroscopic state of the system does not change even if the measurement is performed, and that the two measurements are independent of each other.
data.target_sentence: The non-invasive measurability of a measurement assumes that the measurement does not change the macroscopic state of the system and that the two measurements are independent of each other.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 레겟-가르그 부등식의 위배 모사 연구를 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a violation simulation study of the Legget-Garg inequality was conducted.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, a violation simulation study for the Leggett-Garg inequality was performed.

data.source_sentence: 레겟-가르그 부등식은 하나의 시스템에서 물체의 상태를 변화시키지 않으며 연속적인 측정을 하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The Legget-Garg inequality is a continuous measurement without changing the state of an object in a system.
data.target_sentence: A Leggett-Garg inequality is a continuous measurement without changing the state of an object in the system.

data.source_sentence: 광자를 측정하는 순간 그 상태가 결정되기 때문에, 대부분의 경우 광자를 이용한 레겟-가르그 부등식 실험은 약한 측정(weakmeasurement)의 과정을 이용하여 이루어진다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the state is determined the moment a photon is measured, in most cases the Reggett-Garg inequality experiment using photons is performed using the process of weakmeasurement.
data.target_sentence: Since the state is determined the moment a photon is measured, in most cases, the Reggett-Gag inequality experiment using photons is performed using a weak measurement process.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 사용한 광원은 편광상태의 상관관계가 있는 광자이므로, 측정하기 전에는 항상 같은 편광을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the light source used in this study is a photon with a correlation in the polarization state, it always has the same polarization before measurement.
data.target_sentence: Since the light source used in this study is a correlated photon in the polarization state, it always has the same polarization before measurement.

data.source_sentence: 예고된 단일 광자 광원을 이용한 레겟-가르그 부등식 모사를 위한 실험 장치도는 그림 1과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1 shows an experimental device diagram for the simulation of Legget-Garg inequality using the predicted single photon light source.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the experimental setup diagram for the simulation of the Leggett-Garg inequality using a predicted single-photon light source.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 적합한 SPDC 광원 생성을 위해서 파장판과 편광기를 이용하여 펌프 빔의 세기와 편광을 조절할 수 있도록 했다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to generate an SPDC light source suitable for the experiment, the intensity and polarization of the pump beam can be adjusted using a wave plate and a polarizer.
data.target_sentence: Waveplates and polarizers can be used to control the intensity and polarization of the pump beam to create an SPDC light source suitable for experiments.

data.source_sentence: 아이들러 광자는 트리거 신호로 이용하였고, 시그널 광자는 반파장판을 거친 후 다시 한번 더 편광빔 가르개를 통과할 수 있도록 하여 각각의 포트에서 측정될 수 있도록 하였다.

data.mt_sentence: Nuclear medicine imaging can use radiopharmaceuticals as tracers to analyze changes in human function through the distribution of nuclide in vivo and provide image information about human phenomena that are not morphologically interpreted either molecularly or biochemically.
data.target_sentence: Nuclear medicine imaging can use radiopharmaceuticals as tracers to analyze changes in human function through the distribution of nuclides in vivo and provide image information about human phenomena that are not morphologically or molecularly or biochemically interpreted.

data.source_sentence: 방사성 의약품은 검사와 치료 목적에 적합해야 하고 독성이나 인체에 대한 장해가 적어야 하는 등의 물리적, 생물학적 조건을 갖추어야 사용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals can be used only when they have physical and biological conditions, such as being suitable for testing and treatment purposes, and having little toxicity or harm to the human body.
data.target_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals can be used only when there are physical and biological conditions, such as being suitable for testing and treatment purposes and having little toxicity or harm to the human body.

data.source_sentence: 신티그래피는 방사성 의약품에 의해 집적된 특정 장기 및 조직의 상태를 신티카메라를 이용해 감마선을 검출하고 방사성의약품의 체내 분포를 영상화하는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: The scintigraphy is a method of detecting gamma rays using a scinti camera for the state of specific organs and tissues accumulated by radiopharmaceuticals and imaging the distribution of radiopharmaceuticals in the body.
data.target_sentence: Scintography is a method of detecting gamma rays using a scinti camera to image the distribution of radiopharmaceuticals in the body of specific organs and tissues accumulated by radiopharmaceuticals.

data.source_sentence: 신티그래피 영상을 위한 방사성 의약품은 양질의 화질과 적은 피폭 선량을 방출하는 핵종이 요구되며, 이에 짧은 반감기의 감마선을 방출하는 99 mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, 111In 등 이 많이 이용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals for scintigraphy images require high-quality image quality and nuclide that emits a small exposure dose, and 99 mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, and 111In, which emit gamma rays with a short half-life, are widely used.
data.target_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals for scintigraphy imaging require high-definition images and nuclides that emit small doses, and 99mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, and 111In, which emit gamma rays with short half-lives, are widely used.

data.source_sentence: 감마 카메라(Gamma camera)는 방사성동위원소에서 방출되는 감마선의 위치 정보를 획득하기 위해 조준기를 통해 에너지의 기계적 집속을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: A gamma camera performs mechanical focusing of energy through a collimator to acquire position information of gamma rays emitted from radioisotopes.
data.target_sentence: Gamma cameras mechanically focus energy through a collimator to obtain positional information of gamma rays emitted from radioactive isotopes.

data.source_sentence: 조준기는 감마 카메라의 영상 특징을 보여주는 핵심 구성요소이다.
data.mt_sentence: The aimer is a key component that shows the imaging characteristics of a gamma camera.
data.target_sentence: The collimator is a key part that shows the imaging characteristics of a gamma camera.

data.source_sentence: 조준기를 통과한 감마선 에너지는 섬광 결정에서 가시광선으로 변환되어 전달된다.
data.mt_sentence: Gamma-ray energy passing through the sight is converted from flash crystals to visible light and transferred.
data.target_sentence: Gamma-ray energy passing through the collimator is converted into visible light in the flash crystal and transmitted.

data.source_sentence: 변환된 가시광선은 광전자증배관을 지나 전기적 신호로 바뀐 후, 전치증폭기를 거쳐 검출 회로와 파고 분석기로 전달될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The converted visible light passes through a photomultiplier tube and is converted into an electrical signal, and then passes through a preamplifier and may be transmitted to a detection circuit and a wave height analyzer.
data.target_sentence: The converted visible light may be converted into an electrical signal through a photomultiplier tube, and then passed through a preamplifier to be transmitted to a detection circuit and a wavelength analyzer.

data.source_sentence: 조정기에서 특정 방향으로 입사되는 감마선을 검출하는 방식으로, 감마카메라는 환자 주변을 연속적으로 회전하면서 여러 방향에서 투사를 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: In such a way that the controller detects gamma rays incident in a specific direction, the gamma camera receives projections from various directions while continuously rotating around the patient.
data.target_sentence: In such a way that the controller detects gamma rays incident in a specific direction, the gamma camera continuously rotates around the patient, receiving projections from different directions.

data.source_sentence: 일 광자 단층 촬영은 다방향 투사를 통해 검출된 감마선의 영상재구성을 이용하여 단면 영상을 획득하는 기법으로 주로 심근, 뇌 혈류 측정 등의 생리적 영상에 활용되고 있다(Fig. 2).
data.mt_sentence: One-photon tomography is a technique for acquiring cross-sectional images using image reconstruction of gamma rays detected through multidirectional projection, and is mainly used for physiological images such as myocardial and cerebral blood flow measurements (Fig. 2).
data.target_sentence: One-photon tomography is a technique for acquiring cross-sectional images using image reconstruction of gamma rays detected through multidirectional projection, and is mainly used for physiological images such as myocardial and cerebral blood flow measurements (Fig. 2).

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 핵의학에서 영상 단층법이란 체내에 투여된 방사성의약품의 분포상태를 체 축과 수직인 여러 방향에서 측정하여 영상 재구성 기술을 통해 방사성 의약품 분포를 횡단면영상화하는 횡 단층법을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in nuclear medicine, imaging tomography refers to a cross-sectional tomography method in which the distribution of radioactive drugs administered in the body is measured in various directions perpendicular to the body axis and cross-sectional imaging of radioactive drugs through image reconstruction technology.
data.target_sentence: In general, image tomography in nuclear medicine refers to a cross-sectional tomography method that measures the distribution of a radiopharmaceutical administered in the body in various directions perpendicular to the body axis and a method of imaging a cross-section of a radioactive drug through image reconstruction technology. .

data.source_sentence: 단층 영상은 감마카메라에서 획득한 단면 영상에서 선원의 깊이 정보를 제공하고 깊이에 따라 다르게 측정되는 방사선 에너지를 중첩하는 방식을 사용하여 감마카메라를 통해 획득된 영상보다 높은 해상도와 대조도를 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The tomographic image has higher resolution and contrast than the image obtained through the gamma camera by providing depth information of the source in the cross-sectional image acquired by the gamma camera and superimposing the radiation energy measured differently depending on the depth.
data.target_sentence: A tomography image has higher resolution and contrast than an image acquired with a gamma camera by providing depth information of a light source on a cross-sectional image acquired with a gamma camera and superimposing radiation energy measured differently according to depth.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 융합영상의 제공은 방사성동위원소 섭취를 통한 비정상 병소의 생리학적 민감도와 특이도를 발현하여 정확한 진단을 할 수 있는 정보를 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The provision of such fusion images can provide information that can accurately diagnose abnormal lesions by expressing physiological sensitivity and specificity through radioisotope ingestion.
data.target_sentence: Providing such a fusion image can provide information for accurately diagnosing abnormal lesions by expressing physiological sensitivity and specificity through ingestion of radioactive isotopes.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영은 동시 계측 회로를 이용하여 원자핵에서 방출된 양전자가 주변 자유 전자를 만나 두 개의 감마선을 180o 방향으로 방출하는 소멸방사선(Annihilationradiation)을 측정한대서 기인된 검사법이다(Fig. 3).
data.mt_sentence: Positron emission tomography is a test method that uses a simultaneous measurement circuit to measure annihilation radiation in which positrons emitted from an atomic nucleus meet surrounding free electrons and emit two gamma rays in the 180o direction (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: Positron emission tomography is an inspection method in which positrons emitted from the nucleus of an atom meet free electrons and emit two gamma rays in the 180o direction using a simultaneous measurement circuit to measure extinction radiation (Figure 3).

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 핵종에 무기 혹은 유기화합물을 표지시켜 방사성의약품을 만들어 체내에 투여하면 인체와의 생리학 또는 생화학적 작용으로 각 장기, 조직에 집적될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When radiopharmaceuticals are made by labeling positron-emitting nuclides with inorganic or organic compounds and administered to the body, they can be accumulated in each organ and tissue through physiological or biochemical interactions with the human body.
data.target_sentence: When radiopharmaceuticals are administered to the human body by labeling positron-emitting nuclides with inorganic or organic compounds, they can accumulate in each organ and tissue through physiological or biochemical interactions with the human body.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영을 구성하기 위해서는 사이클로트론, 표지 합성 장치 등이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to construct positron emission tomography, a cyclotron, a label synthesis device, etc. are required.
data.target_sentence: In order to construct positron emission tomography, a cyclotron and a label synthesis device are required.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영을 위해서는 양전자 방출 핵종, 섬광체(Scintillator), 광전자증배관, 전치증폭기 등이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: For positron tomography, a positron emitting nuclide, a scintillator, a photomultiplier tube, and a preamplifier are required.
data.target_sentence: Positron emitting nuclide, scintillator, photomultiplier tube, and preamplifier are required for positron tomography.

data.source_sentence: 양전자방출 핵종은 수소 하전 입자를 사이클로트론의 원형 진공관 내에서 가속시킴으로써 수소 하전 입자에 운동에너지를 가한 높은 에너지(8 Mev 이상)의 양성자를 표적 물질에 조사하여 핵 반응을 통해 얻을 수 있다(Fig. 4).
data.mt_sentence: Positron-emitting nuclides can be obtained through a nuclear reaction by irradiating high-energy (8 Mev or more) protons to a target material by accelerating hydrogen-charged particles in a circular vacuum tube of a cyclotron, applying kinetic energy to hydrogen-charged particles (Fig. 4). ).
data.target_sentence: Positron emitting nuclides can be obtained through a nuclear reaction by irradiating a target material with protons of high energy (8 Mev or more) in which kinetic energy is added to hydrogen charged particles by accelerating hydrogen charged particles in a circular vacuum tube of a cyclotron (Fig 4).

data.source_sentence: 생성된 방사성 동위원소는 표적 물질과 다른 원소로 변환되어 사용하는 표적 물질에 따라 다양한 양전자 방출 핵종을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The generated radioactive isotope is converted into an element different from the target material to obtain various positron-emitting nuclides depending on the target material used.
data.target_sentence: The generated radioactive isotope is converted into an element different from the target material to obtain various positron-emitting nuclides depending on the target material used.

data.source_sentence: 그중 LSO는 형광소멸 시간이 짧아 영상분해능을 향상시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, LSO can improve image resolution due to its short fluorescence extinction time.
data.target_sentence: Among them, LSO can improve image resolution because of its short fluorescence quenching time.

data.source_sentence: 체내 집적 후 방출되는 소멸 방사선은 신틸레이터를 통해 검출기 내의 광전자증배관에서 검출된다.
data.mt_sentence: The extinction radiation emitted after integration into the body is detected in the photomultiplier tube in the detector through a scintillator.
data.target_sentence: The extinction radiation emitted after being incorporated into the body is detected by a scintillator in the detector's photomultiplier tube.

data.source_sentence: 동시계수 회로의 정보를 바탕으로 2개의 동시계수가 된 방사선을 이용하여 동시계수선을 구하고, 그 각도와 시야 중심에서 거리를 활용하여 데이터를 작성한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the information of the simultaneous coefficient circuit, a simultaneous coefficient line is obtained using two simultaneous coefficients of radiation, and data are prepared using the angle and the distance from the center of view.
data.target_sentence: Based on the information of the simultaneous counting circuit, a simultaneous graticule is obtained using two simultaneous radiation coefficients, and data is created using the angle and distance from the center.

data.source_sentence: 사용된 데이터를 투영 데이터라고 하며 각 각도, 거리별로 동시계수 수를 합산한 것이 양전자 단층 촬영 영상 재구성 데이터가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The data used is called projection data, and the sum of the number of simultaneous coefficients for each angle and distance becomes positron tomography image reconstruction data.
data.target_sentence: The data used is called projection data, and the sum of the number of simultaneous coefficients for each angle and distance becomes positron tomography image reconstruction data.

data.source_sentence: 투영 데이터는 양전자 단층 촬영 영상 재구성 수행을 위해 감도 보정과 흡수 보정, 우발동시계수 보정, 산란 보정, 계수손실보정, 방사능 감약 보정 등을 이용하여 보정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Projection data are corrected using sensitivity correction and absorption correction, accidental simultaneous coefficient correction, scattering correction, coefficient loss correction, and radioactivity reduction correction to perform positron tomography image reconstruction.
data.target_sentence: Perform positron tomography image reconstruction by correcting the projection data using sensitivity correction and absorption correction, accidental simultaneous counting correction, scattering correction, count loss correction, and radioactivity reduction correction.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 영상 재구성에서는 중첩 적분법(Convolutionback projection method)을 수행하며, 이는 투영 데이터에 보정 함수를 중첩 적분하여 역 투영하는 방법으로 조작이 간단하고 재구성이 빠른 특징이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in image reconstruction, a convolutionback projection method is performed, which is a method of superimposing and integrating a correction function on projection data and inversely projecting it.
data.target_sentence: In general, in image restoration, a convolutionback projection method is used, which is a method in which a correction function is superimposed on projection data and integrated and then reverse-projected.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영 영상은 감마카메라나 단일 광자 단층 촬영 영상에 비해 재현성이 우수하며 영상 내 정량적 정보와 방사능 농도와의 사이에 비례 관계를 표현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography images have superior reproducibility compared to gamma cameras or single photon tomography images, and can express a proportional relationship between quantitative information in the image and radioactivity concentration.
data.target_sentence: Positron tomography images have superior reproducibility compared to gamma cameras or single photon tomography images, and can express the proportional relationship between the quantitative information of the image and the radioactivity concentration.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영 영상의 부족한 해부학적 정보 제공은 국소 종양 진단의 어려움이 발생시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Insufficient anatomical information provided by positron tomography images may cause difficulties in diagnosing local tumors.
data.target_sentence: Insufficient anatomical information provided by positron tomography imaging can cause difficulties in diagnosing local tumors.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영과 전산화 단층 촬영은 각각 기존 임상에서 많이 사용되고 있으나, 두 기법을 통한 융합 영상 획득을 통해 더욱 정밀한 영상을 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography and computed tomography are each widely used in existing clinical trials, but more precise images can be provided through fusion image acquisition through the two techniques.
data.target_sentence: Although positron tomography and computed tomography are widely used in conventional clinical practice, more accurate images can be provided through fusion image acquisition through the two technologies.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출-전산화 단층 촬영을 포함한 의료 영상의 진단을 위한 요소로는 공간 및 시간, 대조도 분해능이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Factors for diagnosis of medical images, including positron emission-computed tomography, include spatial, temporal, and contrast resolution.
data.target_sentence: Factors in medical imaging, including positron emission computed tomography, include spatial, temporal, and contrast resolution.

data.source_sentence: 공간 분해능은 어느 정도 작은 구조물을 식별할 수 있는 능력이며 시간 분해능은 영상을 얻기 위해 소요되는 시간을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Spatial resolution is the ability to identify structures that are somewhat small, and time resolution refers to the time required to obtain images.
data.target_sentence: Spatial resolution is the ability to identify rather small structures, while temporal resolution means the time required to acquire an image.

data.source_sentence: 대조도 분해능은 목적 구조물을 얼마나 명료하게 나타낼 수 있는지를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Contrast resolution indicates how clearly the target structure can be represented.
data.target_sentence: Contrast resolution refers to how clearly the target structure can be represented.

data.source_sentence: 대조도 분해능을 가지고 있으나 공간 분해능이 매우 떨어지는 영상이 제공된다.
data.mt_sentence: An image with contrast resolution but very poor spatial resolution is provided.
data.target_sentence: It gives an image with contrast resolution but very low spatial resolution.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영만을 독립적으로 수행할 경우 전산화 단층 촬영 영상에 비해 5~6배 정도 우수한 공간 분해능을 갖는 영상을 획득할 수 있으나, 낮은 대조도 분해능으로 단독으로 병변 식별이 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: When only positron tomography is performed independently, images with 5 to 6 times better spatial resolution than computed tomography can be obtained, but lesion identification alone is difficult due to low contrast resolution.
data.target_sentence: When performing positron tomography alone, images with spatial resolution 5 to 6 times higher than that of computed tomography can be obtained, but it is difficult to identify lesions alone due to the low contrast resolution.

data.source_sentence: 이유로 두 기법을 융합하여 만들어진 하나의 융합 영상은 대조도 조절의 측면에서도 자유롭기 때문에 동일한 병변에 대한 여러 측면의 검토를 쉽게 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, a single fusion image created by fusion of two techniques can easily provide a review of multiple aspects of the same lesion because it is free from the aspect of contrast control.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, a single fusion image generated by fusion of the two techniques can easily provide review of multiple aspects of the same lesion, as it is free in terms of contrast agent control.

data.source_sentence: 분자 영상의 특성상 제공할 수 있는 영상 내 모든 정보를 정량적 수치로 제공하여 질병의 유무를 판단하기 때문에 영상의 진단적 가치를 높이며 의료 영상 분야에서 중요도가 높아지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the nature of molecular imaging, all information within an image that can be provided is provided as a quantitative value to determine the presence or absence of a disease, thereby increasing the diagnostic value of the image and increasing its importance in the field of medical imaging.
data.target_sentence: Due to the nature of molecular imaging, all information in the image that can be provided is provided as quantitative values to determine the presence or absence of disease. Therefore, the diagnostic value of images is increasing and the importance is increasing in the field of medical imaging.

data.source_sentence: 두 장비의 장점을 융합하여 서로 다른 차원의 데이터를 동시에 획득하여 질병의 조기 진단과 관찰, 수술적 치료 계획과 관리 등 광범위한 분야에서 응용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By combining the advantages of the two devices, data of different dimensions are obtained at the same time, and they are applied in a wide range of fields such as early diagnosis and observation of diseases, and surgical treatment planning and management.
data.target_sentence: By combining the strengths of the two devices, different dimensions of data can be obtained at the same time, so it is being applied to various fields such as early diagnosis and observation of diseases, and surgical treatment planning and management.

data.source_sentence: 초기 개발 시, 자기 공명 영상 장치에서 양전자 단층 촬영 장치 동작의 영향을 최소화하기 위해 철과 같은 자기 투자율(Magnetic Permeability)이 높은 물질로 표류 자기장(Stray Magnetic Field)을 차폐하는 방식의 수동 차폐(passive shielding)기술이 제시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In early development, passive shielding technology, which shields a stray magnetic field with a material with high magnetic permeability such as iron, is presented to minimize the effect of positron tomography device behavior in magnetic resonance imaging devices.
data.target_sentence: In early development, passive shielding techniques that shield stray magnetic fields with materials with high magnetic permeability such as iron are proposed to minimize the effects of positron tomography device behavior in magnetic resonance imaging devices.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 기존의 다양한 영상 획득 방법들을 보존하고 초 고자장 환경유지를 가능하게 하는 새로운 기술이 등장하게 된 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, a new technology has emerged that preserves various existing image acquisition methods and enables the maintenance of an ultra-high magnetic field environment.
data.target_sentence: Through this, a new technology that can maintain the ultra-high magnetic field environment while maintaining the existing various image acquisition methods has emerged.

data.source_sentence: 공간적 일치를 이룬 융합 영상 제공은 가능하나 동 시간대 영상 획득의 어려움이 남게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is possible to provide a spatially matched fusion image, but it remains difficult to acquire an image at the same time.
data.target_sentence: It is possible to provide spatially consistent fusion images, but it is still difficult to acquire images at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 동 시간대의 영상획득을 위한 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상 구성을 위해서는 자기 공명 영상 획득이 진행하면서 양전자 단층 촬영의 광전자 증배관의 작동이 동시에 이뤄져야만 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to construct a positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance image for image acquisition at the same time, the photomultiplier tube of positron tomography must be operated simultaneously while magnetic resonance image acquisition proceeds.
data.target_sentence: In order to simultaneously construct a positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance image for image acquisition, the photomultiplier tube of positron tomography must be operated simultaneously while the MR image acquisition is in progress.

data.source_sentence: 최근 초 고자장 내에서 이러한 환경 유지가 가능하도록 광전자 증배관의 역할을 대신할 수 있는 반도체형 광전소자(Avalanchephotodiode, APD)가 개발되어 동 시간대의 영상 획득이 가능한 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상이 개발되기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a semiconductor-type photoelectric device (Avalanchephotodiode, APD) that can replace the role of a photomultiplier tube has been developed to maintain such an environment in an ultra-high magnetic field, and positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging that can acquire images at the same time period was also developed.
data.target_sentence: Recently, in order to maintain this environment in an ultra-high magnetic field, a semiconductor-type photoelectric device (Avalanchephotodiode, APD) that can replace the role of a photomultiplier has been developed, and positron emission tomography and magnetic resonance imaging that can acquire images are developed at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 이후 더 나은 반도체형 광전소자의 발전으로 광전자 증배관 수준의 광 증폭이 가능한 실리콘형 광전자 증배관(Silicon Photomultiplier, SiPM)과 디지털 실리콘 형 광전자 증배관(Digital SiPM)이 개발되어 온전한 디지털 양전자 단층 촬영 기술 개발도 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since then, with the development of better semiconductor-type optoelectronic devices, a silicon-type photomultiplier (SiPM) and a digital silicon-type photomultiplier tube (Digital SiPM) that can amplify the level of light at the level of a photomultiplier tube were developed, and a complete digital positron tomography technology was developed. Development is also taking place.
data.target_sentence: Since then, with the development of better semiconductor type optoelectronic devices, a silicon photomultiplier (SiPM) and a digital silicon type photomultiplier (Digital SiPM) capable of amplifying light at the level of a photomultiplier have been developed. For this reason, development of fully digital positron emission tomography technology is also being carried out.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상의 정확한 영상 제공을 위해서는 자기 공명 영상의 균일한 자기장 및 경사 자장의 선형성을 통한 영상의 위치 정보 제공이 매우 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to provide an accurate image of a positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance image, it is very essential to provide position information of the image through the linearity of a uniform magnetic field and gradient magnetic field of a magnetic resonance image.
data.target_sentence: In order to provide an accurate image of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging, it is very important to provide positional information of the image through the uniform magnetic field and linearity of the gradient magnetic field of the magnetic resonance image.

data.source_sentence: 더불어 인체의 불수의적인 움직임으로 인해 발생하는 움직임 인공 음영(Motion artifact)으로 인한 영상 융합의 공간적 불일치가 발생할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, spatial inconsistency in image fusion may occur due to motion artifacts caused by involuntary movements of the human body.
data.target_sentence: In addition, spatial inconsistency of image fusion may occur due to motion artifacts caused by involuntary movements of the human body.

data.source_sentence: 실시간으로 경사 자장을 조정하여 움직임이 없는 영상을 획득하는 기술을 발전시키기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It has also developed a technology for acquiring motionless images by adjusting the gradient magnetic field in real time.
data.target_sentence: It also developed a technology to acquire motionless images by controlling the gradient magnetic field in real time.

data.source_sentence: 현재 가장 최신화 기법인 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상의 완벽한 상용화를 위해서는 아직 기술적으로 많은 한계를 지니고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently, there are still many technical limitations for the complete commercialization of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging, the most recent technique.
data.target_sentence: There are still many technical limitations to the complete commercialization of the most recent technology, positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영과 자기 공명 영상을 독립적으로 수행하는 것과 비교하여 높은 검사 가격으로 대상자 모집이 어려워 임상적 측면에서 진단적인 가치 향상을 가져다주기는 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to the independent performance of positron tomography and magnetic resonance imaging, it is difficult to recruit subjects at a high test price, which is insufficient to bring diagnostic value improvement from a clinical perspective.
data.target_sentence: It is difficult to recruit subjects at a high test price compared to the independent performance of positron tomography and magnetic resonance imaging, which is insufficient to bring about improvement in diagnostic value from a clinical point of view.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영은 감쇠(attenuation), 산란(scatter), 부동시간(dead time), 형광 소멸(Luminescence decay), 표준화(normalization) 등의 다양한 변수의 보정이 필요하며 이를 통해 정량적으로 영상의 정확도를 높여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography requires correction of various variables such as attenuation, scattering, dead time, fluorescence decay, and normalization, and quantitatively increase the accuracy of the image.
data.target_sentence: Positron tomography requires correction of various variables such as attenuation, scattering, dead time, luminescence decay, and normalization, and through this, it is necessary to quantitatively increase the accuracy of the image.

data.source_sentence: 그중 영상의 민감도에 가장 많은 영향을 미치는 감쇠 보정의 향상을 위해 체내 조직들의 정밀한 밀도와 감쇠 정보가 매우 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, precise density and attenuation information of body tissues are very important to improve attenuation correction, which has the most influence on image sensitivity.
data.target_sentence: Among them, accurate density and attenuation information of body tissues are very important in order to improve attenuation correction, which has the greatest influence on image sensitivity.

data.source_sentence: 자기 공명 영상 정보는 조직 내 양자 밀도에 자기적 성질이 포함된 정보로 양자 정보 이외의 조직 밀도, 감쇠 정보를 측정하는 기술은 미흡하다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic resonance image information is information that includes magnetic properties in the quantum density within the tissue, and techniques for measuring tissue density and attenuation information other than quantum information are insufficient.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic resonance image information is information that includes magnetic properties in the quantum density in the tissue, and the technology for measuring tissue density and attenuation information other than quantum information is insufficient.

data.source_sentence: 추후 이러한 기술적인 부분을 해결한다면 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상의 상용화에 큰 도움이 될 것으로 판단되며 차세대 의료 영상 장비로써 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상의 임상적 역할이 커질 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: If these technical aspects are resolved in the future, it will be of great help to the commercialization of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging, and it is expected that the clinical role of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging as a next-generation medical imaging device will increase.
data.target_sentence: If these technical issues are resolved in the future, it is judged to be of great help in the commercialization of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging. As a next-generation medical imaging device, the clinical role of positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging is expected to grow.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 특이 광 투과 현상 센서에서 보조 파장 홀 패턴에 입사되는 광원의 각도 조절을 통해 센서의 민감도를 측정 및 분석하여 이를 극대화할 수 있는 방법을 고안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a method was devised to maximize the sensor's sensitivity by measuring and analyzing the sensor's sensitivity by adjusting the angle of the light source incident on the auxiliary wavelength Hall pattern in the special light transmission phenomenon sensor.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, a method was devised to maximize the sensor's sensitivity by measuring and analyzing the sensor's sensitivity by adjusting the angle of the light source incident on the auxiliary wavelength Hall pattern in a special light-transmitting sensor.

data.source_sentence: 입사파 광원을 평행화된 광원과 각도가 서로 다른 두 개의 집속화된 광원 총 3개의 광원을 시스템적으로 설계하여 서로 다른 각도로 보조 파장 홀 패턴에 입사되게 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The incident wave light source was manufactured to be incident on the auxiliary wavelength hole pattern at different angles by systematically designing a total of three light sources, a parallelized light source and two focused light sources having different angles.
data.target_sentence: As for the incident wave light source, a total of three light sources were systematically designed with two condensing light sources having different angles from the parallel light source, so that they were incident on the auxiliary wavelength hole pattern at different angles.

data.source_sentence: 코로나바이러스감염증-19 (COVID-19)로 인해 세계적으로 사람들이 이 질병에 감염되어 심하게는 사망에 이르게 되며, 세계보건기구(WHO)는 COVID-19가 범유행 전염병(팬데믹)임을 선언하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), people around the world become infected with the disease and even die, the World Health Organization (WHO) has declared COVID-19 a pandemic.
data.target_sentence: Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), people around the world are infected with this disease and even die. The World Health Organization (WHO) has declared COVID-19 a pandemic.

data.source_sentence: 상황 속에서 바이러스와 같은 질병들을 더욱 빠르고 정확하게 실시간으로 감지할 수 있는 바이오 센서 개발의 필요성이 대두되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In this context, the need for developing a biosensor capable of detecting diseases such as viruses more quickly and accurately in real time is emerging.
data.target_sentence: In this situation, the need for the development of a biosensor capable of detecting diseases such as viruses in real time more quickly and accurately is emerging.

data.source_sentence: 특히 바이러스와 같은 작은 크기의 물질을 감지하기 위해서는 민감도가 높은 센서를 개발하는 것이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, it is essential to develop a sensor with high sensitivity to detect small-sized substances such as viruses.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it is essential to develop a high-sensitivity sensor to detect small substances such as viruses.

data.source_sentence: 민감도의 경우 금속의 유전율과 홀 사이즈, 주기 그리고 모양과 같은 파라미터에 의해 달라진다.
data.mt_sentence: Sensitivity depends on the dielectric constant of the metal and parameters such as hole size, period, and shape.
data.target_sentence: Sensitivity depends on the dielectric constant of the metal and on parameters such as hole size, period, and shape.

data.source_sentence: 특이 광 투과 현상을 연구할 때 나노홀 어레이에 정확하게 빛을 집속시키기 위해 대물렌즈를 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: When studying a specific light transmission phenomenon, an objective lens is used to accurately focus light on an array of nanoholes.
data.target_sentence: When studying specific light transmission phenomena, objective lenses are used to precisely focus light onto an array of nanoholes.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 지름이 250 nm, 주기가 550 nm인 나노 홀 어레이 패턴을 가지는 기판을 제작하고, 이어 입사각의 각도를 조절할 수 있는 시스템을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, a substrate having a nano-hole array pattern having a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm was fabricated, and then a system capable of adjusting the angle of the incident angle was fabricated.
data.target_sentence: First, a substrate having a nanohole array pattern having a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm was fabricated, and then a system capable of adjusting the angle of the incident angle was fabricated.

data.source_sentence: 바이오센서는 1950년대 클락(Clack)에 의해서 포도당 측정을 위해 개발된 글루코오스 센서를 시작으로 지금까지 꾸준히 개발되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Biosensors have been continuously developed since the glucose sensor developed for glucose measurement by Clark in the 1950s.
data.target_sentence: Biosensors have been continuously developed since the glucose sensor developed by Clark in the 1950s for glucose measurement.

data.source_sentence: 특이 광 투과 스펙트럼을 측정하기 위해 광학 시스템을 그림 1과 같이 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To measure the specific light transmission spectrum, the optical system was designed as shown in Figure 1.
data.target_sentence: To measure a specific light transmission spectrum, the optical system is designed as shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 광원은 편광자를 통과하여 TM (transverse magnetic)파 형태로 바뀌게 되며 이 광원은 홀 어레이 패턴에 조사된다.
data.mt_sentence: The light source passes through the polarizer and is converted into a TM (transverse magnetic) wave, and the light source is irradiated to the hole array pattern.
data.target_sentence: The light source passes through the polarizer and is converted into a transverse magnetic (TM) waveform so that the light source is irradiated to the hole array pattern.

data.source_sentence: 입사 각도에 따른 차이를 광원 세 가지로 구분하였으며, 그림1(a)와 같이 평행화된 광원과 그림 1(b)의 집속화된 광원을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference according to the incident angle was divided into three light sources, and a parallelized light source as shown in Figure 1(a) and a concentrated light source as shown in Figure 1(b) were manufactured.
data.target_sentence: A parallel light source as shown in Fig. 1(a) and a concentrated light source as shown in Fig. 1(b) were manufactured by dividing the difference according to the incident angle into three light sources.

data.source_sentence: 지름이 250 nm, 주기가 550 nm인 나노 홀 어레이 패턴을 제작하기 위해 전자 빔 리소그래피 공정과 리프트 오프 공정을 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Electron beam lithography and lift-off processes were used to fabricate nano-hole array patterns with a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm.
data.target_sentence: A nanohole array pattern with a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm was fabricated using electron beam lithography and lift-off process.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 BK7 유리기판을 세척한 후, Cr 10 nm와 Au 10 nm를 물리 기상 증착(physical vapor deposi-tion) 방식인 전자 빔 증발법(E-beam evaporation)과 열 증발법(thermal evaporation)을 혼용하여 증착하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the BK7 glass substrate was washed, and then Cr 10 nm and Au 10 nm were deposited by mixing E-beam evaporation and thermal evaporation, which are physical vapor deposition methods.
data.target_sentence: First, after washing the BK7 glass substrate, 10 nm of Cr and 10 nm of Au were deposited by mixing the physical vapor deposition method, E-beam deposition, and thermal deposition.

data.source_sentence: Cr은 접착층으로서 BK7 유리기판과 금을 접촉하기 위해 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Cr was used as an adhesive layer to contact the BK7 glass substrate and gold.
data.target_sentence: Cr was used as an adhesive layer to contact the gold with the BK7 glass substrate.

data.source_sentence: 전자 빔 리소그래피 공정을 통해 나노 홀 어레이 패턴에 맞게 리소그래피 공정을 진행한 후 현상하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the electron beam lithography process, a lithography process was performed according to the nano-hole array pattern and then developed.
data.target_sentence: After the lithography process was performed according to the nanohole array pattern through the electron beam lithography process, it was developed.

data.source_sentence: 광원이 입사되는 과정에서 각도가 커지면서 특이 광 투과현상 효과가 감소하여 센서의 민감도에도 영향을 미치는 경향이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As the angle increases during the incident of the light source, the specific light transmission effect decreases, and thus the sensitivity of the sensor tends to be affected.
data.target_sentence: As the angle increases while the light source is incident, the effect of certain light transmission decreases, which tends to affect the sensitivity of the sensor.

data.source_sentence: 이를 바탕으로 광원의 각도에 따른 센서의 민감도를 비교해보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on this, it is intended to compare the sensitivity of the sensor according to the angle of the light source.
data.target_sentence: Based on this, we want to compare the sensitivity of the sensor according to the angle of the light source.

data.source_sentence: 특이 광 투과 현상을 기반으로 한 센서 시스템을 제작하려고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: We are trying to fabricate a sensor system based on a specific light transmission phenomenon.
data.target_sentence: You want to build a sensor system based on a specific light transmission phenomenon.

data.source_sentence: 입사 각도에 따른 차이를 광원 세 가지로 구분하였으며, 그림 1 의 1(a)와 같이 평행화 된 광원과 1(b)의 집속화된 광원을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference according to the incident angle was divided into three light sources, and a parallelized light source and a focused light source of 1(b) were fabricated as shown in Figure 1(a).
data.target_sentence: By dividing the difference according to the incident angle into three light sources, a parallel light source and a condensed light source 1(b) were manufactured as shown in Fig. 1(a).

data.source_sentence: 1(b)에서 배율이 4 배인대물렌즈에서는 입사각도가 0 도부터 최대 6 도의 광원이 입사하고, 배율이 10 배인대물렌즈에서는 0 도부터 16 도의 광원이 입사하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In 1(b), a light source with an incident angle of 0 degrees to a maximum of 6 degrees is incident on an objective lens with a magnification of 4x, and a light source with an incident angle of 0 degrees to 16 degrees is incident on an objective lens with a magnification of 10x.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 1(b), in the objective lens with a magnification of 4x, a light source with an incident angle of 0 degrees to a maximum of 6 degrees is incident. In an objective lens with a magnification of 10x, a light source of 0 degrees to 16 degrees is incident.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 공통되는 부분인 나노 홀 패턴은 지름 250 nm와 주기 550 nm로 설정하였고, 광원은 TM파를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the nano-hole pattern, which is a common part, was set to a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm, and TM waves were used as the light source.
data.target_sentence: First, a common part, a nanohole pattern, was set to have a diameter of 250 nm and a period of 550 nm, and a TM wave was used as a light source.

data.source_sentence: 평행화된 광원은 입사 각도를 0도로 평행하게 빛이 입사되도록 설정하였고 집속화된 광원은 0도부터 6도(대물렌즈 4배, NA: 0.10)와 16도(대물렌즈 10배, NA: 0.28) 총 두 개의 입사 각도를 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The parallelized light source set the incident angle to be parallel to 0 degrees, and the focused light source set two incident angles from 0 degrees to 6 degrees (4 times the objective lens, NA: 0.10) and 16 degrees (10 times the objective lens, NA: 0.28).
data.target_sentence: The parallel light source sets the angle of incidence parallel to 0 degrees, and the condensed light source sets the angle of incidence from 0 to 6 degrees (4 times that of the objective lens, NA: 0.10) and 16 degrees (10x objective, NA: 0.28).

data.source_sentence: 각도별로 계산된 스펙트럼의 결과값 평균을 구하여 전체적인 집속 광원의 스펙트럼을 구현하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The overall spectrum of the focused light source was realized by obtaining the average of the result values of the spectrum calculated for each angle.

data.source_sentence: 한국에너지공단과 중소기업청의 기술 보고서에 의하면 소형 풍력발전기는 중소기업을 중심으로 개발이 이루어지고 있으며 이중 발전기 부분을 연구 개발하는 대표 기업으로 BBB 등을 언급하고 있다.

There is one history.

data.source_sentence: 해외 풍력발전기 개발 현황을 살펴보면 10대 주요 풍력발전 공급업체가 세계 시장의 75% 이상을 점유하고 있는 것으로 알 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 과거에는 덴마크와 독일을 선두로 풍력발전기 시장을 선점하는 추세였지만 최근에는 공격적인 투자와 연구개발을 바탕으로 점점 중국 기업의 시장 비중이 높아지는 추세이다.

data.source_sentence: 대부분 입지조건이 우수하며 에너지 밀도가 높은 해상풍력을 위한 대용량 풍력발전기의 개발들이 이루어지고 있으며 최대8MW 급의 발전기도 개발되었다.

data.target_sentence: In most cases, large-capacity wind power generators for offshore wind power with excellent location conditions and high energy density are being developed, and generators of up to 8 MW are being developed.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 영구자석 발전기는 가변속도 운전방식을 기반으로 하고 있으며 단단, 다단의 기어박스를 사용하기도 하고 기어박스를 사용하지 않는 직접 구동 방식도 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Most permanent magnet generators are based on a variable speed operation method, and either single-stage or multi-stage gearboxes are used, or a direct drive method that does not use a gearbox is also used.
data.target_sentence: Most permanent magnet generators are based on a variable speed operation method, and either a single-stage or multi-stage gearbox is used, or a direct drive method that does not use a gearbox is used.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 최근 게재된 논문들에서 제시된 발전기의 용량과 전류밀도의 분포를 보여 준다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the generator capacity and current density distribution presented in a recently published paper.

data.source_sentence: 주로 발전기의 설계와 최적설계, 제어기법 등과 관련된 연구가 수행되어 왔고 작게는 수 kW 용량의 발전기에서 크게는 10 MW급 이상의 발전기까지 연구가 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Research has been mainly conducted on the design and optimal design of generators, control techniques, etc., and research has been conducted from generators with a capacity of several kW to generators with a capacity of 10 MW or higher.
data.target_sentence: Research on generator design, optimal design, and control technology has been mainly conducted, and research is being conducted from generators with a capacity of several kW to generators with a capacity of 10 MW or more.

data.source_sentence: 다음으로 회전자 및 고정자의 세부형상, 제작성을 고려한 권선사양 등의 최적설계를 통해 역기전력 THD의 감소, 코깅토크 저감 및 고정자 코어의 적절한 포화도 선정 등을 하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Next, through optimal design such as detailed shape of rotor and stator and winding specification considering fabricability, reverse electromotive force THD is reduced, cogging torque is reduced, and proper saturation of stator core is selected.
data.target_sentence: Next, the back electromotive force THD is reduced, the cogging torque is reduced, and the appropriate saturation of the stator core is selected through the optimal design of the winding specifications in consideration of the detailed shape of the rotor and the stator and machinability.

data.source_sentence: 세부 전자기 해석을 통해 발전기의 동손, 철손, 영구자석 와전류 손의 전자기 손실값들을 확인하고 발전기의 효율과 출력조건을 검토함으로써 전자기 설계를 완료하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The electromagnetic design is completed by checking the electromagnetic loss values of the generator's copper loss, iron loss, and permanent magnet eddy current loss through detailed electromagnetic analysis, and examining the efficiency and output conditions of the generator.
data.target_sentence: The electromagnetic loss values of the generator's copper loss, iron loss, and permanent magnet eddy current loss are confirmed through detailed electromagnetic analysis, and the efficiency and output conditions of the generator are reviewed to complete the electromagnetic design.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 영구자석 발전기의 고정자 철손, 회전자 와전류 손실 분포의 예를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows an example of the distribution of stator iron loss and rotor eddy current loss of a permanent magnet generator.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 7 shows an example of the distribution of stator iron loss and rotor eddy current loss of a permanent magnet generator.

data.source_sentence: 상용 유한요소해석 소프트웨어를 이용하여 부하해석을 수행하게 되면 이와 같은 손실량과 손실 분포를 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When load analysis is performed using commercial finite element analysis software, such a loss amount and loss distribution can be confirmed.
data.target_sentence: This loss amount and loss distribution can be confirmed by performing load analysis using commercial finite element analysis software.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 8은 영구자석 발전기의 기계-전기 에너지 변환 흐름도이며, 이로부터 발전기의 입력과 출력 관계를 정의하고 발전기의 성능, 효율을 산정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 8 is a flow chart of the mechanical-electrical energy conversion of the permanent magnet generator, from which the relationship between the input and output of the generator can be defined and the performance and efficiency of the generator can be calculated.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 8 is a mechanical-electrical energy conversion flow chart of the permanent magnet generator, through which the relationship between the input and output of the generator can be defined and the performance and efficiency of the generator can be calculated.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 매입형 회전자 구조를 갖는 영구자석 발전기의 기계구조해석 예시를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 shows an example of mechanical structure analysis of a permanent magnet generator with a buried rotor structure.
data.target_sentence: Figure 9 shows an example of mechanical structural analysis of a permanent magnet generator with a buried rotor structure.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 해석을 통해 회전체의 각 부분에 발생하는 응력을 확인할 수 있으며 회전자 코어, 영구자석 등의 재질이 갖고 있는 항복응력과 비교하여 안정도를 예측할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this analysis, the stress generated in each part of the rotating body can be checked, and the stability can be predicted by comparing it with the yield stress of materials such as the rotor core and permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: Through this analysis, the stress generated in each part of the rotating body can be checked, and the stability can be predicted by comparing it with the yield stress of materials such as the rotor core and permanent magnets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 10은 영구자석 발전기의 고정자 코어의 모드해석 예시를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 10 shows an example of the mode analysis of the stator core of a permanent magnet generator.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 10 shows an example of mode analysis of the stator core of a permanent magnet generator.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같은 해석을 통해 고정자 코어의 각 모드에서의 고유 진동수를 확인하여 운전영역에서 공진의 문제 등을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through such an analysis, it is possible to check the natural frequency in each mode of the stator core to check the resonance problem in the operation area.

data.source_sentence: 보통 해석을 수행할 때, 정격 온도와 정격 전류조건보다 더 가혹한 조건에서 감자해석을 수행하여 설계의 안전성을 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: When performing normal analysis, the demagnetization analysis is performed under harsher conditions than the rated temperature and rated current to check the safety of the design.
data.target_sentence: In general, when performing an analysis, demagnetization analysis is performed under conditions more severe than rated temperature and rated current to verify the safety of the design.

data.source_sentence: 최근 고전적인 설계기법이 아닌 다중물리 해석을 기반으로 한 설계나 손실해석, 구조강도 해석, 열 해석과 관련된 연구들이 수행되고 있으며, 기어박스를 대체하기 위한 마그네틱 기어를 적용한 발전기의 설계와 같은 연구도 수행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, studies related to design, loss analysis, structural strength analysis, and thermal analysis based on multi-physical analysis, not classical design techniques, are being conducted, such as designing a generator with magnetic gear to replace a gearbox.
data.target_sentence: Recently, studies related to design, loss analysis, structural strength analysis, and thermal analysis based on multiphysics analysis rather than classical design techniques such as designing generators with magnetic gears to replace gearboxes are in progress.

data.source_sentence: 이중 회전자나 이중 고정자 등과 같이 기존에 많이 쓰이던 일반적인 형태와 다른 새로운 형태의 발전기 설계의 가능성 및 다탕성에 관한 연구들도 수행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Studies are also being conducted on the possibility and versatility of designing new types of generators, which differ from the general forms that were widely used in the past, such as double rotators and double fixers.

data.source_sentence: 발전기 최적설계 기법은 크게 확률론적 알고리즘과 근사 최적화 기법 두 가지로 분류된다.
data.mt_sentence: Generator optimal design techniques are largely divided into two categories: probabilistic algorithms and approximate optimization techniques.
data.target_sentence: Generator optimal design techniques fall into two main categories: probabilistic algorithms and approximate optimization techniques.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 12의 (a)와 (b)는 각각 확률론적 알고리즘과 근사 최적화 기법의 최적화 설계에 대한 순서도이다.

data.source_sentence: 신재생에너지 중 풍력발전시스템에 사용되는 영구자석 발전기의 타입별 그리고 형상별 분류를 통해 각 발전기의 특징과 장단점을 정리하였고 관련 문헌조사를 통해 국내·외의 풍력발전기 개발 현황을 조사하고 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the new and renewable energy, the characteristics and advantages and disadvantages of each generator were summarized through classification by type and shape of permanent magnet generators used in wind power generation systems.

data.source_sentence: 영구자석 발전기와 관련된 최근 10년간 게재된 논문들을 조사하여 연구 주제에 따라 분류하고 설계·해석에 관련된 연구를 정리하여 연구 동향을 분석하였다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문과 참고문헌은 풍력에너지 변환용 영구자석기기의 타입 선정 방법과 설계 및 해석 시 고려해야 할 부분 등과 같은 자료를 얻은데 유용할 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper and references are considered to be useful in obtaining data such as a method of selecting a type of permanent magnet device for wind energy conversion and parts to be considered in design and analysis.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 산업통상자원부(MOTIE)와 한국에너지기술평가 원(KETEP)의 지원을 받아 수행한 연구 과제입니다(No.20183010025420).
