data.target_sentence: This study was carried out with the support of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy and the Korea Energy Technology Evaluation and Planning (KETEP).

data.source_sentence: 영구자석은 모터의 중요한 구성요소로서 영구자석 고유의 특성이 모터의 성능과 비용 결정하는 주요 요인이 되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A permanent magnet is an important component of a motor, and its unique characteristics become a major factor in determining the performance and cost of the motor.
data.target_sentence: Permanent magnets are an important component of motors, and their unique characteristics are an important factor in determining the performance and cost of the motor.

data.source_sentence: 이를 기반으로 회전자 극 수(6, 8, 10극)와 타입(매입자석형, 자속집중형)에 따른 영구자석 동기 모터의 역기전력과 감자특성을 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on this, the back electromotive force and demagnetization characteristics of permanent magnet synchronous motors according to the number of rotor poles (6, 8, 10 poles) and types (embedded magnet type, magnetic flux concentration type) are analyzed.
data.target_sentence: Based on this, the back electromotive force of permanent magnet synchronous motors and demagnetization characteristics according to the number of rotor poles (6, 8, and 10) and types (built-in magnet type, magnetic flux concentration type) were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해, 영구자석 동기 모터의 설계 방향을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, the design direction of permanent magnet synchronous motor is suggested.

data.source_sentence: 특히 소결 NdFeB PM을 사용하여 고효율, 고출력 그리고 경량화를 위한 연구가 활발히 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, research for high efficiency, high output, and weight reduction using sintered NdFeB PM is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: In particular, research for high efficiency, high output, and weight reduction using sintered NdFeB PM is being actively conducted.

data.target_sentence: Most sintered NdFeBPMs contain rare earth elements such as dysprosium (Dy).

data.target_sentence: In order to reduce the manufacturing cost of PMSM, studies have been conducted to minimize Dy.

data.source_sentence: 이는 ferritePM에 비해 높은 성능을 가지고, 가격 변동에 대한 대응과 원재료 수급에 효율적이다 .
data.mt_sentence: It has higher performance than ferritePM, and is efficient in responding to price fluctuations and supplying raw materials.
data.target_sentence: It has better performance than ferrite PM, responds to price fluctuations and is more efficient in supplying raw materials.

data.source_sentence: 이방성 본드 NdFeB PM은 모든 온도 범위에서 비선형 특성이 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The anisotropically bonded NdFeB PM exhibits nonlinear properties over all temperature ranges.
data.target_sentence: Anisotropically coupled NdFeB PMs exhibit nonlinear properties over all temperature ranges.

data.source_sentence: 제시된 방법들은 PM의 동작점을 추정하기 위해 PM의 감자특성을 두 직선으로 근사화하였다.

data.target_sentence: The presented method approximates the demagnetization characteristics of the PM with two straight lines to estimate the PM's operating point.

data.source_sentence: 이 방법은 기울기가 급격히 변하는 무릎점 부근에서 동작점이 결정되거나, 전영역 비선형 특성인 본드 NdFeB PM의 경우, 정확한 동작점 계산에 한계가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In this method, the operating point is determined near the knee point where the slope changes rapidly, or in the case of the bonded NdFeB PM, which is a nonlinear characteristic of the entire region, there is a limit to the accurate calculation of the operating point.
data.target_sentence: This method has limitations in determining the operating point near the knee point where the slope changes rapidly, or in accurately calculating the operating point in the case of NdFeB-coupled PM, which is a nonlinear characteristic of the entire area. point out.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구는 산업통상자원부 ‘산업전문인력역량강화사업’의 재원으로 한국산업기술진흥원(KIAT)의 지원을 받아 수행된 연구이다(2021년 미래형자동차 R&D 전문인력 양성사업, 과제번호: N0002428).

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 경량 전기차의 구동모터 사이즈에 따른 전비 분석에 관한 연구 내용을 다룬다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper deals with research on fuel efficiency analysis according to the size of the driving motor of a lightweight electric vehicle.

data.source_sentence: 구동모터를 구성하고 있는 재료의 자기적 특성과 기계적 특성을 고려하여 단면 형상 설계를 진행하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 예측한 특성의 차량 전비에 대한 영향을 분석하기 위하여 차량 시뮬레이션을 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A vehicle simulation was constructed to analyze the effect of these predicted characteristics on vehicle fuel efficiency.

data.target_sentence: The efficiency of the motor is greatly affected by the magnetic material.

data.source_sentence: 모터의 고정자와 회전자 코어에 사용되는 전기 강판, 고정자권선, 회전자 영구자석 등은 모두 모터의 손실과 출력 특성에 영향을 미친다.

data.mt_sentence: Here, the iron loss is calculated through the post-processing process of 2D electromagnetic finite element analysis, which is described in Fig. 6.

data.source_sentence: 유한요소 해석 결과로부터 각 요소의 자속밀도 변화를 고조파 분석을 통하여 성분을 분리하고 자속밀도별 주파수별 철손 측정 데이터를 이용하여 각 요소의 철손을 계산한다.

data.target_sentence: From the finite element analysis result, the components are separated through harmonic analysis of the change in magnetic flux density of each element, and the iron loss of each element is calculated using the frequency-specific iron loss measurement data for each magnetic flux density.

data.source_sentence: 이를 모든 요소에 대하여 수행하여 모터 전체의 철손 산정을 진행하였다.

data.source_sentence: 최대 자속밀도 크기를 가지는 고조파에서 내측 공극자속 밀도는 유한요소법 해석 결과와 최대 1.2%의 오차가 발생하였으며, 외측 공극 자속 밀도는 2.4%의 오차가 발생하였다.

data.target_sentence: As a result, it can be seen that as the harmonics considered in the analysis using the analytical method in the presented data and Table IV increase, the finite element method analysis result and error rate decrease, but the analysis time increases.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 해석적 방법을 이용하여 마그네틱 기어의 자계 해석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, magnetic field analysis of magnetic gears was performed using an analytical method.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, magnetic field analysis of magnetic gear was performed using an analytical method.

data.source_sentence: 각 해석 영역의 지배 방정식 및 일반해를 도출하였으며, 적절한 경계조건을 통해서 자계 분포 특성을 도출하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The governing equations and general solutions of each analysis area were derived, and magnetic field distribution characteristics were derived through appropriate boundary conditions.
data.target_sentence: The governing equations and general solutions of each analysis domain were derived, and magnetic field distribution characteristics were derived through appropriate boundary conditions.

data.source_sentence: 고려되는 공간 고조파에 따른 자속밀도의 고조파 해석 결과와 유한요소해석 결과와 비교를 통해 해석 결과의 타당성을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The validity of the analysis results was verified by comparing the results of the harmonic analysis of magnetic flux density according to the spatial harmonics considered and the results of the finite element analysis.
data.target_sentence: The validity of the analysis results was verified by comparing the results of the magnetic flux density harmonic analysis according to the considered spatial harmonics and the finite element analysis results.

data.source_sentence: 조명에 사용되는 일반적인 백색 발광 다이오드는 청색 발광 다이오드 위에 황색 형광체를 입힌 구조가 보편적이나 발광 스펙트럼상 짙은 적색 성분이 부족해서 조명의 연색성이 떨어지는 문제가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A general white light emitting diode used for lighting generally has a structure in which a yellow phosphor is coated on a blue light emitting diode, but there is a problem in that the color rendering property of lighting is deteriorated due to the lack of a deep red component in the emission spectrum.
data.target_sentence: A typical white light emitting diode used for lighting has a structure in which a yellow phosphor is coated on a blue light emitting diode. However, there is a problem in that the color rendering of the light is poor due to the lack of a deep red component in the emission spectrum.

data.source_sentence: 양자점의 평균 자유 행정 및 확산판 내 TiO2 입자의 농도를 조절해 연색지수, 휘도 등 광특성을 조사했다.
data.mt_sentence: Optical properties such as color rendering index and luminance were investigated by controlling the average free path of quantum dots and the concentration of TiO2 particles in the diffusion plate.
data.target_sentence: Optical properties such as color rendering index and luminance were investigated by controlling the average free path of quantum dots and the concentration of TiO2 particles in the diffusion plate.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 조건에서 연색지수는 90을 넘었고 이는 적색 양자점 필름의 적용이 일반적인 백색 발광 다이오드의 연색 특성을 개선하는 데 효과적인 방법임을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The color rendering index exceeded 90 under most conditions, indicating that the application of a red quantum dot film is an effective method for improving the color rendering characteristics of a general white light emitting diode.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the color rendering index exceeds 90 in most conditions, and applying a red quantum dot film is an effective method for improving the color rendering properties of a general white light emitting diode.

data.source_sentence: 백색 발광다이오드(light emitting diode, LED)는 오늘날 조명의 새로운 흐름으로 확고히 자리잡았고 디스플레이 및 일반 조명 분야에서 급속히 응용을 확대해 가고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: White light emitting diodes (LEDs) are firmly established as a new trend in lighting today and are rapidly expanding their applications in the fields of displays and general lighting.
data.target_sentence: White light emitting diodes (LEDs) are firmly established as a new trend in lighting today and are rapidly expanding their applications in displays and general lighting.

data.source_sentence: 백색 LED의 채택으로 디스플레이의 두께가 대폭 감소하고 소비전력도 줄어들었으며, 이는 LCD가 디스플레이의 주류가 되는 중요한 계기가 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The adoption of white LED significantly reduced the thickness of the display and reduced power consumption, which became an important opportunity for LCD to become the mainstream of the display.
data.target_sentence: The adoption of white LED dramatically reduced the thickness of the display and reduced power consumption, which became an important opportunity for LCD to become the mainstream of the display.

data.source_sentence: 일반 조명용 광원으로도 LED는 긴 수 명, 저전력, 다양한 자유도 등 많은 장점을 가지고 있어 빠른 속도로 기존의 조명을 대체해 가고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a light source for general lighting, LED has many advantages such as long lifespan, low power, and various degrees of freedom, and is rapidly replacing conventional lighting.
data.target_sentence: As a light source for general lighting, LED has many advantages such as long lifespan, low power, and various degrees of freedom, and is rapidly replacing existing lighting.

data.source_sentence: 백색 LED는 일반적으로 InGaN 계열 청색 LED 위에 파장변환 물질을 올려 백색을 구현한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, white LED is implemented by putting a wavelength conversion material on top of an InGaN-based blue LED.
data.target_sentence: In general, a white LED is implemented by putting a wavelength conversion material on top of an InGaN-based blue LED.

data.source_sentence: YAG는 심홍색(deep red) 대역의 성분이 부족해 순도가 높은 적색을 포함한 물체의 색을 제대로 표현하기 힘들고 디스플레이의 색 재현성(color gamut) 측면에서도 문제가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since YAG lacks components in the deep red band, it is difficult to properly express the color of an object including high-purity red, and there is a problem in color gamut of the display.
data.target_sentence: Since YAG lacks components in the deep red band, it is difficult to properly express the colors of objects including high-purity red, and there is a problem in the color gamut of the display.

data.source_sentence: 이를 보완하기 위해 황색 형광체 대신 적색 및 녹색 형광체를 혼합해 적용하는 방법이 보편화되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To compensate for this, a method of mixing and applying red and green phosphors instead of yellow phosphors is becoming common.
data.target_sentence: In order to compensate for this, a method of mixing and applying a red phosphor and a green phosphor instead of a yellow phosphor has become common.

data.source_sentence: 다른 방법 중 하나는 기존의 백색 LED에 적색 양자점(quantum dot)을 추가해 부족한 적색 스펙트럼 영역의 세기를 보완하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Another method is to supplement the insufficient intensity of the red spectrum region by adding red quantum dots to the existing white LED.
data.target_sentence: Another method is to add red quantum dots to the existing white LED to compensate for the lack of intensity in the red spectral region.

data.source_sentence: 양자점은 그 자체로 혹은 기존 형광체와 의 조합으로 조명의 특성을 개선하기 위해 활용되어 왔다[9-20].
data.mt_sentence: Quantum dots have been utilized to improve the characteristics of lighting either in themselves or in combination with existing phosphors [9-20].
data.target_sentence: Quantum dots have been utilized to improve lighting properties by themselves or in combination with conventional phosphors [9-20].

data.source_sentence: 양자점은 크기가 수 나노미터 정도인 반도체 입자로서 양자국한 효과(quantum confinement effect)에 의해 발광 파장이 양자점의 크기에 의해 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Quantum dots are semiconductor particles with a size of several nanometers, and the emission wavelength is determined by the size of the quantum dots due to the quantum confinement effect.
data.target_sentence: Quantum dots are semiconductor particles with a size of several nanometers, and the emission wavelength is determined according to the size of the quantum dots due to the quantum confinement effect.

data.source_sentence: 이뿐 아니라 양자점은 크기 조절을 통한 발광 스펙트럼의 조정이 비교적 자유로워 조명용 발광 재료로 활발히 연구되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, quantum dots have been actively studied as light emitting materials for lighting because they are relatively free to adjust the emission spectrum through size control.
data.target_sentence: In addition, quantum dots are being actively studied as light emitting materials for lighting because the emission spectrum can be controlled relatively freely through size control.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 양자점을 필름이나 캡의 형태로 가공해 원격(remote) 파장 변환 소재로 적용할 경우 열에 의한 문제를 피할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when quantum dots are processed in the form of films or caps and applied as remote wavelength conversion materials, heat problems can be avoided.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, if the quantum dots are processed into a film or cap shape and applied as a long-distance wavelength conversion material, the thermal problem can be avoided.

data.source_sentence: 이런 방법은 이미 원격 형광체의 구조로 적용되어 조명의 신뢰성 향상에 큰 기여를 했다.
data.mt_sentence: This method has already been applied to the structure of the remote phosphor, contributing greatly to the improvement of the reliability of lighting.
data.target_sentence: This method has already been applied to the structure of remote phosphors, contributing greatly to improving the reliability of lighting.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 재료는 필름 형태로 가공되어 백라이트에 들어가는 방식이 일반적이고 조명 분야에서도 양자점 필름의 적용에 대한 연구가 활발해지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Quantum dot materials are generally processed in the form of films and put into backlighting, and research on the application of quantum dot films is becoming active in the field of lighting.
data.target_sentence: Quantum dot materials are generally processed in the form of films and put into backlights, and research on the application of quantum dot films in the lighting field is being actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 적절한 조건 하에 원격양자점 필름을 적용할 경우 장기 신뢰성을 확보하며 고연색성의 조명을 구현하는 것이 가능할 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is expected that it will be possible to secure long-term reliability and implement high-pigmentation lighting when remote quantum dot films are applied under appropriate conditions.
data.target_sentence: If the remote quantum dot film is applied under appropriate conditions, it is expected to secure long-term reliability and realize highly colored lighting.

data.source_sentence: 선행 실험의 경우에는 다양한 자유도를 적용하기에는 시간과 비용이 많이 들어서 광학 시뮬레이션을 이용한 양자점 적용 백색 LED 조명의 광구조 최적화에 대한 연구가 필요했다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of previous experiments, it was time-consuming and expensive to apply various degrees of freedom, so research on optimizing the optical structure of quantum dot-applied white LED lighting using optical simulation was needed.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the existing experiment, it was time-consuming and expensive to apply various degrees of freedom, so a study was needed to optimize the optical structure of white LED lighting to which quantum dots are applied using optical simulation.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 이전의 실험 연구를 기반으로 광선 추적 시뮬레이 션을 활용해 양자점 필름을 적용한 백색 LED 조명의 광특성 개선에 대해 다루었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, based on previous experimental studies, the improvement of the optical properties of white LED lighting with quantum dot film was dealt with using ray tracing simulation.
data.target_sentence: In this study, based on previous experimental studies, we used ray tracing simulation to address the improvement of the optical properties of white LED lighting using quantum dot films.

data.source_sentence: 이 조명은 실내에서 사용되는 보편적인 고출력 전등 형태 중 하나다.
data.mt_sentence: This lighting is one of the common forms of high-power lights used indoors.
data.target_sentence: This lighting is one of the common forms of high-power lighting used indoors.

data.source_sentence: 그림에서 보이는 것처럼 총 72개의 백색 LED가 동심원 형상으로 직경이 97 mm인 하부 반사판 위에 배치되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in the figure, a total of 72 white LEDs are arranged in concentric circles on the lower reflector with a diameter of 97 mm.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the figure, a total of 72 white LEDs are arranged concentrically on the lower reflector with a diameter of 97mm.

data.source_sentence: 각 반사판의 반사율은 실제 조명에 사용되었던 반사판의 반사율 측정 데이터를 기준으로 설정했다(하판은 69%, 측면 경사부의 반사율은 76%로서 일반적인 LED 조명의 반사율에 해당한다).
data.mt_sentence: The reflectivity of each reflector was set based on the reflectance measurement data of the reflector used for actual lighting (the lower plate had 69% reflectance and the side sloped reflectance was 76%, which corresponds to the reflectivity of general LED lighting).
data.target_sentence: The reflectance of each reflector was set based on the reflectance measurement data of the reflector used for actual lighting (lower plate reflectance 69%, side slope reflectance 76%, which corresponds to the reflectivity of general LED lighting).

data.source_sentence: 구체적인 시뮬레이션 조건은 표 1과 표 2에 정리되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Specific simulation conditions are summarized in Tables 1 and 2.
data.target_sentence: Specific simulation conditions are summarized in Tables 1 and 2.

data.source_sentence: 확산 기능은 PMMA 내부에 TiO2 산란자를 포함시켜 부여하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The diffusion function was provided by including TiO2 scatterers in the PMMA.
data.target_sentence: The diffusion function was provided by including TiO2 scatterers in PMMA.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(a)는 TiO2 산란제의 입도 분포를 반지름 기준으로 보여주고 있고 최대 분포의 반지름이 약 220 nm임을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the particle size distribution of the TiO2 scattering agent based on the radius, and the radius of the maximum distribution is about 220 nm.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the particle size distribution according to the radius of the TiO2 scattering agent, and the maximum distribution radius is about 220 nm.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름 내 적색 양자점의 농도는 MFP으로 조절을 했고 필름의 굴절률은 1.493, 두께는 0.1 mm로 설정했다.
data.mt_sentence: The concentration of red quantum dots in the quantum dot film was adjusted with MFP, and the refractive index of the film was set to 1.493 and the thickness was set to 0.1 mm.
data.target_sentence: The red quantum dot concentration of the quantum dot film was adjusted with MFP, the refractive index of the film was set to 1.493, and the thickness was set to 0.1 mm.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션에 사용된 적색 양자점의 흡수 스펙트럼, 방출 스펙트럼, 양자 수율(quantum yield)은 [36]의 데이터를 활용했고 해당 그래프들은 그림 2(b)에 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The absorption spectrum, emission spectrum, and quantum yield of the red quantum dots used in the simulation utilized the data in [36], and the corresponding graphs are shown in Figure 2(b).
data.target_sentence: The absorption spectrum, emission spectrum, and quantum yield of the red quantum dots used in the simulation were utilized from data from [36], and the corresponding graphs are shown in Fig. 2(b).

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름은 확산판의 위 혹은 아래에 배치되었는데 양자점 필름이 기존 조명에 결합되는 방식을 고려해서 필름과 확산판 사이에 50 µm의 공기층을 두었다.
data.mt_sentence: The quantum dot film was placed above or below the diffusion plate, and a layer of air of 50 50m was placed between the film and the diffusion plate, considering the way the quantum dot film was coupled to the existing lighting.
data.target_sentence: A quantum dot film was placed on or under the diffuser plate, and an air layer of 50 × 50 m was placed between the film and the diffuser plate in consideration of how conventional lighting and the quantum dot film were combined.

data.source_sentence: 이에 대한 구체적인 시뮬레이션 조건도 표 1에 제시되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Specific simulation conditions for this are also presented in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: The specific simulation conditions for this are also shown in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3은 양자점 필름이 없는 경우와 양자점 필름이 포함된 경우의 발광 스펙트럼을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 shows the light emission spectrum in the absence of a quantum dot film and the inclusion of a quantum dot film.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the emission spectrum when there is no quantum dot film and when the quantum dot film is included.

data.source_sentence: Top과 Bottom은 각각 양자점 필름이 확산판 위와 아래에 배치된 경우에 해당된다.
data.mt_sentence: Top and Bottom correspond to the case where the quantum dot film is disposed above and below the diffusion plate, respectively.
data.target_sentence: The upper and lower portions correspond to a case in which the quantum dot film is disposed on the upper and lower portions of the diffusion plate, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이런 변화는 해당 조명의 연색지수에 커다란 영향을 끼친다.
data.mt_sentence: This change greatly affects the color rendering index of the light.
data.target_sentence: This change greatly affects the color rendering index of light.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4(a)는 확산판 내 TiO2 산란 입자 농도를 0.1 wt%로 고정하고 적색 양자점 필름의 MFP를 0.05에서 0.1 mm까지 변화시키면서 휘도의 변화를 구한 결과다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4(a) shows the result of obtaining the change in luminance while fixing the TiO2 scattering particle concentration in the diffuser plate to 0.1 wt% and changing the MFP of the red quantum dot film from 0.05 to 0.1 mm.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4(a) shows the result of obtaining the change in luminance while fixing the TiO2 scattering particle concentration in the diffuser plate to 0.1wt% and changing the MFP of the red quantum dot film from 0.05mm to 0.1mm.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 두께가 0.1 mm이므로 MFP를 0.1 mm로 설정하면 양자점 필름에 입사하는 광자는 양자점과 평균 1회 충돌할 확률을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the thickness of the quantum dot film is 0.1 mm, if the MFP is set to 0.1 mm, photons incident on the quantum dot film have a probability of colliding with the quantum dot once on average.
data.target_sentence: Since the thickness of the quantum dot film is 0.1 mm, if the MFP is set to 0.1 mm, there is a probability that photons incident on the quantum dot film collide with the quantum dot once on average.

data.source_sentence: MFP가 증가하면 양자점의 농도가 낮아지며 백색 LED가 방출한 빛의 양자점에 의한 흡수가 줄어들어 파장 변환 효율이 감소할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: If the MFP increases, the concentration of the quantum dots will decrease, and the absorption by the quantum dots of the light emitted by the white LED will decrease, which will decrease the wavelength conversion efficiency.
data.target_sentence: As the MFP increases, the concentration of the quantum dots decreases and the absorption by the quantum dots of light emitted from a white LED decreases, reducing the wavelength conversion efficiency.

data.source_sentence: 이런 경향은 그림 4(b)에 제시된 발광 스펙트럼의 변화에서도 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This trend can also be confirmed in the change of the emission spectrum shown in Fig. 4(b).
data.target_sentence: This trend can also be confirmed in the change of the emission spectrum as shown in Fig. 4(b).

data.source_sentence: 이 그림은 Bottom 구조에 대해 세 가지 MFP로 설정된 조명의 발광 스펙트럼을 청색피크의 높이로 규격화한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: This figure standardizes the emission spectrum of illumination set to three MFPs for the Bottom structure as the height of the blue peak.
data.target_sentence: This figure normalizes the emission spectra of the illumination set with three MFPs for the floor structure by the height of the blue peak.

data.source_sentence: 그림에서 확인할 수 있는 것처럼 MFP가 길어지면 양자점의 농도가 작아지면서 파장 변환 효율이 떨어져 625 nm 부근 적색 피크의 높이가 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be seen in the figure, when the MFP becomes longer, the concentration of quantum dots decreases and the wavelength conversion efficiency decreases, and the height of the red peak near 625 nm decreases.
data.target_sentence: As can be seen from the figure, the longer the MFP, the lower the quantum dot concentration, the lower the wavelength conversion efficiency, and the lower the height of the red peak near 625 nm.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4를 보면 휘도는 MFP가 증가함에 따라 증가하고 Bottom 구조보다 Top 구조의 휘도가 더 높다.
data.mt_sentence: Referring to Figure 4, the luminance increases as the MFP increases, and the luminance of the top structure is higher than that of the bottom structure.
data.target_sentence: Referring to FIG. 4, as the MFP increases, the luminance increases, and the luminance of the upper structure is higher than the luminance of the lower structure.

data.source_sentence: MFP가 작으면 양자점의 여기로 인해 휘도에 기여하는 녹색 영역의 비중이 상대적으로 줄어들고 휘도가 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: Small MFPs reduce the proportion of green areas that contribute to luminance and decrease luminance due to the excitation of quantum dots.
data.target_sentence: Small MFPs reduce the proportion of green regions contributing to luminance and reduce luminance due to excitation of quantum dots.

data.source_sentence: LED 조명 내에서 확산반사/확산투과의 기능을 갖는 확산판과 LED가 고정된 하판 반사판은 빛이 다중 반사를 할 수 있는 일종의 광학적 공동(optical cavity) 구조를 형성한다.
data.mt_sentence: The diffusion plate with diffusion reflection/diffusion transmission function within LED lighting and the lower plate reflection plate with LED fixed form a kind of optical cavity structure in which light can multi-reflect.
data.target_sentence: Within the LED lighting, the diffuser plate with diffuse reflection/diffuse transmission function and the bottom reflector on which the LED is fixed form a kind of optical cavity structure through which the light can be multi-reflected.

data.source_sentence: Bottom 구조는 양자점 필름이 이 공동 구조 내에 위치해 다중 반사된 빛이 여러 번 거쳐가며 색상 변환에 기여하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the bottom structure, quantum dot film is located in this cavity structure, and multiple reflected light passes several times, contributing to color conversion.
data.target_sentence: In the underlying structure, a quantum dot film is placed in this cavity structure, and multiple reflected light passes through it several times, contributing to color conversion.

data.source_sentence: 반면에서 Top 구조에서는 양자점 필름이 공동 구조의 바깥, 즉 확산판의 상면에 위치해 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in the top structure, the quantum dot film is located outside the cavity structure, that is, on the upper surface of the diffusion plate.
data.target_sentence: Meanwhile, in the upper structure, the quantum dot film is located outside the cavity structure, that is, on the upper surface of the diffuser plate.

data.source_sentence: Bottom 구조 조명의 발광 스펙트럼의 적색 비중이 Top 구조에 비해 더 높고 휘도는 더 작아지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The red specific gravity of the light emitting spectrum of the bottom structure light is higher and the luminance is smaller than that of the top structure.
data.target_sentence: The red specific gravity of the light emission spectrum of the substructure light is high and the luminance is smaller than that of the superstructure.

data.source_sentence: 이런 결과는 조명의 색좌표 결과에서도 명확히 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This result can be clearly confirmed in the color coordinate result of lighting.
data.target_sentence: This result can be clearly confirmed in the color coordinate result of lighting.

data.source_sentence: MFP가 증가함에 따라 여기광의 적색 양자점과의 충돌이 줄어들어 색상 변환이 감소하면서 색좌표 x와 y가 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: As the MFP increases, the collision of excitation light with the red quantum dot decreases, resulting in a decrease in color conversion and a decrease in color coordinates x and y.
data.target_sentence: As the MFP increases, the collision of the excitation light with the red quantum dot decreases, resulting in a decrease in color conversion and a decrease in color coordinates x and y.

data.source_sentence: 특히 가시광 스펙트럼 상에서 적색 영역의 비중을 표현하는 색좌표 x의 감소폭이 더 큼을 알수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, it can be seen that the decrease in the color coordinate x representing the specific gravity of the red region on the visible light spectrum is larger.
data.target_sentence: In particular, it can be seen that the decrease in the color coordinate x representing the specific gravity of the red region in the visible light spectrum is larger.

data.source_sentence: 그림 6(a)와 6(b)는 양자점의 MFP의 함수로 구한 연색지수 Ra와 Re를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 6(a) and 6(b) show the color rendering indices Ra and Re obtained as a function of the MFP of quantum dots.
data.target_sentence: Figures 6(a) and 6(b) show the color rendering indices Ra and Re obtained as a function of the MFP of quantum dots.

data.source_sentence: 연색지수란 표준광원과 비교해서 시험 광원 하에서 물체의 색이 얼마나 자연스럽게 보이는지를 평가하는 정량적 지표다.
data.mt_sentence: The color rendering index is a quantitative index that evaluates how natural the color of an object looks under a test light source compared to a standard light source.
data.target_sentence: The color rendering index is a quantitative index that evaluates how natural an object's color looks under a test light source compared to a standard light source.

data.source_sentence: 그림 6을 보면 Top 구조에서는 MFP가 짧은 영역에서 연색지수가 최대가 되고 MFP가 길어짐에 따라 계속 감소하지만 Bottom 구조에서는 연색지수가 최대가 되는 MFP가 Top의 경우보다 더 길다.
data.mt_sentence: Referring to Figure 6, in the top structure, the color rendering index is maximized in the short region of the MFP and continues to decrease as the MFP lengthens, but in the bottom structure, the MFP with the maximum color rendering index is longer than in the top structure.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 6, in the top structure, the color rendering index is maximized in the short MFP area and continues to decrease as the MFP lengthens. However, in the bottom structure, the MFP with the maximum color rendering index is longer than in the case of the top structure.

data.source_sentence: 비록 MFP나 구조에 따른 근소한 차이는 있지만 Ra는 90 이 상, Re도 89 이상의 우수한 연색지수를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Although there is a slight difference depending on the MFP or structure, Ra shows an excellent color rendering index of 90 or more and Re of 89 or more.
data.target_sentence: Although there is a slight difference depending on the MFP or structure, Ra is 90 or more, Re is 89 or more, indicating excellent color rendering index.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름이 포함되지 않은 조명의 Ra는 83, Re는 77 정도였다.
data.mt_sentence: Ra of 83 and Re of illumination without quantum dot film were about 77.
data.target_sentence: Ra was 83, and Re of illumination without Quantum Dot Film was about 77.

data.source_sentence: 이는 실제 조명에 양자점 필름을 적용한 선행 연구에서도 확인한 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This has also been confirmed in previous studies applying quantum dot films to actual lighting.
data.target_sentence: This was also confirmed in previous studies that applied quantum dot films to actual lighting.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7(a)와 7(b)는 양자점의 MFP를 0.1 mm로 고정하고 확산판 내 산란 입자인 TiO2의 비중을 0.01–0.1 wt%로 변경하며 구한 조명의 휘도 및 규격화된 스펙트럼이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 7(a) and 7(b) show the luminance and normalized spectra of illumination obtained by fixing the MFP of quantum dots to 0.1 mm and changing the specific gravity of TiO2, a scattering particle in the diffuser plate, to 0.01–0.1 wt%.
data.target_sentence: Figures 7(a) and 7(b) show the luminance and normalized spectra of illumination in which the MFP of quantum dots is fixed at 0.1 mm and the specific gravity of TiO2, the scattering particle of the diffuser plate, is changed from 0.01 to 0.1 wt %.

data.source_sentence: TiO2의 비중이 증가하면 투과도의 저하로 인해 휘도는 감소하지만 규격화된 스펙트럼에서 볼 수 있듯이 적색 피크의 세기는 더 강해진다.
data.mt_sentence: As the specific gravity of TiO2 increases, the luminance decreases due to the decrease in transmittance, but as can be seen from the normalized spectrum, the intensity of the red peak becomes stronger.
data.target_sentence: As the specific gravity of TiO2 increases, the transmittance decreases and the luminance decreases, but as can be seen from the normalized spectrum, the intensity of the red peak becomes stronger.

data.source_sentence: 이런 경향은 그림 8의 색좌표 변화 및 그림 9의 연색지수의 경향성에서도 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This trend can also be confirmed in the color coordinate change in Figure 8 and the trend in the color rendering index in Figure 9.
data.target_sentence: This trend can also be confirmed in the color coordinate change in Fig. 8 and the color rendering index in Fig. 9.

data.source_sentence: TiO2의 비중이 증가함에 따라 적색 영역의 비중과 관련된 색좌표 x가 단조 증가하는데 특히 광학적 공동 내에 양자점 필름이 위치한 Bottom 구조에서 색좌표의 증가량이 훨씬 더 크다.
data.mt_sentence: As the specific gravity of TiO2 increases, the color coordinate x related to the specific gravity of the red region increases monotonically, especially in the bottom structure where the quantum dot film is located in the optical cavity.
data.target_sentence: As the specific gravity of TiO2 increases, the color coordinate x related to the specific gravity of the red region increases monotonically, especially in the substructure where the quantum dot film is located in the optical cavity.

data.source_sentence: 이는 그림 9에서 볼 수 있듯이 연색지수의 현저한 개선으로 연결된다.
data.mt_sentence: This leads to a significant improvement in the color rendering index, as shown in Figure 9.
data.target_sentence: This results in a significant improvement in color rendering index, as shown in Figure 9.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 채택한 필름형 양자점 구조는 제작이 용이하고 일반 조명에의 적용이 쉬워 조명의 고연색성 구현에 매우 유리하다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The film-type quantum dot structure adopted in this study is easy to manufacture and easy to apply to general lighting, so it is judged to be very advantageous in realizing high color rendering properties.
data.target_sentence: The film-type quantum dot structure adopted in this study is considered to be very advantageous in realizing high color rendering properties because it is easy to manufacture and can be easily applied to general lighting.

data.source_sentence: 평판형 필름이라는 구조적 요인으로 인해 빛의 전파 각도에 따른 광경로 차이가 발생하고 이에 따라 시야각에 따른 특성 변화가 일어날 가능성이 높다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the structural factor of the flat film, an optical path difference occurs depending on the propagation angle of light, and accordingly, there is a high possibility that characteristics change according to the viewing angle.
data.target_sentence: Due to the structural factors of the flat film, the optical path difference occurs depending on the propagation angle of light, and accordingly, the characteristic is highly likely to change according to the viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 10은 몇 가지 조건에서 시야각에 따른 색좌표 x를 표시한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 10 shows the color coordinate x according to the viewing angle under several conditions.
data.target_sentence: Figure 10 shows the color coordinate x as a function of viewing angle under different conditions.

data.source_sentence: 산란 입자의 농도가 매우 작은 두 경우와 산란 입자의 농도가 큰 Top 구조의 경우에는 비슷한 수준의 색좌표 편차를 보여주지만 산란 입자농도가 높은 Bottom 구조에서는 이 편차가 사라짐을 알 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 이 구조 내에 양자점 필름이 포함되면 양자점의 여기 확률이 높아져서 색상 변환 효율이 증가하고 연색지수가 개선된다.

data.target_sentence: When the quantum dot film is included in this structure, the excitation probability of the quantum dot increases, thereby increasing the color conversion efficiency and improving the color rendering index.

data.source_sentence: 확산판 내 산란 입자의 농도가 증가함에 따라 광학적 공동 효과도 강해지기 때문에 연색지수의 개선 효과는 더 높아지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As the concentration of scattered particles in the diffusion plate increases, the optical cavity effect also strengthens, so the improvement effect of the color index increases.
data.target_sentence: As the concentration of particles scattered from the diffuser plate increases, the optical cavity effect is also strengthened, thereby increasing the color index improvement effect.

data.source_sentence: 산란 입자의 농도가 증가하면 확산판의 투과도가 감소하기 때문에 전체적인 광효율도 줄어든다.

data.target_sentence: The higher the concentration of the scattering particles, the lower the transmittance of the diffuser, thereby lowering the overall light efficiency.

data.source_sentence: 연색지수의 개선과 조명의 광효율 등을 종합적으로 고려한 확산판 투과도의 최적화가 필요하다.

data.source_sentence: 이로 인해 각도별 양자점의 여기확률이 달라지고 시야각에 따른 색상의 불균일성이 발생한다.

data.source_sentence: 이를 개선하기 위해서는 양자점 필름의 위치를 빛의 다중 반사가 일어나는 광학적 공동 구조 내에 놓아야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: To improve this, the position of the quantum dot film must be placed within the optical cavity structure where multiple reflections of light occur.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에 서는 광학적 공동 구조의 내부에 해당하는 확산판의 하면에 양자점 필름을 위치시킴으로써 시야각에 따른 색상 불균성의 문제를 해결할 수 있음을 분명히 보여주었다.

data.target_sentence: White LED lighting using quantum dot film showed excellent color development characteristics with a color index exceeding 90 under most conditions.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 양자점 필름을 광학적 공동 내부에 배치함으로써 필름에 대한 다중 투과 효과로 인해 시야각에 따른 광경로 차이, 그리고 색좌표의 불균성이 제거됨을 확인할 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과는 단순한 구조의 양자점 필름을 활용함으로써 연색성이 부족한 백색 LED 조명의 연색 특성을 현저히 개선함과 동시에 시야각에 따른 색편차가 없는 조명의 구현이 가능함을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The above results show that by using a quantum dot film with a simple structure, it is possible to significantly improve the color rendering characteristics of white LED lights lacking color rendering and realize lighting without color deviation according to viewing angles.
data.target_sentence: The above results show that by using a quantum dot film with a simple structure, it is possible to dramatically improve the color rendering properties of white LED lights lacking color rendering and to realize lighting without color deviation depending on the viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 이는 박물관, 미술관, 백화점 등 고연색성 조명을 필요로 하는 공간의 광원 개발에 기여할 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.

data.target_sentence: This is expected to contribute to the development of light sources for spaces that require high color rendering lighting, such as museums, art galleries, and department stores.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 산업통상자원부와 한국산업기술진흥원의 스마트특성화기반 구축사업을 통한 지원을 받았습니다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was supported by the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy and the Korea Industrial Technology Promotion Agency's smart characterization foundation construction project.
data.target_sentence: This study was carried out with the support of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy and the Smart Characterization Foundation Project of the Korea Institute of Industrial Technology Promotion.

data.source_sentence: 높은 종횡비를 가지는 미세 패턴 시료의 하부층 구조결함에 대해 높은 민감도를 가지는 광학적 임계치수 측정 장비로서 준 수직입사 타원계를 제안한다.
data.mt_sentence: A semi-vertical incident ellipsoid is proposed as an optical critical dimension measuring device with high sensitivity to a structural defect in a lower layer of a fine pattern sample with a high aspect ratio.
data.target_sentence: Seminormal incidence ellipsoids have been proposed as optical critical dimension measurement devices with high sensitivity to sublayer structural defects in high-aspect-ratio micropatterned samples.

data.source_sentence: 이 준 수직입사 타원계에서는 입사광은 편광자와 위상지연자를 순차적으로 통과하며 반사광은 이들을 역순으로 통과한다.
data.mt_sentence: In a vertical incident ellipsoid, incident light passes through polarizers and phase retarders sequentially, and reflected light passes through them in reverse order.
data.target_sentence: In a normally incident ellipsoid, incident light passes through a polarizer and a phase retardation plate in turn, and reflected light passes through in reverse order.

data.source_sentence: 하나의 편광자와 하나의 위상지연자를 입사광과 반사광이 공유하며 편광자와 위상지연자의 여러 방위각 조합에서 측정한 빛의 세기로부터 타원상수를 결정하는 이 준 수직입사 타원계의 측정원리를 검토하고 최적의 타원상수 측정방법을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: We review the principle of measurement of a quasi-vertical incident elliptic system that shares a polarizer and a phase retarder with incident light and reflection light, which determines the elliptic constant from the intensity of light measured by several azimuth combinations of polarizers and phase retarders, and present an optimal elliptic constant measurement method.
data.target_sentence: Incident light and reflected light share one polarizer and one phase retarder, and several azimuth angles of the polarizer and phase retarder are combined. The measurement principle of this quasi-normal incidence ellipsometer, which determines the elliptic constant from the measured light intensity, is reviewed and the optimal elliptic constant measurement method is presented.

data.source_sentence: 특히 반도체 산업체에서는 소자들의 집적도가 증가함에 따라 패턴의 미세화와 초박막화가 지속적으로 이루어지고 타원계의 유용성이 이에 비례하여 증가하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, in the semiconductor industry, as the degree of integration of devices increases, patterns are continuously refined and ultra-thin, and the usefulness of the elliptical system increases in proportion thereto.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in the semiconductor industry, as the degree of integration of devices increases, patterns are continuously refined and ultra-thin, and the utilization of the elliptical system is increasing in proportion to this.

data.source_sentence: 일 파장을 사용한 초기의 타원계는 단층박막 두께 측정에 제한적으로 사용되었으나 여러 파장에서 측정하는 분광타원계(spectroscopic ellipsometer, SE)가 개발되고 모델링 분석법이 도입됨에 따라 다층박막 시료의 구조와 광학상수의 고정밀 정량분석이 용이해졌다.
data.mt_sentence: Early ellipsometers using one wavelength were limitedly used to measure the thickness of a single-layer thin film, but as a spectroscopic ellipsometer (SE) measuring at multiple wavelengths was developed and modeling analysis methods were introduced, the structure and optical constant of multi-layered thin-film samples were reduced. High-precision quantitative analysis made easy.
data.target_sentence: Early ellipsometers using one wavelength were of limited use for measuring the thickness of single-layer thin films. However, with the development of a spectroscopic ellipsometer (SE) that measures at multiple wavelengths and the introduction of modeling analysis methods, high-precision quantitative analysis of the structure and optical constants of multilayer thin film samples has become easy.

data.source_sentence: 공간적인 제약을 극복하기 위하여 하나의 편광자와 하나의 위상지연자를 입사광과 반사광이 공유하도록 하며 편광자의 방위각과 위상지연자의 방위각을 적절히 조합한 상태에서 측정한 빛의 세기들로부터 타원상수를 구하는 수학적인 표현들을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: To overcome spatial constraints, we present mathematical expressions for obtaining elliptic constants from intensity of light measured with proper combination of the polarizer azimuth and the phase retarder azimuth, allowing one polarizer and one phase retarder to be shared by incident light.
data.target_sentence: To overcome the spatial constraint, we present a formula to obtain the elliptic constant from the measured light intensity by appropriately combining the polarizer azimuth and the phase retarder azimuth, so that incident light can share one polarizer and one phase retardation plate.

data.source_sentence: 시료면에서 반사된 빛은 위상자와 편광자를 다시 순차적으로 지나게 되고 광 검출기로 들어가게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The light reflected from the sample surface passes through the phase and polarizer sequentially again and enters the photodetector.
data.target_sentence: The light reflected from the sample surface passes through the phase and polarizer in turn and enters the photodetector.

data.source_sentence: E와 T는 각각 투과 축-소거 축 좌표상에서 검광자를 통과한 빛의 존스 벡↔ (θ)는 회전각도가 θ터와 검광자의 존스 행렬을 가리키며 R을 얻는다.
data.mt_sentence: Where E and T are the Jones vector ↔ (θ) of the light passing through the analyzer on the transmission axis-erasing axis coordinates, respectively, the rotation angle indicates θ and the Jones matrix of the analyzer, and R is obtained.
data.target_sentence: Here, E and T are the Jones vector ↔(θ) of the light passing through the analyzer at the transmission axis erasure axis coordinates, and the rotation angle represents θ and the Jones matrix of the analyzer, and R is obtained.

data.source_sentence: 광원에서 방출된 빛이 개구부와 렌즈를 통과할 때 겪는 편광상태의 변화나 시료면에서 반사하여 위상지연자와 검광자를 통과한 빛이 렌즈를 통과하고 거울에서 반사하며 겪는 편광상태의 변화는 편광자의 방위각 P나 위상지연자의 방위각 C와는 무관하다.
data.mt_sentence: The change in the polarization state experienced when the light emitted from the light source passes through the aperture and the lens, or the change in the polarization state experienced by the light passing through the phase delay and analyzer reflecting off the sample plane and passing through the lens and reflected by the mirror It is independent of the azimuth P or the azimuth C of the phase delay.
data.target_sentence: When the light emitted from the light source passes through the aperture and the lens, the change in polarization state or the light reflected from the sample surface and passing through the phase retarder and the analyzer passes through the lens. And the change in the polarization state experienced by reflection from the mirror has nothing to do with the azimuth angle P of the polarizer or the azimuth angle C of the phase retarder.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 주 증폭기가 양방향 펌핑 방식인 MOPA (master oscillator power amplifier) 협대역 고출력 광섬유 레이저를 제작하였으며, 제작된 레이저의 출력 특성을 연구하였다.
