data.mt_sentence: When amplifying the same output through bi-directional pumping, it was confirmed that the mode instability phenomenon can be suppressed by dispersing the amount of heat generated by the core that is focused only in one direction.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that when the same output is amplified through bidirectional pumping, mode instability can be suppressed by dispersing the amount of core heat that is concentrated in only one direction.

data.source_sentence: 최근 농작물의 상황을 실시간이면서도 비파괴적으로 측정하는 시스템이 스마트팜 등의 분야에서 필수적인 요소로 주목받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a system that measures crop conditions in real time and non-destructively is attracting attention as an essential element in fields such as smart farms.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a system that non-destructively measures the state of crops in real time has been attracting attention as an essential element in fields such as smart farms.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 초분광 영상 기술을 통해 많은 개체 수의 청경채 유묘 내의 안토시아닌 함량을 비 파괴적으로 동시에 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the anthocyanin content in a large number of bok choy seedlings was simultaneously and non-destructively measured using hyperspectral imaging technology.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the anthocyanin content in multiple bok choy seedlings was simultaneously and non-destructively measured using hyperspectral imaging technology.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 제안한 초분광 영상 기술은 파괴적 화학 분석 방법과 비교 가능한 분석 시스템을 제공하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The hyperspectral imaging technique proposed in this paper has been shown to provide a comparable analysis system with destructive chemical analysis methods.
data.target_sentence: The hyperspectral imaging technique proposed in this paper has been shown to provide an analytical system comparable to destructive chemical analysis methods.

data.source_sentence: 많은 수의 식물을 동시에 측정함으로써, 초분광 영상 기술이 초고속 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용될 수 있다는 가능성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By simultaneously measuring a large number of plants, it was confirmed that hyperspectral imaging technology could be applied to a high-speed pinotapping system.
data.target_sentence: By simultaneously measuring multiple plants, it was confirmed that hyperspectral imaging technology can be applied to a high-speed phenotypic system.

data.source_sentence: 안토시아닌(anthocyanin)은 플라보노이드의 한 종류로서, 식물의 잎, 줄기, 뿌리, 꽃, 과일 등에서 빨간색과 보라색 및 파란색에 이르는 다양한 식물 조직의 색상으로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: Anthocyanin is a type of flavonoid, and it appears in the colors of various plant tissues ranging from red, purple, and blue in leaves, stems, roots, flowers, fruits, etc. of plants.
data.target_sentence: Anthocyanins are a kind of flavonoids and appear in various plant tissue colors ranging from red, purple, and blue to leaves, stems, roots, flowers, and fruits of plants.

data.source_sentence: 최근 안토시아닌이 풍부한 음식은 심혈관 질환과 암 발생률의 감소 등 인간에게 여러 가지 건강상의 이점을 증가시키는 것으로 알려져 현재 식물 내의 축적 개선을 위한 활발한 연구가 진행 중에 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, anthocyanin-rich foods are known to increase various health benefits in humans, such as a decrease in cardiovascular disease and cancer incidence, and active research is currently underway to improve accumulation in plants.
data.target_sentence: Recently, anthocyanin-rich foods have been known to increase various human health benefits, including a reduction in the incidence of cardiovascular disease and cancer, and research to improve plant accumulation is currently being actively pursued.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 식물 내에 존재하는 물질의 함량을 추정하기 위해서는 식물을 분쇄하여 이를 UV-spectrometer나 HPLC(high-performance liquid chromatography) 등으로 측정하여 함량을 측정하는 파괴적 방법이 주로 사용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in order to estimate the content of substances present in plants, a destructive method has been mainly used to measure the content by grinding plants and measuring them with UV-spectrometer or high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC).
data.target_sentence: In general, in order to estimate the content of substances present in plants, destructive methods of grinding plants and measuring the content by UV-spectrometer or HPLC (High Performance Liquid Chromatography) have been mainly used.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 파괴적 측정 방법은 인위적인 양의 투입으로 인한 문제점, 성분 준비를 위한 많은 시간과 노동력의 필요 등 여러 가지 단점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This destructive measurement method has several disadvantages, such as a problem due to the artificial amount input, and the need for a lot of time and labor for preparing the ingredients.
data.target_sentence: This destructive measurement method has several disadvantages, such as problems caused by artificial input and requires a lot of time and labor to prepare materials.

data.source_sentence: 최근 농업분야에서 중요성이 점점 커지고 있는 스마트팜(smart farm) 적용을 위해서는 작물의 상황을 실시간 비파괴 측정 방법으로 검지할 수 있는 시스템이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to apply the smart farm, which has recently become increasingly important in the agricultural field, a system capable of detecting the condition of crops by a real-time non-destructive measurement method is essential.
data.target_sentence: In order to apply the smart farm, which has recently become increasingly important in the agricultural field, a system that can detect the condition of crops in a real-time non-destructive measurement method is essential.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미징 기술은 분광 및 이미징 기술의 장점을 결합하여 가시광선에서 근적외선까지의 연속 파장을 선택적으로 감지할 수 있는 최신 이미징 기술이다.
data.mt_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging technology is the latest imaging technology that can selectively detect continuous wavelengths from visible to near-infrared rays by combining the advantages of spectroscopic and imaging technologies.
data.target_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging technology is the latest imaging technology that can selectively detect continuous wavelengths from visible light to near-infrared rays by combining the advantages of spectral technology and imaging technology.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미징 기법은 다양한 야채와 과일 등의 물질 함량을 비파괴적인 방식으로 측정하기 위해 성공적으로 사용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging techniques have been successfully used to measure the content of various vegetables and fruits in a non-destructive way.
data.target_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging technology has been successfully used to non-destructively measure the content of various vegetables and fruits.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 초분광 기술을 사용하여 다수의 청경채 유묘 내의 안토시아닌 축적의 양을 동시에 분석하여, 초고속 피노타이핑(phenotyping) 시스템으로서의 활용 가능성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, using hyperspectral technology, the amount of anthocyanin accumulation in multiple bok choy seedlings was analyzed simultaneously, and the possibility of its application as a high-speed phenotyping system was confirmed.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the possibility of application as a high-speed phenotypic system was confirmed by simultaneously analyzing the accumulation of anthocyanins in several bok choy seedlings using hyperspectral technology.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 카메라를 식물의 상단에 위치시켜 아래에 있는 대상 물체를 측정하는 top-view 방식의 셋업을 만들어 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experiment was conducted by creating a top-view setup in which a hyperspectral camera was placed on the top of the plant to measure the target object below.
data.target_sentence: The experiment was done by creating a top view setup in which a hyperspectral camera was placed on top of the plant to measure the target object below.

data.source_sentence: 실험 대상 식물은 전 세계적으로 재배 및 소비되는 중요한 식용 채소인 청경채(bok choy)로, 정식 전 유묘 상태의 식물들을 대상으로 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The plant to be tested was bok choy, an important edible vegetable grown and consumed worldwide, and was measured for plants in full seedling condition.
data.target_sentence: The test target plant was bok choy, which is an important edible vegetable cultivated and consumed worldwide, and the plants in the mature state were measured.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 획득을 위한 셋업 구성을 연구하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: It is intended to study the setup configuration for hyperspectral image acquisition.
data.target_sentence: To study the setup configuration for hyperspectral image acquisition.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상(hyperspectral imaging) 기술은 분광기술과 영상 기술의 장점들을 결합하여 가시광선과 근적외선의 연속파장을 선택적으로 결합할 수 있는 진보된 기술로, 여러 가지 물질 특성의 변화에 대해서 객관적이고 정확한 분석을 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging is an advanced technology that can selectively combine visible and near-infrared continuous wavelengths by combining the advantages of spectroscopic and imaging technologies, enabling objective and accurate analysis of various material properties.
data.target_sentence: Hyperspectral imaging technology is a cutting-edge technology that can selectively combine visible and near-infrared continuous wavelengths by combining the advantages of spectral technology and imaging technology, enabling objective and accurate analysis of the physical properties of various materials.

data.source_sentence: 분광학은 빛과 물체 사이의 상호 작용을 의미하며, 빛과 상호 작용하는 물체의 반응도는 표적 샘플의 물리적 및 화학적 특성을 보여줄 수 있는 1차원의 스펙트럼을 각 픽셀마다 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Spectroscopy refers to the interaction between light and objects, and the reactivity of objects interacting with light shows a one-dimensional spectrum for each pixel that can show the physical and chemical properties of the target sample.
data.target_sentence: Spectroscopy refers to the interaction between light and an object, and the reactivity of an object interacting with light shows a one-dimensional spectrum for each pixel that can represent the physical and chemical properties of the target sample.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상은 그림 1에 보인 바와 같은 과정을 통해 얻어진다.
data.mt_sentence: The hyperspectral image is obtained through the process shown in Figure 1.
data.target_sentence: The hyperspectral image is obtained through the process shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 광원에 의해서 대상 샘플에서 반사된 고유한 물질의 파장이 전방의 렌즈를 통과하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The wavelength of the intrinsic material reflected from the target sample by the light source passes through the front lens.
data.target_sentence: The wavelength of the intrinsic material reflected from the target sample by the light source passes through the front lens.

data.source_sentence: 전환된 정보가 CCD 등의 센서를 통해 기록되어 초분광 영상을 얻게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The converted information is recorded through a sensor such as a CCD to obtain a hyperspectral image.
data.target_sentence: The converted information is recorded through a sensor such as a CCD to obtain a hyperspectral image.

data.source_sentence: 분광 시스템에서는 광원, 대상체, 센서의 기하학적 상태뿐만 아니라 광원 자체의 공간 균일성, 파장의 균일성, 효율, 동작 거리에 따른 광 세기의 균일성 등 고려해야 할 사항이 많다.
data.mt_sentence: In the spectroscopic system, there are many things to consider, such as the geometric state of the light source, object, and sensor, as well as the spatial uniformity of the light source itself, the uniformity of wavelength, efficiency, and the uniformity of light intensity according to the operating distance.
data.target_sentence: In a spectroscopy system, there are many things to consider, such as spatial uniformity of the light source itself, uniformity of wavelength, efficiency, and uniformity of light intensity according to a working distance, as well as the geometry of the light source, object, and sensor.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 가시 영역에서 근적외선 영역까지의 넓은 스펙트럼 범위의 빛을 제공하는 할로겐 텅스텐(halogentungsten) 램프 광원을 초분광 영상 시스템을 위한 광원으로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a halogentungsten lamp light source that provides light in a wide spectrum from the visible region to the near-infrared region was used as the light source for the hyperspectral imaging system.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a tungsten halogen lamp light source that provides a wide spectrum of light from the visible region to the near infrared region was used as the light source for the hyperspectral imaging system.

data.source_sentence: 할로겐 램프의 스펙트럼 측정 결과, 초분광 영상카메라의 파장 대역인 가시광 대역에서 안정적인 파워 스펙트럼을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of measuring the spectrum of the halogen lamp, it showed a stable power spectrum in the visible light band, which is the wavelength band of the hyperspectral imaging camera.
data.target_sentence: As a result of measuring the spectrum of the halogen lamp, it showed a stable power spectrum in the visible light band, the wavelength band of the hyperspectral imaging camera.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 청경채 유묘들은 화분에 정식하기 전 파종 후 1주일 된 싹 상태로 각 품종 당 24개를 준비하였고, 식물용 큐브에 발아된 상태이다.
data.mt_sentence: The bok choy seedlings used in the experiment were prepared in a state of buds one week after sowing before planting in a pot, and 24 of each variety were prepared, and they were germinated in a plant cube.
data.target_sentence: The bok choy seedlings used in the experiment were prepared before sowing in pots in the state of sprouting one week after sowing, and 24 of each variety were prepared and germinated in a cube.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2에 각 품종 유묘의 사진을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows pictures of seedlings of each variety.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows pictures of seedlings of each variety.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미징 시스템은 그림 3에 보인 바와 같이 초분광카메라, 할로겐 램프, 대상 샘플, 그리고 모니터링을 위한 장비로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: The hyperspectral imaging system consists of a hyperspectral camera, a halogen lamp, a target sample, and equipment for monitoring, as shown in Figure 3.
data.target_sentence: A hyperspectral imaging system consists of a hyperspectral camera, a halogen lamp, a target sample, and monitoring equipment, as shown in Figure 3.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미징 기술을 초고속 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용하기 위해, 전체 식물 모습을 위에서 측정할 수 있도록 실험 셋업을 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to apply the hyperspectral imaging technology to the ultrafast pinotyping system, the experimental setup was configured so that the whole plant appearance could be measured from above.
data.target_sentence: To apply the hyperspectral imaging technique to an ultrafast phenotypic system, we configured the experimental setup to measure whole plant shape from above.

data.source_sentence: 위의 실험 구성도를 통해 획득한 초분광 영상의 예시를 그림 4에 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: An example of the hyperspectral image obtained through the above experimental configuration diagram is shown in Figure 4.
data.target_sentence: An example of the hyperspectral image obtained through the above experimental configuration is shown in Figure 4.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미지 스캐닝 후 흰색 레퍼런스 패널과 대상 샘플들의 원 데이터(raw data)를 통해 잎의 반사율(reflectance)을 아래 식 (1)과 같이 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After scanning the hyperspectral image, the reflectance of the leaf was calculated as shown in Equation (1) below through raw data of the white reference panel and the target samples.
data.target_sentence: After scanning the hyperspectral image, the reflectance of the leaf was calculated using the white reference panel and the raw data of the target sample as shown in Equation 1 below.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술을 사용한 비파괴 안토시아닌 측정법의 정확도를 알기 위해, 식물을 분쇄한 뒤 UV-spectrometer로 분석한 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to find out the accuracy of the non-destructive anthocyanin measurement method using hyperspectral technology, it was compared with the results of analysis with UV-spectrometer after grinding plants.
data.target_sentence: To check the accuracy of the non-destructive anthocyanin measurement using hyperspectral technology, the plants were crushed and compared with the results of analysis with a UV-spectrometer.

data.source_sentence: 잎 조직의 안토시아닌 함량은 [10]에 설명된 과정을 통하여 분석되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The anthocyanin content of leaf tissue was analyzed through the procedure described in [10].
data.target_sentence: The anthocyanin content of leaf tissue was analyzed using the procedure described in [10].

data.source_sentence: 동결 건조된 유묘의 조직 0.5 g을 70% 메탄올 10 ml에 균질화하고 5분간 초음파 처리한 후 종이 필터에 통과시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: 0.5 g of freeze-dried seedling tissue was homogenized in 10 ml of 70% methanol, sonicated for 5 minutes, and then passed through a paper filter.
data.target_sentence: 0.5 g of freeze-dried seedling tissue was homogenized in 10 ml of 70% methanol, sonicated for 5 minutes, and then passed through a paper filter.

data.source_sentence: 파종 후 1주일 된 정식 전의 유묘 하나당 질량은 매우 작아 측정이 어렵기 때문에 8개의 유묘 조직을 모아서 분석 샘플을 만들었다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the mass of each seedling before planting, one week after sowing, is very small and difficult to measure, eight seedling tissues were collected to prepare an analysis sample.
data.target_sentence: Since the mass of each seedling before planting is very small one week after sowing and it is difficult to measure, the tissues of 8 seedlings were collected to prepare an analysis sample.

data.source_sentence: 안토시아닌의 축적량은 반사율로 변환한 뒤, 가장 낮은 반사율을 나타낸 에픽하이 품종을 최소값, 가장 높은 반사율인 청경채 싱싱골드 품종을 최대값으로 규격화하여 백분율로 결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: After converting the accumulation of anthocyanin into a reflection rate, the Epic High variety showing the lowest reflectance was standardized as the minimum value and the highest reflection rate, the bok choy Singing Gold variety, was standardized as the maximum value, and the result was shown as a percentage.
data.target_sentence: The accumulated amount of anthocyanins is converted into reflectance. Thereafter, the Epik High variety with the lowest reflectance was standardized as the minimum value, and the bok choy fresh gold variety with the highest reflectance was standardized as the maximum value, and the result was expressed as a percentage.

data.source_sentence: 그림 5에 네 가지 품종의 잎 반사율의 평균을 스펙트럼으로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 5 shows the average of the leaf reflectance of the four varieties as a spectrum.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the average of the leaf reflectance of the four varieties as a spectrum.

data.source_sentence: 안토시아닌에 대한 빛의 흡수 파장으로 알려진 550.14 nm의 반사율 값을 0–100의 백분율 값으로 치환하여, 8개의 유묘를 분쇄 처리한 뒤 UV-spectrometer로 측정한 파괴적 분석 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The reflectance value of 550.14 nm, known as the absorption wavelength of light for anthocyanins, was substituted with a percentage value of 0–100, and 8 seedlings were crushed and compared with the destructive analysis results measured with a UV-spectrometer.
data.target_sentence: The reflectance value of 550.14 nm, which is known as the absorption wavelength of light for anthocyanins, was substituted as a percentage value of 0 to 100, and 8 seedlings were crushed and compared with the destruction analysis results measured by UV spectroscopy.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술을 통한 분석과 파괴적 분석에 의해 추정된 안토시아닌 함량은 청경채의 품종에 따라 달라지는 함량의 차이를 비슷하게 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The anthocyanin content estimated by analysis through hyperspectral technology and destructive analysis showed similar differences in content depending on the variety of bok choy.
data.target_sentence: The anthocyanin content estimated by analysis through hyperspectral technology and destructive analysis showed a similar difference in content according to bok choy varieties.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 품종 사이에서 나타나는 안토시아닌 함량의 차이는 잎 조직의 색소 발현과 관련이 있는 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference in anthocyanin content among various cultivars seems to be related to the pigment expression of leaf tissue.
data.target_sentence: Differences in anthocyanin content between different varieties appear to be related to pigment expression in leaf tissue.

data.source_sentence: “레드 쵸이” 품종은 중간 수준의 안토시아닌 함량을 보였으며, 유묘의 잎에서 부분적으로 보라색과 붉은색이 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The “Red Choy” variety showed a moderate level of anthocyanin content, and partial purple and red color in the leaves of the seedlings.
data.target_sentence: The "Red Choi" variety showed moderate anthocyanin content and partial purple and red color in seedling leaves.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술 분석과 파괴적 분석 데이터 간의 이러한 비슷한 결과는 초분광 기술을 고처리량 식물 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용할 수 있음을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: These similar results between hyperspectral technique analysis and destructive analysis data indicate that hyperspectral technique can be applied to high-throughput plant pinotyping systems.
data.target_sentence: These similar results between hyperspectral analysis and destructive analysis data indicate that hyperspectral techniques can be applied to high-throughput plant phenotypic systems.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 비파괴 분석 방법인 초분광 영상 기술을 사용하여 식물 내의 안토시아닌 함량을 분석하였고, top-view방식의 실험 셋업을 구성함으로써 12개의 식물을 동시에 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the anthocyanin content in plants was analyzed using hyperspectral imaging technology, which is a non-destructive analysis method, and 12 plants were simultaneously analyzed by constructing top-view experimental setup.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the anthocyanin content of plants was analyzed using hyperspectral imaging technology, a non-destructive analysis method, and 12 plants were simultaneously analyzed by configuring a top-view experimental setup.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용한 식물은 식용 채소인 청경채로, 안토시아닌 함량이 각각 다른 네 개의 품종을 실험에 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The plant used in the experiment was bok choy, an edible vegetable, and four varieties with different anthocyanin contents were used for the experiment.
data.target_sentence: The plant used in the experiment was edible bok choy, and 4 varieties with different anthocyanin contents were used for the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 기술을 통한 비파괴 분석 후, 정확도를 입증하기 위해 기존의 측정 방법인 유묘 분쇄 후 UV-spectrometer로 측정하는 파괴적 측정 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After non-destructive analysis through hyperspectral imaging technology, the results were compared with destructive measurement results measured with a UV-spectrometer after seedling crushing, a conventional measurement method, to verify accuracy.
data.target_sentence: After non-destructive analysis through hyperspectral imaging technology, the accuracy was confirmed by comparing with the destruction measurement results measured with a UV-spectrometer after seedling crushing, which is a conventional measurement method.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과, 네 가지 청경채 품종 모두에서 초분광 분석과 파괴적 측정을 통한 안토시아닌 함량이 매우 유사한 수준으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the anthocyanin content through hyperspectral analysis and destructive measurement was found to be very similar in all four bok choy varieties.
data.target_sentence: As a result, it was found that the anthocyanin content through hyperspectral analysis and destruction measurement was very similar in all 4 varieties of bok choy.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 기술을 통해 총 96개의 유묘를 24분이라는 짧은 시간 동안 측정하여 분석할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through hyperspectral imaging technology, a total of 96 seedlings can be measured and analyzed in a short time of 24 minutes.
data.target_sentence: With hyperspectral imaging technology, a total of 96 seedlings can be measured and analyzed in as little as 24 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 광도가 약한 광원과 저성능 초분광 카메라 등의 제한된 조건에서 실험이 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the experiment was conducted under limited conditions such as a light source with weak luminous intensity and a low-performance hyperspectral camera.
data.target_sentence: In this study, experiments were performed under limited conditions, such as a low-illuminance light source and a low-performance hyperspectral camera.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 기술을 통한 분석방법은 초고속 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용 가능한 분석 시스템으로서의 가능성을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis method through hyperspectral imaging technology confirmed the potential as an analysis system applicable to the ultra-high-speed pinotyping system.
data.target_sentence: The analysis method through hyperspectral imaging technology confirmed its potential as an analysis system applicable to ultrafast phenotypic systems.

data.source_sentence: 눈부심 방지를 위한 확산판의 투과율과 연색지수 향상을 위한 양자점 필름의 농도가 고출력 직하형 백색 LED 조명의 광특성에 미치는 영향을 조사했다.
data.mt_sentence: We investigated the effect of the transmittance of diffusion plates to prevent glare and the concentration of quantum dot films to improve the color index on the light characteristics of high-power direct-under-the-ground white LED lights.
data.target_sentence: The effects of the light transmittance of the diffuser plate for preventing glare and the concentration of the quantum dot film for improving the color index on the optical characteristics of high-power underground white LED lighting were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 시야각에 따른 광특성의 편차는 거의 없었고 휘도 분포는 람버시안 분포에 가까웠다.
data.mt_sentence: There was little variation in the optical characteristics according to the viewing angle, and the luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution.
data.target_sentence: There was almost no change in the optical properties according to the viewing angle, and the luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 조명의 구조를 최적화하면 연색지수가 95까지 증가함을 확인했다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, it was confirmed that the color rendering index increased to 95 when the lighting structure was optimized.
data.target_sentence: In addition, it was confirmed that the color rendering index increased to 95 when the lighting structure was optimized.

data.source_sentence: 최근 일반 조명 시장에서 영역을 급속히 확대하고 있는 백색 발광다이오드(light emitting diode, LED)는 높은 광효율, 다양한 디자인 요소, 환경 친화적인 속성으로 인해 인기를 끌고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, white light emitting diodes (LEDs), which are rapidly expanding their scope in the general lighting market, are gaining popularity due to their high luminous efficiency, various design elements, and environmentally friendly properties.
data.target_sentence: White LED (Light Emitting Diode), which is rapidly expanding its range in the general lighting market, is gaining popularity due to its high luminous efficiency, various design elements, and eco-friendly characteristics.

data.source_sentence: LED는 사용 목적에 따라 디스플레이용 LED, 일반 가정용 LED, 그리고 공장을 포함한 대형 건물용 고출력 LED 등 다양한 종류로 나뉜다.
data.mt_sentence: LEDs are divided into various types depending on the purpose of use, such as LED for display, LED for general households, and LED for high power for large buildings including factories.
data.target_sentence: LEDs are classified into various types, such as LEDs for displays, LEDs for general households, and high-output LEDs for large buildings including factories, depending on the purpose of use.

data.source_sentence: 연색지수란 조명이 비추는 물체의 색이 자연스럽게 연출되는 정도를 정량화한 수치다.
data.mt_sentence: The color rendering index is a numerical value that quantifies the degree to which the color of an object illuminated by light is rendered naturally.
data.target_sentence: The color rendering index is a numerical value that quantifies the degree to which the color of an object illuminated by light is naturally expressed.

data.source_sentence: 이런 이유로 양자점은 일반 조명뿐만 아니라 식물생장용 조명이나 기타 특수 조명용파장 변환 물질로도 많이 연구되고 있고 디스플레이, 바이오, 의료 분야 등 여러 분야에 활발히 응용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, quantum dots are being studied a lot not only as general lighting but also as wavelength conversion materials for plant growth lighting or other special lighting, and are actively applied in various fields such as display, bio, and medical fields.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, quantum dots are being studied a lot not only as general lighting but also as wavelength conversion materials for plant growth lighting or other special lighting, and are being actively applied in various fields such as display, bio, and medicine.

data.source_sentence: 디스플레이용 백라이트의 경우에는 양자점 필름 형태로 가공, 청색 LED에서 이격해 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of backlight for display, it is processed in the form of a quantum dot film and used separately from the blue LED.
data.target_sentence: In the case of backlight for display, it is processed into quantum dot film and used separately from blue LED.

data.source_sentence: 조명의 경우 형광체와 양자점을 섞어 함께 코팅하는 경우도 있지만 양자점 필름이나 캡의 형태로 가공, LED 칩으로부터 이격해서 적용하기도 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of lighting, phosphors and quantum dots are mixed and coated together, but in some cases, they are processed in the form of a quantum dot film or cap, and applied at a distance from the LED chip.
data.target_sentence: In the case of lighting, a mixture of phosphor and quantum dot is sometimes coated, but in some cases, it is processed into a quantum dot film or cap and applied at a distance from the LED chip.

data.source_sentence: 후자의 경우에는 열에 의한 양자점의 열화 속도가 느려 장기신뢰성을 확보할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the latter case, the degradation rate of the quantum dots due to heat is slow, so that long-term reliability can be secured.
data.target_sentence: In the latter case, since the degradation rate of the quantum dots due to heat is slow, long-term reliability can be secured.

data.source_sentence: 양자점의 적절한 적용은 백색 LED 조명의 광특성 및 성능 개선을 이끌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Appropriate application of quantum dots can lead to improved optical properties and performance of white LED lighting.
data.target_sentence: Proper application of quantum dots can improve the optical properties and performance of white LED lighting.

data.source_sentence: 고출력 조명의 경우 인간 눈에 불편함을 줄 수 있는 글래어(glare) 현상을 방지하고 적절한 밝기를 유지하기 위해 확산판을 사용하는 경우가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of high-power lighting, diffusion plates are often used to prevent glare phenomena that can cause inconvenience to human eyes and maintain proper brightness.
data.target_sentence: In the case of high-power lighting, a diffuser plate is often used to prevent glare, which can cause discomfort to the human eye, and to maintain adequate brightness.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 재질, 두께, 투과율 등의 여러 광학적 조건에 의해 광 효율이나 조명의 색감 등의 광학적 특성들이 변할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Optical characteristics such as light efficiency and color sense of lighting may change due to various optical conditions such as material, thickness, transmittance, etc. of the diffusion plate.
data.target_sentence: Depending on various optical conditions such as the material, thickness, and transmittance of the diffuser, optical properties such as light efficiency and color of lighting may change.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀의 선행 연구에서는 주로 양자점 필름의 배치 혹은 양자점의 농도에 의한 효과를 다루었다면, 본 연구에서는 양자점이 부착되는 투광부(확산판)의 투과도 및 양자점의 농도 변화에 의한 조명 특성의 변화를 다룬다.
data.mt_sentence: Whereas previous studies of this research team dealt mainly with the effect caused by the placement of quantum dot films or the concentration of quantum dots, this study deals with changes in lighting characteristics due to changes in the transmittance and concentration of quantum dots and the transmittance of the light-transmitting part (diffuser plate) to which quantum dots are attached. .
data.target_sentence: Previous studies by this research team mainly dealt with the effect of the arrangement of the quantum dot film or the concentration of the quantum dots. In this study, the transmittance of the light transmitting part (diffusion plate) to which the quantum dots are attached and the change in the lighting characteristics by the change in the concentration of the quantum dots are dealt with.

data.source_sentence: 휘도, 연색지수 및 색좌표의 변화와 투과도의 상관성에 대해 집중적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The correlation between changes in luminance, color rendering index, and color coordinates and transmittance was intensively analyzed.
data.target_sentence: The correlation between luminance change, color rendering index, color coordinates and transmittance was intensively analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 본 실험 결과와 이전에 진행된 시뮬레이션 결과의 비교 분석을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, a comparative analysis is performed between the results of this experiment and the simulation results performed previously.
data.target_sentence: In addition, the results of this experiment and the simulation results performed previously were compared and analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 재질인 트리아진 에폭시 레진(triazine epoxy resin)에 대한 양자점-실리카 혼합물의 비는 2.5, 5.0, 7.5 wt%였다.
data.mt_sentence: The ratio of the quantum dot-silica mixture to the triazine epoxy resin, which is the material of the quantum dot film, was 2.5, 5.0, and 7.5 wt%.
data.target_sentence: The ratio of the quantum dot-silica mixture to the triazine epoxy resin, which is a material of the quantum dot film, was 2.5, 5.0, and 7.5 wt%.

data.source_sentence: 양자점-레진 혼합물은 롤-투-롤(roll-to-roll) 슬롯 다이(slot die) 코팅을 통해 PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) 위에 30 µm의 두께로 코팅되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The quantum dot-resin mixture was coated with a thickness of 30 µm on PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) through roll-to-roll slot die coating.
data.target_sentence: The quantum dot-resin mixture was coated on PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) with a thickness of 30 μm through roll-to-roll slot die coating.

data.source_sentence: 사용된 양자점 필름의 사진은 그림 1(b)에 제시되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A photograph of the quantum dot film used is presented in Fig. 1(b).
data.target_sentence: The photo of the quantum dot film used is shown in Fig. 1(b).

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 구체적인 제작 공정에 대해서는 S. C. Hong etal.에 기술되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The specific fabrication process of the quantum dot film is described in SC Hong et al.
data.target_sentence: The specific manufacturing process of the quantum dot film is described in SC Hong et al.

data.source_sentence: 표 1은 세 종류의 확산판의 전광선투과율(total transmittance), 탁도(haze), 확산 투과율(dif-fuse transmittance), 평행 투과율(parallel transmittance)을 비교한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 compares total transmittance, haze, diff-use transmittance, and parallel transmittance of the three types of diffusion plates.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 compares the total transmittance, haze, diff-use transmittance, and parallel transmittance of three types of diffuser plates.

data.source_sentence: 같은 재질에 두께만 다르기 때문에 세 확산판의 탁도는 모두 동일하지만 확산판의 두께가 증가함에 따라 확산판의 투과율이 줄어듦을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Because only the thicknesses of the three diffusion plates are different from the same material, the turbidity of the three diffusion plates is the same, but as the thickness of the diffusion plates increases, the transmittance of the diffusion plates decreases.
data.target_sentence: The turbidity of the three diffuser plates is the same because they are made of the same material, only the thickness of the diffuser plate is different, but as the thickness of the diffuser plate increases, the transmittance of the diffuser plate decreases.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 두께가 증가함에 따라 투과율이 감소해서 확산판 밑 구멍의 이미지가 흐려짐을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the transmittance decreases, and the image of the hole under the diffusion plate is blurred.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that as the thickness of the diffuser plate increases, the transmittance decreases and the image of the hole under the diffuser plate becomes blurred.

data.source_sentence: 세 가지 종류의 양자점 필름과 세 가지 종류의 확산판에 양자점 필름을 사용하지 않는 경우까지 포함해서 총 12가지 조합의 조명 구조가 가능해진다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 12 combinations of lighting structures are possible, including three types of quantum dot films and the case where no quantum dot films are used for the three types of diffusion plates.
data.target_sentence: A total of 12 lighting structures can be combined, including 3 types of quantum dot films and 3 types of diffusion plates not using quantum dot films.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름은 그림 1(a)와 같이 확산판의 하부 표면에 부착되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The quantum dot film was attached to the lower surface of the diffuser plate as shown in Fig. 1(a).
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 1(a), a quantum dot film was attached to the lower surface of the diffuser plate.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(b)–2(d)는 총 12가지 조합에 대해 측정된 고출력 LED 조명의 발광 스펙트럼이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2(b)–2(d) shows the emission spectrum of high-power LED lighting measured for a total of 12 combinations.
data.target_sentence: Figures 2(b)–2(d) show the emission spectra of high-power LED lights measured for a total of 12 combinations.

data.source_sentence: 0 wt%는 양자점 필름이 적용되지 않은 경우로서 깊은 적색(deep red) 영역의 스펙트럼 성분이 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: 0 wt% is a case where the quantum dot film is not applied, and the spectral component of the deep red region is insufficient.
data.target_sentence: 0wt% is a case in which a quantum dot film is not applied, and a case in which the spectral component of the deep red region is insufficient.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 농도가 올라가면서 약 630 nm 파장의 성분이 현저히 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: As the concentration of the quantum dot film increases, the component of about 630 nm wavelength significantly increases.
data.target_sentence: As the concentration of the quantum dot film increases, the component of about 630 nm wavelength greatly increases.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 확산판의 두께가 증가하면 투과도 감소에 의해 스펙트럼의 세기가 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the intensity of the spectrum decreases due to a decrease in transmittance.
data.target_sentence: In addition, as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the transmittance decreases and the intensity of the spectrum decreases.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에는 포함시키지 않았으나 전광선 투과율이 76–83%로 높은 확산판에 대해서도 실험을 진행했다.
data.mt_sentence: Although not included in this paper, an experiment was conducted on a diffusion plate with a high electric light transmittance of 76–83%.
data.target_sentence: Although not included in this paper, the experiment was conducted with a diffuser plate having a high total light transmittance of 76~83%.

data.source_sentence: 이 정도의 투과율 조건에서 확산판은 LED가 만드는 휘점을 완벽하게 가리지 못하고 글래어가 제거되지 못했으며 양자점 필름에 의한 적색 피크 역시 충분히 형성되지 못했다.
data.mt_sentence: Under the transmittance condition of this level, the diffuser plate did not completely cover the bright spot made by the LED, the glare could not be removed, and the red peak by the quantum dot film was not sufficiently formed.
data.target_sentence: Under the transmittance condition of this level, the diffuser plate did not completely cover the bright spots made by the LED, the glare could not be removed, and the red peak by the quantum dot film was not sufficiently formed.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름이 충분히 여기되기 위해서는 여기 광원(청색 및 녹색광)이 양자점 필름을 통과할 횟수가 높아야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order for the quantum dot film to be sufficiently excited, the number of times that the excitation light source (blue and green light) passes through the quantum dot film must be high.
data.target_sentence: In order for the quantum dot film to be sufficiently excited, the number of times the excitation light source (blue and green light) passes through the quantum dot film must be high.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 투과율이 낮으면 확산 반사율도 올라가면서 확산판과 하부 반사판 사이에 수직으로 형성되는 광학 공동(optical cavity)의 효과도 커져 양자점 필름에 대한 여기광의 다중 통과 확률이 올라간다.
data.mt_sentence: When the transmittance of the diffuser plate is low, the diffuse reflectance also increases and the effect of an optical cavity formed vertically between the diffuser plate and the lower reflector increases, so that the multiple passage probability of the excitation light through the quantum dot film increases.
data.target_sentence: If the transmittance of the diffuser plate is low, the diffuse reflectance is also increased. In addition, the effect of the optical cavity formed vertically between the diffusion plate and the lower reflector increases, so that the probability of multiple passage of the excitation light through the quantum dot film increases.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2는 투과율이 41–58% 정도인 확산판의 적용을 통해 광학 공동 내 빛의 다중 반사가 강해지면서 양자점 필름이 충분히 여기될 수 있음을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows that the quantum dot film can be sufficiently excited as multiple reflections of light in the optical cavity become stronger through the application of a diffusion plate with a transmittance of about 41–58%.

data.source_sentence: 전체적으로 조명의 수직 방향(0°)에서 휘도가 가장 높고 고시야각으로 갈수록 휘도가 감소하는 경향을 보여주고 있으나 각도 변화에 따른 휘도의 변화는 그리 크지 않다.

data.target_sentence: Overall, the luminance is highest in the vertical direction of illumination (0°), and the luminance tends to decrease as the viewing angle increases.

data.target_sentence: The luminescent properties of light are close to the Lambertian distribution.

data.source_sentence: 동일한 양자점 필름을 적용한 조명의 경우 확산판 두께가 증가하면 투과도가 감소해 휘도도 떨어지는 것으로 나타났다.

data.target_sentence: It was found that, in the case of illumination with the same quantum dot film, as the thickness of the diffuser plate increased, the transmittance decreased and the luminance decreased.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 동일한 확산판 두께에 대해 양자점 필름의 농도가 올라가는 경우 높은 농도의 양자점에 의한 다중 여기, 다중 산란으로 빛의 투과도가 감소하며 휘도도 떨어지는 걸로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when the concentration of the quantum dot film increases for the same thickness of the diffusion plate, the light transmittance decreases and the luminance appears to decrease due to multiple excitation and multiple scattering by the high concentration of quantum dots.

data.source_sentence: 여기 광원인녹색 및 청색광이 적색 양자점 필름을 거쳐 여기되면서 휘도에 크게 기여하는 녹색 영역의 세기가 감소하기 때문에 양자점의 농도가 높아짐에 따라 휘도가 감소하는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As the green and blue light, which are the sources of light, are excited through the red quantum dot film, the intensity of the green area that contributes greatly to the luminance decreases, so it can be seen that the luminance decreases as the concentration of the quantum dot increases.
data.target_sentence: As green and blue light, which are excitation light sources, are excited through the red quantum dot film, the intensity of the green region, which greatly contributes to luminance, is reduced. Therefore, it can be confirmed that the luminance decreases as the concentration of the quantum dots increases.

data.source_sentence: 이런 결과는 이미 선행 연구를 통해 확인된 바 있지만 본 연구에서는 확산판의 투과도가 상당히 변화해도 연색지수의 개선 효과는 그대로 유지된다는 것을 보여준다.
