data.target_sentence: In the method of applying the phosphor to the blue LED, it is difficult to change the correlated color temperature because the mixing ratio of the phosphor is fixed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 상용화되어 판매되는 제품에 양자점 필름을 적용함으로써 넓은 범위에서 색좌표와 상관색 온도를 변경시킬 수 있음을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: This study shows that the color coordinates and correlated color temperature can be changed in a wide range by applying a quantum dot film to commercially available products.
data.target_sentence: This study shows that when quantum dot films are applied to commercially available products, color coordinates and correlated color temperatures can be varied widely.

data.source_sentence: 이 방법은 동시에 백색 LED의 단점인 낮은 연색지수를 개선하는 효과도 거둘 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: At the same time, this method can also achieve the effect of improving the low color rendering index, which is a disadvantage of white LEDs.
data.target_sentence: At the same time, this method can also achieve the effect of improving the low color rendering index, which is a disadvantage of white LEDs.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 목표 중 하나였던 확산판의 투과도에 따른 광특성 변화의 측면을 보면, 양자점 기반 백색 LED 조명은 투광부의 투과율 변화에 따라 주목할 만한 차이를 나타내지는 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the aspect of the change in light characteristics according to the transmittance of the diffusion plate, which was one of the objectives of this study, quantum dot-based white LED lighting did not show a remarkable difference depending on the transmittance change of the light transmission part.
data.target_sentence: Looking at the light characteristic change according to the transmittance of the diffuser plate, which was one of the goals of this study, the quantum dot-based white LED lighting did not show a noticeable difference according to the transmittance change of the light emitting part.

data.source_sentence: 이는 사용된 확산판이 가시광선 대역에서 고른 투과율을 보인다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that the used diffusion plate shows even transmittance in the visible light band.
data.target_sentence: This means that the diffuser plate used exhibits uniform transmittance in the visible light band.

data.source_sentence: 투과율이 감소하면 휘도 및 광효율이 줄어들기 때문에 조명의 글래어를 방지하는 한에서 얇고 투과율이 높은 확산판을 사용하는 것이 바람직하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since luminance and light efficiency are reduced when transmittance is reduced, it is preferable to use a thin and high transmittance diffuser plate as far as preventing glare of illumination.
data.target_sentence: When the transmittance is lowered, the luminance and light efficiency are reduced. Therefore, it is preferable to use a thin and high transmittance diffusion plate to prevent glare of the light.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름도 부분적인 확산 효과를 나타내기 때문에 확산판의 두께를 추가적으로 줄일 여지를 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the quantum dot film also exhibits a partial diffusion effect, it gives room to further reduce the thickness of the diffusion plate.
data.target_sentence: Since the quantum dot film also exhibits a partial diffusion effect, it gives room to further reduce the thickness of the diffusion plate.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 LED 조명의 확산판 두께 및 양자점 필름의 농도에 따른 광 특성 변화를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the changes in the optical properties according to the thickness of the diffuser plate and the concentration of the quantum dot film of LED lighting were analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the change in optical properties according to the thickness of the diffuser plate of LED lighting and the concentration of the quantum dot film was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 투광부의 역할을 하는 확산판의 두께가 증가함에 따라 빛의 투과율이 감소하여 조명의 휘도도 줄어들었다.
data.mt_sentence: As the thickness of the diffusion plate serving as the light transmission unit increases, the transmittance of light decreases, and thus the luminance of the light decreases.
data.target_sentence: As the thickness of the diffusion plate serving as the light transmitting part becomes thicker, the transmittance of light decreases and the luminance of light decreases.

data.source_sentence: 휘도 분포는 람버시안 분포에 가까웠고 시야각에 따른 색좌표나 연색지수의 편차는 확인되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution, and the deviation of color coordinates or color rendering index according to the viewing angle was not confirmed.
data.target_sentence: The luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution, and the deviation of color coordinates or color rendering index according to the viewing angle was not confirmed.

data.source_sentence: 이는 양자점으로 이루어진 적절한 형상의 파장 변환 부품을 체결함으로써 상용화된 백색 LED의 광특성, 특히 조명의 색감을 넓은 범위에서 변경할 수 있다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that the optical characteristics of a commercially available white LED, especially the color of lighting, can be changed in a wide range by fastening a wavelength conversion part of an appropriate shape made of quantum dots.
data.target_sentence: This means that the optical properties of the currently commercially available white LEDs, especially the color of lighting, can be changed in a wide range by fastening a wavelength converter of an appropriate shape made of quantum dots.

data.source_sentence: 본 결과는 고출력 직하형 조명의 투광부와 양자점 필름의 적절한 조합을 통해 눈부심이 없고 연색지수가 높은 조명을 구현할 수 있음을 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: This result showed that it is possible to implement a light with no glare and a high color rendering index through the appropriate combination of the light transmitting part of the high-power direct lighting and the quantum dot film.
data.target_sentence: This result showed that glare-free light and high color rendering are possible through the proper combination of the high-power direct light emitter and quantum dot film.

data.source_sentence: Photobiomodulation (PBM) 치료법은 특정 파장대역의 광원이 미토콘드리아에서 ATP 생성을 촉진하는 현상을 이용하는 치료법으로서 상처 치유, 염증 감소, 통증 완화 효과가 있는 것으로 알려져 생물 및 의학 분야에서 많은 관심을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Photobiomodulation (PBM) therapy is a treatment that utilizes the phenomenon that light sources in a specific wavelength band promote ATP production in mitochondria, and is known to have wound healing, inflammation reduction, and pain relief effects, drawing much attention in the biological and medical fields.
data.target_sentence: Photobiomodulation (PBM) therapy is a therapy that uses a phenomenon in which a light source of a specific wavelength band promotes ATP production in mitochondria. It is known to have wound healing, inflammation reduction, and pain relief effects, and has received a lot of attention in the biological and medical fields.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 PBM 현상을 이용하여 모발의 성장을 촉진하고, 콜라겐 합성을 촉진하며, 지방 축적을 감소시키는 효과를 관측한 연구결과도 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, research results have also been reported that observed the effects of using PBM to promote hair growth, promote collagen synthesis, and reduce fat accumulation.
data.target_sentence: Recently, studies have also been reported in which effects of promoting hair growth, promoting collagen synthesis and reducing fat accumulation have been observed using PBM.

data.source_sentence: 이로 인해 PBM에 의한 치료효과를 이용하는 의료기기뿐만 아니라 PBM에 의한 효과를 이용하는 미용기기도 다수 개발되어 시장에 출시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, not only medical devices that use treatment effects by PBM, but also beauty devices that use effects by PBM have been developed and released in the market.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, not only medical devices using the therapeutic effect of PBM, but also cosmetic devices using the effects of PBM have been developed and released on the market.

data.source_sentence: OLED를 이용한 PBM 치료법의 효과를 분석하는 연구로서 기존에는 상처 치유 및 세포 재생 효과에 대한 연구가 주로 이루어졌으나, 최근에는 피부 개선, 피부 진정 등의 미용적 측면의 효과에 대한 연구도 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a study to analyze the effectiveness of PBM therapy using OLED, studies on wound healing and cell regeneration effects have been mainly conducted in the past, but recently, studies on beauty effects such as skin improvement and skin calming are also being conducted.
data.target_sentence: As a study to analyze the effect of PBM treatment using OLED, studies on wound healing and cell regeneration effects were mainly conducted in the past, but recently, studies on cosmetic effects such as skin improvement and skin soothing are being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 보건복지부 지정 공용기관생명윤리위원회 심의를 거쳐 연구윤리승인을 받아 시행되었다(승인번호: P01-202106-31-007).
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted with research ethics approval after deliberation by the Bioethics Committee of a public institution designated by the Ministry of Health and Welfare (approval number: P01-202106-31-007).
data.target_sentence: This study was carried out with research ethics approval after deliberation by the Bioethics Committee of a public institution designated by the Ministry of Health and Welfare (approval number: P01-202106-31-007).

data.source_sentence: 24 well plate에 각각의 세포를 분주하고 24시간 동안 배양시킨 후 완전히 부착된 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Each cell was dispensed in a 24-well plate and incubated for 24 hours, then it was confirmed that the cells were completely adhered.
data.target_sentence: Each cell was aliquoted in a 24-well plate and cultured for 24 hours, and then it was confirmed that the cells were completely adhered.

data.source_sentence: 현탁액은 4 ℃, 12000 rpm에서 10분 동안 원심 분리시켜 상층액을 단백질 정량과 활성측정 효소액으로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The suspension was centrifuged at 4 °C and 12000 rpm for 10 minutes, and the supernatant was used as an enzyme solution for protein quantification and activity measurement.
data.target_sentence: The suspension was centrifuged at 4° C., 12000 rpm for 10 minutes, and the supernatant was used as an enzyme solution for protein quantification and activity measurement.

data.source_sentence: 모든 실험은 세포 독성이 나타나지 않은 광 조사 조건에서 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: All experiments were conducted under light irradiation conditions in which cytotoxicity did not appear.
data.target_sentence: All experiments were conducted under light irradiation conditions that showed no cytotoxicity.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 피부주름 개선, 피부 미백, 염증 완화의 목적으로 OLED 조명 모듈의 PBM 효과를 이용할 수 있는 가능성을 입증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, the possibility of using the PBM effect of the OLED lighting module for the purpose of improving skin wrinkles, whitening skin, and alleviating inflammation was proved.
data.target_sentence: Through this, the possibility of using the PBM effect of the OLED lighting module for skin wrinkle improvement, skin whitening, and inflammation relief has been proven.

data.source_sentence: OLED 조명 모듈이 광조사 조건(중심파장, 광조사에너지)이 동일한 LED 조명모듈과 동등한 수준의 PBM 효과를 보이는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the OLED lighting module showed the same level of PBM effect as the LED lighting module with the same light irradiation conditions (center wavelength, light irradiation energy).
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the OLED lighting module exhibited the same level of PBM effect as the LED lighting module under the same light irradiation conditions (center wavelength, light irradiation energy).

data.source_sentence: OLED는 일반적으로 LED와 비교하여 무게가 가볍고 소모전력이 낮으며 유연 박막화가 가능한 장점이 있기 때문에, 피부에 밀착이 가능하여 광전달 효율이 우수한 소형 경량의 조명 모듈로 활용할수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: OLED generally has advantages of lighter weight, lower power consumption, and flexible thinning compared to LEDs, so it can be used as a small and lightweight lighting module with excellent light transmission efficiency as it can adhere to the skin.
data.target_sentence: Compared to LEDs, OLEDs generally have advantages such as light weight, low power consumption, and flexible thinning, so it can be used as a small and lightweight lighting module with excellent light transmission efficiency as it can adhere to the skin.

data.source_sentence: 향후 OLED 조명 모듈의 저비용 양산공정이 확립되고 신뢰성이 향상된다면 피부미용을 위한 다양한 웨어러블 기기에 활용될 것으로 기대한다.
data.mt_sentence: If a low-cost mass production process for OLED lighting modules is established and reliability is improved in the future, it is expected that it will be used in various wearable devices for skin care.
data.target_sentence: When the low-cost mass production process of OLED lighting module is established and reliability is improved in the future, it is expected to be used in various skin care wearable devices.

data.source_sentence: 수직 이방성을 가지는 나노선에서 수평 자기장 펄스에 의한 복수의 키랄성을 가지는 자구벽들의 이동에 관한 체계적인 연구를 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: A systematic study is conducted on the movement of magnetic sphere walls having a plurality of chiral properties by horizontal magnetic field pulses in a nano wire having vertical anisotropy.
data.target_sentence: A systematic study is being conducted on the movement of magnetic sphere walls with multiple chiral properties by horizontal magnetic field pulses in nanowires with vertical anisotropy.

data.source_sentence: 자구벽의 이동 방향은 횡축 자기장 펄스의 방향, 자구벽의 방향 및 쟐로쉰스키-모리야 상호작용의 부호에 의존한다.
data.mt_sentence: The direction of movement of the magnetic domain wall depends on the direction of the transverse magnetic field pulse, the direction of the magnetic domain wall, and the sign of the Zhaloshinsky-Moriya interaction.
data.target_sentence: The direction of movement of the magnetic domain wall depends on the direction of the transverse magnetic field pulse, the direction of the magnetic field and the sign of the ZhalosinskyMoriya interaction.

data.source_sentence: 레이스트랙 메모리로의 응용 가능성을 판정하기 위하여 연속적인 자기장 펄스에 의하여 복수의 자구벽이 일정하게 이동하는지 여부에 대해서 시뮬레이션을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to determine the applicability of the racetrack memory, a simulation is performed on whether a plurality of magnetic domain walls are constantly moved by successive magnetic field pulses.
data.target_sentence: In order to determine the applicability of the racetrack memory, a simulation is performed on whether a plurality of magnetic domain walls are constantly moved by successive magnetic field pulses.

data.source_sentence: 차세대 비휘발성 메모리 분야 및 인공지능 논리회로 분야로의 응용 가능성에 대해서 논의한다.
data.mt_sentence: The potential of application to the next-generation non-volatile memory field and artificial intelligence logic circuit field will be discussed.
data.target_sentence: The potential of application to the next-generation non-volatile memory field and artificial intelligence logic circuit field will be discussed.

data.source_sentence: BBB 연구소 AAA 박사에 의하여 제안된 스핀 분극전류 인가 자구벽 이동(spin-polarized current induced magneticdomain wall motion)은 기존 휘발성 메모리의 한계를 극복하고 자구벽이라는 비휘발성 소재를 사용함으로써 소모 전력을 획기적으로 줄이는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-polarized current induced magnetic domain wall motion proposed by Dr. AAA of BBB Research Institute overcomes the limitations of the existing volatile memory and dramatically reduces power consumption by using a non-volatile material called a magnetic domain wall. It is possible.
data.target_sentence: Spin polarization current-induced magnetic domain wall motion proposed by Dr. BBB Lab's AAA uses a non-volatile material called a magnetic domain wall to overcome the limitations of conventional volatile memory and dramatically reduce power consumption.

data.source_sentence: 기술이 발전함에 따라서 자구벽 이동 소자의 기반이 되는 자성체 나노선(magneticnanowire)은 수평 자기 이방성 물질에서 수직 자기 이방성(perpendicular magnetic anisotropy) 물질로 변화하게 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As technology advances, magnetic nanowires, which are the basis of magnetic domain wall moving devices, have changed from a horizontal magnetic anisotropy material to a perpendicular magnetic anisotropy material.
data.target_sentence: As technology develops, magnetic nanowires, which are the basis of magnetic field moving devices, are changing from horizontal magnetically anisotropic materials to perpendicular magnetically anisotropic materials.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 수직 자기 이방성 물질 내 자구벽의 넓이가 상대적으로 작기 때문에 정보의 밀도를 높이는 측면에서 유리하기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason is that the width of the magnetic domain wall in the perpendicular magnetic anisotropy material is relatively small, which is advantageous in terms of increasing the information density.
data.target_sentence: The reason is that the width of the magnetic domain wall is relatively small in the perpendicular magnetic anisotropy material, which is advantageous in increasing the information density.

data.source_sentence: 뿐만 아니라 상기 두 가지 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용(spin-orbit interaction) 기반 효과들로도 해석이 불가능한 현상들이 보고되었고, 최근에 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 가지는 자성 다층 박막에서 쟐로쉰스키-모리야 상호작용(Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction)이 크게 기여한다는 사실이 밝혀졌다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, phenomena that cannot be interpreted by the above two strong spin-orbit interaction-based effects have been reported, and recently, it has been found that the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction contributes significantly in magnetic multilayer thin films with strong spin-orbit interactions.
data.target_sentence: In addition, phenomena that cannot be interpreted even with the above two strong spin-orbit interaction-based effects have been reported. And, it has recently been found that the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction greatly contributes to magnetic multilayer thin films with strong spin-orbit interactions.

data.source_sentence: 가장 큰 기여 중 하나로는 자구 및 자구벽의 키랄성(chirality)을 주는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the biggest contributions is to give the chirality of domains and domain walls.
data.target_sentence: One of the biggest contributions is to give the chirality of domains and domain walls.

data.source_sentence: 키랄성이란 서로 다른 두 개의 자구와 그 사이에 존재하는 자구벽의 스핀방향이 특정 방향으로 꼬이는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Chirality means that the spin directions of two different magnetic domains and the magnetic domain wall existing between them are twisted in a specific direction.
data.target_sentence: Chirality means that the spin directions of two different magnetic domains and the magnetic domain wall between them are twisted in a specific direction.

data.source_sentence: 오른쪽 자구는 업(up) 방향을 향하고 있고 왼쪽 자구는 다운(down) 방향을 향하고 있다고 가정하면 자구벽의 자화 방향이 오른쪽(right) 방향, 혹은 왼쪽(left) 방향을 향하는지에 따라서 서로 다른 키랄성을 갖는다고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the right magnetic domain points in the up direction and the left magnetic domain points in the down direction, different chirality can be obtained depending on whether the magnetization direction of the magnetic domain wall is in the right or left direction. said to have
data.target_sentence: Assuming that the right magnetic domain points up and the left magnetic domain points down, different chirality can be obtained depending on whether the magnetization direction of the magnetic domain wall is right or left.

data.source_sentence: 이 방향은 시스템이 가지고 있는 DMI의 방향에 따라서 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: This direction is determined by the direction of the DMI that the system has.
data.target_sentence: This direction is determined by the direction of DMI the system has.

data.source_sentence: 문제는 키랄성을 가지는 자구벽을 효과적으로 이동시켜서 이를 기반으로 다양한 메모리 소자 또는 논리회로에 응용하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The problem is to effectively move the magnetic domain wall having chirality and apply it to various memory devices or logic circuits based on this.
data.target_sentence: The problem is to effectively move the magnetic domain wall having chirality and apply it to various memory devices or logic circuits based on this.

data.source_sentence: 가장 기본적인 자구벽 이동 방법으로는 외부 자기장을 인가하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The most basic way to move the magnetic domain wall is to apply an external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The most basic way to move the magnetic domain wall is to apply an external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 수직 자기 이방성을 가지는 나노선의 경우 자구의 방향과 동일한 방향으로 자기장을 인가하여 자구벽을 이동시키는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a nanowire having perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, it is a method of moving the magnetic domain wall by applying a magnetic field in the same direction as that of the magnetic domain.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a nanowire having perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, it is a method of moving the magnetic domain wall by applying a magnetic field in the same direction as the magnetic domain.

data.source_sentence: 대안으로 개발된 방법이 전류 인가 자구벽 이동 현상이다.
data.mt_sentence: An alternative developed method is the current-applied magnetic domain wall movement phenomenon.
data.target_sentence: An alternatively developed method is the current applied magnetic domain wall motion phenomenon.

data.source_sentence: 수직 자기 이방성을 만들기 위하여 기본적으로 강자성체-중금속 이종 접합 구조를 사용하는데 계면에서 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용이 만들어지고, 상기 시스템에 전류를 인가할 때 계면에서 스핀 전류(spincurrent)가 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to create vertical magnetic anisotropy, a ferromagnetic-heavy metal heterogeneous bonding structure is basically used, and a strong spin-orbit interaction is generated at an interface, and a spin current is generated at the interface when a current is applied to the system.
data.target_sentence: To create perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, a ferromagnetic-heavy metal hetero-bonding structure is basically used, and when a current is applied to the system, a strong spin-orbit interaction occurs at the interface and a spin current occurs at the interface.

data.source_sentence: 이 스핀 전류는 키랄성 자구벽을 제어하는데 매우 효과적인 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This spin current is known to be very effective in controlling the chiral domain wall.
data.target_sentence: This spin current is known to be very effective in controlling the chiral domain wall.

data.source_sentence: 최근에 횡축 자기장 펄스(transverse magnetic field pulse) 인가 자구벽 이동 및 자화 반전(magnetization reversal) 기술이 발표되어 주목을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a technique of moving a magnetic domain wall applying a transverse magnetic field pulse and magnetization reversal has been announced and is attracting attention.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a technique for moving a magnetic domain wall by applying a transverse magnetic field pulse and magnetization reversal has been announced and attracts attention.

data.source_sentence: 외부 자기장 외에 열적 요동에 의한 자기장, 자기 변형에 의한 자기장, DMI에 의한 자기장 등이 포함될 수 있으며, 마지막으로 α는 감쇠상수를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to the external magnetic field, a magnetic field due to thermal fluctuations, a magnetic field due to magnetostriction, a magnetic field due to DMI, etc. may be included. Finally, α means an attenuation constant.
data.target_sentence: In addition to the external magnetic field, a magnetic field due to thermal fluctuations, a magnetic field due to magnetostriction, a magnetic field due to DMI, etc. may be included, and finally, α means an attenuation constant.

data.source_sentence: 횡축 자기장 펄스에 의한 자구벽 이동 현상 또는 자화 반전 현상의 핵심은 LLG 방정식에서 설명하듯이 세차운동 토크(precession torque)와 감쇠 토크(damping torque)의 경쟁이다.
data.mt_sentence: The core of the magnetic domain wall movement phenomenon or the magnetization reversal phenomenon caused by the transverse magnetic field pulse is the competition between the precession torque and the damping torque, as described in the LLG equation.
data.target_sentence: The core of the magnetic wall movement phenomenon or the magnetization reversal phenomenon caused by the transverse magnetic field pulse is the competition between the precession torque and the damping torque described in the LLG equation.

data.source_sentence: 세차운동은 자구벽을 일정 방향으로 회전하려고 하기 때문에 나노선에서의 자구벽은 횡축 자기장 펄스에 의하여 이동하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Because precession tries to rotate the magnetic domain wall in a certain direction, the magnetic domain wall in the nanowire is moved by the transverse magnetic field pulse.
data.target_sentence: Because precession tries to rotate the magnetic domain wall in a certain direction, the magnetic domain wall of the nanowire is moved by the transverse magnetic field pulse.

data.source_sentence: 일단 횡축 방향으로 자기장이 인가되면 자구 및 자구벽은 세차운동 토크와 감쇠 토크의 경쟁으로 인하여 비평형 상태에 놓이게 되고 시스템이 평형 상태를 찾아가는 동안에 자구벽은 이동하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Once the magnetic field is applied in the transverse direction, the magnetic domain and the domain wall are placed in a non-equilibrium state due to competition between the precession torque and the damping torque, and the domain wall moves while the system finds the equilibrium state.
data.target_sentence: When a magnetic field is applied in the transverse direction, the competition between the precession torque and the damping torque causes the magnetic domain and the magnetic domain wall to become non-equilibrium, and the magnetic domain wall moves while the system seeks equilibrium.

data.source_sentence: 자기장 펄스가 사라지면 새로운 평형상태의 시스템은 반대 방향의 토크를 받게 되고, 자구 및 자구벽은 원래 위치로 돌아가게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the magnetic field pulse disappears, the new equilibrium system receives a torque in the opposite direction, and the magnetic domain and the magnetic domain wall return to their original positions.
data.target_sentence: When the magnetic field pulses disappear, the new equilibrium system receives a torque in the opposite direction, and the magnetic domain and magnetic wall return to their original positions.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 시뮬레이션에 사용된 수직자기를 갖는 나노선에서의 자구 및 자구벽 생성 방법을 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1 shows a method for generating a magnetic domain and a magnetic domain wall in a nanowire with perpendicular magnetism used in the simulation.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1 shows a method for generating magnetic domains and magnetic walls in nanowires with perpendicular magnetism used in the simulation.

data.source_sentence: 상기 물질 상수들은 최근 브릴루앙 광산란을 이용한 DMI 크기 및 기타 물질 상수 측정 결과에서 결정하였기 때문에 실험적 검증이 용이할 것으로 예상한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the material constants were recently determined from the DMI size and other material constant measurement results using Brillouin light scattering, it is expected that the experimental verification will be easy.
data.target_sentence: Since the material constant was recently determined from the DMI size and other material constant measurement results using Brillouin light scattering, it is expected that the experimental verification will be easy.

data.source_sentence: DMI에 의한 키랄성을 가지는 다수의 자구벽을 생성하기 위하여 서로 다른 4개의 자구와 3개의 자구벽 구조체를 만들었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to generate multiple domain walls with chirality by DMI, four different domains and 3 domain wall structures were created.
data.target_sentence: Four different domains and three domain wall structures were generated by DMI to generate multi-domain walls with chirality.

data.source_sentence: 5 ns 후 서로 다른 3개의 자구벽의 자화 방향은 모두 x 방향과 나란하게 정렬하였다(Neel type).
data.mt_sentence: After 5 ns, the magnetization directions of the three different magnetic domain walls were all aligned with the x direction (Neel type).
data.target_sentence: After 5 ns, the magnetization directions of the three different magnetic domain walls were all aligned with the x direction (Neel type).

data.source_sentence: 횡축 방향 자기장의 방향이란 세차 토크의 크기가 최대화되는 방향이기 때문에 자구의 방향(± z) 및 자구벽의 방향(± x)에 동시에 수직한 ± y 방향을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the direction of the transverse magnetic field is the direction in which the magnitude of the precession torque is maximized, the direction of the magnetic domain (± z) and the direction of the magnetic domain wall (± x) mean the ± y direction at the same time.
data.target_sentence: The direction of the transverse magnetic field is a direction in which the magnitude of the precession torque is maximized. Therefore, it means the ± y direction simultaneously perpendicular to the direction of the magnetic domain (± z) and the direction of the magnetic domain wall (± x).

data.source_sentence: 앞서 진행되었던 연구들은 횡축 방향 자기장 펄스에 의한 다양한 동역학 해석 및 자구벽 이동에 관한 체계적인 연구 결과들을 보여주었으나, 복수의 자구벽을 갖는 구조체에서는 시도되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: Previous studies have shown systematic study results on various dynamics analysis and magnetic domain wall movement by transverse magnetic field pulses, but they have not been attempted in structures with multiple magnetic domain walls.
data.target_sentence: Existing studies have shown systematic research results on various dynamic analysis and magnetic domain wall movement by lateral magnetic field pulses, but this has not been attempted in structures with multiple magnetic domain walls.

data.source_sentence: 복수의 자구벽 이동과 관련된 선행연구가 되지 않는 경우, 실제 메모리나 논리 소자로 응용이 어려우며, 본 연구에서는 복수의 키랄성 자구벽이 횡축 방향 자기장 펄스에 의한 영향을 검증한다.
data.mt_sentence: It is difficult to apply it as a real memory or logic device if it is not a prior study related to the movement of multiple magnetic wall, and in this study, the effect of multiple chiral magnetic wall by the transverse magnetic field pulse is verified.
data.target_sentence: If there is no previous study related to the movement of multiple magnetic domain walls, it is difficult to apply them to real memories or logic devices, and in this study, the effect of multiple chiral magnetic wall by the transverse magnetic field pulse is verified.

data.source_sentence: 횡축 자기장 펄스의 세기는 100 mT~200 mT까지 다양하게 변화를 주었으며 펄스의 상승시간(rise time)은 10 ps으로 고 정했으며, 펄스의 유지시간(duration time)과 하강시간(falltime)은 변수로 놓고 시뮬레이션을 수행했다.
data.mt_sentence: The intensity of the transverse magnetic field pulse varied from 100 mT to 200 mT, and the rise time of the pulse was fixed at 10 ps, and the duration time and fall time of the pulse were set as variables.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of the transverse magnetic field pulse varied from 100 mT to 200 mT, and the rise time of the pulse was fixed at 10 ps. The simulation was performed with the duration time and fall time of the pulse set as variables.

data.source_sentence: 뿐만 아니라 자구벽을 고정시키기 위해서 물리적 노치(notch)를 사용했으며 노치의 크기는 5 × 5 m2이고 간격은 50 nm로 나노선의 폭과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, a physical notch was used to fix the magnetic sphere wall, and the notch size was 5 × 5 m2 and the gap was 50 nm, equal to the width of the nanowires.
data.target_sentence: In addition, the magnetic sphere wall was fixed using a physical notch, and the size of the notch was 5 × 5 m2 and the gap was 50 nm, which is the same as the width of the nanowire.

data.source_sentence: 자기장 펄스 인가는 동일 시스템에 최소 1회부터 최대 2회까지 수행했다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic field pulse application was performed on the same system from at least once to up to two times.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic field pulse application was performed from a minimum of 1 to a maximum of 2 times in the same system.

data.source_sentence: 횡축 자기장 펄스 인가 키랄 자구벽 이동에 대해 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The movement of the chiral domain wall with the application of a transverse magnetic field pulse was studied.
data.target_sentence: The movement of the chiral domain wall upon application of a transverse magnetic field pulse was studied.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 노치가 없는 나노선에서 3개의 키랄 자구벽들이 y 축 방향 횡축 자기장 펄스에 의하여 어떻게 움직이는지를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Fig. 2 shows how the three chiral domain walls move by the y-axis transverse magnetic field pulses in the unnotched nanowire.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows how the walls of three chiral domains are moved by y-axis transverse magnetic field pulses in an unnotched nanowire.

data.source_sentence: 횡축 자기장 펄스의 이력(profile)은 Fig.2(b)와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The profile of the transverse magnetic field pulse is shown in Fig. 2(b).
data.target_sentence: The profile of the transverse magnetic field pulse is shown in Fig. 2(b).

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2(c)는 시간에 따른 자구벽들의 변위(displacement)를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2(c) shows the displacement of the magnetic sphere walls over time.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2(c) shows the displacement of the magnetic sphere wall with time.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 자구벽들이 같은 키랄성을 가지고 있기 때문에 가능한 현상이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is possible because the domain walls have the same chirality.
data.target_sentence: This is possible because the domain walls have the same chirality.

data.source_sentence: 뿐만 아니라 상기 자구벽 이동 속도의 경우 각종 물질 상수의 함수이기 때문에 물질 상수의 조절에 의하여 자구벽 이동 속도를 크게 증가 또는 감소시키는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, since the magnetic domain wall movement speed is a function of various material constants, it is possible to greatly increase or decrease the magnetic domain wall movement speed by controlling the material constant.
data.target_sentence: In addition, since the moving speed of the magnetic domain wall is a function of various material constants, it is possible to greatly increase or decrease the moving speed of the magnetic domain wall by adjusting the material constant.

data.source_sentence: 1.11 ns 이후에 횡축 자기장 펄스 인가가 끝나는 시점부터 시스템은 반대 방향의 토크를 받게 되고 키랄 자구벽들은 다시 반대 방향으로 이동하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: After 1.11 ns, when the transverse magnetic field pulse application is finished, the system receives a torque in the opposite direction, and the chiral domain walls move in the opposite direction again.
data.target_sentence: After 1.11 ns, when the transverse magnetic field pulse application is complete, the system receives a torque in the opposite direction and the chiral domain wall moves in the opposite direction again.

data.source_sentence: 만약 초기상태와 자구벽 이동 상태가 동일하다면 같은 세기의 토크가 인가되기 때문에 대칭성에 의하여 자구벽들은 초기 위치로 되돌아와야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the initial state and the moving state of the magnetic domain wall are the same, the magnetic domain walls must return to their initial position due to symmetry because the same torque is applied.
data.target_sentence: If the initial state of the magnetic domain wall and the moving state are the same, the magnetic domain wall must return to its initial position because the same torque is applied due to symmetry.

data.source_sentence: 총 시뮬레이션 시간 5 ns 동안 자구벽의 이동 변위들을 살펴본 결과 펄스 인가가 끝나고 상당한 시간이 지났지만, 자구벽들은 초기 위치로 돌아오지 않는다는 사실을 발견했다(Fig. 2(a) 참고).
data.mt_sentence: As a result of examining the displacements of the magnetic domain walls during the total simulation time of 5 ns, it was found that although a considerable amount of time has elapsed after the pulse application, the domain walls do not return to their initial positions (see Fig. 2(a)).
data.target_sentence: As a result of examining the displacement of the magnetic domain wall for a total simulation time of 5 ns, it was found that the magnetic domain wall did not return to its initial position even though a considerable amount of time had elapsed after the pulse was applied (See Figure 2(a)).

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 키랄 자구벽 이동 시 발생하는 자구벽의 경사각(tilting angle) 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason is the tilting angle of the domain wall that occurs when the chiral domain wall moves.
data.target_sentence: The reason is the tilt angle of the domain wall that occurs when the chiral domain wall moves.

data.source_sentence: DMI에 의하여 자구벽이 이동할 때 경사각이 발생하고 초기 상태와 펄스 인가 후의 평형상태가 동등하지 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: When the magnetic domain wall moves due to DMI, an inclination angle occurs, and the initial state and the equilibrium state after pulse application are not equal.
data.target_sentence: When the magnetic domain wall is moved by DMI, an inclination angle occurs, and the initial state and the equilibrium state after the pulse application are not the same.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로 Fig. 2(c)의 자구벽 변위를 살펴보면 초기에 자구벽 이동이 시작되고 자구벽의 변위가 지속적으로 증가만 하는 것이 아니라 주기적인 요동(fluctuation)이 있다는 사실을 밝혀냈다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, looking at the displacement of the magnetic sphere wall in Fig. 2(c), it was found that the movement of the magnetic sphere wall initially began and the displacement of the magnetic sphere wall did not only increase continuously, but also there was periodic fluctuation.
data.target_sentence: Finally, looking at the displacement of the magnetic domain wall in Fig. 2(c), it was found that the magnetic domain wall started to move in the early stage, and thus the displacement of the magnetic domain wall not only increased, but also continuously increased, but also there was periodic fluctuation.

data.source_sentence: 이는 횡축 자기장 인가 자구벽 이동이라는 물리 현상이 세차운동 토크와 감쇠현상 토크와의 경쟁에서 발생하는데, 이 주기에 맞춰서 요동이 발생하는 것으로 이해할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be understood that the physical phenomenon of transverse magnetic field application magnetic wall movement occurs in the competition between the precession torque and the damping phenomenon torque, and fluctuations occur according to this period.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that in the competition between the precession torque and the damping phenomenon torque, the physical phenomenon of the magnetic domain wall applied with the transverse magnetic field occurs, and the fluctuation occurs according to this period.

data.source_sentence: 다른 하나의 요인으로는 펄스의 하강시간이 상승시간에 비하여 10배가 더 긴 100 ps을 사용했기 때문에 초기상태로 회귀하는 데 많은 시간이 걸리게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Another factor is that it takes a lot of time to return to the initial state because the fall time of the pulse is 100 ps which is 10 times longer than the rise time.
data.target_sentence: Another factor is that the fall time of the pulse is 100 ps, which is 10 times the rise time, which takes a lot of time to return to the initial state.

data.source_sentence: 노치는 자구벽의 이동을 통제하는 대표적인 도구로써 노치가 있는 경우 자구벽은 노치에 걸리는 pinning현상이 발생하고, 또 강한 외부 자극(예: 자기장 또는 전류)을 인가해야만 노치에서 빠져나오는 depinning 현상이 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The notch is a representative tool that controls the movement of the magnetic domain wall. If there is a notch, the magnetic domain wall is pinning on the notch, and depinning occurs only when a strong external stimulus (eg, magnetic field or current) is applied to get out of the notch. will do
data.target_sentence: The notch is a representative tool for controlling the movement of the magnetic domain wall. If there is a notch, the magnetic domain wall is caught by the notch, called pinning, and a strong external stimulus (eg, magnetic field or electric current) is applied to break out of the notch.

data.source_sentence: 다른 한 가지 요인은 횡축 자기장의 하강시간을 조절하여 시스템에 인가되는 토크를 조절함으로써 일정 변위를 가지고 움직인 자구벽들이 다시 회귀하는 현상을 억제하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Another factor is to control the torque applied to the system by adjusting the descent time of the transverse magnetic field to suppress the regression of magnetic sphere walls that have moved with certain displacements.
data.target_sentence: Another factor is to control the torque applied to the system by adjusting the fall time of the transverse magnetic field, thereby suppressing the degeneration of the magnetic field wall that has moved with a certain displacement.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3은 서로 다른 세기의 비대칭 횡축 자기장 펄스 인가에 의하여 복수의 키랄 자구벽이 이동하여 노치에 pinning되는 현상을 보여주는 시뮬레이션 결과들이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3 are simulation results showing a phenomenon in which a plurality of chiral domain walls are moved and pinning in the notch by the application of asymmetric transverse magnetic field pulses of different intensities.
data.target_sentence: FIG. 3 shows simulation results showing a phenomenon in which a plurality of chiral magnetic domain walls are moved and fixed to a notch by applying asymmetric transverse magnetic field pulses of different intensities.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 3개의 서로 다른 자구벽이 원점을 대칭으로 ± 100 nm에 위치해 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, three different magnetic domain walls are symmetrically located at ± 100 nm from the origin.
data.target_sentence: First, three different magnetic domain walls are symmetrically located ± 100 nm from the origin.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 말하는 비대칭은 자기장 펄스의 상승시간과 하강시간이 극단적으로 다른 것을 의미하고, 본 시뮬레이션에서 사용된 펄스의 상승시간과 하강시간은 10 ps과 1000 ps이고 펄스지속시간은 1000 ps이다.
data.mt_sentence: The asymmetry here means that the rise time and fall time of the magnetic field pulse are extremely different, and the rise time and fall time of the pulse used in this simulation are 10 ps and 1000 ps, and the pulse duration is 1000 ps.
data.target_sentence: Asymmetry here means that the rise and fall times of the magnetic field pulses are extremely different, and the pulses used in this simulation have rise and fall times of 10 ps and 1000 ps, and pulse durations of 1000 ps.

data.source_sentence: 첫 번째 펄스의 세기는 +150 Mt이며 총 시뮬레이션 시간은 5 ns이다.
data.mt_sentence: The intensity of the first pulse is +150 Mt and the total simulation time is 5 ns.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of the first pulse is +150 Mt and the total simulation time is 5 ns.

data.source_sentence: 첫 번째 펄스의 세기를 +150 mT로 설정한 이유는 초기상태에서 자구벽은 노치에 pinning되어 있는 상태이기 때문에 depinning 현상이 일어나기에 충분한 자기장을 인가해야 하기 때문에 +150 mT를 인가했다.
