data.source_sentence: 전원 공급기가 정 전압원일 경우 코일의 권선 수에 따라 코일 인덕턴스가 달라져 코일에 흐르는 전류가 변하여 솔레노이드 코일 내부의 자기장 세기 또한 달라지므로 코일에 작용하는 힘 또한 달라진다.
data.mt_sentence: When the power supply is a constant voltage source, the coil inductance changes depending on the number of turns of the coil, so the current flowing through the coil changes, so the magnetic field strength inside the solenoid coil also changes, so the force acting on the coil also changes.
data.target_sentence: If the power source is a constant voltage source, the inductance of the coil changes depending on the number of turns of the coil, so the current flowing through the coil changes, so the magnetic field strength inside the solenoid coil changes, so the force acting on the coil changes.

data.source_sentence: 이 경우 코일 동선 각각의 내부에서는 Fig. 4와 같이 자속 밀도의 세기가 선형적으로 감소할 것으로 예상할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the inside of each coiled copper wire is shown in Fig. 4, it can be expected that the intensity of the magnetic flux density decreases linearly.
data.target_sentence: In this case, the inside of each coiled copper wire is shown in Fig. 4, it can be expected that the intensity of the magnetic flux density decreases linearly.

data.source_sentence: 전류가 흐르는 도선의 표피 효과와 근접 효과를 무시할 경우, 동선 내부에서의 전류 밀도는 일정하고 식 (18)과 같이 정의할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the skin effect and proximity effect of the current-carrying wire are neglected, the current density inside the copper wire is constant and can be defined as Equation (18).
data.target_sentence: If the skin effect and proximity effect of the current-carrying wire are neglected, the current density inside the copper wire is constant and can be defined as Equation (18).

data.source_sentence: 여기서 a는 동선 내부의 폭 길이를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, a represents the width and length of the inside of the copper wire.
data.target_sentence: Here, denotes the width and length of the inside of the copper wire.

data.source_sentence: 솔레노이드로 구성된 코일도선의 한 가닥에 작용하는 자기적인 팽창력은 동선 내부에 인가되는 자속 밀도 크기 분포와 균일하게 흐르는 전류 밀도의 벡터곱으로 산출할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic expansion force acting on a single strand of a coil wire composed of a solenoid can be calculated by the vector product of the magnitude distribution of the magnetic flux density applied inside the wire and the current density flowing uniformly.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic expansion force acting on one strand of the coil wire composed of a solenoid can be calculated as the vector product of the magnitude distribution of the magnetic flux density applied inside the wire and the uniformly flowing current density.

data.source_sentence: 코일 동선 한 가닥의 미소 단면적에 작용하는 자기적인 팽창력은 식 (17), (18)을 이용하여 식 (21), 식 (22)로 정의할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic expansion force acting on the micro-cross-sectional area of a single strand of coil copper can be defined by equations 21 and 22 using equations 17 and 18.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic expansion force acting on the microscopic cross-sectional area of a single strand of coiled copper can be defined by Equations 21 and 22 using Equations 17 and 18.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 r은 솔레노이드 코일의 반경 길이를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, r denotes the radial length of the solenoid coil.
data.target_sentence: Here, r is the radial length of the solenoid coil.

data.source_sentence: 만약 솔레노이드 코일이 N개의 개별 코일로 권선되어 있다고 가정하면, 다층 권선된 솔레노이드 코일에 작용하는 전제적인 자기 팽창력은 식 (24)와 같이 산출된다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the solenoid coil is wound with N individual coils, the absolute self-expansion force acting on the multilayer wound solenoid coil is calculated as shown in Equation (24).
data.target_sentence: Assuming that N individual coils are wound around the solenoid coil, the absolute magnetic expansion force acting on the multi-layered solenoid coil is calculated as in Equation 24.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 솔레노이드 코일은 권선 수가 높아지면 여러 개의 층(layer)으로 구성된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, a solenoid coil is composed of several layers when the number of windings increases.
data.target_sentence: As a rule, solenoid coils are made up of several layers as the number of turns increases.

data.source_sentence: 솔레노이드의 코일이 n개의 층으로 설계되어 총 N턴 권선된 구조라고 가정하면, 다층 권선형 솔레노이드 코일 전체에 작용하는 전자기적 팽창력은 최종적으로 식 (25)와 같이 정의할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the solenoid coil is designed with n layers and has a total N turns winding structure, the electromagnetic expansion force acting on the entire multilayer winding type solenoid coil can be finally defined as Equation (25).
data.target_sentence: Assuming that the solenoid coil is designed with n layers and has a total N winding structure, the electromagnetic expansion force acting on the entire multilayer winding type solenoid coil can be finally defined as Equation (25).

data.source_sentence: 다층 권선형 솔레노이드 코일에 큰 전류가 인가될 경우 코일에는 입력 전류의 크기와 코일 형상 치수에 비례하는 전자기력이 코일 도선 간에 작용한다.
data.mt_sentence: When a large current is applied to a multilayer wound solenoid coil, an electromagnetic force proportional to the magnitude of the input current and the coil shape dimension acts on the coil wire.
data.target_sentence: When a large current is applied to the multilayer wound solenoid coil, an electromagnetic force proportional to the magnitude of the input current and the coil shape dimension acts on the coil wire.

data.source_sentence: 코일의 반경 방향으로 작용하는 자기 팽창력은 코일 조립체의 구조적인 안정성을 저해하는 주요 요인이기 때문에 솔레노이드 코일 조립체 덮개 및 지지구조물에 대한 구조설계 단계에서 코일에 작용하는 전자기적 팽창력의 분석은 반드시 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic expansion force acting in the radial direction of the coil is a major factor that hinders the structural stability of the coil assembly, so it is essential to analyze the electromagnetic expansion force acting on the coil in the structural design stage for the solenoid coil assembly cover and support structure.
data.target_sentence: The self-expansion force acting in the radial direction of the coil is a major factor that hinders the structural stability of the coil assembly. Therefore, analysis of the electromagnetic expansion force acting on the coil is absolutely necessary in the structural design stage for the solenoid coil assembly cover and support structure.

data.source_sentence: 실제 유도탄 사출 발사용으로 제작한 전자기식 코일건 발사대에서의 고정자 코일 단일 조립체 형상과 코일에 인가되는 입력 전원 사양을 반영하여 모사한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is simulated by reflecting the single assembly shape of the stator coil and the input power specification applied to the coil in the electromagnetic coil gun launcher manufactured for actual missile injection and firing.
data.target_sentence: The single assembly shape of the stator coil and the input power specification applied to the coil were simulated by reflecting the electromagnetic coil gun launcher manufactured for actual missile injection and launch.

data.source_sentence: 수치해석 시뮬레이션은 상용 전자기해석 프로그램인 MagNET을 이용하여 솔레노이드 코일을 2차원 축대칭으로 모델링 한 후 코일의 설계 인자 및 재질 특성, 공기 영역에서의 경계 조건을 설정하여 해석을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Numerical analysis simulation was performed by modeling the solenoid coil as a two-dimensional axisymmetric model using MagNET, a commercial electromagnetic analysis program, and then setting the design factors and material properties of the coil and boundary conditions in the air domain.
data.target_sentence: Numerical simulation was performed by modeling the solenoid coil as a two-dimensional axisymmetric model using MagNET, a commercial electromagnetic analysis program, and setting the design factors and material properties of the coil and boundary conditions of the air region.

data.source_sentence: 해석 결과, 코일의 저항이 작아 코일에 흐르는 전류는 5 kV 전압인가 시 최대 9 kA까지 흐르고 것을 확인하였고, 수학적 모델식으로부터 계산한 결과와 시뮬레이션 결과는 거의 유사한 값이 계산되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was confirmed that the current flowing in the coil flows up to 9 kA when a voltage of 5 kV is applied because the resistance of the coil is small, and a value almost similar to the result calculated from the mathematical model equation and the simulation result.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was confirmed that the current flowing through the coil flows up to 9kA when a voltage of 5kV is applied because the resistance of the coil is small, and the mathematical model equation and simulation results.

data.source_sentence: 솔레노이드 코일의 경우 코일 권선 수 와 코일의 길이와 같은 형상치수에 따라 코일 저항 및 인덕턴스의 계산식이 간단하게 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of solenoid coils, the calculation formula of coil resistance and inductance is simply defined according to the number of coil windings and shape dimensions such as the length of the coil.
data.target_sentence: For solenoid coils, the formulas for calculating coil resistance and inductance are simply defined by geometric dimensions such as the number of turns in the coil and the length of the coil.

data.source_sentence: 산출된 코일의 저항 및 인덕턴스에 의하여 전체 임피던스 값이 결정되며, 입력전원의 전압 크기와 임피던스 값에 의하여 코일에 흐르는 전류값이 산출된다.
data.mt_sentence: The total impedance value is determined by the calculated resistance and inductance of the coil, and the current value flowing in the coil is calculated by the voltage size and impedance value of the input power.
data.target_sentence: The total impedance value is determined by the calculated resistance and inductance of the coil, and the current flowing through the coil is calculated by the voltage magnitude and impedance value of the input power.

data.source_sentence: 코일 내부에서 발생하는 자기장의 크기는 코일 내부에 흐르는 전류의 값과 코일 권선 수에 의해 결정되고, 코일에 작용하는 로렌츠 힘은 자기장의 값과 코일에 흐르는 전류값의 벡터곱으로 산출할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnitude of the magnetic field generated inside the coil is determined by the value of the current flowing inside the coil and the number of coil windings, and the Lorentz force acting on the coil can be calculated by the vector product of the value of the magnetic field and the current flowing in the coil.
data.target_sentence: The magnitude of the magnetic field generated inside the coil is determined by the value of the current flowing inside the coil and the number of turns of the coil, and the Lorentz force acting on the coil can be calculated as a vector product of the magnetic field value and the current flowing in the coil.

data.source_sentence: 결론적으로 수치해석 시뮬레이션 모델링 단계에서 솔레노이드 코일의 형상 치수가 반영되며, 이에 따른 코일의 회로 정수, 전류 및 자기장 해석 결과값이 단순한 수식으로 계산한 값과 비교하여 거의 유사하게 계산되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In conclusion, the shape dimensions of the solenoid coil were reflected in the numerical analysis simulation modeling stage, and the circuit constant, current, and magnetic field analysis results of the coil were calculated almost similarly compared to those calculated with a simple equation.
data.target_sentence: In conclusion, the shape dimensions of the solenoid coil were reflected in the numerical simulation modeling stage, and the coil circuit constant, current, and magnetic field analysis results were calculated almost similar to those calculated with simple equations.

data.source_sentence: 코일에 작용하는 팽창력의 크기도 본 논문에서 제안한 수식에 의한 계산값과 수치해석 시뮬레이션을 통한 결과값이 잘 일치하는 경향이 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnitude of the expansion force acting on the coil also tends to agree well with the calculated value of the formula proposed in this paper and the result of numerical simulation.
data.target_sentence: The magnitude of the expansion force acting on the coil also tends to agree well with the calculated values of the formulas proposed in this paper and the results of numerical analysis.

data.source_sentence: 솔레노이드 코일 반경 방향으로 작용하는 팽창력은 권선된 코일의 형상구조 인자와 전류의 크기 변수의 함수로 간략하게 표현할 수 있었고, 이로부터 코일 고정형 구조물에 작용하는 물리적인 반력을 분석하는 방법과 간략화 수식을 구체화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The expansion force acting in the radial direction of the solenoid coil could be briefly expressed as a function of the shape structure factor and current magnitude variable of the wound coil, and from this, the method of analyzing the physical reaction force acting on the coil fixed structure and the simplified formula were specified.
data.target_sentence: The expansion force acting in the radial direction of the solenoid coil can be briefly expressed as a function of the shape structure factor of the wound coil and the size variable of the current. From this, a method and simplified formula for analyzing the physical reaction force acting on the coil-fixed structure were embodied.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 제안한 수학적 모델식은 유한요소법을 이용한 전자기 수치해석 시뮬레이션 해석 결과를 통해 그 유효성을 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The mathematical model formula proposed in this paper was validated through the simulation results of electromagnetic numerical analysis using the finite element method.
data.target_sentence: The mathematical model equation proposed in this paper was verified through the simulation results of electromagnetic numerical analysis using the finite element method.

data.source_sentence: 3차원 네트워크 구조로 이루어진 하이드로겔은 많은 종류가 생분해성이며 독성이 없어 생체 적합성이 높은 재료이다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogels consisting of three-dimensional network structures are biodegradable and non-toxic, making them highly biocompatible materials.
data.target_sentence: A hydrogel composed of a three-dimensional network structure is a biodegradable and non-toxic material with high biocompatibility.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔은 환경공학, 생물의학 및 기타 분야에서 널리 사용되며, 특히 생체적 합성이 높은 특성으로 의료용 재료 설계 및 제조에 매우 중요한 요소 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogels are widely used in environmental engineering, biomedical science, and other fields, and are particularly highly biocompatible, making them one of the most important factors in the design and manufacture of medical materials.
data.target_sentence: Hydrogels are widely used in various fields such as environmental engineering and biomedical science, and in particular, due to their high biocompatibility, it is one of the most important factors in the design and manufacture of medical materials.

data.source_sentence: 자기 자극에 반응하는 자기반응형 스마트 하이드로겔 마이크로 로봇은 빠른 반응 속도, 생체 적합성이 높은 재료, 자기장을 통한 원격 제어 등의 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Self-responsive smart hydrogel micro-robots that respond to magnetic stimuli have advantages such as fast reaction speed, high biocompatibility materials, and remote control through magnetic fields.
data.target_sentence: Self-responsive smart hydrogel micro-robots that respond to magnetic stimuli have advantages such as fast reaction speed, high biocompatible materials, and remote control through magnetic fields.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 자기반응형 스마트 하이드로겔의 반응 원리와 합성 방법을 소개하고, 성능 특성을 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper introduces the reaction principle and synthesis method of a self-reactive smart hydrogel, and analyzes its performance characteristics.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the reaction principle and synthesis method of self-reactive smart hydrogels are introduced and their performance characteristics are analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 자기반응형 스마트하이드로겔 마이크로/나노 로봇의 특성과 응용, 미래 연구 전망에 대해 논의한다.
data.mt_sentence: The characteristics, applications, and future research prospects of self-responsive smart hydrogel micro/nano robots will be discussed.
data.target_sentence: The characteristics, applications, and future research prospects of self-responsive smart hydrogel micro/nano robots are discussed.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔은 팽윤되며 많은 양의 수분을 함유할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The hydrogel swells and can contain a large amount of moisture.
data.target_sentence: Hydrogels can swell and contain large amounts of water.

data.source_sentence: 가교된 네트워크 구조는 완전히 융해되지 않으므로 하이드로겔은 우수한 수분 흡수 및 수분 보유 특성을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the crosslinked network structure is not completely melted, the hydrogel has excellent water absorption and water retention properties.
data.target_sentence: Since the crosslinked network structure is not completely dissolved, the hydrogel has excellent water absorption and water retention properties.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔의 구조의 강도와 특성은 실제 생체 조직과 매우유사하여 생물의학, 환경 및 재료 분야에서 폭넓게 응용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The strength and properties of the structure of the hydrogel are very similar to actual living tissues, so it can be widely applied in biomedical, environmental and material fields.
data.target_sentence: The strength and physical properties of the hydrogel structure are very similar to actual living tissues, so it can be widely applied in biomedical, environmental, and material fields.

data.source_sentence: 특히 스마트 하이드로겔은 외부 자극에 반응하여 팽윤, 탈팽윤, 재팽윤 등의 거동을 제어할 수 있어 활발한 연구가 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, smart hydrogels can control behaviors such as swelling, de-swelling, and re-swelling in response to external stimuli, so active research is being conducted.
data.target_sentence: In particular, smart hydrogels can control behaviors such as swelling, de-swelling, and re-swelling in response to external stimuli, so active research is being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 외부 자극 종류로는 온도, pH 농도, 화학, 압력, 자기장 등이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: External stimulus types include temperature, pH concentration, chemistry, pressure, and magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: External stimulus types include temperature, pH concentration, chemistry, pressure, and magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 외부 자기장이 가해졌을 때 자기장과 자기 나노 입자 사이의 힘과, 자기 나노 입자 사이에서 발생하는 힘에 의해 3차원 네트워크 구조의 부피 또는 모양이 마이크로 및 매크로 수준으로 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: When an external magnetic field is applied, the volume or shape of the three-dimensional network structure changes at the micro and macro level by the force between the magnetic field and the magnetic nanoparticles and the force generated between the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: When an external magnetic field is applied, the volume or shape of the 3D network structure changes in microscopic and macroscopic dimensions by the force between the magnetic field and the magnetic nanoparticles and the force generated between the magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 기본 원리를 통해 하이드로겔로 제작된 마이크로 로봇의 굽힘, 팽창, 수축 등의 변형을 유도할 수 있으며, 변형 정도와 주기를 조절해 운동을 제어할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the basic principle, deformation such as bending, expansion, and contraction of the microrobot made of hydrogel can be induced, and the movement can be controlled by adjusting the degree and period of deformation.
data.target_sentence: Through the basic principle, deformation such as bending, expansion, and contraction of the microrobot made of hydrogel can be induced, and the movement can be controlled by adjusting the degree and period of deformation.

data.source_sentence: 무선 구동 제어가 가능한 자기반응형 스마트 하이드로겔 마이크로봇은 표적 약물 전달, 보조 진단, 자기 온열 요법, 조직 공학 등의 분야에 적용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The self-responsive smart hydrogel microbot capable of wireless driving control can be applied to fields such as targeted drug delivery, auxiliary diagnostics, self-thermal therapy, and tissue engineering.
data.target_sentence: The self-responsive smart hydrogel microbot capable of wireless operation control can be applied to fields such as targeted drug delivery, auxiliary diagnosis, self-thermal therapy, and tissue engineering.

data.source_sentence: 자기 반응형 하이드로겔은 생물 의학 분야의 중요 요소로 주목받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Self-reactive hydrogels are attracting attention as an important factor in the field of biomedical science.
data.target_sentence: Self-reactive hydrogels are attracting attention as an important element in the field of biomedical science.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 자기 반응성 스마트 하이드로겔의 제작 원리 및방법, 성능, 마이크로 로봇의 특성 및 응용에 대해 서술한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper describes the fabrication principles and methods, performance, and characteristics and applications of micro-robots.
data.target_sentence: This paper describes the manufacturing principles and methods, performance, characteristics and applications of microrobots.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로 향후 자기반응형 하이드로겔의 연구 전망에 대해제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, future research prospects for self-reactive hydrogels are presented.
data.target_sentence: Finally, future research prospects for self-reactive hydrogels are presented.

data.source_sentence: 자기반응형 스마트 하이드로겔의 반응 원리 및 합성 방법에 대해 알아보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The reaction principle and synthesis method of self-reactive smart hydrogel will be investigated.
data.target_sentence: The reaction principle and synthesis method of self-reactive smart hydrogel are studied.

data.source_sentence: 스마트 하이드로겔은 친수성 고분자가 중합되어 일정한 물리적 또는 화학적 가교 방식을 통해 3차원 네트워크 구조의 겔을 형성한다.
data.mt_sentence: In smart hydrogels, hydrophilic polymers are polymerized to form a three-dimensional network-structured gel through a certain physical or chemical cross-linking method.
data.target_sentence: In smart hydrogels, hydrophilic polymers are polymerized through specific physical or chemical crosslinking methods to form a three-dimensional network structure of gel.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 “온-오프” 방식은 자기반응성 하이드로겔이 외부 자기장이 인가되었을 때에 형태가 변화하는 특성을 이용한다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the “on-off” method uses the property that the self-reactive hydrogel changes shape when an external magnetic field is applied.
data.target_sentence: First, the “on-off” method uses the property of changing the shape of the self-responsive hydrogel when an external magnetic field is applied.

data.source_sentence: “열 특성” 방식은 하이드로겔의 3차원 네트워크 구조 내부에 자기 나노 입자를 혼합한 뒤, 고주파 교류자기장으로 나노 입자를 발열시켜 하이드로겔의 팽윤 및 탈팽윤 거동을 제어한다.
data.mt_sentence: The “thermal properties” method controls the swelling and de-swelling behavior of the hydrogel by mixing magnetic nanoparticles inside the three-dimensional network structure of the hydrogel, and then heating the nanoparticles with a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The “thermal characterization” method controls the swelling and de-swelling behavior of the hydrogel by mixing magnetic nanoparticles inside the three-dimensional network structure of the hydrogel and then heating the nanoparticles with a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 세 가지 반응 방식 모두 외부 자극이 사라질 경우 하이드로겔은 원래의 형태로 복원되며, 이때 하이드로겔의 네트워크 구조는 파괴되지 않고 유지된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the external stimulus disappears in all three reaction methods, the hydrogel is restored to its original form, where the network structure of the hydrogel is maintained without being destroyed.
data.target_sentence: In all three reaction methods, when the external stimulus disappears, the hydrogel is restored to its original shape and the network structure of the hydrogel is maintained without destruction.

data.source_sentence: 자기 반응성 하이드로겔은 일반적으로 무기 자성 입자와 고분자 매트릭스로부터 물리적, 화학적 방법을 통해 제조된 복합 재료이다.
data.mt_sentence: A self-reactive hydrogel is generally a composite material prepared from inorganic particles and a polymer matrix through physical and chemical methods.
data.target_sentence: A self-reactive hydrogel is a composite material that is generally synthesized from inorganic particles and a polymer matrix through physical and chemical methods.

data.source_sentence: 자기 반응성 스마트 하이드로겔의 합성법은 물리적 혼합법(Blending method), 침전법(In-situ precipitation method), 그라프팅 공중법(Grafting-Onto method)이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The self-reactive smart hydrogel synthesis method includes a physical mixing method, a precipitation method, and a grafting-onto method.
data.target_sentence: A self-reactive hydrogel is a composite material that is generally synthesized from inorganic particles and a polymer matrix through physical and chemical methods.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔 혼합 방법은 일반적으로 두 단계에 걸쳐 진행된다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic hydrogel mixing method generally proceeds in two steps.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic hydrogel mixing method generally proceeds in two steps.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 화학적 방법을 사용해 자성 나노 입자를 제작한 뒤, 자성 나노 입자와 하이드로겔의 단량체를 균일하게 혼합한다.
data.mt_sentence: First, magnetic nanoparticles are prepared using a chemical method, and then the magnetic nanoparticles and the hydrogel monomer are uniformly mixed.
data.target_sentence: First, magnetic nanoparticles are prepared using a chemical method, and then the magnetic nanoparticles and the hydrogel monomer are uniformly mixed.

data.source_sentence: 이후 하이드로겔 단량체는 가교 중합 과정을 거치며 Fig. 1(a)와 같이 3차원 사슬 구조물 사이에 자성 나노입자가 위치하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, the hydrogel monomer undergoes a cross-linking polymerization process, and magnetic nanoparticles are located between the three-dimensional chain structures as shown in Fig. 1(a).
data.target_sentence: After that, the hydrogel monomer undergoes a cross-linking polymerization process, and magnetic nanoparticles are positioned between the three-dimensional chain structure as shown in Fig. 1(a).

data.source_sentence: 제작된 하이드로겔은 코어-쉘 구조로 자성 입자가 중앙에 위치하는 형태를 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: The prepared hydrogel has a core-shell structure in which magnetic particles are located in the center.
data.target_sentence: The prepared hydrogel has a core-shell structure in which magnetic particles are located in the center.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 알지네이트와 PNiPAAm를 상온에서 중합하여 망상구조의 하이드로겔을 제조하였다.
data.mt_sentence: First, a hydrogel of a network structure was prepared by polymerization of alginate and PNiPAAm at room temperature.
data.target_sentence: First, a hydrogel of a network structure was prepared by polymerizing alginate and PNiPAAm at room temperature.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 하이드로겔을 증류수에서 2일 동안 투석해 반응하지 않은 단량체들을 제거하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The prepared hydrogel was dialyzed in distilled water for 2 days to remove unreacted monomers.
data.target_sentence: The prepared hydrogel was dialyzed in distilled water for 2 days to remove unreacted monomers.

data.source_sentence: 이때 하이드로겔 내부의 철 이온은 산화과정을 거쳐 산화철이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the iron ions inside the hydrogel undergo an oxidation process to become iron oxide.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the iron ions inside the hydrogel undergo an oxidation process to become iron oxide.

data.source_sentence: 위의 절차를 세 번 반복하여 산화철 함유량을 높일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The above procedure can be repeated three times to increase the iron oxide content.
data.target_sentence: You can increase the iron oxide content by repeating the above process 3 times.

data.source_sentence: 이 과정으로 자기하이드로겔을 제작할 경우 강한 자성을 가지는 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When a magnetic hydrogel is manufactured by this process, there is an advantage of having strong magnetism.
data.target_sentence: There is an advantage of having strong magnetism when manufacturing a magnetic hydrogel through this process.

data.source_sentence: 제작 준비 과정이 번거롭고 합성 효율이 낮으며, 하이드로겔 내부의 3차원 구조가 파괴될 가능성이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The fabrication preparation process is cumbersome, the synthesis efficiency is low, and the three-dimensional structure inside the hydrogel is likely to be destroyed.
data.target_sentence: The manufacturing preparation process is cumbersome, the synthesis efficiency is low, and the three-dimensional structure inside the hydrogel is easily destroyed.

data.source_sentence: 그라프팅 방법은 Fig. 1(c)와 같이 자성 나노입자와 고분자 네트워크 사이에 공유결합을 형성하여 3차원 네트워크 구조를 보다 안정적으로 만드는 그라프트 중합법을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The grafting method refers to a graft polymerization method that forms covalent bonds between magnetic nanoparticles and polymer networks, making the three-dimensional network structure more stable, as shown in Fig. 1(c).
data.target_sentence: The grafting method refers to a graft polymerization method that makes the three-dimensional network structure more stable by forming a covalent bond between the magnetic nanoparticles and the polymer network as shown in Fig. 1(c).

data.source_sentence: AAA는 무기 구조에 가교제 및 강화제로 아크릴산 변성 마그네시아 나노로드(org-ATP)를 도입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA introduced acrylic acid-modified magnesia nanorods (org-ATP) as crosslinking agents and reinforcing agents in the inorganic structure.
data.target_sentence: AAA introduced acrylic acid-modified magnesia nanorods (org-ATP) as crosslinkers and reinforcing agents with inorganic structures.

data.source_sentence: 이어 가교제와 강화제를 통해 자성 마그네시아/미분탄회/폴리(아크릴산)(ATP/FA/PAA) 삼원 나노복합 하이드로겔 재료를 제조했다.
data.mt_sentence: Subsequently, a magnetic magnesia/differentiated carbon/poly(acrylic acid) (ATP/FA/PAA) three-way nanocomposite hydrogel material was manufactured through a crosslinking agent and a reinforcing agent.
data.target_sentence: Then, a magnetic magnesia/carbon pulverized/poly(acrylic acid) (ATP/FA/PAA) ternary nanocomposite hydrogel material was prepared through a crosslinking agent and a reinforcing agent.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 실험 조건에서 얻은 하이드로겔의 그래프트율을 조사한 결과 단량체의 약 95%가 무기 물질에 그래프트되어 높은 기계적 안정성과 자성을 갖는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of examining the graft rate of the hydrogel obtained under various experimental conditions, it was confirmed that about 95% of the monomer was grafted to the inorganic material, thereby having high mechanical stability and magnetism.
data.target_sentence: As a result of examining the graft rate of the hydrogel obtained under various experimental conditions, it was confirmed that about 95% of the monomer was grafted to the inorganic material and thus had high mechanical stability and magnetism.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔을 사용하여 인간 점막 섬유아세포를 배양하면 Fig. 2(d)와 같이 Poly@Mag@PEG가 섬유아세포 주위에 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: When human mucosal fibroblasts are cultured using magnetic hydrogels, Poly@Mag@PEG is present around the fibroblasts as shown in Fig. 2(d).
data.target_sentence: When human mucosal fibroblasts are cultured using magnetic hydrogels, Poly@Mag@PEG is present around the fibroblasts as shown in Figure 2(d).

data.source_sentence: PCNA(Proliferating CellNuclear Antigen) 테스트를 통해 Fig. 2(b)와 같이 하이드로겔에서 섬유아세포가 증식함을 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A PCNA (Proliferating Cell Nuclear Antigen) test confirmed that fibroblasts proliferate in hydrogels as shown in Fig. 2(b).
data.target_sentence: Through PCNA (Proliferating Cell Nuclear Antigen) test, as shown in Fig. 2(b), it was confirmed that fibroblasts proliferated in the hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: 섬유아세포의 면역분석을 진행하여 Fig. 2(c)와 같이 강한 양성 면역반응을 보이는 것을 확인되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Immunoassay analysis of fibroblasts was performed and it was confirmed that they showed a strong positive immune response as shown in Fig. 2(c).
data.target_sentence: The results of immunoassay on fibroblasts are shown in Fig. 2(c), which was confirmed that a strong positive immune response.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과를 통해 자기 하이 드로겔이 우수한 생체 적합성을 가지고 있음을 증명한다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results prove that the magnetic hydrogel has excellent biocompatibility.
data.target_sentence: Experimental results prove that magnetic hydrogels have excellent biocompatibility.

data.source_sentence: 이때 H2O에 의한 분해를 가수분해, NaOH에 의한 분해를 비누화라 한다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, decomposition by H2O is called hydrolysis, and decomposition by NaOH is called saponification.
data.target_sentence: At this time, decomposition by H2O is called hydrolysis, and decomposition by NaOH is called saponification.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3(c)는 하이드로겔 구조의 완전한 분해에 필요한 시간과 NaOH 농도의 관계를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3(c) shows the relationship between the time required for complete decomposition of the hydrogel structure and the NaOH concentration.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3(c) shows the relationship between the time required for complete decomposition of the hydrogel structure and the NaOH concentration.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노 입자가 자성 하이드로겔의 저장 계수를 향상시키는 것을 실험을 통해 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed through experiments that the magnetic nanoparticles improved the storage coefficient of the magnetic hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed through experiments that the magnetic nanoparticles improve the storage coefficient of the magnetic hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: AAA 등은 각각 0%, 5%, 10%의 자성 나노 입자를 함유하는 크탄산검하이드로겔을 준비하고 저장계수 G’와 손실계수 G’’ 측정 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA, etc., prepared a gum xanthan hydrogel containing 0%, 5%, and 10% magnetic nanoparticles, respectively, and conducted an experiment to measure the storage coefficient G' and loss coefficient G''.
data.target_sentence: AAA et al. prepared a gum xanthan hydrogel containing 0%, 5%, and 10% magnetic nanoparticles, respectively, and performed experiments to measure the storage coefficient G' and the loss coefficient G''.

data.source_sentence: 저장계수와 손실계수는 재료의 형태 변형으로 인해 저장되거나 손실되는 에너지 양을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The storage coefficient and the loss coefficient refer to the amount of energy stored or lost due to the shape deformation of the material.
data.target_sentence: The storage and dissipation factors indicate the amount of energy stored or lost due to the shape deformation of a material.

data.source_sentence: 다음 실험을 통해 Fe3O4 나노 입자를 하이드로겔과 혼합할 경우 더 좋은 기계적 특성을 얻을 수 있음을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The following experiment confirmed that better mechanical properties could be obtained when the Fe3O4 nanoparticles were mixed with hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: Through the following experiment, it was confirmed that better mechanical properties could be obtained when Fe3O4 nanoparticles and hydrogel were mixed.

data.source_sentence: 모든 하이 드로겔은 임계 변형율에 도달한 후 Fig. 4(b)와 같이 G’와 G’’가 급격하게 감소하며, 유체와 같은 특성을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: All hydrogels are rapidly reduced in G' and G'', as shown in Fig. 4(b), after reaching the critical strain, and exhibit fluid-like characteristics.
data.target_sentence: All hydrogels rapidly decrease in G' and G'' and exhibit fluid-like properties after reaching the critical strain, as shown in Figure 4(b).

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자를 함유한 하이드로겔은 자기 나노 입자의 자화 특성을 유지하며, 자기 하이드로겔의 포화 자화는 나노입자 함유량에 따라 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: A hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles maintains the magnetization properties of magnetic nanoparticles, and the saturation magnetization of the magnetic hydrogel increases with the content of nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: The hydrogel including the magnetic nanoparticles maintains the magnetization properties of the magnetic nanoparticles, and the saturation magnetization of the magnetic hydrogel increases according to the content of the nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 자화 곡선에서 히스테리시스 현상은 보이지 않았으며, 이는 자기 나노 입자가 하이드로겔 구조에 혼합된 후에도 초상자성 특성을 유지하고 있음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Hysteresis was not shown in the magnetization curve, which means that the magnetic nanoparticles maintain their portrait magnetic properties even after being mixed into the hydrogel structure.
data.target_sentence: No hysteresis was observed in the magnetization curve, which means that the magnetic nanoparticles retain their longitudinal magnetic properties even after they are mixed into the hydrogel structure.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자의 함량이 높을수록 하이드로겔의 자화 세기가 증가하는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the higher the content of the magnetic nanoparticles, the higher the magnetization strength of the hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the higher the content of magnetic nanoparticles, the higher the magnetization strength of the hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: 자성 하이드로겔이 자기장 내부에 위치할 때 하이드로겔 내부의 자성 입자가 자화되며, 자성 입자 사이에 발생하는 인력에 의해 하이드로겔의 부피와 기공 크기가 작아진다.
data.mt_sentence: When the magnetic hydrogel is positioned inside the magnetic field, the magnetic particles inside the hydrogel are magnetized, and the volume and pore size of the hydrogel are reduced by the attraction between the magnetic particles.
data.target_sentence: When the magnetic hydrogel is positioned inside the magnetic field, the magnetic particles inside the hydrogel are magnetized, and the attractive force between the magnetic particles reduces the volume and pore size of the hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 알지네이트 자기 하이드로겔을 제작한 뒤 자기 구동 기반의 원격 밸브를 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA fabricated an alginate magnetic hydrogel and then fabricated a magnetic actuation-based remote valve.
data.target_sentence: AAA fabricated alginate magnetic hydrogels and then magnetically actuated based remote valves.

data.source_sentence: 원격구동 밸브의 성능 검증을 위해 외부 자기장이 인가되었을 때 발생하는 하이드로겔의 자기 변형 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To verify the performance of the remote-actuated valve, a magnetostriction experiment of the hydrogel that occurs when an external magnetic field is applied was conducted.
data.target_sentence: To confirm the performance of the remote-actuated valve, we performed magnetostriction experiments of hydrogels that occur when an external magnetic field is applied.

data.source_sentence: 외부자기장은 57.4 kA/m 세기의 경사 자기장이며, Fig. 4(e)와 같이 자기 하이드로겔 끝 부분에서 인가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The external magnetic field is an inclined magnetic field of 57.4 kA/m intensity, and is applied at the end of the magnetic hydrogel as shown in Fig. 4(e).
data.target_sentence: The external magnetic field is a gradient magnetic field with a strength of 57.4 kA/m, and Fig. It is applied to the end of the magnetic hydrogel as shown in 4(e).

data.source_sentence: 외부 자기장이 인가되었을 때 자기 하이드로겔의 길이는 최대 6%의 수축율을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: When an external magnetic field was applied, the length of the magnetic hydrogel showed a maximum shrinkage of 6%.
data.target_sentence: When an external magnetic field was applied, the length of the magnetic hydrogel showed a maximum contraction of 6%.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노 입자에 고주파 교류 자기장을 인가하면 Néel 운동 또는 Brownian 운동에 의해 열이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: When a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field is applied to a magnetic nanoparticle, heat is generated by Néel motion or Brownian motion.
data.target_sentence: When a high-frequency alternating magnetic field is applied to magnetic nanoparticles, heat is generated by Néel motion or Brownian motion.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자가 물과 같은 용액 내부에 있을 때에는 Néel 운동 또는 Brownian 운동에 의해 유발할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When magnetic nanoparticles are in a solution such as water, they can be caused by Néel motion or Brownian motion.
data.target_sentence: It can be caused by Néel motion or Brownian motion when magnetic nanoparticles are in a solution such as water.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔 내부에 위치한 나노 입자는 하이드로겔 네트워크와의 상호 작용으로 인해 물리적 제한을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: Nanoparticles located inside the hydrogel are physically limited due to their interaction with the hydrogel network.
data.target_sentence: Nanoparticles located inside the hydrogel are physically restricted due to their interactions with the hydrogel network.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자의 발열 원리 중 Brownian 운동이 크게 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the exothermic principles of magnetic nanoparticles, Brownian motion is greatly reduced.
data.target_sentence: Among the exothermic principles of magnetic nanoparticles, Brownian motion is greatly reduced.

data.source_sentence: 이는 하이드로겔 내부에 위치한 나노 입자의 발열은 주로 Néel 운동에 의한 발열임을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that the heat generation of nanoparticles located inside the hydrogel is mainly due to the Néel motion.
data.target_sentence: This means that the heat generation of nanoparticles located inside the hydrogel is mainly due to the Néel motion.

data.source_sentence: J. S. Lu 등은 알지네이트 자성 하이 드로겔의 가열 현상을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: J. S. Lu et al. analyzed the heating phenomenon of alginate magnetic hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: J. S. Lu et al analyzed the heating phenomenon of alginate magnetic hydrogels.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자가 없는 하이드로겔의 온도는 변화하지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The temperature of the hydrogel without magnetic nanoparticles did not change.
data.target_sentence: The temperature of the hydrogel without magnetic nanoparticles did not change.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자가 포함된 하이드로겔은 Fig. 4(f)의 그래프와 같이 나노 입자의 함량에 비례해 온도가 증가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in the graph of Fig. 4(f), hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles increased in temperature in proportion to the content of nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: As shown in the graph of FIG. 4(f), the hydrogel including magnetic nanoparticles increased in temperature in proportion to the content of nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 나노 입자의 함량에 비례해 온도가 증가하였으며, 각각 5 °C, 30 °C, 50 °C의 온도 증가율을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: The temperature increased in proportion to the content of nanoparticles, and the temperature increase rates were 5 °C, 30 °C, and 50 °C, respectively.
data.target_sentence: The temperature increased in proportion to the content of nanoparticles, and the temperature increase rates were 5°C, 30°C, and 50°C, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노 입자를 포함한 자기 하이드로겔은 일정한 전도도를 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels including magnetic nanoparticles have a certain conductivity.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels containing magnetic nanoparticles have a certain conductivity.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔의 전도도는 하이드로겔 내부 3차원 가교 구조의 밀도와 관련이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The conductivity of the magnetic hydrogel is related to the density of the three-dimensional crosslinked structure inside the hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: The conductivity of magnetic hydrogels is related to the density of three-dimensional crosslinked structures inside the hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 입자를 함유하지 않는 폴리이소시아나이드 하이드로겔(PIC)과, 자성 나노 입자를 포함한 하이 드로겔의 기능적 변형이 없는 자성 하이드로겔 pF3를 제조하여 전도도 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Conductivity experiments were conducted by preparing a polyisocyanide hydrogel (PIC) containing no magnetic nanoparticles and a magnetic hydrogel pF3 without functional modification of the hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Conductivity experiments were performed by preparing a polyisocyanide hydrogel (PIC) without magnetic nanoparticles and a magnetic hydrogel pF3 without functional modification of a hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과는 Fig. 5(a)와 같이 자성 나노 입자가 포함된 하이드로겔의 전도도는 포함되지 않은 하이드로겔의 전도도보다 높게 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results showed that the conductivity of the hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles was higher than that of the hydrogel not containing magnetic nanoparticles as shown in Fig. 5(a).
data.target_sentence: Experimental results, as shown in Fig. 5(a), the hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles showed higher conductivity than the hydrogel without magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔은 3차원 네트워크 형태와 친수성 화학 성분으로 인해 팽윤 특성을 가지며, 팽윤 특성은 기능 변형을 통해 달라질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogels have swelling properties due to their three-dimensional network shape and hydrophilic chemical composition, and the swelling properties can be changed through functional modification.
data.target_sentence: Hydrogels have swelling properties due to their three-dimensional network morphology and hydrophilic chemical composition, and their swelling properties can be altered through functional modifications.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 자기 하이드로겔의 팽윤 특성 실험을 위해 자기 나노 입자 Fe3O4의 농도가 각각0 wt%, 5 wt%, 10 wt%인 자성 크산탄검 하이드로겔을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA prepared magnetic xanthan gum hydrogels in which the concentrations of magnetic nanoparticles Fe3O4 were 0 wt%, 5 wt%, and 10 wt%, respectively, to test the swelling properties of the magnetic hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: AAA prepared magnetic xanthan gum hydrogels in which the concentrations of magnetic nanoparticles Fe3O4 were 0wt%, 5wt%, and 10wt%, respectively, in order to test the swelling properties of the magnetic hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: XG/MXG2-5의 팽윤도가 XG/MXG2보다 높은 이유는 폴리아크릴산으로 코팅된 Fe3O4의 친수성 성질에 의해 하이드로겔 내부로 수분이 침투하기 용이하기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason why the swelling degree of XG/MXG2-5 is higher than that of XG/MXG2 is that moisture can easily penetrate into the hydrogel due to the hydrophilic property of Fe3O4 coated with polyacrylic acid.
data.target_sentence: The reason why the swelling degree of XG/MXG2-5 is higher than that of XG/MXG2 is that moisture can easily penetrate into the hydrogel due to the hydrophilicity of Fe3O4 coated with polyacrylic acid.

data.source_sentence: 그 이유는 Fe3O4의 함유량이 높아짐에 따라 하이드로겔 3차원 구조 내부의 공간이 줄어들었기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason is that the space inside the hydrogel three-dimensional structure decreased as the content of Fe3O4 increased.
data.target_sentence: The reason is that as the content of Fe3O4 increases, the space inside the hydrogel three-dimensional structure decreases.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과를 통해 자성 하이드로겔의 팽윤율이 비자성 하이드로겔보다 더 높아지는 것과 나노 입자의 함유량이 일정 수준 이상 증가하면 오히려 팽윤율이 감소하는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results confirmed that the swelling rate of the magnetic hydrogel is higher than that of the non-magnetic hydrogel and that the swelling rate decreases when the content of the nanoparticles increases by a certain level or more.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was confirmed that the swelling rate of the magnetic hydrogel was higher than that of the non-magnetic hydrogel, and the swelling rate decreased when the content of nanoparticles increased over a certain level.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 각각 0%, 1 wt% 및 3 wt%를 함유하는 폴리비닐 알코올(PVA) 기반 하이드로겔을 제조한 다음 중금속(Cb) 흡착 실험을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA produced a polyvinyl alcohol (PVA)-based hydrogel containing 0%, 1 wt%, and 3 wt%, respectively, and then conducted a heavy metal (Cb) adsorption experiment.
data.target_sentence: AAA was subjected to heavy metal (Cb) adsorption experiments after preparing polyvinyl alcohol (PVA)-based hydrogels containing 0%, 1wt%, and 3wt%, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과를 통해 자기 나노 입자는 하이드로겔의 Cb 흡착 성능을 향상시키는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the experimental results, it was confirmed that the magnetic nanoparticles improved the Cb adsorption performance of the hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: Through the experimental results, it was confirmed that the magnetic nanoparticles improved the Cb adsorption performance of the hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔은 독성이 없는 생분해성 고분자로 높은 수 분 함유량과, 부드러운 특성을 가지므로 우수한 생체 적합성재료이다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic hydrogel is a biodegradable polymer that is not toxic and has a high moisture content and soft properties, so it is an excellent biocompatible material.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic hydrogel is a biodegradable polymer that is non-toxic, has a high water content and has soft properties, so it is a material with excellent biocompatibility.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔은 다른 자극 반응성 하이드로겔과 쉽게 통합되어 다중 반응형 하이드로겔을 제작할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels can be easily integrated with other stimuli-responsive hydrogels to fabricate multi-responsive hydrogels.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels can be easily integrated with other stimuli-responsive hydrogels to fabricate multi-responsive hydrogels.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 기능 구현이 가능하므로 폭넓은 응용이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since various functions can be implemented, a wide range of applications is possible.
data.target_sentence: Various functions can be implemented and various applications are possible.

data.source_sentence: 기존의 하이드로겔 로봇은 체내와 같은 협소한 공간에서 최소한의 피해로 정확한 작업이 어려운 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Existing hydrogel robots have a disadvantage in that it is difficult to perform accurate work with minimal damage in a narrow space such as the body.
data.target_sentence: Existing hydrogel robots have a disadvantage in that it is difficult to perform precise tasks with minimal damage in a narrow space such as the body.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔 마이크로/나노 로봇은 자기 무선 구동 방식을 통해 혈관 내부에서 이동이 가능하며, 목표 지점에 정확하게 도달할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic hydrogel micro/nano robot can move inside the blood vessel through a magnetic wireless driving method and can accurately reach the target point.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic hydrogel micro/nano robot can move within the blood vessel through the magnetic wireless driving method, so that it can accurately reach the target point.

data.source_sentence: 로봇은 빠른 응답성과 원격 제어, 생체 적합성 등의 장점을 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Robots have advantages such as quick response, remote control, and biocompatibility.
data.target_sentence: Robots have the advantages of fast response, remote control, biocompatibility, etc.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔 마이크로/나노 로봇은 약물 운반, 자기 공명 조영제 및 온열 요법과 같은 생물의학 분야에서 응용 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic hydrogel micro/nano robots have potential applications in biomedical fields such as drug delivery, magnetic resonance contrast agents and hyperthermia.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic hydrogel micro/nano robots have potential applications in biomedical fields such as drug delivery, magnetic resonance contrast agents and hyperthermia.

data.source_sentence: 온열요법은 자기 나노 입자가 고주파 교류 자기장 내부에 위치해 있을 때 발생하는 열을 이용해 암세포를 죽이는 치료방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Thermotherapy is a treatment method that kills cancer cells using heat generated when magnetic nanoparticles are located inside a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: Hyperthermia is a treatment that kills cancer cells by using the heat generated when magnetic nanoparticles are placed inside a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 자성 나노 입자를 정렬한 생체 모방 구형 마이크로 로봇을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA proposed a biomimetic spherical microrobot with aligned magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: AAA proposed a biomimetic spherical microrobot with aligned magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 고주파 교류 자기장을 통해 자기 나노 입자를 발열시켜 온열 치료가 가능하며, 혈전 융해를 위한 약물 방출이 가능해 최소 침습으로 효과적인 치료가 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Thermal treatment is possible by heating magnetic nanoparticles through a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field, and drug release for thrombus fusion is possible, so effective treatment with minimal invasion is possible.
data.target_sentence: Heat treatment is possible by heating magnetic nanoparticles through a high-frequency alternating magnetic field, and drug release for thrombus fusion is possible, enabling effective treatment with minimal invasiveness.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 하이드로겔은 자기장 내에서 살아있는 암세포를 추적할 수 있어 자기 온열 치료에 효과적인 응용이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The produced hydrogel can track living cancer cells in a magnetic field, so it can be effectively applied to magnetic thermotherapy.
data.target_sentence: The produced hydrogel can track living cancer cells in a magnetic field, so it can be effectively applied to magnetic hyperthermia.

data.source_sentence: 전단박화, 상전이 특성으로 자기 하이드로겔을 종양 조직에 주입해 확산시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Because of its shear thinning and phase transition properties, magnetic hydrogels can be injected into tumor tissue and diffused.
data.target_sentence: Because of its shear thinning and phase-transition properties, magnetic hydrogels can be injected into tumor tissue and diffuse.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6(b)와 같이 복합적인 기능을 통합하므로, 암세포 주변 정상세포의 피해를 최소화할 수 있어 부작용을 효과적으로 줄일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since complex functions are integrated as shown in Fig. 6(b), damage to normal cells around cancer cells can be minimized, and side effects can be effectively reduced.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 6(b), complex functions are integrated, so damage to normal cells around cancer cells can be minimized and side effects can be effectively reduced.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이드로겔은 특정 조직에 축적된 후 주변 조직에 비해 특정 조직의 양성자 이완 속도를 향상시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels improve the rate of proton relaxation in specific tissues compared to surrounding tissues after accumulating in specific tissues.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic hydrogels enhance the rate of proton relaxation in specific tissues compared to surrounding tissues after accumulating in specific tissues.

data.source_sentence: 양성자 이완 속도가 증가할 경우 자기 공명 영상(MRI) 촬영 시 더 좋은 화질을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the rate of proton relaxation is increased, better image quality can be obtained during magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).
data.target_sentence: Increasing the rate of proton relaxation can result in better image quality in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).

data.source_sentence: AAA는 MRI 영상의 대조도를 향상시키는 방법으로 자기 나노 입자가 함유된 하이드로겔을 조영제로 사용할 것을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA proposed to use hydrogel containing magnetic nanoparticles as a contrast agent as a method of improving the contrast of MRI images.
data.target_sentence: AAA proposed the use of hydrogels containing magnetic nanoparticles as contrast agents to enhance the contrast of MRI images.

data.source_sentence: 위 연구에서는 화학적 공침법을 사용하여 Fig. 7(a)와 같이 다공성 폴리 아크릴산(PAA) 나노겔에 Fe3O4 자기 나노 입자를 혼합하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the research, Fe3O4 magnetic nanoparticles were mixed with a porous polyacrylic acid (PAA) nanogel as illustrated in Fig. 7(a) using a chemical coprecipitation method.
data.target_sentence: In this study, Fe3O4 magnetic nanoparticles and porous polyacrylic acid (PAA) nanogels were mixed using a chemical co-precipitation method as shown in Fig. 7(a).

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 겔을 사용해 MRI 촬영을 진행하였을 때 더 향상된 양성자 이완 속도를 보이며, Fig. 7(a), (b)와 같이 더 높은 대비를 가지는 영상을 얻을 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: MRI scans using magnetic nanogels showed improved proton relaxation rates, and images with higher contrast were obtained, as shown in Fig. 7(a) and (b).
data.target_sentence: MRI scan using magnetic nanogel showed improved proton relaxation rate, and higher contrast images were obtained as shown in Fig. 7(a) and (b).

data.source_sentence: 현대 재생 의학 조직 공학의 궁극적인 목표 중 하나는 세포 배양에 적합한 미세 환경을 조성하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the ultimate goals of modern regenerative medicine tissue engineering is to create a microenvironment suitable for cell culture.
data.target_sentence: One of the ultimate goals of modern regenerative medicine tissue engineering is to create a microenvironment suitable for cell culture.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이 드로겔의 미세 구조와 생체 적합 특성은 세포 배양에 적합한 환경을 제공하며, 외부 자기장을 인가해 세포에 자극을 주어 증식을 촉진시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The microstructure and biocompatibility properties of the magnetic hydrogel provide an environment suitable for cell culture, and can stimulate cells by applying an external magnetic field to promote proliferation.
data.target_sentence: The microstructure and biocompatibility properties of magnetic hydrogels provide a suitable environment for cell culture and stimulate cells by applying an external magnetic field to promote proliferation.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔 구조와 공유 결합하여 기본 섬유아세포 성장 인자(bFGF), 베타 신경 성장인자 또는 교세포 신경 성장 인자(GDNF) 등을 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be covalently combined with hydrogel structures to provide basic fibroblast growth factors (bFGF), beta neural growth factors, or glioblast neural growth factors (GDNF).
data.target_sentence: It can be covalently linked with a hydrogel structure to provide basal fibroblast growth factor (bFGF), beta nerve growth factor, or glioblastic nerve growth factor (GDNF).

data.source_sentence: 복잡한 구조를 가진 세포를 제작할 수 있는 장점을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: It has the advantage of being able to fabricate cells with complex structures.
data.target_sentence: It has the advantage of being able to fabricate cells with complex structures.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 자기 폴리카프로락톤(PCL)으로 구성된 주사 가능한 하이드로겔을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA produced an injectable hydrogel composed of magnetic polycaprolactone (PCL).
data.target_sentence: AAA has produced an injectable hydrogel composed of magnetic polycaprolactone (PCL).

data.source_sentence: 제작된 섬유를 마이크로 절단 기술을 사용해 짧은 나노 섬유(SFs)로 절단한 뒤 알지네이트 하이드로겔과 혼합한다.
data.mt_sentence: The fabricated fibers are cut into short nanofibers (SFs) using micro-cutting technology, and then mixed with alginate hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: The fabricated fibers are cut into short nanofibers (SF) using micro-cutting techniques and then mixed with alginate hydrogels.

data.source_sentence: 알지네이트 하이드로겔 내부에 위치하는 나노 섬유는 미리테슬라(mT) 세기의 외부 자기장이 인가될 경우 자기장 방향으로 정렬된다.
data.mt_sentence: The nanofibers located inside the alginate hydrogel are aligned in the direction of the magnetic field when an external magnetic field of the intensity of the mT is applied.
data.target_sentence: When an external magnetic field of millitesla (mT) strength is applied, the nanofibers located inside the alginate hydrogel are aligned in the direction of the magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔 내부에 위치한 OE-MSC는 7일이 경과된 후에도 생존해 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: OE-MSCs located inside the hydrogel were still alive after 7 days.
data.target_sentence: OE-MSCs located inside the hydrogel were still alive after 7 days.

data.source_sentence: 14일 경과 후 나노 섬유를 정렬한 하이드로겔 내부의 OE-MSC는 정렬하지 않은 하이드로겔 내부의 OE-MSC보다 신경세포 분화가 더 가속화되었다.
data.mt_sentence: After 14 days, OE-MSC inside the hydrogel aligned with nanofibers accelerated neuronal cell differentiation more than the OE-MSC inside the hydrogel that was not aligned.
data.target_sentence: After 14 days, OE-MSCs inside hydrogels aligned with nanofibers accelerated neuronal cell differentiation more than OE-MSCs inside unaligned hydrogels.

data.source_sentence: 자기 나노 섬유를 혼합한 하이드로겔은 Fig. 8(a)와 같이 신경 조직 재생을 위한 최소 침습 요법으로 사용될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Hydrogel mixed with magnetic nanofibers can be used as a minimum invasive therapy for neurotissue regeneration as shown in Fig. 8(a).
data.target_sentence: Hydrogel mixed with magnetic nanofibers can be used as a minimally invasive treatment for neural tissue regeneration as shown in Fig. 8(a).

data.source_sentence: 염화 나트륨 용액에 알긴산 나트륨을 완전히 융해시킨 뒤 자기 나노 입자를 혼합한다.
data.mt_sentence: Sodium alginate is completely melted in a sodium chloride solution and then magnetic nanoparticles are mixed.
data.target_sentence: After completely dissolving sodium alginate in sodium chloride solution, magnetic nanoparticles are mixed.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 용액을 세포 여과기에 넣고 세포 여과기 외부에 염화칼슘 용액을 첨가하여 이온 교환에 의한 중합을 유도해 자기 하이드로겔을 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The prepared solution was put into a cell filter and a calcium chloride solution was added to the outside of the cell filter to induce polymerization by ion exchange to produce a magnetic hydrogel.
data.target_sentence: The prepared solution was put into a cell filter, and a calcium chloride solution was added to the outside of the cell filter to induce polymerization by ion exchange to prepare a magnetic hydrogel.

data.source_sentence: 혈관 내피 전구 세포(EPC)를 배양하여 자기 하이드로겔에 주입해 세포 시트를 제작했다.
data.mt_sentence: Vascular endothelial precursor cells (EPC) were cultured and injected into magnetic hydrogels to produce cell sheets.
data.target_sentence: Cell sheets were generated by culturing vascular endothelial progenitor cells (EPCs) and injecting them into magnetic hydrogels.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 세포 시트를 Fig. 8(b)와 같이 실험 쥐의 상처 부위에 이식해 실험한 결과 상처 치유를 촉진하는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the experiment by implanting the prepared cell sheet into the wound area of the experimental mouse as shown in Fig. 8(b), it was confirmed that the wound healing was promoted.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was confirmed that wound healing was promoted by implanting the cell sheet prepared as shown in FIG. 8(b) into the wound site of an experimental mouse.

data.source_sentence: AAA는 세포 전달 및 분화를 위한 나선형 마이크로 자기 하이드로겔을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: AAA proposed a spiral micromagnetic hydrogel for cell transfer and differentiation.
data.target_sentence: AAA proposed a spiral micromagnetic hydrogel for cell delivery and differentiation.

data.source_sentence: 젤라틴 메타크릴로일(GelMA)을 함유하는 광경화성 수지와, dipropanoate(P2CK) 광개시제를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A photocurable resin containing gelatin methacryloyl (GelMA) and a dipropanoate (P2CK) photoinitiator were used.
data.target_sentence: A photocurable resin containing gelatin methacryloyl (GelMA) and dipropanoate (P2CK) photoinitiators was used.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과 외부 자기장을 통해 Fig. 8(c)와 같이 목표 지점으로 이동할 수 있으며, 고주파 교류 자기장에 의해 세포가 분화될 수 있음을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was confirmed that it could move to the target point through the external magnetic field as shown in Fig. 8(c), and that cells could be differentiated by the high-frequency alternating current magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: Experimental results as shown in Fig. 8(c), it was confirmed that it can move to a target point through an external magnetic field, and that a high-frequency alternating magnetic field can differentiate cells.

data.source_sentence: 7일 경과 후 신경 모세포종 SH-SY5Y 세포에 의해 생성된 단백질 분해효소에 의해 구조물의 대부분이 분해되었다.
data.mt_sentence: After 7 days, most of the structure was decomposed by protease produced by neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y cells.
data.target_sentence: After 7 days, most of the structures were degraded by proteases produced by neuroblastoma SHSY5Y cells.

data.target_sentence: By rotating the convex aspheric surface and measuring the partial opening, the partial shape information of the mirror is obtained.

data.source_sentence: 이 세 가지 오차를 모두 보정한 후 부분 개구들의 좌표를 맞추어 정합하면 고리 영역에 대한 정보를 획득할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: After correcting all three errors, if the coordinates of the partial openings are matched and matched, information on the ring region can be obtained.
data.target_sentence: After correcting all three errors, if the coordinates of the partial openings match and match, you can get information about the ring area.

data.source_sentence: 오차를 보정하는 방법에 대해서는 지난 연구에 이미 상세히 기술하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The method of correcting the error has already been described in detail in the previous study.
data.target_sentence: Methods of correcting errors have already been described in detail in previous studies.

data.source_sentence: 중심부 측정 실험 모식도와 두 가지 측정에서 획득할 수 있는 각 영역의 범위와 두 영역을 합쳐 전체를 획득하는 부분 개구 지도는 그림 2(a), 2(b)와 같이 표현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A schematic diagram of the center measurement experiment, the range of each area that can be obtained from two measurements, and a partial aperture map obtained by combining the two areas can be expressed as Figures 2(a) and 2(b).
data.target_sentence: A schematic diagram of the central measurement experiment, the extent of each region obtainable from the two measurements, and the partial aperture map obtained by combining the two regions can be shown in Figures 2(a) and 2(b).

data.source_sentence: 간섭계에서 출사하는 파는 구면파이고 측정 대상은 비구면이기 때문에 측정 결과에 반사경의 정보 외의 초점벗어남(defocus), 구면수차(spherical aberration)가 포함되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the wave emitted from the interferometer is a spherical wave and the measurement target is an aspherical surface, defocus and spherical aberration are included in the measurement result other than the reflector information.
data.target_sentence: Since the wave emitted from the interferometer is a spherical wave and the measurement target is an aspherical surface, defocus and spherical aberration are included in the measurement result in addition to the reflector information.

data.source_sentence: 광학 설계 프로그램을 이용하여 발생할 수 있는 수차들을 확인한 후 간섭계 측정 데이터에서 이 수차들을 제거한다.
data.mt_sentence: After identifying the aberrations that may occur using an optical design program, these aberrations are removed from the interferometer measurement data.
data.target_sentence: After the optical design program is used to identify possible aberrations, these aberrations are removed from the interferometric measurement data.

data.source_sentence: 한국표준과학연구원에서 보유한 간섭계의 경우 출사동 크기가 약 100 mm이고 측정 가능한 볼록 비구면경의 영역은 곡률반경에 따라 달라지나 수 mm 내지 수십 mm이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the interferometer owned by the Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science, the exit pupil size is about 100 mm, and the measurable convex aspherical area varies depending on the radius of curvature, but ranges from several mm to several tens of mm.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the interferometer owned by the Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science, the exit pupil size is about 100 mm, and the measurable convex aspheric area varies from several mm to several tens of mm, although it depends on the radius of curvature.

data.source_sentence: 측정 영역이 이보다 크면 메니스커스 렌즈를 이용하여 측정하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the measurement area is larger than this, it should be measured using a meniscus lens.
data.target_sentence: If the measurement area is larger than this, measurements should be made using a meniscus lens.

data.source_sentence: 볼록 비구면의 전체 영역을 측정하기 위한 측정 순서는 그림3과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The measurement sequence for measuring the entire area of the convex aspheric surface is shown in Figure 3.
data.target_sentence: The measurement sequence for measuring the entire area of a convex aspheric surface is shown in Figure 3.

data.source_sentence: 고리 영역 측정에서는 힌들 정합법으로 볼록 비구면을 측정하고 측정 구성에 의한 왜곡과 힌들 구면경이나 회전에 의한 오차를 보정하여 정합한다.
data.mt_sentence: In measuring the ring area, the convex aspherical surface is measured by the hinge matching method, and the distortion caused by the measurement composition and the error caused by the hinge spherical diameter or rotation are corrected and matched.
data.target_sentence: When measuring the ring area, the convex aspheric surface is measured by the hindle matching method, and the distortion according to the measurement composition and the error due to the diameter or rotation of the hindle spherical surface are corrected and matched.

data.source_sentence: 고리 영역에 대한 형상 정보를 획득하고 가운데 영역 측정에서는 간섭계 바로 앞에 볼록 비구면을 위치시켜 직접 측정한 후 고리 영역 측정 결과와 합쳐 볼록 비구면 전체 형상 정보를 얻는 순으로 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the middle area measurement, the shape information of the ring area is obtained, and the convex aspherical surface is directly measured in front of the interferometer, and the total convex aspherical shape information is obtained by combining the ring area measurement results.
data.target_sentence: In the middle area measurement, the shape information of the ring area is obtained, the convex aspheric surface is measured directly in front of the interferometer, and the ring area measurement result is combined to obtain the overall convex aspheric shape information.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션에서는 실제 측정할 대상과 동일한 사양을 가지는 반사경을 Zemax에 입력하고 계산을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the simulation, a reflector having the same specifications as the actual measurement target was input to Zemax and calculations were performed.
data.target_sentence: In the simulation, the calculation was performed by inputting a reflector with the same specifications as the actual measurement target into Zemax.

data.source_sentence: 광학 설계프로그램인 Zemax를 이용하여 고리 영역 측정, 가운데 영역측정의 두 가지 실험을 모사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Two experiments of ring area measurement and center area measurement were simulated using Zemax, an optical design program.
data.target_sentence: Two experiments, a ring area measurement and a central area measurement, were simulated using the optical design program Zemax.

data.source_sentence: 고리 영역 측정에서는 측정하고자 하는 부분 개구 위치에 맞게 입사각, 거울 사이의 거리를 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the ring area measurement, the incident angle and the distance between the mirrors were set according to the location of the partial opening to be measured.
data.target_sentence: In the ring area measurement, the distance between the incident angle and the mirror was set according to the position of the partial opening to be measured.

data.source_sentence: 간섭계의 입사각, 반사경의 회전 각도별로 획득한 32장의 부분 개구의 형상 정보를 가지고 정합하여 고리 영역의 형상 정보를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: The shape information of the ring region was obtained by matching with the shape information of 32 partial openings obtained for each incident angle of the interferometer and the rotation angle of the reflector.
data.target_sentence: The shape information of the ring area was obtained by matching the shape information of 32 partial openings obtained for each interferometer incidence angle and the rotation angle of the reflector.

data.source_sentence: 측정 영역 내에서 간섭무늬가 넓게 발생하는 거리를 찾아 반사경을 위치시켜야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The reflector should be located by finding the distance where the interference fringe occurs widely within the measurement area.
data.target_sentence: The reflector should be located by finding the distance where the interference fringe occurs widely within the measurement area.

data.source_sentence: 본 전산모사에서는 파면 오차가 최저가 되도록 거리를 최적화하여 반사경을 501.8 mm에 위치시켜 형상 정보를 획득하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this computational simulation, the distance was optimized to minimize the wavefront error, and the shape information was obtained by positioning the reflector at 501.8 mm.
data.target_sentence: In this computational simulation, geometry information was obtained by optimizing the distance to minimize the wavefront error and positioning the reflector at 501.8 mm.

data.source_sentence: 비구면 거울을 구면파를 이용해 측정하는 경우 측정 오차로 초점벗어남, 구면수차항이 추가로 측정되며 비구면 수식에서 고차항의 유무에 따라 발생하는 구면수차의 차수가 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: When an aspherical mirror is measured using spherical waves, the out-of-focus spherical aberration term is additionally measured due to the measurement error, and the order of spherical aberration is determined by the presence or absence of a higher order term in the aspherical equation.
data.target_sentence: When measuring an aspherical mirror using a spherical wave, an out-of-focus spherical aberration term is additionally measured due to a measurement error, and the order of the spherical aberration is determined depending on the presence or absence of an upper term in the aspherical equation.

data.source_sentence: 이 때 고리영역과의 겹침 영역 비율은 약 5%이다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the ratio of the overlapping area with the ring area is about 5%.
data.target_sentence: In this case, the proportion of the area overlapping the ring area is about 5%.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4(a)는 볼록 비구면의 형상 오차로 입력해 준 것으로 우리가 정합으로 구해야 할 값과 형상이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4(a) is the shape error of the convex aspherical surface, which is the value and shape that we need to obtain in matching.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4(a) is the shape error of the convex aspherical surface, which is the value and shape to be obtained in matching.

data.source_sentence: 그림 5는 고리 영역 측정 데이터와 가운데 영역 측정 데이터를 정합한 결과와 정합오차이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 5 shows the result of matching the ring area measurement data and the center area measurement data and the matching error.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 shows the result of matching the ring area measurement data and the center area measurement data and the matching error.

data.source_sentence: 고리 영역 측정에서는 간섭계의 빛이 비스듬히 입사하며 발생하는 왜곡에 대한 왜곡보정을 수행하였고 중심부 측정에서는 왜곡 보정 및 고리 영역과 해상도를 맞추는 과정을 거친 후 정합을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the ring region measurement, distortion correction was performed for the distortion caused by the oblique incident of the interferometer light, and in the center measurement, the distortion correction and the process of matching the resolution with the ring region were performed, and then matching was performed.
data.target_sentence: In the measurement of the ring region, distortion correction was performed for the distortion caused by obliquely incident light from the interferometer. And, in the center measurement, matching was performed after distortion correction and matching the ring area and resolution.

data.source_sentence: 정합 결과 형상 오차는 0.030 wv rms로 볼록 비구면 형상 오차로 입력한 값과 동일하며 동일한 형태의 비점수차를 띄는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of matching, the shape error is 0.030 wv rms, which is the same as the value entered as the convex aspheric shape error, and it can be seen that the same form of astigmatism is exhibited.
data.target_sentence: As a result of matching, the shape error is 0.030 wv rms, which is the same as the value input as the convex aspheric shape error, and it can be seen that it shows the same type of astigmatism.

data.source_sentence: 정합오차는 거의 발생하지 않은 것으로 나와 본 논문에서 제안한 볼록 비구면의 전체 형상 오차를 구하는 방법이 잘 구동하는 것을 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was shown that the matching error hardly occurred, and the method for calculating the overall shape error of the convex aspheric surface proposed in this paper works well.
data.target_sentence: It was found that the matching error hardly occurred, and the method for calculating the overall shape error of the convex aspheric surface proposed in this paper works well.

data.source_sentence: 실험에 사용된 기준 구면경은 3회 측정한 결과 9.4 ± 0.8 nm rms로 볼록 비구면의 형상 오차를 수 nm rms 수준으로 측정하고자 했을 때 결코 무시할 수 없는 크기의 형상 오차를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The standard spherical diameter used in the experiment is 9.4 ± 0.8 nm rms as a result of three measurements, and when trying to measure the shape error of a convex aspheric surface at the level of several nm rms, it shows a shape error of a size that cannot be ignored.
data.target_sentence: The standard spherical mirror used in the experiment was 9.4 ± 0.8 nm rms as a result of three measurements, showing a shape error of a size that can never be ignored when measuring the shape error of a convex aspherical surface at the level of several nm rms.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 이전에 발표된 논문에 따라 기준 구면의 형상오차 정보를 고리 영역 측정에서 제거하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, according to the previously published paper, the shape error information of the reference sphere was removed from the ring area measurement and used.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, according to a previously published report, the shape error information of the reference sphere was removed from the ring area measurement and used.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7은 힌들 정합 구성으로 볼록 비구면경을 측정하는 실험 사진과 실험에 사용된 기준 구면경의 형상 측정 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows the experimental photograph measuring the convex aspherical diameter with the hinge matching configuration and the shape measurement result of the reference spherical diameter used in the experiment.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the experimental photos of measuring the convex aspherical diameter in the Hindle matching configuration and the shape measurement results of the reference spherical diameter used in the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 그 앞에 볼록 비구면경을 회전 스테이지에 장착하여 반사경을 돌리며 부분 개구를 획득할 수 있도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A convex aspherical diameter was mounted on the rotating stage in front of it so that a partial opening could be obtained by rotating the reflector.
data.target_sentence: A convex aspherical diameter was mounted on the front rotating stage to obtain a partial opening by rotating the reflector.

data.source_sentence: 회전 스테이지의 정밀도는 0.0025°이며 볼록 비구면을 360° 회전하였을 때 반사경 중심의 이동은 0.001 mm, 기울기는 0.01° 이내에서 움직이도록 중심축을 맞추었다.
data.mt_sentence: The precision of the rotating stage is 0.0025°, and when the convex aspherical surface is rotated 360°, the central axis is adjusted to move within 0.001 mm of the movement of the reflector center and the slope within 0.01°.
data.target_sentence: The precision of the rotation end was 0.0025°, and when the convex aspheric surface was rotated 360°, the central axis was adjusted to be within 0.001 mm of the movement of the center of the reflector, and the inclination was adjusted to within 0.01°.

data.source_sentence: 볼록 비구면경의 맞은편에는 기준 구면경을 두어 볼록 비구면으로부터 반사되는 빛을 모아주도록 정렬하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A reference spherical diameter was placed on the opposite side of the convex aspherical diameter to collect light reflected from the convex aspherical surface.
data.target_sentence: To collect the reflected light from the convex aspheric surface, we placed the reference sphere diameter opposite the convex aspheric diameter.

data.source_sentence: 실험은 안쪽 고리 측정, 바깥쪽 고리 측정을 각각 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the experiment, inner ring measurement and outer ring measurement were performed, respectively.
data.target_sentence: In the experiment, inner ring measurement and outer ring measurement were performed, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 부분 개구 지도는 그림 1(a)와 동일하게 안쪽은 30° 간격 12장, 바깥쪽은 18° 간격 20장으로 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 1(a), the partial aperture map consisted of 12 sheets at 30° intervals on the inside and 20 sheets at 18° intervals on the outside.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 1(a), the partial aperture map consists of 12 sheets at 30° intervals from the inside and 20 sheets at 18° intervals from the outside.

data.source_sentence: 측정하고자 하는 부분 개구의 위치에 따라 거울들과 간섭계의 거리와 위치 관계를 다르게 하여 부분 개구의 위치를 조절하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The location of the partial opening was adjusted by varying the distance and positional relationship between the mirrors and the interferometer according to the location of the partial opening to be measured.
data.target_sentence: The position of the partial opening was adjusted by changing the distance and positional relationship between the mirror and the interferometer according to the position of the partial opening to be measured.

data.source_sentence: 측정한 32장의 부분 개구 데이터에서 기준 구면경의 누적오차와 왜곡 오차 보정을 거쳐 정합하여 고리 영역에 대한 결과를 구할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: From the measured partial aperture data of 32 sheets, the result for the ring region can be obtained by matching through the cumulative error and distortion error correction of the reference spherical mirror.
data.target_sentence: From the measured partial aperture data of 32 sheets, the results for the ring area can be obtained through the correction of the cumulative error and distortion error of the reference spherical mirror.

data.source_sentence: 우선 기준 구면경의 누적 오차의 경우 평균 보정법을 이용하여 제거한다.
data.mt_sentence: First of all, the cumulative error of the reference spherical diameter is removed using the average correction method.
data.target_sentence: First, the cumulative error of the reference diameter is removed by using the average correction method.

data.source_sentence: 평균 보정법은 정합법에서 기준 구면경의 오차를 효과적으로 제거할 수 있는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: The average correction method is a method that can effectively remove the error of the reference spherical diameter in the matching method.
data.target_sentence: The average correction method is a method that can effectively remove the error of the reference diameter in the registration method.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 구한 기준 구면경의 형상을 모든 부분 개구에서 빼 보정하면 측정 대상만의 형상이 남는다.
data.mt_sentence: If the shape of the reference spherical mirror obtained in this way is subtracted from all partial openings and corrected, only the shape of the measurement object remains.
data.target_sentence: If the shape of the reference spherical mirror obtained in this way is subtracted from all the partial apertures and corrected, only the shape of the measurement target remains.

data.source_sentence: 다음으로 간섭계의 빛이 측정 대상에 비스듬히 입사하여 발생하는 왜곡 오차를 보정하는데 이는 코사인의 역을 곱하여 간단히 보정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Next, the distortion error caused by the light of the interferometer incident obliquely on the measurement object can be corrected simply by multiplying the inverse of the cosine.
data.target_sentence: Next, the distortion error caused by the interferometer light incident obliquely on the measurement target can be corrected simply by multiplying it by the reciprocal of the cosine.

data.source_sentence: 두 번의 보정을 거쳐 정합한 결과는 그림 8과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The results of the matching after two corrections are shown in Figure 8.
data.target_sentence: After two revisions, the matching result is shown in Figure 8.

data.source_sentence: 중심부 측정에서는 고리 영역에서 측정할 수 없었던 가운데 직경 50 mm에 대한 형상 오차 정보를 획득하기 위해 직경 60 mm를 측정하고 앞에서 측정한 고리 영역 결과와 정합하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to obtain shape error information about a diameter of 50 mm, which could not be measured in the ring region in the central measurement, a diameter of 60 mm was measured and matched with the result of the ring region measured previously.
data.target_sentence: To obtain shape error information for a diameter of 50 mm, which could not be measured in the ring area in the central measurement, a diameter of 60 mm was measured and matched with the results of the previously measured ring area.

data.source_sentence: 그림 9(a)는 가운데 영역을 간섭계로 직접 측정하는 실험 사진이고 그림 9(b)는 측정 영역을 제한하기 위해 볼록 비구면에 마스크를 씌운 모습이다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 9(a) is an experimental photograph of directly measuring the central area using an interferometer, and Figure 9(b) is a photograph of a convex aspheric surface covered with a mask to limit the measurement area.

data.source_sentence: 출사동이 직경 100 mm인 피조 간섭계 앞에 F/6 TS를 장착하고 TS의 초점으로부터 간섭계 쪽으로 볼록 비구면의 곡률반경에 해당하는 약 499 mm만큼 옮겨 볼록 비구면을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The F/6 TS was mounted in front of the interferometer with an exit pupil of 100 mm in diameter and moved from the focal point of the TS toward the interferometer by about 499 mm, which corresponds to the radius of curvature of the convex aspheric surface, and the convex aspheric surface was measured.

data.source_sentence: 방향성 강판은 자기적 이방성을 가지고 있어, 압연 방향으로 뛰어난 자기적 특성을 가지는 강판이다.
