data.target_sentence: Calculated points are represented as single points in Figure 4.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7의 산란체 영상의 아랫부분에 강한 산란 물체가 있음을 알 수 있는데, 이는 약 100 m 부근에 있는 나뭇잎에 의한 산란 신호이다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that there is a strong scattering object in the lower part of the scatterer image in Fig. 7, which is a scattering signal by a leaf at a distance of about 100 m.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that there is a strong scattering object in the lower part of the scatterer image in Fig. 7, which is a scattering signal by a leaf around 100 m.

data.source_sentence: 그림 8은 연속광원에서 산란된 빛의 영상으로부터 얻은 화소 값과 이를 이용하여 얻은 라이다 신호, 그리고 식 (6)을 통하여 계산한 소산계수를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 8 shows the pixel values obtained from the image of light scattered from the continuous light source, the LiDAR signal obtained using the pixel values, and the dissipation coefficient calculated through Equation (6).
data.target_sentence: Figure 8 shows the pixel values obtained from images of scattered light from a continuous light source, the LiDAR signal obtained using the pixel values, and the dissipation coefficient calculated via equation (6).

data.source_sentence: 화소 값은 레이저 빛의 산란 효과만을 얻기 위하여 레이저에 의한 산란체의 영상 화소 값을 직접 사용하지 않고, 레이저의 화소 값에서 근처의 배경 신호를 빼는 방식으로 순수한 레이저의 산란 신호를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to obtain only the scattering effect of laser light, the pixel value does not directly use the image pixel value of the scatterer by the laser, but subtracts the background signal from the pixel value of the laser to obtain a pure laser scattering signal.
data.target_sentence: To obtain only the scattering effect of laser light, the pixel value does not directly use the image pixel value of the scatterer by the laser, but subtracts the background signal from the pixel value of the laser to obtain a pure laser scattering signal.

data.source_sentence: 라이다 신호는 화소값에 식 (3b)의 기여도(dRL =다른 거리에서 산란되어 하나의 화소로 입사되는 모든 거리)로 나눔으로써 특정 거리에서의 산란 신호만을 고려하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The lidar signal was divided into pixel values by the contribution of equation (3b) (dRL=all distances scattered from another distance and incident on one pixel), and only the scattered signal at a specific distance was considered.
data.target_sentence: The LIDAR signal was divided into pixel values by the contribution of Equation (3b) (dRL = all distances incident on one pixel that were scattered at different distances), and only signals scattered at a specific distance were considered.

data.source_sentence: 이렇게 얻은 라이다 신호는 전통적인 라이다 방정식과 같은 미분방정식으로 표현되어 그 해, 즉 소산계수를 구할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The obtained lidar signal is expressed as a differential equation like the traditional lidar equation, and the solution, that is, the dissipation coefficient, can be obtained.
data.target_sentence: The obtained LiDAR signal is expressed in the same differential equation as the existing LiDAR equation, and the dissipation coefficient, which is a solution, can be obtained.

data.source_sentence: Klett 방식으로 계산한 결과도 나뭇잎이 있는 부근에서 큰 값을 보이나 기타 지역에서는 일정한 값을 유지하고 있음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the Klett method also shows a large value in the vicinity of the leaves, but maintains a constant value in other regions.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the Klett method also shows a large value in the vicinity of the leaf, but maintains a constant value in other regions.

data.source_sentence: 미분 방정식 식 (6) 해의 중요한 특성 중의 하나는 원거리에서의 소산계수(경계조건)가 근거리에서의 소산계수에 영향을 적게 준다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the important properties of the differential equation (6) solution is that the dissipation coefficient (boundary condition) at long distances has less effect on the dissipation coefficient at close range.
data.target_sentence: One of the important properties of the solution of differential equation (6) is that the dissipation coefficient (boundary condition) at long distances has little effect on the dissipation coefficient at short distances.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 원거리에서의 대기 소산계수 값을 실제 값보다 높게 설정하면 근거리 값은 점점 낮아지는 형태의 프로파일을 보이고, 반대의 경우 근거리로 올수록 점점 소산계수 값이 증가하는 현상을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: If the atmospheric dissipation coefficient value at a general distance is set higher than the actual value, the near field value shows a profile that decreases gradually, and vice versa, the dissipation coefficient value increases gradually as it approaches the near field.
data.target_sentence: If the atmospheric dissipation coefficient value at normal distance is set higher than the actual value, the near-field value shows a gradually decreasing profile, and vice versa, the value of the dissipation coefficient gradually increases as the near-field gets closer.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 적절한 값을 대입하면 거리에 관계없이 참값을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, substituting an appropriate value indicates the true value regardless of the distance.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, substituting an appropriate value will represent the true value regardless of the distance.

data.source_sentence: 수평방향으로 조사된 본 실험의 경우 거리에 따른 평균 소산계수는 거의 일정할 것으로 예상할 수 있으며, 회귀법으로 적용하여 전체 구간에서 일정한 값의 프로파일이 도출되도록 경계조건(원거리에서의 소산계수 값)을 대입하면 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this experiment, the average dissipation coefficient according to distance could be expected to be almost constant, and the boundary condition (the dissipation coefficient value at a long distance) could be substituted so that a profile of a certain value could be derived in the entire section using the regression method.
data.target_sentence: In the case of this experiment irradiated in the horizontal direction, the average dissipation coefficient according to the distance can be expected to be almost constant. By applying the regression method, the boundary condition (dissipation coefficient value at a long distance) is substituted so that a profile of a constant value is derived in the entire section.

data.source_sentence: 그림 9는 이러한 방법으로 얻은 두 가지 날씨 상태에서 얻은 소산계수이며 모든 hardware (HW) 상태에 대한 조건을 같게 하고 얻은 것으로, 본 방법의 유용성을 평가하는데 중요한 시사점을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 9 shows the dissipation coefficients obtained from the two weather conditions obtained by this method and obtained with the same conditions for all hardware (HW) conditions, which have important implications for evaluating the usefulness of this method.
data.target_sentence: Figure 9 shows the dissipation coefficients obtained under the same conditions for both weather conditions and all hardware (HW) conditions obtained by this method, which has important implications for evaluating the usefulness of this method.

data.source_sentence: 연속발진 레이저의 영상을 이용한 측정법은 CCD가 모든 거리의 레이저 산란체의 영상을 얻을 수 있기 때문에 가까운 거리에서도 소산계수 정보를 얻을 수 있음을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The measurement method using the image of the continuous oscillation laser shows that the dissipation coefficient information can be obtained even at a close distance because the CCD can obtain the image of the laser scatterer at all distances.
data.target_sentence: The measurement method using images of a continuous oscillation laser shows that the dissipation coefficient information can be obtained even at close distances because CCD can obtain images of the laser scatterers at any distance.

data.source_sentence: 그림 10에서 근거리에서의 소산계수가 급격히 증가하는 것은 지표면에서의 소산계수가 더 높고, 레이저의 방향이 높은 고도의 바다 방향임을 고려할 때 예상할 수 있는 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: The sharp increase in the dissipation coefficient at a short distance in Figure 10 is a predictable result considering that the dissipation coefficient at the surface is higher and the direction of the laser is toward the sea at a high altitude.
data.target_sentence: The sharp increase in the dissipation coefficient at a short distance in FIG. 10 is a predictable result considering that the dissipation coefficient at the surface is higher and the direction of the laser is toward the sea at a high altitude.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 연속발진 다이오드 광원을 이용하면서 기존의 펄스형 라이다가 가지는 공간 분해능을 얻은 방법을 고찰한 연구이다.
data.mt_sentence: This study examines a method of obtaining spatial resolution of a conventional pulsed lidar while using a continuous oscillation diode light source.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we investigate how to obtain the spatial resolution of conventional pulse lidar using a continuous oscillation diode light source.

data.source_sentence: 카메라를 통하여 얻은 영상 신호로부터 각 화소의 거리 정보와 각 화소에 기여하는 산란체의 기여도를 이론적으로 계산하여, 화소 신호에 대한 연속광원 라이다 방정식을 유도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The continuous light source LiDAR equation for the pixel signal was derived by theoretically calculating the distance information of each pixel and the contribution of the scatterer contributing to each pixel from the image signal obtained through the camera.
data.target_sentence: The continuous light source LiDAR equation for the pixel signal was derived by theoretically calculating the distance information of each pixel and the contribution of the scatterers to each pixel in the image signal obtained through the camera.

data.source_sentence: 이론적으로 유도된 방정식으로부터 각 거리에 있는 미세먼지나 공기분자의 총 소산계수를 얻기 위하여 밤 시간에 일반 다이오드 레이저와 카메라로 영상을 얻고 이를 분석하여 거리에 따른 소산계수를 얻을 수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to obtain the total dissipation coefficient of fine dust or air molecules at each distance from the theoretically derived equation, it was shown that the dissipation coefficient according to the distance can be obtained by obtaining an image with a general diode laser and camera at night time and analyzing it.
data.target_sentence: In order to obtain the total dissipation coefficient of fine dust or air molecules at each distance from the theoretically derived equation, it was shown that the dissipation coefficient according to the distance can be obtained by obtaining images with a general diode laser and camera at night and analyzing them.

data.source_sentence: 과정에서 레이저와 카메라의 거리 정보를 정확히 얻을 수 있어야 하며, 화소의 시야각도 정확하게 얻어야 한다는 것을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the process, it was found that the distance information between the laser and the camera should be accurately obtained, and the viewing angle of the pixel should also be accurately obtained.
data.target_sentence: In this process, it was found that the distance information between the laser and the camera must be accurately obtained, and the viewing angle of the pixel must also be obtained accurately.

data.source_sentence: 산란체(나뭇가 지)의 존재로 인한 소산이 강하게 일어나기 때문에 소산계수가 크다는 것을 확인할 수 있었고 기타 지역에서는 화소의 밝기에 따른 특성으로부터 일정한 소산계수를 보이고 있음을 알수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It could be confirmed that the dissipation coefficient is large because the dissipation occurs strongly due to the presence of a scattering body (wood branch), and other regions show a constant dissipation coefficient from characteristics according to pixel brightness.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the dissipation coefficient was large because dissipation occurred strongly due to the presence of scatterers (tree branches). And it was confirmed that the dissipation coefficient was constant in other areas due to the characteristics according to the brightness of the pixel.

data.source_sentence: 이 논문은 2019년도 한밭대학교 대학회계 연구비를 지원받아 작성되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper was written with the support of the 2019 Hanbat University College Accounting Research Fund.
data.target_sentence: This article was written with the support of the 2019 Hanbat University Accounting Research Foundation.

data.source_sentence: OPA를 구성하는 광 안테나가 주기적으로 배치되어 있는 경우에는 grating lobe의 형성으로 인해 빔 조향의 범위가 제한된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the optical antenna constituting the OPA is periodically arranged, the range of beam steering is limited due to the formation of the grating lobe.
data.target_sentence: Periodic placement of the optical antennas constituting the OPA results in the formation of grating lobes, which limits the beam steering range.

data.source_sentence: 광안테나가 비주기적으로 배치된 OPA에서는 한 개의 main lobe만 형성되어 넓은 조향 범위가 가능하지만 side lobe에 의한 잡음의 영향으로 신호 품질이 저하된다.
data.mt_sentence: In OPA, where optical antennas are placed aperiodically, only one main lobe is formed, enabling a wide steering range, but signal quality is degraded due to noise caused by the side lobe.
data.target_sentence: In OPA where optical antennas are aperiodically arranged, only one main lobe is formed, so the steering range is wide, but the signal quality is degraded due to noise caused by side lobes.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 이러한 비주기적인 OPA에서 발생하는 잡음을 최소화하고 신호 품질을 향상시키기 위한 최적화 연구를 수행한 결과를 보고한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, we report the results of optimization studies to minimize the noise generated by the aperiodic OPA and improve the signal quality.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we report the results of optimization studies to minimize noise caused by periodic OPA and improve signal quality.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 비주기적인 OPA에서 고품질의 신호를 얻기 위한 최적의 안테나 배열을 구하는 데 있어서 PSO, GA, PSA의 최적화 알고리즘이 유용하게 활용될 수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this study, we demonstrate that optimization algorithms of PSO, GA, and PSA can be usefully utilized in obtaining the optimal antenna arrangement for obtaining high-quality signals in aperiodic OPA.
data.target_sentence: This study shows that the optimization algorithms of PSO, GA, and PSA can be usefully utilized to obtain the optimal antenna array for obtaining high-quality signals in aperiodic OPA.

data.source_sentence: 현재 자율주행차용 라이다는 대개 차량 위에 장착한 모터 방식으로 활용되고 있지만, 크기가 너무 크고 가격이 비싸며 진동에 취약하다는 단점이 있어서 새로운 차량용 라이다 기술이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Currently, self-driving car lida is usually used as a motor method mounted on a vehicle, but new vehicle lida technology is needed because of the disadvantage of being too large, expensive, and vulnerable to vibration.
data.target_sentence: Currently, autonomous car lidar is mainly used as the motor method installed in vehicles, but new vehicle lidar technology is needed due to the disadvantages of being too large, expensive, and vulnerable to vibration.

data.source_sentence: OPA는 위상을 제어할 수 있는 수십–수백 채널의 광 안테나(optical antenna)들을 1차원 또는 2차원으로 배열한 구조로, 각 광 안테나에서 빛의 위상을 조절함으로써 원하는 각도로 빛을 방출할 수 있는 광학 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: OPA is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional arrangement of optical antennas of tens–hundreds of channels capable of controlling phases, and is an optical structure capable of emitting light at a desired angle by adjusting the phase of light from each optical antenna.
data.target_sentence: OPA is an optical structure that can emit light at a desired angle by adjusting the phase of light of each optical antenna by arranging dozens of optical antennas with phase control in one or two dimensions.

data.source_sentence: 실리콘 포토닉스 기술기반의 OPA에서 광 안테나는 보통 회절격자 결합기(gratingcoupler) 형태로 제작되며, 각각의 채널 위상을 순차적으로 조절하여 빛의 진행 방향을 연속적으로 변화시킴으로써 빛의 조향(beam steering)이 가능하여 라이다용 센서로 활용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In an OPA based on silicon photonics technology, an optical antenna is usually manufactured in the form of a grating coupler, and can be used as a radar sensor by sequentially adjusting the phase of each channel to continuously change the direction of light.
data.target_sentence: In OPA based on silicon photonics technology, the optical antenna is generally manufactured in the form of a grating coupler, and it can be used as a radar sensor by continuously changing the direction of light by sequentially adjusting the phase of each channel.

data.source_sentence: 그렇지만 2차원 OPA는 구조가 복잡하고 조향 각도의 범위가 제한적이어서 현재는 주로 1차원 OPA에 대한 연구가 활발하게 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: However, the two-dimensional OPA has a complicated structure and the range of the steering angle is limited, so research on the one-dimensional OPA is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: However, the two-dimensional OPA has a complicated structure and the range of the steering angle is limited, so research on the one-dimensional OPA is being actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 비주기적인 OPA에서는 최적의 안테나 배열을 얻기 위해서 최적화 알고리즘이 활용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, an optimization algorithm has been used to obtain an optimal antenna arrangement.
data.target_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, an optimization algorithm was used to obtain an optimal antenna arrangement.

data.source_sentence: PSO는 진화형 알고리즘으로 해를 입자로 간주하여 검색 공간 내에서 가중치와 속도에 따라 입자들을 움직여가며 위치와 속도의 업데이트를 통해 최적화하는 기법으로 입자를 이동시킬 수 있는 범위를 정하여 최적화한다.
data.mt_sentence: PSO is an evolutionary algorithm that considers a solution as a particle and moves the particles according to weight and velocity in the search space, and optimizes it by determining the range in which particles can be moved.
data.target_sentence: PSO is an evolutionary algorithm that considers a solution as a particle and optimizes it by moving the particle according to its weight and velocity in the search space and determining the extent to which the particle can move.

data.source_sentence: 각 최적화 알고리즘에 대해서는 3장에서 자세하게 설명할 예정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Each optimization algorithm will be described in detail in Chapter 3.
data.target_sentence: Each optimization algorithm is described in detail in Chapter 3.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 비주기적인 OPA에 위 3가지의 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 신호 품질이 우수한 광 안테나 배열을 설계하고 그 결과를 비교하며, 프라운호퍼 회절 이론을 바탕으로 다중 안테나의 간섭에 의한 원장 특성을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study designed the optical antenna arrangement with excellent signal quality by applying the above three optimization algorithms to aperiodic OPA, compared the results, and calculated the ledger characteristics by interference of multiple antennas based on Fraunhofer diffraction theory.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the above three optimization algorithms were applied to periodic OPA to design an optical antenna arrangement with excellent signal quality, and the results were compared, and ledger characteristics due to interference of multiple antennas were calculated based on the Fraunhofer diffraction theory.

data.source_sentence: 원장의 신호 품질을 나타내는 매개변수로서 SLL (side-lobe level)을 이용하였는데, 이는 0차 모드의 강도와 sidelobe들 중 가장 높은 강도의 비를 dB로 나타낸 값이다.
data.mt_sentence: SLL (side-lobe level) was used as a parameter representing the signal quality of the ledger, which represents the ratio of the intensity of the zero-order mode to the intensity of the highest among the sidelobe in dB.
data.target_sentence: The side-lobe level (SLL) was used as a parameter to represent the signal quality of the ledger, which represents the ratio in dB of the intensity of the zero-order mode to the highest of the side lobes.

data.source_sentence: PSO, GA, PSA를 적용하여 SLL이 가장 감소한 안테나 배열을 얻고 각 최적화 알고리즘 별로 SLL 값을 비교 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By applying PSO, GA, and PSA, the antenna array with the lowest SLL was obtained, and the SLL values were compared and analyzed for each optimization algorithm.
data.target_sentence: An antenna array having the lowest SLL was obtained by applying PSO, GA, and PSA, and SLL values were compared and analyzed for each optimization algorithm.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문의 2장에서는 OPA에서 원장을 계산하는 이론을 통해서 주기적인 OPA와 비주기적인 OPA에서 일반적인 원장 특성을 설명한다.
data.mt_sentence: Chapter 2 of this paper explains general ledger characteristics in periodic OPA and aperiodic OPA through the theory of calculating the ledger in OPA.
data.target_sentence: Chapter 2 of this paper explains the general ledger characteristics in periodic OPA and aperiodic OPA through the theory of calculating the ledger in OPA.

data.source_sentence: 3장에서는 본 연구에서 활용할 최적화 알고리즘인 PSO, GA, PSA에서의 최적화 방법에 대해서 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: Chapter 3 introduces optimization methods in PSO, GA, and PSA, which are optimization algorithms to be used in this study.
data.target_sentence: Chapter 3 introduces the optimization methods of PSO, GA, and PSA, which are the optimization algorithms used in this study.

data.source_sentence: 4장에서는 각 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 비주기적 OPA를 설계하고 원장 계산을 통해 각 알고리즘별로 SLL 값을 비교 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Chapter 4, each optimization algorithm is applied to design a aperiodic OPA, and SLL values are compared and analyzed for each algorithm through ledger calculation.
data.target_sentence: In Chapter 4, we design aperiodic OPA by applying each optimization algorithm, and compare and analyze the SLL value for each algorithm through ledger calculation.

data.source_sentence: OPA에서 원거리장의 전기장 분포는 기본적으로 다중 슬릿에서 빛의 간섭 현상으로 모델링을 할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In OPA, the electric field distribution of the far-field can basically be modeled as an interference phenomenon of light in multiple slits.
data.target_sentence: In OPA, the electric field distribution of the far field can be basically modeled as a phenomenon of light interference in multiple slits.

data.source_sentence: 다중 슬릿의 간섭에서 각 슬릿이 OPA를 구성하는 광 안테나에 해당된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the interference of multiple slits, each slit corresponds to an optical antenna constituting an OPA.
data.target_sentence: In the interference of multiple slits, each slit corresponds to an optical antenna constituting an OPA.

data.source_sentence: N개의 슬릿이 d의 간격으로 주기적으로 배치되어 있는 경우각 슬릿에서 방출되는 빛의 파장이 λ이고 전기장의 진폭이 E0로 동일할 때, 프라운호퍼 회절에 의하여 각도 q에서의 전기장 분포가 다음과 같이 표현된다.
data.mt_sentence: When N slits are periodically arranged at intervals of d, when the wavelength of light emitted from each slit is λ and the amplitude of the electric field is equal to E0, the electric field distribution at angle q by Fraunhofer diffraction is expressed as do.
data.target_sentence: When the wavelength of light emitted from each slit is λ and the amplitude of the electric field is E0, when N slits are periodically arranged at intervals of d, the electric field distribution at angle q by Fraunhofer diffraction is expressed as do.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1은 단일 광 안테나에서빛의 회절에 의한 각도에 따른 강도 분포를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1 shows the intensity distribution according to the angle by diffraction of light in a single optical antenna.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the intensity distribution according to the angle due to diffraction of light from a single optical antenna.

data.source_sentence: 빛의 강도는 전기장의 제곱에 비례하므로 (sinb/b)에 비례하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the intensity of light is proportional to the square of the electric field, it is proportional to (sinb/b).
data.target_sentence: The intensity of light is proportional to the square of the electric field, so it is proportional to (sinb/b).

data.source_sentence: b가 증가함에 따라 중앙 로브의 폭이 크게 감소하는 것을 볼수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the width of the central lobe decreases significantly as b increases.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the width of the central lobe significantly decreases as b increases.

data.source_sentence: 라이다 응용을 위해서는 넓은 각도 범위에서 빛이 조향되어야 하므로 중앙 로브가 넓게 형성되는 것이 필요한데, b= 0.2 μm에서는 ±80도에서의 빛의 세기가 0도에서 세기의 93% 정도로 유지된다.
data.mt_sentence: For LiDAR application, since light must be steered in a wide angular range, it is necessary to form a wide central lobe. At b = 0.2 μm, the light intensity at ±80 degrees is maintained at about 93% of the intensity at 0 degrees.
data.target_sentence: For lidar applications, since light must be steered in a wide angular range, it is necessary to form a wide central lobe. At b = 0.2 μm, the light intensity at ±80 degrees is maintained at 93% of the intensity at 0 degrees.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 b를 0.2 μm로 설정하여 큰 각도에서도 회절에 의한 빛의 세기가 여전히 강하게 유지되도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, b was set to 0.2 μm to maintain the intensity of light caused by diffraction even at a large angle.
data.target_sentence: In this study, b was set to 0.2 μm in order to maintain the intensity of light due to diffraction even at a large angle.

data.source_sentence: 식 (1)을 보면 분모가 0이 될 때 OPA를 구성하는 모든 안테나에서 방출된 빛이 보강간섭을 해서 강한 신호가 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: According to Equation (1), when the denominator becomes 0, the light emitted from all antennas constituting the OPA interferes with constructive interference and a strong signal is generated.
data.target_sentence: According to Equation 1, when the denominator becomes 0, light emitted from all antennas constituting the OPA interferes with constructive interference to generate a strong signal.

data.source_sentence: 다음 조건을 만족하는 각도 qm에서 봉우리(peak)가 형성된다.
data.mt_sentence: A peak is formed at an angle qm satisfying the following conditions.
data.target_sentence: A peak is formed at an angle qm that satisfies the following condition.

data.source_sentence: d가 증가함에 따라 식 (2)를 만족하는 qm이 여러 개가 존재할 수 있으므로 원장에서 다수의 봉우리가 형성될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As d increases, there may be several qm that satisfy Equation (2), so multiple peaks may be formed in the ledger.
data.target_sentence: As d increases, there may be several qm satisfying Equation 2, so that several peaks may be formed in the ledger.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2의 두 경우 모두 m = 0인 봉우리 좌우에 고차의 봉우리가 여러 개 형성되는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In both cases in Figure 2, it can be seen that several high-order peaks are formed on the left and right of the peak with m = 0.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that in both cases in Figure 2, several higher-order peaks are formed to the left and right of the peak with m = 0.

data.source_sentence: 라이다 응용에서는 보통 m = 0인 봉우리에서 f를 변화시키면서 빔 조향을 하게 되므로 고차의 봉우리가 형성되는 각도 이내로 빔 조향의 범위가 제한된다.
data.mt_sentence: In lidar applications, beam steering is usually performed while changing f at the peak of m = 0, so the range of beam steering is limited within the angle at which high-order peaks are formed.
data.target_sentence: In lidar applications, beam steering is usually performed while changing f at the peak of m = 0, so the range of beam steering is limited within the angle at which higher-order peaks are formed.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1의 경우에는 빔 조향의 범위가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of Figure 1, there is a range of beam steering.
data.target_sentence: In the case of Figure 1, there is a beam steering range.

data.source_sentence: 식 (2)를 보면, 이론적으로 전체 각도범위인 ±90°를 모두 조향하기 위해서는 m = 0인 봉우리만 형성되어야 하므로 δ ≈ λ이 되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at Equation (2), theoretically, in order to steer the entire angular range of ±90°, only peaks with m = 0 should be formed, so δ ≈ λ.
data.target_sentence: Looking at Equation 2, theoretically, to adjust the full angular range of ±90°, only peaks with m = 0 should be formed, so δ ≈ λ.

data.source_sentence: 비주기적 OPA 구조는 고차 모드가 발생하는 주기적 OPA구조의 문제점을 해결할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The aperiodic OPA structure can solve the problem of the periodic OPA structure in which a higher-order mode occurs.
data.target_sentence: The aperiodic OPA structure can solve the problem of the periodic OPA structure in which higher-order modes occur.

data.source_sentence: 비주기적 OPA에서 원장의 광분포는 다중 슬릿에서의 간섭 현상으로 모델링할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, the light distribution of the ledger can be modeled as an interference phenomenon in multiple slits.
data.target_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, the light distribution of the ledger can be modeled as an interference phenomenon in multiple slits.

data.source_sentence: 프라운호퍼 회절 이론을 이용하면, N개의 채널로 구성된 OPA에서 파수 k, 각진동수 ω의 빛이 방출될 때 OPA에서 R만큼떨어진 위치에서 각도 q에서의 전기장의 크기는 다음과 같이 표현된다.
data.mt_sentence: Using the Fraunhofer diffraction theory, when light of wave number k and angular frequency ω is emitted from an OPA composed of N channels, the magnitude of the electric field at an angle q at a distance R by R from the OPA is expressed as follows.
data.target_sentence: When light of wavelength k and angular frequency ω is emitted from an OPA composed of N channels using the Fraunhofer diffraction theory, the magnitude of the electric field at an angle q at a distance R x R from the OPA is expressed as follows.

data.source_sentence: 주기적 OPA에서는 dn이 채널 주기의 정수배로 주어지지만 비주기적 OPA에서는 비주기적 또는 무작위적으로 주어지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In periodic OPA, dn is given as an integer multiple of the channel period, but in aperiodic OPA, it is given aperiodically or randomly.
data.target_sentence: In periodic OPA, dn is given as an integer multiple of the channel period, but in aperiodic OPA, it is given aperiodically or randomly.

data.source_sentence: fn은 n번째 채널의 위상으로 이 값을 적절하게 조정함으로 써 특정 각도에서 모든 안테나의 빛이 보강 간섭을 이루어 강하게 진행할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By appropriately adjusting this value to the phase of the nth channel, fn allows light from all antennas to travel strongly at a certain angle with reinforcing interference.
data.target_sentence: By adjusting this value appropriately to the phase of the nth channel, fn allows the light from all antennas to travel strongly at a certain angle, enhancing the interference.

data.source_sentence: An은 각 안테나의 전기장 진폭인데, 여기서는 편의상 모두 동일하다고 가정한다.
data.mt_sentence: An is the electric field amplitude of each antenna, which is assumed here to be the same for convenience.
data.target_sentence: An is the electric field amplitude of each antenna, which is assumed to be equal here for convenience.

data.source_sentence: OPA의 빛을 각도 q 방향으로 진행하기 위해서는 각 안테나에서 전기장의 위상이 모두 q에서 일치하도록 하면 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to propagate the light of the OPA in the angle q direction, all the phases of the electric fields in each antenna should match at q.
data.target_sentence: To propagate the OPA's light in the angular q direction, all electric fields from each antenna must be in phase q.

data.source_sentence: 모든 안테나에서 전기장의 위상이 다음과 같이 2p의 정수배를 만족하게 되면 빛이 q 방향으로 진행하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In all antennas, when the phase of the electric field satisfies an integer multiple of 2p as follows, light travels in the q direction.
data.target_sentence: In all antennas, when the phase of the electric field satisfies an integer multiple of 2p as follows, light travels in the q direction.

data.source_sentence: 식 (4)로부터 n번째 안테나가 방출하는 빛의 위상 fn은 다음과 같이 얻어진다.
data.mt_sentence: From Equation (4), the phase fn of the light emitted by the nth antenna is obtained as follows.
data.target_sentence: From Equation 4, the phase fn of the light emitted from the nth antenna is obtained as follows.

data.source_sentence: 비주기적인 채널의 위치 dn에 대해 안테나의 위상 fn이 식 (5)를 만족하도록 조절하게 되면 q 방향에서만 강한 봉우리가 형성된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the phase fn of the antenna is adjusted to satisfy Equation (5) for the position dn of the aperiodic channel, a strong peak is formed only in the q direction.
data.target_sentence: When the phase fn of the antenna is adjusted to satisfy Equation 5 for the position dn of the aperiodic channel, a strong peak is formed only in the q direction.

data.source_sentence: 만일 dn이 주기성을 갖게 된다면 식 (3)은 식 (1)과 같이 표현되어 식 (2)와 같이 고차 봉우리들이 형성될 수 임의의 비주기적 OPA에 대한 원장 시뮬레이션의 예를 그림 3에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: If dn has periodicity, Equation (3) is expressed as Equation (1), and an example of a ledger simulation for any aperiodic OPA where higher-order peaks can be formed as Equation (2) is shown in Figure 3.
data.target_sentence: When there is periodicity in dn, Equation 3 is expressed as Equation 1, and an example of a ledger simulation for all aperiodic OPAs in which higher-order peaks can be formed as Equation 2 is shown in Fig. 3.

data.source_sentence: 채널의 위치는 난수를 발생시켜 무작위적으로 배치를 하였는데, 채널 간격의 평균은 4 μm, 표준편차는 1 μm로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The position of the channel was randomly arranged by generating a random number, and the mean of the channel interval was set to 4 μm and the standard deviation was set to 1 μm.
data.target_sentence: Channel positions were randomly arranged by generating random numbers, and the average of the channel intervals was set to 4 μm and the standard deviation was set to 1 μm.

data.source_sentence: 실제 OPA를 구현할 때 채널 간의 간격이 너무 좁으면 간섭이 발생하므로 각 채널 간의 간격은 0.2 μm이상이 되도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When the actual OPA is implemented, if the distance between channels is too narrow, interference occurs.
data.target_sentence: In actual OPA implementation, if the distance between channels is too narrow, interference occurs. Therefore, the interval between each channel was set to be 0.2 μm or more.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3은 각각 q가 0도와 30도가 되도록 식 (5)의 fn을 설정하여 시뮬레이션한 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 is the result of the simulation by setting fn of Equation (5) so that q is 0 degrees and 30 degrees, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the simulation results in which fn in Equation 5 is set so that q is 0 degrees and 30 degrees, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 각각 0도와 30도에서 0차 모드가 형성되는 것을 볼 수 있고, 그림 2의 주기적인 OPA에서와 같은 고차 모드들은 형성되지 않는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that zero-order modes are formed at 0 and 30 degrees, respectively, and higher-order modes like in the periodic OPA in Fig. 2 are not formed.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that a zero-order mode is formed at 0 degrees and 30 degrees, respectively, and a higher-order mode like the periodic OPA of FIG. 2 is not formed.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3은 무작위적으로 선택된 특정 dn의 집합에 대해서 시뮬레이션한 결과로서 다른 무작위적인 dn 집합의 경우에는 1차 모드의 각도는 동일하지만 잡음 신호들의 형태가 달라지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 shows the simulation results for a particular set of randomly selected dn, and for other random dn sets, the angles of the primary mode are the same, but the forms of the noise signals are different.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the simulation results for a specific randomly selected set of dn, for different sets of random dn, the angle of the fundamental mode is the same, but the shape of the noise signal is different.

data.source_sentence: 최적으로 선택된 dn 집합에 대해서는 잡음이 최소화되어 우수한 신호의 품질이 얻어질 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: For the optimally selected set of dn, noise may be minimized to obtain excellent signal quality.
data.target_sentence: Good signal quality can be obtained with minimal noise for an optimally selected set of dn.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 이러한 잡음의 영향이 최소화된 최적의 비주기적 OPA 배열을 얻기 위한 최적화 연구를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, an optimization study was conducted to obtain an optimal aperiodic OPA arrangement with the minimized effect of noise.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, an optimization study was performed to obtain an optimal aperiodic OPA arrangement while minimizing the effect of noise.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 입자 군집 최적화(PSO), 유전 알고리즘(GA), 패턴 검색 알고리즘(PSA) 등 3가지의 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하였는데, 각최적화 알고리즘의 원리와 과정에 대해 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, three optimization algorithms were applied: particle cluster optimization (PSO), genetic algorithm (GA), and pattern search algorithm (PSA), and the principle and process of each optimization algorithm are introduced.
data.target_sentence: In this study, three optimization algorithms were applied: Particle Cluster Optimization (PSO), Genetic Algorithm (GA), and Pattern Search Algorithm (PSA), and the principles and processes of each optimization algorithm were introduced.

data.source_sentence: 최적화 알고리즘에서는 최적화하고자 문제의 목푯값을 계산하기 위한 목적 함수(fitness function)를 설정해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the optimization algorithm, it is necessary to set a fitness function for calculating the target value of the problem to be optimized.
data.target_sentence: In the optimization algorithm, it is necessary to set the fitness function to calculate the target value of the problem to be optimized.

data.source_sentence: 목적 함수 y =f(x)를 최적화하는 알고리즘의 목표는 y를 최적화(최소 또는 최대화)하는 x를 찾아내는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The goal of an algorithm that optimizes the objective function y = f(x) is to find x that optimizes (minimizes or maximizes) y.
data.target_sentence: The goal of an algorithm that optimizes the objective function y = f(x) is to find x that optimizes (minimizes or maximizes) y.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 비주기적인 배열을 최적화하는 문제에서 x는 N개로 이뤄진 광 안테나 위치에 대한 변수가 되고, y는 빔의 품질을 나타내는 함수의 값이다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in the problem of optimizing the aperiodic arrangement, x becomes a variable for the position of the optical antenna of N, and y is the value of the function representing the quality of the beam.
data.target_sentence: In this study, in the problem of optimizing the aperiodic arrangement, x becomes a variable for the optical antenna position of N, and y becomes a value of a function indicating the quality of the beam.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 SLL을 목적 함수로 두고 이를 최적화하는 안테나 위치에 대한 정보를 찾도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we set SLL as the objective function to find information on the antenna position that optimizes it.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the SLL was set as the objective function to find information on the antenna position to optimize the SLL.

data.source_sentence: 식 (6)에서 정의된 SLL은 음의 값을 가지며, SLL 값이 작을수록 0차 모드와 잡음 신호의 최대 세기 차이가 커지게 되어 빔의 품질이 개선됨을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The SLL defined in Equation (6) has a negative value, and the smaller the SLL value, the greater the difference between the 0th-order mode and the maximum intensity of the noise signal, which means that the quality of the beam is improved.
data.target_sentence: The SLL defined in Equation 6 has a negative value, and the smaller the SLL value, the greater the difference between the zero-order mode and the maximum intensity of the noise signal, so that the quality of the beam is improved.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 적용한 최적화 알고리즘에서는 SLL이 최소값을 가지는 OPA 배열을 찾는다.
data.mt_sentence: In the optimization algorithm applied in this study, the SLL finds the OPA array with the minimum value.
data.target_sentence: In the optimization algorithm applied in this study, the SLL finds the OPA array with the minimum value.

data.source_sentence: 알고리즘의 최종 기준이 만족되면 알고리즘이 종료되고, 그렇지않으면 입자들의 속도를 계산하고, 위치와 속도를 업데이트하여 목적함수 계산부터 다시 반복하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the final criterion of the algorithm is satisfied, the algorithm is terminated, otherwise the speed of the particles is calculated, and the position and speed are updated to repeat the calculation of the objective function again.
data.target_sentence: If the final criterion of the algorithm is satisfied, the algorithm is terminated. Otherwise, the objective function calculation is repeated again by calculating the velocity of the particle and updating the position and velocity.

data.source_sentence: 입자들의 위치와 속도는 다음의 두 식을 통해 업데이트된다.
data.mt_sentence: The positions and velocities of particles are updated through the following two equations.
data.target_sentence: The particle's position and velocity are updated through two equations:

data.source_sentence: 식 (7)에서 x는 입자들의 위치, x′은 업데이트되는 위치이다.
data.mt_sentence: In Equation (7), x is the position of the particles, and x′ is the position to be updated.
data.target_sentence: In Equation 7, x is the position of the particle and x' is the position to be updated.

data.source_sentence: (p − x) 항은 입자가 보는 현재의 위치와 해당 입자가 찾은 최적의 위치 차이, (g − x) 항은 현재 위치와 군집 전체 최적 위치의 차이이다.
data.mt_sentence: The term (p − x) is the difference between the current position seen by a particle and the optimal position found by the particle, and the term (g − x) is the difference between the current position and the optimal position of the entire cluster.
data.target_sentence: The term (p − x) is the difference between the current position seen by the particle and the optimal position found by the particle, and the term (g − x) is the difference between the current position and the optimal position for the entire cluster.

data.source_sentence: W는 관성으로 절댓값이 커질수록 새로운 속도 v′이 이전 속도 v와 비슷하다.
data.mt_sentence: W is inertia, and as the absolute value increases, the new velocity v′ is similar to the previous velocity v.
data.target_sentence: W is the inertia, and as the absolute value increases, the new velocity v' is similar to the old velocity v.

data.source_sentence: y1은 자가 적응 가중치(self-adjustment weight)로서 이 값이 커질수록 입자들이 최적의 위치로 더 많이 이동하게 되고, y2는 사회 적응 가중치(social adjustment weight)로 값이 커질수록 입자들이 현재의 위치 근처에서 가장 좋은 곳으로 향하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As y1 is a self-adaptation weight, the larger the value, the more particles move to the optimum position, and as y2 is a social adjustment weight, the larger the value, the better the particles are directed near the current position.
data.target_sentence: Since y1 is a self-adjusting weight, a larger value will move more particles to the optimal location, and y2 is a socially-adjusted weight, so a larger value will better direct the particles closer to their current location.

data.source_sentence: W, y1, y2의 값을 적절하게 조절하지 못하면 군집이 불안정해진다.
data.mt_sentence: If the values of W, y1, and y2 are not properly adjusted, the cluster becomes unstable.
data.target_sentence: If the W, y1, and y2 values are not properly adjusted, the cluster becomes unstable.

data.source_sentence: 그에 따라 최적화 시간이 많이 걸리거나, 지역최적해로 빠르게 수렴해 더 나은 해를 찾지 못하는 등의 문제점이 발생하므로 값을 적절히 조절해 최적화해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, problems such as taking a lot of optimization time or failing to find a better solution due to rapid convergence to the local optimal solution occur.
data.target_sentence: As a result, problems such as taking a lot of optimization time or failing to find a better solution due to fast convergence to the local optimal solution occur.

data.source_sentence: 입자의 수가 많으면 탐색 공간을 채우는 입자가 많아지므로 더 나은 최적해를 찾기에 용이하나 너무 많으면 최적화 시간이 길어지므로 입자 수를 조절하는 것도 고려하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the number of particles is large, the number of particles filling the search space increases, so it is easy to find a better optimization solution, but if it is too large, the optimization time becomes longer, so it should be considered to adjust the number of particles.
data.target_sentence: A large number of particles makes it easier to find a better optimization solution because the number of particles filling the search space is large, but if it is too large, it will take longer to optimize, so you should consider tuning. number of particles.

data.source_sentence: PSO를 OPA에 적용하게 되면, PSO에서 각 입자의 위치는 128개 안테나 채널들의 좌표 값에 해당하고 각 입자별로 입자의 위치에 대응하는 SLL 값을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: When PSO is applied to OPA, the position of each particle in the PSO corresponds to the coordinate values of 128 antenna channels, and each particle has an SLL value corresponding to the position of the particle.
data.target_sentence: When PSO is applied to OPA, the position of each particle in the PSO corresponds to a coordinate value of 128 antenna channels, and each particle has an SLL value corresponding to the position of the particle.

data.source_sentence: 본 계산에서는 초기에 5,000 set의 OPA를 무작위적으로 생성하여 PSO 알고리즘을 적용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this calculation, initially, 5,000 sets of OPAs were randomly generated and the PSO algorithm was applied.
data.target_sentence: In this calculation, we initially randomly generated a set of 5,000 OPAs and applied the PSO algorithm.

data.source_sentence: 128차원 공간에 있는 5,000개의 입자의 위치가 PSO 최적화를 통해 SLL이 최소화된 지점으로 수렴하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The positions of 5,000 particles in 128-dimensional space converge to the point where the SLL is minimized through PSO optimization.
data.target_sentence: The positions of 5,000 particles in 128-dimensional space converge to the point where the SLL is minimized through PSO optimization.

data.source_sentence: 알고리즘이 실행되면 5,000개의 입자에 대한 SLL값을 계산하여 전역 최소인 입자의 위치를 결정한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the algorithm is executed, the SLL value for 5,000 particles is calculated to determine the global minimum particle position.
data.target_sentence: When the algorithm runs, SLL values for 5,000 particles are calculated to determine the global minimum particle location.

data.source_sentence: 이 입자의 위치를 기준으로 입자들이 움직이면서 찾아내는 최소의 SLL 값이 얻어질 때까지 입자의 위치와 속도를 업데이트하며 계산을 반복하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the position of this particle, the calculation is repeated while updating the position and velocity of the particle until the minimum SLL value found as the particles move is obtained.
data.target_sentence: Based on the position of this particle, the calculation is repeated, updating the position and velocity of the particle until the smallest SLL value found as the particle moves is obtained.

data.source_sentence: GA는 다윈(Darwin)의 적자생존을 기본 개념으로 분석하는 알고리즘으로 진화를 모방한 알고리즘이며, 그림 6에 GA의 알고리즘을 도식적으로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: GA is an algorithm that analyzes Darwin's survival of the fittest as a basic concept and mimics evolution, and is schematically illustrated in Figure 6.
data.target_sentence: GA is an algorithm that analyzes Darwin's survival of the fittest as a basic concept and simulates evolution.

data.source_sentence: 찾고자 하는 해를 유전자로 간주하고 인구(population)를 일정 수만큼 생성하여 해당 인구들이 나타내는 목적함수를 통해 해의 적합도를 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: The solution to be found is regarded as a gene and population is generated in a certain number to confirm the suitability of the solution through the objective function represented by the population.
data.target_sentence: Considering the solution to be found as a gene, a certain number of populations are generated to check the suitability of the solution through the objective function indicated by the population.

data.source_sentence: 원하는 만큼의 세대(generation)를 거치면서 매 세대에서의 최적해(elite)를 설정한 만큼 남기고 선택(selection), 교차(crossover), 변이(mutation)를 통하여 유전자를 향상시키며 최적해를 찾는다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the desired generation, the optimal solution is found by improving genes through selection, crossover, and mutation, leaving as much as the optimal solution in each generation is set.
data.target_sentence: Through the desired generation, the optimal solution is found by improving the gene through selection, crossing, and mutation, and the optimal solution is left for each generation.

data.source_sentence: 교차는 두 부모의 유전자 정보 중 임의의 부분을 바꾸어 다음세대에 배치해 정보를 병합하며, 더 나은 결과를 가질 수도 그렇지 않을 수도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Crossover changes any part of the genetic information of both parents and places them on the next generation to merge the information, which may or may not have better results.
data.target_sentence: Crossovers may or may not yield better results by changing some of the genetic information of both parents and placing them in the next generation to merge the information.

data.source_sentence: 유전 알고리즘 역시 elite와 세대 수 및 인구 수, 선택 방법, 교차 또는 변이 비율을 조정해 최적화 성능을 달리할수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Genetic algorithms can also vary optimization performance by adjusting elite and number of households and populations, selection methods, cross-sections or mutation ratios.
data.target_sentence: Genetic algorithms can also change optimization performance by adjusting the number of elites and households and populations, selection methods, cross-sections, or mutation rates.

data.source_sentence: GA는 초기 인구를 생성하고, 인구들이 갖는 목적함수 값을 계산하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: GA creates the initial population and calculates the objective function values of the populations.
data.target_sentence: GA generates an initial population and computes the values of the objective function of the population.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7은 선택, 교차, 변이 과정을 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows the selection, crossover, and mutation processes.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the selection, crossover and mutagenesis process.

data.source_sentence: 검색공간이 매우 넓기 때문에 해당 과정들이 적절하게 이루어져야 가까운 지역 최적해(local optimal)로 수렴하는 것을 줄일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the search space is very wide, the convergence to the local optimal solution can be reduced if the corresponding processes are properly performed.
data.target_sentence: Since the search space is very wide, convergence to the local optimal solution can be reduced if that process is done properly.

data.source_sentence: GA는 군집 최적화와 마찬가지로 최대 세대 값이나 인구 수가 크면 탐색이 늘어나 지역 최적해에 빠질 확률을 줄여주지만, 시간이 너무 오래 걸린다는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Similar to cluster optimization, GA reduces the probability of falling into a local optimal solution by increasing the search when the maximum generation value or the number of population is large, but has the disadvantage that it takes too long.
data.target_sentence: Similar to cluster optimization, GA reduces the probability of falling into a local optimal solution by increasing the search when the maximum generation value or the number of populations is large, but has the disadvantage that it takes too long.

data.source_sentence: GA를 본 연구의 OPA의 최적화에 활용할 때 128 채널의 각안테나가 유전자에 해당하고, 128개의 안테나로 구성된 각각의 OPA가 128개의 유전자를 지닌 각 인구에 해당한다.
data.mt_sentence: When GA is utilized for optimization of OPA in this study, each antenna in 128 channels corresponds to the gene, and each OPA consisting of 128 antennas corresponds to each population with 128 genes.
data.target_sentence: In this study, utilizing GA for OPA optimization, each antenna of 128 channels corresponds to a gene, and each OPA consisting of 128 antennas corresponds to each population with 128 genes.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 초기에 2,000 set의 OPA를 무작위적으로 생성하였는데, 이는 128개의 유전자를 가진 인구의 수를 2,000으로 두고 GA를 적용한 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, 2,000 sets of OPAs were initially generated randomly, meaning that GA was applied with the number of populations with 128 genes at 2,000.
data.target_sentence: In this study, initially 2,000 sets of OPAs were randomly generated, meaning that GA was applied with population numbers from 2,000 to 128 genes.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 OPA에 대해서 목적 함수인 SLL 값을 계산하여 해의 적합도를 확인하고, 세대를 거치면서 선택, 교차, 변이를 통하여 SLL 값이 최소가 되도록 유전자, 즉 안테나의 배치를 업데이트하면서 최적 위치를 찾게 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For each OPA, the target function SLL value was calculated to check the suitability of the solution, and the placement of the gene, that is, the antenna, was updated to minimize the SLL value through selection, crossing, and variation over generations.
data.target_sentence: For each OPA, the target function SLL value was calculated to confirm the suitability of the solution, and the placement of the gene, i.e., the antenna, was updated to minimize the SLL value through generational selection, crossover, and mutation.

data.source_sentence: 이때 교차는 안테나 배치 중 임의의 부분을 서로 바꾸어 다음 세대에 배치하는 것을 의미하고, 변이는 안테나 위치에 대한 정보 일부분이 무작위로 바뀌는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the crossover means that an arbitrary part of the antenna arrangement is exchanged and placed in the next generation, and the variation means that a part of information on the antenna location is changed at random.
data.target_sentence: In this case, crossover means that any part of the antenna array is replaced and placed in the next generation, while fluctuation means that some of the information about the antenna position is changed randomly.

data.source_sentence: PSA는 앞서 언급된 두 알고리즘과 마찬가지로 도함수를 사용하지 않기 때문에 미분 불가능한 함수에 대해 사용 가능하며, 수치적 최적화 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Like the two algorithms mentioned above, PSA can be used for non-differentiable functions because it does not use derivatives, and is a numerical optimization method.
data.target_sentence: Like the two algorithms mentioned above, PSA can be used for non-differentiable functions because it is a numerical optimization method without using differentiation.

data.source_sentence: PSA는 패턴 중심을 시작점으로 하고, 벡터들의 집합인 패턴(pattern)을 따라 조사(polling)를 진행한다.
data.mt_sentence: The PSA has a pattern center as a starting point and polls along a pattern, which is a set of vectors.
data.target_sentence: PSA takes the center of the pattern as the starting point and polls along the pattern, which is a set of vectors.

data.source_sentence: 패턴의 길이는 기본적으로 1이고, 이 패턴의 길이를 메시 크기(mesh size)라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The length of the pattern is basically 1, and the length of this pattern is called the mesh size.
data.target_sentence: The length of the pattern is 1 by default, and the length of this pattern is called the mesh size.

data.source_sentence: 패턴을 따라서 더 나은 해를 찾게 되는 경우를 성공적인 조사(successful polling)라고 하며, 패턴의 중심이 이동하여 해를 조정한 후 메시 크기를 확장한다.
data.mt_sentence: The case of finding a better solution along the pattern is called successful polling, and the center of the pattern moves to adjust the solution and then the mesh size is expanded.
data.target_sentence: When a better solution is found along a pattern, it is called successful polling, and the solution is adjusted by moving the center of the pattern, and then the mesh size is expanded.

data.source_sentence: 그렇지 않은 경우를 성공적이지 않은 조사(unsuccessfulpolling)라고 하며 이 경우 패턴의 중심이 이동하지 않은 채 메시 크기를 줄여가면서 이웃한 공간에서 최적해가 있는지 조사를 진행한다.
data.mt_sentence: Otherwise, the case is called unsuccessful polling, and in this case, the size of the mesh is reduced without the center of the pattern moving, and the investigation is conducted to see if there is an optimization in the neighboring space.
data.target_sentence: If not, it is called unsuccessfulpolling. In this case, the center of the pattern does not move and the mesh size is reduced to investigate whether there is an optimization in the surrounding space.

data.source_sentence: 이는 시작점, 초기 메시 크기, 메시의 확장 및 감소 비율에 따라 다르게 최적화가 가능하다는 특징이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This is characterized by being optimized differently according to the starting point, the initial mesh size, and the expansion and reduction ratio of the mesh.
data.target_sentence: It is characterized in that it is optimized differently depending on the starting point, the initial mesh size, and the expansion and contraction ratio of the mesh.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 시작점을 무작위로 설정했고 2N 개의 방향과 초기 메시 크기를 0.3으로 하는 패턴을 사용하여 최적화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the starting point was randomly set and optimized using a pattern with 2N orientations and an initial mesh size of 0.3.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the starting point was randomly set and optimized using a pattern with a 2N orientation and an initial mesh size of 0.3.

data.source_sentence: 시작점에서 메시 크기만큼 더하고 빼준 지점에 대한 목적함수인 SLL을 모두 계산하고 더 나은 해가 있으면 패턴의 시작점으로 업데이트되며, 그렇지 않으면 메시 크기를 줄여 업데이트할 지점을 찾아 주변을 세부적으로 탐색한다.
data.mt_sentence: It calculates all the SLL objective functions for the points added and subtracted by the mesh size from the starting point, and if there is a better solution, it is updated as the starting point of the pattern.
data.target_sentence: Computes all SLL objective functions for points subtracted or subtracted from the starting point by the mesh size, and updates to the starting point of the pattern if a better solution is found.

data.source_sentence: 방식으로 알고리즘이 반복되고 최적의 SLL를 갖는 OPA 정보를 찾아나간다.
data.mt_sentence: In this way, the algorithm iterates and finds the OPA information with the optimal SLL.
data.target_sentence: In this way, the algorithm iterates and finds the OPA information using the optimal SLL.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 128개의 안테나로 구성된 OPA의 최적화를 수행하므로 N이 128, 즉 2N = 256개의 방향을 가지고 초기 메시 크기가 0.3인 패턴을 사용하여 최적화를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, since the OPA consisting of 128 antennas is optimized, the optimization was performed using a pattern in which N has 128 directions, i.e., 2N = 256 and the initial mesh size is 0.3.
data.target_sentence: In this study, since the OPA consisting of 128 antennas is optimized, the optimization was performed using a pattern with N 128 directions, that is, 2N = 256 and an initial mesh size of 0.3.

data.source_sentence: 3장에서 소개한 최적화 알고리즘들을 비주기적인 OPA에 적용하여 신호 품질이 우수한 최적 안테나 배열을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optimization algorithms introduced in Chapter 3 were applied to aperiodic OPA to obtain an optimal antenna array with excellent signal quality.
data.target_sentence: By applying the optimization algorithm introduced in Chapter 3 to aperiodic OPA, an optimal antenna array with excellent signal quality was obtained.

data.source_sentence: 모든 조향 각도에서 SLL을 계산하면 시간이 너무 오래 걸리므로, 본 연구에서는 각도별로 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 최소 SLL값을 가지는 OPA 배열을 구하고 다른 각도들에서 SLL 값의 변화를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since calculating SLL at all steering angles takes too long, this study obtained an OPA array with minimum SLL values by applying an optimization algorithm for each angle and investigated changes in SLL values at other angles.
data.target_sentence: Since it takes too long to calculate the SLL at all steering angles, in this study, we applied an optimization algorithm for each angle to obtain an OPA array with a minimum SLL value and investigated the change in the SLL value at different angles.

data.source_sentence: ψ는 빔이 ψ의 각도에서 형성될 때 최적화 알고리즘으로 찾은 최적 OPA 배열에 대한 각도를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Ψ means the angle for the optimal OPA arrangement found by the optimization algorithm when the beam is formed at the angle of ψ.
data.target_sentence: Ψ means the angle for the optimal OPA arrangement found by the optimization algorithm when the beam is formed at the angle of ψ.

data.source_sentence: q는 주어진 OPA 배열에 대해서 식 (5)로 주어진 빔의 조향 각도를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Q denotes the steering angle of the beam given by Eq. (5) for a given OPA arrangement.
data.target_sentence: Q denotes the steering angle of the beam given by the equation. (5) for a given OPA arrangement.

data.source_sentence: SLL(ψ, q)는 ψ의 각도에서 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 구한 OPA의 광 안테나 배치에 대해서 q 각도에서 빔이 형성될 때의 SLL 값을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: SLL(ψ, q) means the SLL value when the beam is formed at the q angle with respect to the optical antenna arrangement of the OPA obtained by applying the optimization algorithm at the ψ angle.
data.target_sentence: SLL(ψ, q) means the SLL value when the beam is formed at the q angle with respect to the optical antenna arrangement of the OPA to which the optimization algorithm is applied at the ψ angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 9는 최적화 각도 ψ에 대해서 3가지 최적화 알고리즘 별로 구한 최소 SLL을 계산한 결과를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 9 shows the results of calculating the minimum SLL obtained for each of the three optimization algorithms for the optimization angle ψ.
data.target_sentence: Figure 9 shows the results of calculating the minimum SLL obtained for each of the three optimization algorithms for the optimization angle ψ.

data.source_sentence: 그림 9에서는 최적화 각도와 조향 각도가 동일해서 ψ = q인 경우에 해당한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Figure 9, the optimization angle and the steering angle are the same, corresponding to the case where ψ = q.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 9, the optimization angle and the steering angle correspond to the case where ψ = q.

data.source_sentence: 라이다 응용에서는 조향 각도를 −80도에서 80도까지 변화시키는 동안에 높은 신호 품질을 유지하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In lidar applications, it is important to maintain high signal quality while changing the steering angle from −80 to 80 degrees.
data.target_sentence: In lidar applications, it is important to maintain high signal quality while changing the steering angle from -80 to 80 degrees.

data.source_sentence: ψ의 각도에서 최적화한 OPA의 광 안테나 배치에서 조향 각도 q를 −80도에서 80도까지 변화시키면서 SLL(ψ, q)를 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: SLL(ψ, q) was calculated while changing the steering angle q from −80 degrees to 80 degrees in the optical antenna arrangement of the OPA optimized at the angle of ψ.
data.target_sentence: SLL(ψ, q) was calculated while changing the steering angle q from -80 degrees to 80 degrees in the optical antenna arrangement of the OPA optimized for the ψ angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 10은 최적화 각도가 클수록 다른 조향 각도에서도 우수한 빔 품질이 유지됨을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 10 shows that the larger the optimization angle, the better the beam quality is maintained at different steering angles.
data.target_sentence: Figure 10 shows that the larger the optimization angle, the better the beam quality is maintained at various steering angles.

data.source_sentence: 이를 확인하기 위해 ψ =0°와 80°에서 최적화한 OPA에 대한 원장 분포를 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: To confirm this, the ledger distribution for OPA optimized at ψ = 0° and 80° was calculated.
data.target_sentence: To confirm this, we calculated the ledger distribution for the optimized OPA at ψ = 0° and 80°.

data.source_sentence: 그림 11(b)에서와 같이 80°에서 최적화한 OPA의 경우에는 q에 관계없이 side lobe의 세기가 낮게 유지되어 모든 각도에 서 우수한 신호 품질을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Fig. 11(b), in the case of OPA optimized at 80°, the strength of the side lobe is kept low regardless of q, so that excellent signal quality can be obtained from all angles.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 11(b), in the case of OPA optimized for 80°, the strength of the sidelobe remains low regardless of q, resulting in good signal quality at all angles.

data.source_sentence: 그림 10과 11의 결과는 PSA로 최적화한 OPA의 경우 큰 각도에서 최적화할수록 다른 조향 각도에서도 side lobe이 낮게 유지됨을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The results in Figures 10 and 11 show that for OPA optimized with PSA, the side lobe remains lower at other steering angles as the optimization is performed at a larger angle.
data.target_sentence: The results in Figures 10 and 11 show that for the PSA-optimized OPA, the side lobes remain low at different steering angles as the optimization is performed at larger angles.

data.source_sentence: 경향이 다른 최적화 알고리즘에서도 해당하는지 확인하기 위하여 GA와 PSA로 최적화한 OPA에 대하여 조향 각도에 따른 SLL을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm that the tendency is also applicable to other optimization algorithms, SLL according to the steering angle was calculated for OPA optimized with GA and PSA.
data.target_sentence: To confirm that this trend is applicable to other optimization algorithms, the SLL according to the steering angle was calculated for OPA optimized with GA and PSA.

data.source_sentence: GA의 경우에는 ψ가 45° 이상일 때에는 모든 조향 각도에서 SLL이 낮게 유지가 되고, PSO의 경우에도 ψ가 45° 이상일 때에는 큰 조향 각도에서도 SLL이 급격하게 증가하지는 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of GA, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL is kept low at all steering angles, and even in the case of PSO, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL does not increase sharply even at large steering angles.
data.target_sentence: In the case of GA, SLL is kept low at all steering angles when ψ is greater than 45°. And, even in the case of PSO, when ψ is 45° or more, SLL does not increase rapidly even at a large steering angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 13은 각 알고리즘의 최적화 각도별 OPA 배치를 사용해 SLL을 모든 조향 각도에서 평균한 값을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 13 shows the average value of SLL at all steering angles using the OPA arrangement for each optimization angle of each algorithm.
data.target_sentence: Figure 13 shows the average value of SLL at all steering angles using the OPA array for each optimization angle of each algorithm.

data.source_sentence: 특히 PSA의 경우에 최적화 각도가 감소할수록 평균 SLL이 급격히 증가하여 평균적인 빔 품질이 나빠지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, in the case of PSA, as the optimization angle decreases, the average SLL increases rapidly, and the average beam quality deteriorates.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in the case of PSA, as the optimization angle decreases, the average SLL rapidly increases and the average beam quality deteriorates.

data.source_sentence: PSO와 GA의 경우에도 최적화 각도가 40° 이하에서는 최적화 각도가 감소할수록 SLL이 증가하는 경향을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Even in the case of PSO and GA, when the optimization angle is less than 40°, the SLL tends to increase as the optimization angle decreases.
data.target_sentence: Even for PSO and GA, when the optimization angle is less than 40°, the SLL tends to increase as the optimization angle decreases.

data.source_sentence: 반면 45° 이상의 각도에서는 3가지 알고리즘 모두 대부분의 조향 각도에서 SLL이 낮게 유지되어 평균 SLL도 −13 dB 이 하의 값을 보이게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, at an angle of 45° or higher, all three algorithms maintain low SLL at most steering angles, resulting in an average SLL of -13 dB or less.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, at angles above 45°, all three algorithms maintain a low SLL at most steering angles, resulting in an average SLL of -13dB or less.

data.source_sentence: PSA의 경우 30° 이하의 작은 최적화 각도에서 OPA를 최적화할 경우 평균 SLL이 상당히 크게 증가했지만 45° 이상의 최적화 각도에서는 가장 낮은 평균 SLL값을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: For PSA, the average SLL was significantly increased when OPA was optimized at a small optimization angle of 30° or less, but the lowest average SLL value was shown at an optimization angle of 45° or more.
data.target_sentence: For PSA, mean SLL increased significantly when optimizing OPA at small optimization angles below 30°, but showed the lowest mean SLL value at optimization angles above 45°.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 비주기적 OPA에서 side-lobe이 최소화된 우수한 신호 품질을 얻기 위한 최적화 방법들을 비교 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, optimization methods for obtaining excellent signal quality with minimized side-lobe in aperiodic OPA were compared and investigated.
data.target_sentence: In this study, optimization methods for obtaining good signal quality while minimizing sidelobes in periodic OPA were compared and investigated.

data.source_sentence: 128 채널의 광 안테나 배열로 이루어진 비주기적 OPA에서 PSO, GA, PSA 등 3가지의 최적화 기법을 적용하여 SLL이 최소화된 최적의 안테나 배열을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In aperiodic OPA consisting of 128-channel optical antenna array, three optimization techniques such as PSO, GA, and PSA were applied to obtain an optimal antenna array with minimized SLL.
data.target_sentence: In aperiodic OPA composed of 128-channel optical antenna array, three optimization techniques such as PSO, GA, and PSA were applied to obtain an optimal antenna array with minimized SLL.

data.source_sentence: 전반적으로 PSO와 GA는 서로 유사한 최적화 결과를 보인 반면, PSA는 이들과는 약간 차별적인 특성을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Overall, PSO and GA showed similar optimization results, while PSA showed slightly different characteristics.
data.target_sentence: Overall, PSO and GA showed similar optimization results, while PSA showed slightly different characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 오차를 발생시킨 원인을 분석하고, 제작된 회절격자 위에 추가의 코팅을 통하여 회절 효율 보정이 가능함을 시뮬레이션을 통하여 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The cause of the error was analyzed, and it was confirmed through simulation that the diffraction efficiency could be corrected through additional coating on the manufactured diffraction grating.
data.target_sentence: The cause of the error was analyzed, and it was confirmed through simulation that the diffraction efficiency could be corrected through additional coating on the manufactured diffraction grating.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션 결과를 확인하기 위하여 제작된 회절격자 위에 Ta2O5 추가층을 제작하고 회절격자를 측정한 결과 회절 효율 보상이 이루어졌으며, 최고 91.7%의 무편광 회절 효율을 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: To confirm the simulation results, an additional layer of Ta2O5 was fabricated on the fabricated diffraction grating and the diffraction grating was measured. As a result, the diffraction efficiency was compensated, and a maximum non-polarization diffraction efficiency of 91.7% was obtained.
data.target_sentence: In order to confirm the simulation result, a Ta2O5 layer was additionally fabricated on the prepared diffraction grating, and as a result of measuring the diffraction grating, the diffraction efficiency was compensated to obtain a maximum unpolarized diffraction efficiency of 91.7%.

data.source_sentence: 최근 고출력 레이저를 국방 분야에 응용하기 위한 다양한 개발이 주요 국방 선진국에서 치열하게 전개되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, various developments for applying high-power lasers to the defense field are being fiercely developed in major defense advanced countries.
data.target_sentence: Recently, various developments for applying high-power lasers to the defense field are being actively conducted in major defense advanced countries.

data.source_sentence: 각국이 우주군을 창설하고 위성을 활용한 무기 개발이 전개되면서, 고출력 레이저를 활용한 위성 추격체계 등 고출력 레이저를 이용한 다양한 무기체계 개발이 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As each country establishes space forces and develops weapons using satellites, various weapon systems using high-power lasers are being developed, such as a satellite tracking system using high-power lasers.
data.target_sentence: As each country establishes space forces and develops weapons using artificial satellites, various weapon systems using high-power lasers, such as satellite tracking systems using high-power lasers, are being developed.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 반사형 회절격자가 반사율이 높은 금속 위에 격자 형상을 만들어 제작된다.
data.mt_sentence: Most reflective diffraction gratings are made by forming a lattice shape on a metal with high reflectivity.
data.target_sentence: Most reflective gratings are made by forming gratings on highly reflective metals.

data.source_sentence: 고출력 레이저에 사용하기 위한 유전체 다층박막 회절격자는 레이저 빔에 의한 흡수로 회절격자가 손상되는 것을 방지하기 위하여 유전체 다층박막 반사경 위에 회절격자를 형성한다.
data.mt_sentence: A dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction grating for use in a high-power laser forms a diffraction grating on a dielectric multilayer thin film reflector to prevent damage to the diffraction grating by absorption by a laser beam.
data.target_sentence: Dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction grating used in high power laser prevents damage to the diffraction grating due to laser beam absorption by forming a diffraction grating on the dielectric multilayer thin film reflector.

data.source_sentence: 설계된 유전체 다층박막 회절격자는 그림 1과 같이 26층의 다층박막과 1층의 요철형 격자구조로 되어있다.
data.mt_sentence: The designed dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction grating has a multilayer thin film of 26 layers and a concave-convex grating structure of one layer as shown in Figure 1.
data.target_sentence: The designed dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction grating has a multilayer thin film of 26 layers and a concave-convex grating structure of one layer as shown in Figure 1.

data.source_sentence: 유전체 다층박막 회절격자는 수십 층의 다층박막과 격자로 구성되어 있어서 제작상의 오차가 발생할 가능성이 매우 크다.
data.mt_sentence: The dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction grating is composed of several tens of multilayer thin films and gratings, so there is a very high possibility of manufacturing errors.
data.target_sentence: Dielectric multilayer thin film diffraction gratings are composed of dozens of multilayer thin films and gratings, so the possibility of manufacturing errors is very high.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 설계된 회절격자를 제작하고, 그 결과를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a designed diffraction grating was fabricated and the results were analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a designed diffraction grating was fabricated and the results were analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 회절격자의 회절 효율에서 목표와 다른 결과가 도출된 원인을 찾고, 이를 보상하는 방법을 시뮬레이션으로 확인하고, 실제 제작을 통하여 회절 효율 보상이 가능함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the cause of the diffraction efficiency of the manufactured diffraction grating was found different from the goal, the method of compensating it was verified through simulation, and the diffraction efficiency could be compensated through actual manufacture.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the cause of the diffraction efficiency of the manufactured diffraction grating was different from the target, the compensation method was verified through simulation, and the diffraction efficiency could be compensated through actual fabrication.

data.source_sentence: λ/4 광학적 두께를 가지는 유전체 다층박막으로 반사경을 제작하는 경우 반사경의 대역폭은 식 (1)과 같이 주어진다.
data.mt_sentence: When a reflector is manufactured using a multilayer dielectric thin film having a λ/4 optical thickness, the bandwidth of the reflector is given by Equation (1).
data.target_sentence: When a reflector is manufactured using a dielectric multilayer thin film having an optical thickness of λ/4, the bandwidth of the reflector is as shown in Equation 1.

data.source_sentence: 본 제작에 저굴절률 물질로 사용한 SiO2 박막은 제작 조건에 따른 굴절률 변화가 거의 발생하지 않는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is known that the SiO2 thin film used as a low refractive index material in the present manufacturing manufacturing has little change in refractive index according to manufacturing conditions.
data.target_sentence: It is known that the SiO2 thin film used as a low-refractive-index material in the present manufacture has little change in refractive index depending on the manufacturing conditions.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2와 같은 반사 대역폭의 차이가 발생한 이유를 고굴절률 물질인 Ta2O5의 굴절률 저하로 판단한다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for the difference in the reflection bandwidth as shown in Figure 2 is the lowering of the refractive index of Ta2O5, a high refractive index material.
data.target_sentence: The reason for the difference in the reflection bandwidth as shown in Figure 2 is that the refractive index of Ta2O5, a high refractive material, is lowered.

data.source_sentence: 이를 변화시켜 제작된 분광특성과 유사한 반사 대역폭을 가지는 굴절률을 결정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By changing this, a refractive index having a reflection bandwidth similar to that of the manufactured spectral characteristics was determined.
data.target_sentence: This was changed to determine a refractive index with a reflection bandwidth similar to the spectral properties produced.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 제작한 유전체 다층박막의 두께는 사전에 두께 조정을 거친 크리스털 두께 측정기를 사용하여 제어하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The thickness of the dielectric multilayer thin film fabricated in this study was controlled using a crystal thickness gauge that had undergone thickness adjustment in advance.
data.target_sentence: The thickness of the multilayer dielectric thin film in this study was controlled using a crystal thickness meter that had undergone thickness adjustment in advance.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 회절격자의 상부 단면과 전체 회절격자의 모습을 그림 4에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4 shows the upper cross-section of the manufactured diffraction grating and the appearance of the entire diffraction grating.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the upper section of the fabricated diffraction grating and the appearance of the entire diffraction grating.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 대역 간 전이의 경우는 EF와 관련된 전하 밀도가 증가함에 따라 대역 간 Pauli 차단으로 인해 대역 간 광전도도가 감소하게 된다.

data.target_sentence: Here, in the case of inter-band transition, as the charge density related to EF increases, the inter-band photoconductivity decreases due to inter-band Pauli blocking.

data.source_sentence: 중적외선 및 원적외선 영역의 광이 입사되는 경우 인가된 전압에 의한 그래핀의 EF 변화는 그래핀 내 전하밀도의 변화를 유도하게 되며, 대역 내 광전도도는 Drude 가중치에 비례하여 변화하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Where light is incident in the mid-infrared and far-infrared regions, EF change of graphene by the applied voltage induces a change of charge density in graphene, and the optical conductivity in the band changes in proportion to Drude's weight.
data.target_sentence: When light is incident on the mid-infrared and far-infrared regions, the EF change of graphene by the applied voltage induces a change in the charge density of graphene, and the photoconductivity of the band changes in proportion to the weight of the Drude.

data.source_sentence: FZP 기반 렌즈의 경우 렌즈의 초점 거리는 연속으로 놓인 동환의 가장자리 반경과 관련이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For FZP-based lenses, the focal length of the lens is related to the radius of the edge of the continuous ring.
