data.source_sentence: 일반적인 FZP는 투명 영역과 불투명 영역이 번갈아 가며 구성되며, n번째 영역의 반경(rn)은 해당 초점(f)과 입사광의 파장(λ)에 따라 아래의 식 (5)로 정해진다.
data.mt_sentence: A typical FZP consists of a transparent region and an opaque region alternately, and the radius (rn) of the n-th region is determined by the following equation (5) according to the corresponding focus (f) and the wavelength (λ) of the incident light.
data.target_sentence: A general FZP consists of alternating transparent and opaque regions, and the radius (rn) of the n-th region is determined by Equation (5) below according to the focal point (f) and the wavelength (λ) of the incident light.

data.source_sentence: 다층 그래핀이 유리 기판에 놓인 경우, 공기/다층 그래핀/유리기판에 의한 반사도와 공기/유리 기판의 반사도의 대비비가 매우 높으므로, 유리 기판 위에 다층 그래핀을 FZP로 형성한 반사형 프레넬 렌즈를 구현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the multilayer graphene is placed on the glass substrate, the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of the air/multilayer graphene/glass substrate and the reflectivity of the air/glass substrate is very high, and thus a reflective Fresnel lens in which the multilayer graphene is formed of FZP on the glass substrate may be implemented.
data.target_sentence: When the multilayer graphene is placed on the glass substrate, the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of the air/multilayer graphene/glass substrate and the reflectivity of the air/glass substrate is very high. Therefore, it is possible to implement a reflective Fresnel lens in which multi-layer graphene is formed by FZP on a glass substrate.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1(a)는 유리 기판 위에 형성된 다층 그래핀 FZP와 그 위에 전사된 그래핀 전극으로 구성된 적외선 FZP 렌즈의 개략도를 나타내고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1(a) shows a schematic diagram of an infrared FZP lens composed of a multilayer graphene FZP formed on a glass substrate and a graphene electrode transferred thereon.
data.target_sentence: 1(a) shows a schematic diagram of an infrared FZP lens composed of a multilayer graphene FZP formed on a glass substrate and a graphene electrode transferred thereon.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 8층 그래핀은 기존의 FZP의 불투명 영역에 놓이며, 단일층 그래핀 전극은 FZP의 투명 영역에 놓이는 구조가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the 8-layer graphene is placed on the opaque region of the conventional FZP, and the single-layer graphene electrode is placed on the transparent region of the FZP.
data.target_sentence: Here, eight-layer graphene is placed in an opaque region of the conventional FZP, and a single-layer graphene electrode is placed in a transparent region of the FZP.

data.source_sentence: 다층 그래핀이 놓인 영역의 층수와 인가된 EF에 따라서 다층그래핀의 반사도가 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The reflectivity of the multilayer graphene varies depending on the number of layers in the region where the multilayer graphene is placed and the applied EF.
data.target_sentence: The reflectivity of multilayer graphene depends on the number of layers in the region where the multilayer graphene is located and the applied EF.

data.source_sentence: 제안된 프레넬 렌즈를 구현하기 위한 공정흐름도는 그림 1(b)에 표시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The process flow diagram for implementing the proposed Fresnel lens is shown in Fig. 1(b).
data.target_sentence: The process flow diagram for implementing the proposed Fresnel lens is shown in Figure 1(b).

data.source_sentence: 먼저 유리 기판 위에 전사된 다층 그래핀(7층)을 광식각(photolithography) 공정으로 FZP 형태의 패턴을 형성한 후, 단일층 그래핀을 전면에 전사함으로써 FZP의 홀수 번째 환에는 다층 그래핀(8층)이 놓이고, 짝수 번째 환에는 단일층 그래핀이 놓이게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: First, a multilayer graphene (7 layers) transferred on a glass substrate is formed using a photolithography process to form a FZP-type pattern, and then single layer graphene is transferred to the entire surface of the multilayer graphene (8 layers) on the odd-numbered ring of FZP. layer), and single-layer graphene is placed on the even-numbered ring.
data.target_sentence: First, the multilayer graphene (7 layers) transferred to the glass substrate is used to form an FZP-type pattern using a photolithography process, and then the single-layer graphene is transferred to the entire surface so that the odd rings of the FZP are positioned. Multi-layer graphene (8 layers), single-layer graphene is located in the even rings.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 패턴된 다층 그래핀의 EF는 그래핀 전극을 통해 용이하게 전압을 인가하여 조절할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the EF of the patterned multilayer graphene can be easily controlled by applying a voltage through the graphene electrode.
data.target_sentence: Here, the EF of the patterned multilayer graphene can be easily controlled by applying a voltage through the graphene electrode.

data.source_sentence: 전극으로 사용되는 단일층 그래핀의 반사도와 다층 그래핀이 놓인 영역의 반사도 대비비에 따른 반사형 FZP 렌즈의 초점 집속 성능을 정량화하기 위해서 finite-difference time-domain 방법을 사용하여 광학 전산모사를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to quantify the focusing performance of the reflective FZP lens according to the contrast ratio of the reflectivity of the single-layer graphene used as an electrode and the reflectivity of the region where the multi-layer graphene is placed, optical simulations were performed using the finite-difference time-domain method. did.
data.target_sentence: The focusing performance of the reflective FZP lens is quantified according to the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of the single-layer graphene used as an electrode and the reflectivity of the area where the multi-layer graphene is placed. For this purpose, optical computational simulation was performed using the finite-difference time-domain method.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 환의 수를 증가시키면 초점 집속 세기가 증가되는데, 제작 공정을 고려하여 환의 수를 적절히 선택하여 사용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, when the number of rings is increased, the focus focusing intensity is increased, and the number of rings may be appropriately selected and used in consideration of the manufacturing process.
data.target_sentence: Here, as the number of rings increases, focus focusing strength increases, and the number of rings may be appropriately selected and used in consideration of the manufacturing process.

data.source_sentence: 경계조건은 시뮬레이션 영역의 x, y 방향을 따라 완벽하게 일치하는 층(perfectlymatched layer)으로 설정하였고, 그래핀 렌즈를 x 방향으로 놓고 평면파를 −y 방향으로 입사시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: The boundary condition was set as a perfectly matched layer along the x and y directions of the simulation region, and a graphene lens was placed in the x direction and a plane wave was incident in the −y direction.
data.target_sentence: The boundary condition was set as a perfectly matching layer along the x and y directions of the simulation area, and a graphene lens was placed in the x direction and plane waves were incident in the -y direction.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 그래핀의 산란율은 300 K의 온도에서 0.001 eV로 설정하였고, 유리 기판의 파장에 따른 유전율(굴절율) 값들은 Palik의 데이터를 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the scattering rate of graphene was set to 0.001 eV at a temperature of 300 K, and the values of the dielectric constant (refractive index) according to the wavelength of the glass substrate were obtained using the data of Palik.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the scattering rate of graphene was set to 0.001 eV at a temperature of 300 K, and the value of the dielectric constant (refractive index) according to the wavelength of the glass substrate was obtained using the data of Palik.

data.source_sentence: 반사형 FZP 렌즈의 성능은 다층 그래핀의 반사도와 그래핀 전극의 반사도의 대비비에 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The performance of the reflective FZP lens is affected by the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of multilayer graphene and the reflectivity of the graphene electrode.
data.target_sentence: The performance of reflective FZP lenses is affected by the contrast ratio between the reflectance of multilayer graphene and the reflectance of the graphene electrode.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀 전극을 통해 EF가 변화할 때 나타나는 다층 그래핀과 그래핀 전극의 반사도 스펙트럼을 4 μm–30 μm 파장영역에서 살펴보았다.
data.mt_sentence: The reflectivity spectrum of multilayer graphene and graphene electrodes, which is manifested when EF changes through graphene electrodes, was examined in a wavelength range of 4 μm–30 μm.
data.target_sentence: The reflection spectra of multilayer graphene and graphene electrodes, which appear when the EF is changed through the graphene electrode, were investigated in the wavelength range of 4 μm-30 μm.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(a)는 EF가 0 eV 인가될 때 8층 그래핀과 그래핀 전극의 반사도 스펙트럼을 보여주고 있는데, 반사도의 차이는 매우 적으며 반사도 스펙트럼은 유리 기판의 반사도 특성을 그대로 따르게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the reflectivity spectrum of the 8-layer graphene and the graphene electrode when EF is applied to 0 eV. The difference in reflectivity is very small, and the reflectance spectrum follows the reflectivity characteristics of the glass substrate as it is.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the reflectance spectrum of the 8-layer graphene and graphene electrode when EF is applied to 0 eV. The difference in reflectance is very small, and the reflectance spectrum follows the reflectance characteristics of the glass substrate as it is.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(b)에서 보이듯이 1.6 eV의 EF를 인가한 경우에는 8층 그래핀과 그래핀 전극과의 반사도 차이가 대폭 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As illustrated in Fig. 2(b), where 1.6 eV of EF is applied, the difference in reflectivity between the 8-layer graphene and graphene electrodes increases significantly.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 2(b) where an EF of 1.6 eV is applied, the difference in reflectance between the 8-layer graphene electrode and the graphene electrode increases significantly.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 그림 2(c)에 표시된 반사도 대비비 스펙트럼을 통해서 7.22 μm 파장에서 최고의 대비비를 보이며 8.83 μm 파장 부근에서 최소 대비비를 보임을 통해 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be confirmed through the reflectivity contrast ratio spectrum shown in Figure 2(c) by showing the best contrast ratio at the wavelength of 7.22 μm and the minimum contrast ratio near the wavelength of 8.83 μm.
data.target_sentence: This can be confirmed through the reflectivity contrast spectrum as shown in Figure 2(c) as it shows the highest contrast ratio at the 7.22μm wavelength and the smallest contrast ratio near the 8.83μm wavelength.

data.source_sentence: 이 두 곡선이 만나는 지점인 8 μm 부근을 해당 영역에서 최적파장으로 택해서 FZP 렌즈의 초점집속 성능을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The focusing performance of the FZP lens was analyzed by selecting the area around 8 μm, the point where these two curves meet, as the optimal wavelength in the corresponding region.
data.target_sentence: The focusing performance of the FZP lens was analyzed by selecting the area around 8 μm, the point where these two curves meet, as the optimal wavelength for the region.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 층수 및 EF에 따라 초점의 세기가 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The intensity of the focus changes according to the number of graphene layers and EF.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of the focus changes according to the number of graphene layers and EF.

data.source_sentence: 8 μm 파장의 빛이 FZP 렌즈에 입사된 후 반사되어 나오는 회절 광의 초점 집속 성능은 FZP를 구성하고 있는 다층 그래핀의 층수 및 인가된 EF에 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The focusing performance of the reflected diffracted light after 8 μm wavelength light is incident on the FZP lens is affected by the number of layers of multilayer graphene constituting the FZP and the applied EF.
data.target_sentence: After 8 μm wavelength light is incident on the FZP lens, the focusing performance of the reflected diffracted light is affected by the number of layers of multilayer graphene constituting the FZP and the applied EF.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 다층 그래핀의 층수를 변화시켜 가면서 초점 집속 성능을 살펴보았다.
data.mt_sentence: First, focusing performance was examined by changing the number of layers of multilayer graphene.
data.target_sentence: First, the focusing performance was investigated by changing the number of layers of multilayer graphene.

data.source_sentence: 그림3(a)와 그림 3(b)는 4층 그래핀과 8층 그래핀으로 구성된 FZP에 의해 초점거리 240 μm에서 관찰되는 전기장의 세기 분포를 각각 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 3(a) and 3(b) show the intensity distribution of the electric field observed at a focal length of 240 μm by FZP composed of 4-layer graphene and 8-layer graphene, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Figures 3(a) and 3(b) show the electric field intensity distribution observed at a focal length of 240 μm by FZP composed of 4-layer graphene and 8-layer graphene, respectively.

data.source_sentence: FZP의 홀수 번째 환에 놓인 다층 그래핀의 수를 2, 4, 6, 8층으로 증가시킴에 따라서 그림 3(c)와 같이 초점 세기가 3.18에서 18.5 [V2 μm−2]로 선형적으로 증가함을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As the number of multilayer graphene placed in the odd-numbered ring of FZP is increased to 2, 4, 6, and 8 layers, it can be verified that the intensity of focus linearly increases from 3.18 to 18.5 [V2 μm-2], as illustrated in Fig. 3(c).
data.target_sentence: The number of multi-layer graphene placed on the odd-numbered annulus of FZP is increased to 2, 4, 6, and 8 layers. Accordingly, it can be confirmed that the focus intensity increases linearly from 3.18 to 18.5 [V2 μm−2] as shown in Fig. 3(c).

data.source_sentence: 결과는 그래핀의 수나 그래핀에 인가되는 EF에 따라 초점에서의 집속 세기를 용이하게 조절할 수 있음을 보여주며, 이는 그래핀 기반 FZP의 광학 특성(유전율 및 흡수) 변화와 관련되어 있음을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results show that the focusing intensity at the focus can be easily adjusted depending on the number of graphene or the EF applied to the graphene, which is related to the change in the optical properties (permittivity and absorption) of graphene-based FZP. have.
data.target_sentence: As a result, it was shown that the focusing intensity at the focal point can be easily adjusted according to the number of graphenes related to changes in the optical properties (permittivity and absorptivity) of graphene-based FZPs or the EF applied to the graphene.

data.source_sentence: 다층 그래핀 영역과 그래핀 전극 영역 사이의 반사도 대비비와 더불어 아래 놓인 기판과 그래핀 층들에 의한 반사도가 렌즈의 집속 성능에 영향을 주는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be confirmed that the reflectivity by the substrate and the graphene layers placed below affects the focusing performance of the lens, as well as the reflectivity contrast ratio between the multilayer graphene region and the graphene electrode region.
data.target_sentence: It can be confirmed that the reflectance by the substrate and the graphene layer disposed below affects the focusing performance of the lens as well as the reflectance contrast ratio between the multilayer graphene region and the graphene electrode region.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀만으로 구성된 FZP가 렌즈로서 역할을 하므로, 이러한 FZP를 공간적으로 쌓아 올린 구조에 EF를 위치별로 다르게 인가하여 초점거리를 변화시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the FZP composed only of graphene acts as a lens, it is possible to change the focal length by applying different EF for each position to the structure in which these FZPs are spatially stacked.
data.target_sentence: Since the FZP composed only of graphene acts as a lens, it is possible to change the focal length by applying different EF to each location in the spatially stacked structure of these FZPs.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4(a)는 초점거리가 240 μm, 360 μm에 해당하는 서로 다른 FZP를 유리기판 위에 쌓아 올린 구조를 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4(a) shows the structure in which different FZPs with focal lengths of 240 μm and 360 μm are stacked on a glass substrate.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4(a) shows the structure in which different FZPs with focal lengths of 240 μm and 360 μm are laminated on a glass substrate.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 f1과 f2에 동시에 EF = 0 eV를 인가할 경우에는 그림4(b)에 보여지는 전기장의 세기 분포와 같이 초점 형성이 되지 않으며, 관심 영역의 전기장의 세기가 0.25 [V2 μm−2] 이하로 관찰된다.
data.mt_sentence: First, when EF = 0 eV is applied to f1 and f2 at the same time, the focus is not formed, as shown in the intensity distribution of the electric field in Fig. 4(b), and the intensity of the electric field in the region of interest is less than 0.25 [V2 μm-2].
data.target_sentence: First, when EF = 0 eV is applied simultaneously to f1 and f2, the focus is not formed as shown in the distribution of electric field strength shown in Fig. 4(b). And, the strength of the electric field in the region of interest is observed to be less than 0.25 [V2 μm−2].

data.source_sentence: 여기서 초점거리에 따라 FZP의 크기가 다르므로 반경이 큰 360 μm 초점에 해당하는 FZP 렌즈의 세기가 240 μm 초점에 해당하는 FZP 렌즈의 세기보다 높게 관찰된다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, since the size of the FZP is different depending on the focal length, the intensity of the FZP lens corresponding to the 360 μm focal point with a large radius is higher than that of the FZP lens corresponding to the 240 μm focal length.
data.target_sentence: Here, since the size of the FZP varies depending on the focal length, the strength of the FZP lens corresponding to the focal length of 360 μm with a large radius is higher than that of the FZP lens corresponding to the focal length of 240 μm.

data.source_sentence: 원하는 수만큼 그래핀만으로 구성된 FZP를 쌓아 올림으로써 다중 초점을 갖는 초박형 FZP 렌즈를 구현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By stacking FZP composed of only graphene as many times as desired, an ultra-thin FZP lens with multiple focus can be implemented.
data.target_sentence: Multifocal ultra-thin FZP lenses can be realized by stacking as many FZPs composed of only graphene as desired.

data.source_sentence: 공간적으로 쌓아 올린 서로 다른 초점 거리(240 μm, 360 μm)를 갖는 FZP들로 구성된 프레넬 렌즈가 각 층에 인가된 EF에 따라 초점 거리가 조절될 뿐만 아니라 다중 초점 구현이 가능함을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fresnel lenses composed of FZPs with spatially stacked different focal distances (240 μm, 360 μm) showed that the focal length is adjusted according to EF applied to each layer, as well as multi-focus implementation is possible.
data.target_sentence: The Fresnel lens composed of spatially stacked FZPs with different focal lengths (240μm, 360μm) showed that the focal length was adjusted according to the EF applied to each layer, and multifocal realization was possible.

data.source_sentence: 제안된 적층형 FZP 렌즈 구조는 그래핀의 EF 인가 여부에 따라 렌즈 모드 또는 투과/반사 모드로 동작하는 기능을 갖춘 초박형 렌즈 플랫폼으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: The proposed stacked FZP lens structure is expected as an ultra-thin lens platform with the ability to operate in either a lens mode or a transmission/reflection mode depending on whether graphene is EF applied.
data.target_sentence: The proposed stacked FZP lens structure is expected as an ultra-thin lens platform that can operate in lens mode or transmission/reflection mode depending on whether graphene is applied to EF.

data.source_sentence: 광학계는 매우 다양한 용도로 사용되고 있기 때문에 유사한 구성의 광학계에서도 활용 목적과 주어진 광학 사양에 따라 다양한 설계가 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the optical system is used for a wide variety of purposes, even in an optical system with a similar configuration, various designs exist depending on the purpose of application and given optical specifications.
data.target_sentence: Since the optical system is used for a wide variety of purposes, even an optical system with a similar configuration has various designs depending on the application purpose and given optical specifications.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 무차원의 설계변수를 사용하여 광학 사양과 무관하게 광학 설계의 수차 특성을 파악하는 방법을 연구하고, 예시로서 서로 다른 용도와 사양을 가지는 4종의 triplet 설계를 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a method of identifying aberration characteristics of optical design regardless of optical specification using dimensionless design variables was studied, and four types of triplet designs with different uses and specifications were analyzed as examples.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a method to grasp the aberration characteristics of optical designs regardless of optical specifications using dimensionless design variables was studied, and four types of triplet designs with different uses and specifications were analyzed as examples.

data.source_sentence: 광학계는 매우 다양한 용도로 사용되고 있으며, 각각의 광학계는 고유한 활용 목적에 맞추어 특정한 광학 사양을 만족시키면서 수차가 충분하게 보정되어 있을 것이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: Optical systems are used for a wide variety of purposes, and each optical system is required to be sufficiently corrected for aberration while satisfying specific optical specifications for a unique application purpose.
data.target_sentence: Optics serve a wide variety of applications, and each must be sufficiently compensated for aberrations while meeting specific optical specifications for its unique application.

data.source_sentence: 광학 설계자는 경제성을 위하여 최소의 광학소자를 사용하여 주어진 광학 사양을 모두 만족시키면서 수차가 충실하게 보정된 광학계를 설계하여야 하는 책임이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The optical designer is responsible for designing an optical system with a sufficiently corrected aberration while satisfying all given optical specifications using minimal optical elements for economic feasibility.
data.target_sentence: The optical designer is responsible for designing an optical system with sufficiently compensated aberrations while meeting all given optical specifications using a minimum of optical elements for economic feasibility.

data.source_sentence: 책임을 다하기 위해서는 설계의 초기 단계에서 설계 목표의 달성에 가장 적합한 구조를 가지도록 초기 설계를 구성하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to fulfill its responsibilities, the initial design must be constructed to have the most appropriate structure for achieving the design objectives in the early stages of the design.
data.target_sentence: To fulfill that responsibility, the initial design must initially consist of a structure best suited to achieve the design objectives.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서 구조변수를 어떤 광학계의 결상 특성은 직접적으로 나타내지만 물리적 차원이 없는 변수로 정의하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the structural variable is defined as a variable that directly indicates the imaging characteristics of an optical system but has no physical dimension.
data.target_sentence: In this study, structural variables were defined as variables that directly represent the imaging characteristics of an optical system but have no physical dimension.

data.source_sentence: 상측 수치구경(numeri-cal aperture, NA), 주광선의 입사각, 입사동의 반직경과 같은 설계 변수는 물리적 차원을 가지면서 광학 사양을 직접 나타나는 스케일 변수이며, 이들은 사양을 규정하지만 결상의 특성과는 무관하다.
data.mt_sentence: Design variables such as numerical aperture (NA), angle of incidence of chief ray, and radius of entrance pupil are scale variables that have physical dimensions and directly express optical specifications. do.
data.target_sentence: Design variables such as numerical aperture (NA), chief ray incidence angle, and incident pupil radius are scale variables that have physical dimensions and directly express optical specifications.

data.source_sentence: 광학 면의 결상에서 물리적 차원이 없는 구조변수로는 물체 측과 상측 매질의 굴절률 (n, n’)과 분산(δn, δn’), 면의 횡 배율 m과 주광선의 각배율 −p가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Structural variables without physical dimensions in the imaging of the optical plane include refractive indices (n, n') and variance (,n, ),n') of the object side and the top medium, transverse magnification m of the plane, and angular magnification -p of the main ray.
data.target_sentence: In optical plane imaging, the structural parameters without physical dimensions are: the refractive index (n, n') and dispersion (δn, δn') of the object side and the upper medium, the transverse magnification of the plane m and the angular magnification of the chief ray −p.

data.source_sentence: 면의 결상에서 스케일 변수는 여러 가지 조합이 가능하나 이 연구에서는 주변 광선이 면에 입사하는 높이 h와 상측 NA a’(= n’u’), 주광선의 물체 측 NA −a(= n−u)를 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Although various combinations of scale variables are possible in the formation of the surface, this study used the height h at which the surrounding light enters the surface, the upper NAa' (= n'u'), and the object side NA-a (= n-u) at the main light.
data.target_sentence: Although various combinations of scale variables are possible in the formation of the surface, in this study, the height h at which ambient light is incident on the surface, the upper NAa' (= n'u'), and the object-side NA-a (= nu) in the main light.

data.source_sentence: 광학계는 광학면의 집합이며, 각 면에서의 결상이 순차로 중계되어 마지막 광학면에서 전체 광학계의 상을 결상하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The optical system is a collection of optical surfaces, and the images on each surface are sequentially relayed to form an image of the entire optical system on the last optical surface.
data.target_sentence: An optical system is a collection of optical surfaces and the images of each surface are sequentially relayed to the last optical surface to form an image of the entire optical system.

data.source_sentence: 면 하나의 결상에서 주변 광선의 높이 h는 그면의 실제적인 크기를 결정하는 스케일 변수이나, 광학계의 결상에서는 j면에 입사하는 높이 hj는 광학계의 내부구조를 나타내는 구조변수가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the image of a single plane, the height h of the surrounding light beam is a scale variable that determines the actual size of the surface, while in the image of the optical system, the height hj incident on the surface j becomes a structural variable representing the internal structure of the optical system.
data.target_sentence: The height h of the marginal rays in the image of a facet is a scale variable that determines the actual size of that facet. However, in the image formation of the optical system, the incident height hj on the j-plane becomes a structural variable representing the internal structure of the optical system.

data.source_sentence: 이 점을 고려하여 광학계에서는 입사동의 반직경 hE에 대한 hj의 비율 aj (= hj/h_E)를 광학계 구조변수로 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering this point, in the optical system, the ratio aj (= hj/h_E) of hj to the radial diameter of the entrance pupil hE was used as the optical system structural variable.
data.target_sentence: Considering this point, in the optical system, the ratio aj of hj to the radial diameter of the incident pupil hE (=hj/h_E) was used as a structural variable of the optical system.

data.source_sentence: 광학계의 설계 변수를 구조변수와 스케일 변수로 분리하고, 모든 스케일 변수를 1로 정규화하고 구조변수만으로 파면수차를 계산하면 이 파면수차는 광학 사양과 무관하게 광학계의 구조적 특성에만 의존하는 파면수차가 되며, 여기에서는 이를 정규화된 파면수차라고 부르고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the design variables of the optical system are separated into structural variables and scale variables, all scale variables are normalized to 1, and wavefront aberration is calculated using only the structural variables, this wavefront aberration becomes a wavefront aberration that depends only on the structural characteristics of the optical system regardless of optical specifications. , we will call this normalized wavefront aberration here.
data.target_sentence: If the design variables of the optical system are divided into structural variables and scale variables, all scale variables are normalized to 1, and wavefront aberration is calculated using only the structural variables, this wavefront aberration becomes a wavefront aberration that depends only on structural characteristics. It is referred to here as normalized wavefront aberration because the maximum aberration of the optical system occurs regardless of the optical specification.

data.source_sentence: 실제 광학계의 파면수차는 정규화된 파면수차가 광학 사양을 나타내는 스케일 변수에 의하여 스케일링되어 나타나게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The wavefront aberration of the actual optical system appears by scaling the normalized wavefront aberration by a scale variable representing the optical specification.
data.target_sentence: Represents the wavefront aberration of real-world optical systems by scaling the normalized wavefront aberration by a scale variable representing the optical specification.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 구조변수만을 사용하여 정규화된 3차 파면수차를 해석적으로 유도하고, 이 수차가 실제 광학계의 수차가 되도록 스케일해주는 scale factor를 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study defined a scale factor that induces a normalized tertiary wavefront aberration analytically using only structural variables and scales this aberration to become an aberration of the actual optical system.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a scale factor that analytically induces the normalized third-order wavefront aberration using only structural variables was defined, and the aberration was scaled to become the aberration of the actual optical system.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서 면의 횡 배율은 광학계의 3차 파면수차를 해석하는 중요한 구조변수이다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the lateral magnification of the plane is an important structural variable to analyze the third-order wavefront aberration of the optical system.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the lateral magnification of the plane is an important structural variable in analyzing the third-order wavefront aberration of the optical system.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 광학면의 횡 배율을 변수로 사용하여 광학계의 3차수차를 해석적으로 보정하는 방법은 설계 변수가 비교적 적은 반사광학계의 초기설계에서 이미 널리 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, the method of analytically correcting the tertiary aberration of the optical system using the transverse magnification of the optical surface as a variable is already widely used in the initial design of the reflective optical system with relatively few design parameters.
data.target_sentence: As described above, the method of analytically correcting the tertiary aberration of the optical system using the lateral magnification of the optical surface as a variable has been widely used in the initial design of the reflective optical system with relatively few design parameters.

data.source_sentence: 1972년 AAA는 원추곡면 3반사광학계의 3차 수차를 물체의 횡 배율과 동의 횡 배율로 표현하고, 이를 이용하여 구면수차, 코마, 비점수차, 상면만곡이 보정된 해를 얻는 방법을 제시한 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In 1972, AAA expressed the tertiary aberration of the conical curved three-reflective optical system at the transverse magnification and the equivalent transverse magnification of the object, and suggested a method to obtain a corrected solution for spherical aberration, koma, astigmatism, and top curvature.
data.target_sentence: In 1972, AAA proposed a method to express the third-order aberration of a conical curved trireflection optics in terms of the transverse magnification and equivalent transverse magnification of the object, and obtain correction solutions for spherical aberration, coma, astigmatism and maximum curvature.

data.source_sentence: 이들 연구에서 광학계의 각 면에서 발생하는 3차 수차를 횡 배율의 함수로 표현한 것은 이 연구와 유사한 점이다.
data.mt_sentence: In these studies, the tertiary aberration occurring on each side of the optical system was expressed as a function of the lateral magnification, which is similar to this study.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the tertiary aberration occurring on each side of the optical system was expressed as a function of the lateral magnification, which is similar to this study.

data.source_sentence: 이들 연구는 반사광학계에서 3차 수차가 보정된 해를 얻는 것에 목적이 있었기에 조리개의 위치는 제1면에 고정된 것으로 가정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since these studies aimed to obtain a solution corrected for third-order aberration in the reflective optical system, the position of the diaphragm was assumed to be fixed on the first plane.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1은 물체 측 매질의 굴절률이 n, 상측 매질의 굴절률이 n’이고 곡률반경이 r인 광학 면에서 물체 h가 상 h’로 결상하고, 입사동 −h가 출사동 −h’으로 결상하는 것을 보여주고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 광학계는 매우 다양한 용도로 활용되고 있어 유사한 구성의 광학계도 사용 목적에 따라 f-수, 유효초점거리, 시야 등 광학 사양 뿐만 아니라 렌즈의 배치나 크기, 사용하는 소재가 다른여러 가지 설계가 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the optical system is used for a wide variety of purposes, optical systems with similar configurations have various designs with different arrangements, sizes, and materials used, as well as optical specifications such as f-number, effective focal length, and field of view.
data.target_sentence: Because optical systems are used for so many different purposes, even optical systems of similar construction have different designs with different arrangements, sizes, and materials used, and optical specifications such as f-numbers, effective focal lengths, and viewing angles.

data.source_sentence: 구조적 특성에서 발생하는 고유한 수차는 광학 사양과 무관하므로 사양이 다른 광학계에서도 구조적인 특성의 비교에 활용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Intrinsic aberrations occurring in structural properties are independent of optical specifications, so it can be used for comparison of structural properties even in optical systems with different specifications.
data.target_sentence: Since natural aberrations occurring in structural properties are independent of optical specifications, they can be used to compare structural properties in optical systems with different specifications.

data.source_sentence: 무차원의 구조변수로부터 계산되는 파면수차는 단위가 없는 물리량이며, 이는 광학 사양을 나타내는 스케일 변수가 모두 +1로 정규화된 광학계의 파면수차이다.
data.mt_sentence: The wavefront aberration calculated from the dimensionless structural variable is a unitless physical quantity, which is the wavefront aberration of the optical system in which all scale variables representing optical specifications are normalized to +1.
data.target_sentence: The wavefront aberration calculated from the dimensionless structural variable is a unitless physical quantity, and it is the wavefront aberration of the optical system in which all scale variables representing optical specifications are normalized to +1.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 이를 정규화된 파면수차라고 부르고 있으며, 구면으로 구성된 광학계에서 Seidel 수차이론에 기반하여 정규화된 파면수차를 해석적으로 유도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, this is called normalized wavefront aberration, and normalized wavefront aberration is analytically derived based on Seidel's aberration theory in a spherical optical system.
data.target_sentence: In this study, this is called normalized wavefront aberration, and the normalized wavefront aberration is derived analytically based on Seidel's aberration theory in spherical optical systems.

data.source_sentence: 실제 광학계의 파면수차는 무차원의 정규화된 파면수차가 광학 사양을 나타내는 스케일변수에 의하여 스케일되어 나타나며, 이 연구에서 광학계의 스케일 변수는 입사동의 반직경, 주변 광선의 상측 수치구경, 주광선의 물체 측 수치구경을 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The wavefront aberration of the actual optical system is shown by scaling the dimensionless normalized wavefront aberration by the scale variable representing the optical specification. In this study, the scale variables of the optical system used the diameter of the incident, the upper diameter of the surrounding light, and the object-side diameter of the main light.
data.target_sentence: Wavefront aberrations in real optical systems are represented by scaling the dimensionless normalized wavefront aberration with a scale variable representing the optical specification. In this study, as the scale variables of the optical system, the incident diameter, the upper diameter of the ambient light, and the diameter of the object side of the main light were used.

data.source_sentence: 이 경우에는 상이나 입사동이 무한대에 있어도 발산하지 않는 구조변수를 사용하여 파면수차를 해석하는 방법이 별도로 연구되어야 할 것으로 본다.

data.source_sentence: 다음으로 EMF 기본한계 노출량 평가를 위해 등가 코일로부터 다양한 거리에 위치한 인체 모델에 유도되는 전류밀도를 시뮬레이션 소프트웨어를 이용하여 계산하였다.

data.source_sentence: 최근 가정에서 유도가열 조리기(인덕션 레인지)의 보급과 사용이 늘어나고 있다.

data.source_sentence: ICNIRP 등의 국제기구에서 제정한 전자기장 인체보호 기준에서 정의하고 있는 노출 기준은 크게 기본한계(basic restrictions)와 기준레벨(reference levels)로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Exposure standards defined in the electromagnetic field protection standards established by international organizations such as ICNIRP can be broadly divided into basic restrictions and reference levels.
data.target_sentence: Exposure standards stipulated in the electromagnetic wave protection standards established by international organizations such as ICNIRP can be divided into basic restrictions and reference levels.

data.source_sentence: 기준 레벨은 실용적인 노출량 평가를 위해 인체가 위치할 자유공간에서 측정한 전기장/자기장 강도, 전력밀도 등 기본 한계보다 측정이 용이한 물리량으로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The reference level is defined as a physical quantity that is easier to measure than basic limits such as electric/magnetic field strength and power density measured in a free space where the human body will be located for practical exposure evaluation.
data.target_sentence: Reference levels are defined as physical quantities that are easier to measure than basic limits, such as electric/magnetic field strength and power density, measured in free space where the human body will be located for actual exposure evaluation.

data.source_sentence: 기준 레벨은 그 적용이 간단하여 전자기장 인체노출량평가에 널리 쓰이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the reference level is simple to apply, it is widely used in evaluating the amount of human exposure of electromagnetic fields.

data.source_sentence: 인체유도전류밀도는 수치해석 기반의 시뮬레이션 소프트웨어를 이용하여 계산하고 그 결과를 바탕으로 노출량을 평가하는 접근방법을 취하는 것이 일반적이다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 국내에서 시판되고 있는 유도가열 조리기 주변의 다양한 위치에서 자기장을 측정하고 EMF 인체보호 기준의 기준레벨 노출 제한값과 비교하였다.

data.source_sentence: 고려한 모든 거리에서 등가 코일에 의한 자기장이 실측한 자기장보다 크도록 하여 보수적인 인체 노출량 평가가 가능하게 하였다.

data.source_sentence: 다음으로 EMF 기본 한계 노출량 평가를 위해 등가 코일로부터 다양한 거리에 위치한 인체 모델에 유도되는 전류밀도를 시뮬레이션 소프트웨어를 이용하여 해석하였다.

data.mt_sentence: From the analysis results, the current density for each major tissue and organ of the human body was calculated and compared with the basic limit exposure limit value of the human body protection standard.

data.source_sentence: 프로브가 위치할 수 있는 가장 낮은 위치에서 측정을 시작하고 프로브의 높이 h를 5 cm씩 증가시키면서 iv), v)의 과정을 반복하며 최대 자속밀도가 측정되는 높이 h를 기록한다.

data.source_sentence: 수평거리 d를 조정하고 iii)부터 과정을 반복한다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 자기장 측정, 등가 소스 모델링에서 고조파는 무시하고 기본파의 영향만 고려하였다.

data.source_sentence: 노출지수는 ICNIRP 1998 인체보호 기준에서 지정하고 있는 일반인의 자속밀도 기준레벨 노출 제한값(28 kHz에서 6.25 T) 대비 실제 측정된 자속밀도의 비율을 나타낸다.

data.source_sentence: Worst-case 노출 상황을 고려하여 측면 거리 d = 10 cm에서 측정한 자속밀도는 인체보호 기준을 초과하는 것으로 나타났으나 이러한 노출상황은 극히 제한적이며 대부분의 실제 사용환경에서는 자속밀도 기준레벨을 만족하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the Worst-case exposure situation, the magnetic flux density measured at the lateral distance d = 10 cm exceeded the human protection standard, but this exposure situation is extremely limited and the magnetic flux density reference level is satisfied in most practical environments.
data.target_sentence: Considering the worst-case exposure, the measured magnetic flux density at a lateral distance d = 10 cm exceeds the human protection standard, but this exposure situation is extremely limited and meets the magnetic flux density threshold in most real-world environments.

data.source_sentence: 그럼에도 불구하고 기준레벨을 초과하는 일부 상황에 대해서는 1장에서 설명한 바와 같이 등가 코일과 인체모델을 이용하여 인체전류밀도를 해석하고 기본 한계 노출량을 확인할 필요가 있는 것을 알 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 본 장에서는 유도가열 조리기에서 측정한 자기장 분포로부터 등가 코일을 도출하는 과정에 대해 설명한다.
data.mt_sentence: This chapter describes the process of deriving an equivalent coil from the magnetic field distribution measured in an induction cooker.
data.target_sentence: This chapter describes the process of deriving an equivalent coil from the measured magnetic field distribution in an induction cooker.

data.source_sentence: 유도가열 조리기의 등가 소스를 원형 코일로 가정할 경우 Fig. 3에 나타낸 원형 코일에 의한 측정점 p에서의 자속밀도는 r >> r' 일 경우자기 쌍극자 모멘트로부터 다음과 같이 근사할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 차폐 재료와 조리 용기 등 강자성체를 고려할 수 있는 전자기장 해석 소프트웨어에서는 조직별로 세분화된 해부학적 인체 모델의 적용이 어렵기 때문에 균일하거나 간략화한 조직분포를 가진 등가 인체 모델을 사용해야 한다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 전자기 해석이 아닌 기본 한계 인체 노출량 평가에서는 자기장 발생원(코일) 주변의 세부적인 자기장 분포보다 인체 모델링과 실제 인체가 위치할 공간의 자기장 분포가 더 중요하다.

data.source_sentence: 앞에서 설명한 바와 같이 기준레벨과 기본 한계 중 기본 한계가 더 근본적인 노출기준이므로 기준레벨(실측 자속밀도)이 노출 제한값을 초과하더라도 기본 한계(인체전류밀도)가 노출 제한값보다 작으면 인체보호기준을 만족하는 것으로 판정한다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 가정용 유도가열 조리기의 기본 한계 인체노출량 평가를 위해 유도가열 조리기 주변의 다양한 위치에서 자기장을 측정하고 이를 기반으로 자기 쌍극자 모멘트 수식을 이용하여 유도가열 조리기의 등가 코일을 도출하였다.

data.source_sentence: 시뮬레이션 소프트웨어에 등가 코일을 적용하여 다양한 거리에서 인체 모델의 유도전류밀도를 해석하였다.

data.mt_sentence: The induced current density was the highest in the bladder, where the path of the induced current was close to the equivalent coil and the path of the induced current was increased, and at a distance d = 10 cm, the induced current density of the main organ and tissue was calculated to be 0.84~20.67 mA/m2.
data.target_sentence: The induced current density was highest in the bladder, where the path of the induced current increased as the path of the induced current was closer to the equivalent coil, and at a distance d = 10 cm, the induced current density of the main organ and tissue was calculated to be 0.84~20.67 mA/m2.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 도출한 유도가열 조리기의 기본 한계 인체노출량 평가 결과는 향후 IF 대역 생활환경 노출 매트릭스 개발에 활용될 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is expected that the basic marginal human exposure evaluation results of induction heating cookers derived in this paper can be utilized for the development of IF band living environment exposure matrix in the future.
data.target_sentence: The basic human exposure evaluation results of induction heating cookers derived in this paper are expected to be utilized in the future development of the IF band living environment exposure matrix.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 과학기술정보통신부 및 정보통신기획평가원의 정보통신·방송 연구개발사업의 일환으로 수행하였다[2019-0-00102, 복합 전파환경에서의 국민건강 보호기반 구축].
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted as part of the information and communication and broadcasting R&D project of the Ministry of Science and ICT and the Information and Communication Planning and Evaluation Institute.
data.target_sentence: This study was conducted as part of the information communication and broadcasting R&D project of the Ministry of Science and ICT and the Information and Communication Planning and Evaluation Institute.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 차량용 에코페달 시스템 구동을 위한 보이스 코일 모터(VCM)의 설계 및 해석결과를 기술하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper describes the design and analysis results of the voice coil motor (VCM) for driving the vehicle eco-pedal system.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the design and analysis results of the voice coil motor (VCM) for driving the vehicle eco-pedal system are described.

data.source_sentence: 저연비 차량의 과도한 연료소모를 방지하기 위해 액추에이터는 차량의 페달에 반작용을 일으켜 차량이 가속되지 않도록 하여 연비를 향상시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to prevent excessive fuel consumption of the low fuel economy vehicle, the actuator may counteract the vehicle's pedal to prevent the vehicle from accelerating, thereby improving fuel efficiency.
data.target_sentence: In order to prevent excessive fuel consumption of the fuel-efficient vehicle, the actuator may improve fuel efficiency by preventing acceleration of the vehicle in response to a pedal of the vehicle.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 에코페달에 적용할 엑추에이터로서, VCM을 제시하고 요구되는 고출력 밀도를 만족하도록 자기회로를 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper presents a VCM as an actuator to be applied to an eco-pedal and designs a magnetic circuit to satisfy the required high power density.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we present VCM as an actuator to be applied to eco-pedal and design a magnetic circuit to satisfy the required high power density.

data.source_sentence: VCM은 축 대칭구조를 가지고 있어 등가의 2차원 축 대칭해석이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since VCM has an axisymmetric structure, an equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis is possible.
data.target_sentence: Since VCM has an axisymmetric structure, an equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis is possible.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 VCM 추력의 해석 및 설계기법으로서, 2차원 축 대칭 해석방법을 사용하였으며, 그 설계 및 해석결과를 실험을 통하여 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis method was used as an analysis and design technique of VCM thrust, and the design and analysis results were verified through experiments.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, a two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis technique was used as a VCM thrust analysis and design technique, and the design and analysis results were verified through experiments.

data.source_sentence: 지구온난화와 석유 자원의 고갈에 의해 에너지소비를 줄이 기 위한 많은 노력들이 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Many efforts are being made to reduce energy consumption due to global warming and depletion of petroleum resources.
data.target_sentence: Due to global warming and depletion of oil resources, many efforts are being made to reduce energy consumption.

data.source_sentence: 특히 석유 자원의 사용 및 온난화의 주된 원인인 이산화탄소 배출의 많은 부분이 내연기관의 동력으로 움직이는 자동차가 발생시키고 있어 자동차의 연비 개선이 최근 들어 자동차 개발의 가장 핵심적인 부분이 되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, the use of petroleum resources and a large portion of carbon dioxide emissions, the main cause of global warming, are generated by automobiles powered by internal combustion engines.
data.target_sentence: In particular, a large portion of carbon dioxide emission, which is the main cause of the use of petroleum resources and global warming, is generated by vehicles powered by internal combustion engines. Therefore, improving the fuel efficiency of automobiles has recently become the most important part of automobile development.

data.source_sentence: 이를 위해 기존 운전자의 습관에서만 작동되던 수동형 가속페달을 운전자의 운전습관을 개선하도록 유도할 수 있는 능동형 가속페달로 교체하여 연비를 향상시키는 연구가 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To this end, research is being conducted to improve fuel efficiency by replacing the passive accelerator pedal, which was operated only in the habit of the existing driver, with an active accelerator pedal that can induce the driver to improve the driving habit.
data.target_sentence: To this end, research is being conducted to improve fuel efficiency by replacing the passive accelerator pedal, which was operated only as a driver's habit, with an active accelerator pedal that can induce improvement in the driver's driving habits.

data.source_sentence: 페달 시스템의 구조상 회전형보다는 직접적인 직선운동이 가능한 직선형의 단순구조 모터가 적합하며, 이러한 구조의 하나로서 보이스 코일형 모터(Voice CoilMotor, VCM)가 좋은 해결책이 될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the structure of the pedal system, a straight-line simple structure motor capable of direct straight movement is better than a rotary type, and a voice coil motor (VCM) may be a good solution as one of the structures.
data.target_sentence: As for the structure of the pedal system, a linear simple structure motor capable of direct linear motion is better than a rotational type, and a voice coil motor (VCM) may be a good solution as one of the structures.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 차량의 페달에 장착하여 직접적인 직선운동을 전달할 수 있는 보이스 코일형 모터의 해석과 설계에 대해서 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the analysis and design of a voice coil type motor that can be mounted on the pedal of a vehicle to transmit direct linear motion was studied.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the analysis and design of a voice coil type motor that can directly transmit linear motion by attaching it to the pedal of a vehicle was studied.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 엑추에이터의 디텐트력을 근본적으로 제거하기 위해서 코어가 없는 보이스 코일형의 리니어모터(VCM) 적용을 채택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research adopted the application of a voice coil type linear motor (VCM) without a core to fundamentally remove the detent force of the actuator.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a coreless voice coil type linear motor (VCM) was applied to fundamentally remove the stopping force of the actuator.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 공극은 제작 가능한 최소길이로 설정하고 자연냉각을 고려하여 전류밀도는 평균 10(A/mm2)를 넘지 않도록 하고, 순시값 20(A/mm2)를 넘지 않도록 설계사양을 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The air gap of the VCM is set to the minimum length that can be manufactured, and the current density is not to exceed an average of 10 (A/mm2) in consideration of natural cooling, and the design specifications are set so that the instantaneous value does not exceed 20 (A/mm2).
data.target_sentence: The air gap of VCM is set to the minimum length that can be manufactured, the current density should not exceed 10(A/mm2) on average considering natural cooling, and the value should not exceed 20(A/mm2).

data.source_sentence: 제약된 공간을 고려하여 설계한 VCM이 요구되는 추력을 만족하는지 확인하기 위해서 2차원 유한요소법을 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The two-dimensional finite element method was used to check whether the VCM designed considering the limited space satisfies the required thrust.
data.target_sentence: The two-dimensional finite element method was used to check whether the VCM designed considering the limited space satisfies the required thrust.

data.source_sentence: 기본적으로 VCM 설계를 위해서는 영구자석의 형태를 먼저 결정하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Basically, it is important to determine the shape of the permanent magnet first for the VCM design.
data.target_sentence: Basically, for VCM design, it is important to first determine the shape of the permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 링형 형태의 구조를 채택하여 요구추력을 확보하도록 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It is designed to secure the required thrust by adopting the ring-type structure.
data.target_sentence: It is designed to secure the required thrust by adopting a ring-type structure.

data.source_sentence: VCM 극 수 선정에 있어서는 단극으로 갈 경우에는 자속의 귀환경로를 위한 요크가 두꺼워져야 하는 점을 고려하여 설계해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In case of selecting the number of VCM poles, it should be designed in consideration of the fact that the yoke for the return path of magnetic flux should be thickened when going to a single pole.
data.target_sentence: When selecting the number of poles of the VCM, it should be designed considering that the yoke for the return path of magnetic flux should be thickened when going to a single pole.

data.source_sentence: 추력에 영향을 미치는 유효한 면적이 줄어드는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: There is a disadvantage in that the effective area affecting thrust is reduced.
data.target_sentence: There is a disadvantage in that the effective area that affects the thrust decreases.

data.source_sentence: 한편 2극의 경우에는 자극변화에 따라 코일의 움직일 수 있는 변위에 제약이 생기게 되므로 스트로크가 길어지면 급격하게 추력이 감소할 수 있음을 고려해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, in the case of two poles, it is necessary to consider that the thrust may be sharply reduced if the stroke is long because the movable displacement of the coil is restricted according to the change of magnetic pole.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in the case of two poles, it is necessary to consider that the thrust may be rapidly reduced if the stroke is long because the movement displacement of the coil is limited according to the change of the magnetic pole.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 권선기자력을 증가시키기 위해서 권선의 단면적을 증가시키면 유효공극이 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the cross-sectional area of the winding is increased to increase the winding magnetic force of the VCM, the effective air gap is increased.
data.target_sentence: Increasing the cross-sectional area of the winding to increase the winding magnetic force of the VCM increases the effective air gap.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 l과 N은 코일의 길이와 유효턴 수를 나타내며, I는 전류, Bg는 영구자석에 의한 공극자속밀도이다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, l and N represent the length of the coil and the number of effective turns, I is the current, and Bg is the air gap flux density by the permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: where l and N are the coil length and effective number of turns, I is the current, and Bg is the air gap flux density by the permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 코일의 요크철심과 이동자철심의 자기회로 포화를 고려한 공극자속밀도 계산은 해석모델의 3차원 문제를 축 대칭 문제로 간략화하여 해석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The air gap flux density calculation considering the saturation of the magnetic circuit of the yoke core of the coil and the moving magnet core was analyzed by simplifying the three-dimensional problem of the analysis model as an axial symmetry problem.
data.target_sentence: The air gap magnetic flux density calculation considering the saturation of the magnetic circuit of the coil's yoke core and moving magnetic core was analyzed by simplifying the three-dimensional problem of the analysis model into an axisymmetric problem.

data.source_sentence: 공극의 자속밀도는 좌표계의 전계식으로부터 다음과 같이 나타낼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic flux density of the air gap can be expressed as follows from the electric field equation of the coordinate system.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic flux density of the air gap can be expressed as follows from the electric field equation of the coordinate system.

data.source_sentence: 여기서, Ar, Aθ, Az 각 방향의 자기벡터포텐셜, J0는 전류밀도, r은 축과 위치와의 거리, r0e는 각요소의 축반경 평균값이다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the magnetic vector potential in each of Ar, Aθ, and Az directions, J0 is the current density, r is the distance between the axis and the position, and r0e is the average value of the axis radius of each element.
data.target_sentence: Here, the magnetic vector potential in each of Ar, Aθ, and Az directions, J0 is the current density, r is the distance between the axis and the position, and r0e is the average value of the axis radius of each element.

data.source_sentence: 원통형 VCM은 등가 2차원 축대칭 해석이 가능하므로 설계와 해석측면에서도 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since cylindrical VCM is capable of equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis, it has advantages in terms of design and analysis.
data.target_sentence: Cylindrical VCM has advantages in terms of design and analysis because it enables equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric analysis.

data.source_sentence: 원통형 VCM은 추력밀도를 증대하기 위해서 영구자석 재질은 Nd42SH을 사용하며, 영구자석의 착자방향은 이방성착자를 하도록 초기설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to increase the thrust density of the cylindrical VCM, the permanent magnet material is Nd42SH, and the magnetization direction of the permanent magnet is initially designed to perform anisotropic magnetization.
data.target_sentence: To increase the thrust density of the cylindrical VCM, the permanent magnet material is Nd42SH, and the magnetization direction of the permanent magnet is initially designed to perform anisotropic magnetization.

data.source_sentence: 영구자석을 이방성으로 착자하기 위해서는 별도의 소결금형 제작이 필요하며, 방사방향에 영구자석 이방성 착자에 대한 많은 경험을 요구한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to anisotropically magnetize a permanent magnet, it is necessary to manufacture a separate sintering die, and it requires a lot of experience in the anisotropic magnetizing of a permanent magnet in the radial direction.
data.target_sentence: In order to anisotropically magnetize a permanent magnet, a separate sintering mold must be manufactured, and a lot of experience is required to anisotropically magnetize a permanent magnet in the radial direction.

data.source_sentence: 실질적으로 본 연구에서는 프로토타입 VCM 제작을 위해서 영구자석의 이방성착자에 대한 비용과 착자방향 착오에 대한 설계오차를 줄이기 위해서 평판형 이방성 자석을 가공하여 8개의 세그먼트 영구자석을 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Practically, in this study, 8 segment permanent magnets were used by processing flat anisotropic magnets in order to reduce the cost of anisotropic magnetization of permanent magnets and design errors due to errors in the direction of magnetization for the production of a prototype VCM.
data.target_sentence: Practically, in this study, an 8-segment permanent magnet was used by processing a planar anisotropic magnet to reduce the anisotropic magnetization cost and design error of the permanent magnet due to the error in the magnetization direction for producing a circular VCM.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 길이는 이동자가 최대 스트로크일 때, 전체의 길이가 있을 때의 길이가 60(mm)가 되도록 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The length of the VCM was designed to be 60 (mm) when the mover has the maximum stroke and the total length.
data.target_sentence: The length of the VCM is designed to be 60 (mm) when the mover has maximum stroke and overall length.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 추력은 실질적으로 스트로크의 길이에 따라 결정되며, 스트로크가 길수록 VCM의 추력은 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: The thrust of the VCM is substantially determined by the length of the stroke, and the longer the stroke, the less the thrust of the VCM.
data.target_sentence: The thrust of the VCM is effectively determined by the length of the stroke, the longer the stroke, the smaller the thrust of the VCM.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 2극의 VCM을 영구자석 극성과 권선의 전류방향을 고려하여 안정적인 추력을 낼수 있도록 고정자 길이를 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research designed a stator length so that a two-pole VCM could produce stable thrust in consideration of the permanent magnet polarity and the current direction of the winding.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the stator length was designed so that the two-pole VCM could produce stable thrust by considering the polarity of the permanent magnet and the current direction of the winding.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 추력을 결정하는 또 하나의 요소는 권선기자력이다.
data.mt_sentence: Another factor that determines the thrust of the VCM is the winding magnetic force.
data.target_sentence: Another factor that determines the thrust of the VCM is the winding magnetic force.

data.source_sentence: 요구되는 추력을 만족하도록 권선기자력이 정해지면 권선의 단멱적을 설계해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the winding magnetic force is determined to satisfy the required thrust, the short power product of the winding should be designed.
data.target_sentence: Once the winding magnetic force is determined to satisfy the required thrust, a short power product of the windings must be designed.

data.source_sentence: 권선의 단면적은 전류밀도를 고려해야 하며, 권선의 권회수는 점적률을 고려해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The cross-sectional area of the winding should consider the current density, and the number of turns of the winding should consider the space factor.
data.target_sentence: The cross-sectional area of the winding should take into account the current density and the number of turns should consider the spatial factor.

data.source_sentence: 권선의 점적률은 권선의 단면적과 권회수를 결정하는 중요한 설계기준가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The drop rate of windings is an important design criterion for determining the cross-sectional area and the number of windings.
data.target_sentence: The drop rate of a winding is an important design criterion that determines the cross-sectional area and number of turns.

data.source_sentence: VCM의 냉각조건이나 운전조건에 따라 전류밀도를 선정해야 하며, 일반적으로, 자연냉각 시에는 5~10(A/mm2) 이내의 평균 전류밀도를 설정하며, 순간적인 동작에서는 최대 전류밀도를 20(A/mm2) 이내로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A current density shall be selected according to a cooling condition or an operating condition of a VCM, and in general, an average current density within 5–10 (A/mm2) is set during natural cooling, and a maximum current density is set within 20 (A/mm2) in an instantaneous operation.
data.target_sentence: The current density must be selected according to the cooling or operating conditions of the VCM, and in general, the average current density within 5 to 10 (A/mm2) is set for natural cooling. And, in the instantaneous operation, the maximum current density was set within 20 (A/mm2).

data.source_sentence: VCM 극 수는 스트로크를 고려하면 실질적으로 2극이 최대 한계이다.
data.mt_sentence: As for the number of VCM poles, considering the stroke, 2 poles is practically the maximum limit.
data.target_sentence: Considering the stroke in the number of VCM poles, 2 poles is the maximum limit.

data.source_sentence: 영구자석 2극을 이동자로 하여 최대 스트로크 구간에서 자석과 코일의 전류방향에 따라 역방향의 추력이 발생하지 않도록 이동자의 길이에 제한을 두어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: With two permanent magnets as the movers, the length of the movers shall be limited to prevent reverse thrust from occurring along the current direction of the magnets and coils in the maximum stroke section.
data.target_sentence: With two permanent magnets as movers, the length of the mover should be limited so that reverse thrust does not occur along the current direction of the magnet and coil in the maximum stroke section.

data.source_sentence: 영구자석을 이동자로 만드는 것이 영구자석의 길이 변화가 용이하고 제작에도 유리하므로, 본 연구에서는 영구자석 이동자 구조로 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, permanent magnet mover structure was designed because it is easy to change the length of permanent magnet and is advantageous in manufacturing.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the permanent magnet mover structure was designed because it is easy to change the length of the permanent magnet and is advantageous in manufacturing.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 프로토 타입 VCM 구조를 나타내고 있으며, Fig. 2는 설계된 프로토 타입 VCM을 해석하기 위한 2차 등가 축대칭 해석 모델링과 등포텐셜 자속선도 해석결과를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1 shows the prototype VCM structure, and Fig. 2 shows the results of the second-order equivalent axisymmetric analysis model and the equivalent magnetic flux line analysis for analyzing the designed prototype VCM.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the prototype VCM structure, and Figure 2 shows the second-order equivalent axisymmetric analysis model for analyzing the designed prototype VCM and the equivalent magnetic flux line analysis results.

data.source_sentence: 설계된 코일의 단면적으로부터 영구자석의 내경과 외경을 결정하고 영구자석의 자화방향길이는 철심의 자기포화를 고려하여 설계하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The inner and outer diameters of the permanent magnet are determined from the cross-sectional area of the designed coil, and the length of the permanent magnet in the magnetization direction is designed in consideration of the magnetic saturation of the iron core.
data.target_sentence: The inner and outer diameters of permanent magnets are determined from the cross-sectional area of the designed coil, and the length of the permanent magnet in the magnetization direction is designed in consideration of the magnetic saturation of the iron core.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3에는 최대 전류밀도에서 VCM의 추력특성 해석결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3 shows the results of the thrust characteristics analysis of VCM at the maximum current density.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the analysis results of the thrust characteristics of VCM at the maximum current density.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 VCM 추력에 유효하게 작용하는 방향의 공극자속밀도 분포를 나타내고 있으며, Fig. 5는 정지 시 VCM 내의 자속밀도 분포를 나타내고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the pore magnetic flux density distribution in the direction that effectively acts on the VCM thrust, and Fig. 5 shows the magnetic flux density distribution in the VCM at stop.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the pore flux density distribution in the direction effectively acting on the VCM thrust, and Figure 5 shows the magnetic flux density distribution in the VCM at rest.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 VCM은 디텐트력이 0이 되어야 하지만 설계된 모델의 경우는 선형전동기에서 나타나는 단부효과가 존재하기 때문에 이동자의 스트로크 양끝단에서 흡인력이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, the detent force of the VCM should be 0, but in the case of the designed model, the suction force occurs at both ends of the stroke of the mover because the end effect that appears in the linear motor exists.
data.target_sentence: In general, the stopping force of the VCM should be zero, but in the designed model, there is an end effect that appears in a linear motor, so the suction force occurs at both ends of the mover's stroke.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6은 설계된 VCM의 단부효과특성을 고려한 디텐트력 해석결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 6 shows the results of detent force analysis considering the end effect characteristics of the designed VCM.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 6 shows the detent force analysis results considering the final effect characteristics of the designed VCM.

data.source_sentence: 설계된 프로토타입 VCM의 구조적인 문제로 기인하는 단부효과는 VCM의 이동자가 최대 스트로크로 다가갈수록 발생 추력을 감소시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The end effect caused by the structural problem of the designed prototype VCM reduces the thrust generated as the mover of the VCM approaches the maximum stroke.
data.target_sentence: The final effect of the designed prototype VCM's structural problems is to reduce the thrust generated as the VCM's mover approaches its maximum stroke.

data.source_sentence: 일정한 추력 특성을 얻기 위해서는 구동회로에서 흡인력과 반대방향의 추력을 발생시켜 단부효과를 상쇄할 수 있는 전류제어 알고리즘 적용이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: To obtain constant thrust characteristics, it is required to apply a current control algorithm that can offset an end effect by generating thrust in the opposite direction to the suction force in the driving circuit.
data.target_sentence: In order to obtain a constant thrust characteristic, it is necessary to apply a current control algorithm that can cancel the final effect by generating thrust in the opposite direction to the suction force in the driving circuit.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 전류밀도 10(A/mm2)가 되도록 일정한 전류를 인가하여 VCM 이동자의 스트로크 변화에 따른 추력특성 해석결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the results of thrust characteristics analysis according to the stroke change of the VCM movers by applying a constant current to have a current density of 10 (A/mm2).
data.target_sentence: Fig. 7 shows the result of analyzing the thrust characteristics according to the stroke change of the VCM mover by applying a constant current so that the current density becomes 10 (A/mm2).

data.source_sentence: 실질적으로 VCM 이동자가 1(m/s)의 속도로 이동할 경우에는 철심에서 발생하는 와전류의 영향으로 발생추력은 해석결과보다 작을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, when the VCM mover moves at a speed of 1 (m/s), the generated thrust may be smaller than the analysis result due to the influence of the eddy current generated in the iron core.
data.target_sentence: In fact, the thrust generated when the VCM mover moves at a speed of 1 (m/s) may be smaller than the analysis result due to the effect of eddy currents generated in the iron core.

data.source_sentence: 프로토 타입 VCM의 구동시험은 단상 여자방식으로 일정한 전압을 인가하고, 이동자의 위치는 홀신호를 이용하는 DC정전류 제어를 통하여 발생추력 특성시험을 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the driving test of the prototype VCM, a constant voltage was applied in a single-phase excitation method, and the position of the mover was tested for the thrust characteristics through DC constant current control using a Hall signal.
data.target_sentence: In the driving test of the prototype VCM, a constant voltage was applied in a single-phase excitation method, and the thrust characteristics were tested by controlling the DC constant current using the Hall signal.

data.source_sentence: 프로토 타입 VCM은 이 동자의 스트로크 변위에 따라 추력이 다르게 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: The prototype VCM generates thrust differently according to the stroke displacement of the mover.
data.target_sentence: The prototype VCM generates thrust differently depending on the stroke displacement of the mover.

data.source_sentence: 스트로크 최소지점과 초대지점에서 추력이 감소하고 중간지점에서 최대추력이 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The thrust decreased at the minimum and initial points of the stroke, and the maximum thrust occurred at the midpoint.
data.target_sentence: The thrust decreased at the minimum and initial points of the stroke, and the maximum thrust occurred at the midpoint.

data.source_sentence: 차량 ECU에서 CAN을 통하여 전달되는 APS 신호는 페달의 정확한 위치를 약 0.06(mm) 단위로 제공한다.
data.mt_sentence: The APS signal transmitted from the vehicle ECU through CAN provides the precise position of the pedal in units of about 0.06 (mm).
data.target_sentence: The APS signal transmitted through CAN from the vehicle ECU provides the precise position of the pedal in units of about 0.06 (mm).

data.source_sentence: 차량의 페달과 같이 움직이는 VCM의 이동자의 위치를 APS 신호를 이용하면, 홀신호에 의존하는 DC 정전류 제어보다 정밀한 추력 제어가 가능해지고 추력리플 감소운전이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Using the APS signal, the position of the moving member of the VCM, such as the pedal of the vehicle, enables more precise thrust control and reduces thrust ripple operation than DC constant current control that relies on the hall signal.
data.target_sentence: Using the APS signal, the position of the moving member of the VCM, such as the vehicle's pedal, enables more precise thrust control than the DC constant current control that depends on the Hall signal and reduces the thrust ripple operation.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 차량의 APS 신호에 따라서 전류의 양을 테이블화하여 전류제어시 반영하는 방법을 이용하여 발생추력을 측정한 결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the result of measuring the generated thrust using a method that tables the amount of current according to the vehicle's APS signal and reflects it during current control.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the result of measuring the generated thrust in a way that the amount of current according to the vehicle's APS signal is tabulated and reflected during current control.

data.source_sentence: 추력리플 감소운전한 결과로서, 추력평균은 8.01(kg)으로 측정되었으며, 추력리플은 ± 0.07(kg)으로 분석되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the thrust ripple reduction operation, the average thrust was measured as 8.01(kg), and the thrust ripple was analyzed as ±0.07(kg).
data.target_sentence: As a result of the thrust ripple reduction operation, the average thrust was 8.01(kg) and the thrust ripple was analyzed as ±0.07(kg).

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 차량용 에코 페달 시스템 구동을 위한 VCM을 주어진 요구사양을 만족하도록 설계하고 등가 2차원 축 대칭유한요소해석법을 이용하여 그 특성을 해석하고 결과를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper designed the VCM for driving the vehicle echo pedal system to satisfy the given requirements, and analyzed its characteristics using the equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric finite element analysis method and showed the results.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the VCM for driving the vehicle eco-pedal system was designed to satisfy the given requirements, and its characteristics were analyzed using the equivalent two-dimensional axisymmetric finite element analysis method, and the results were presented.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 영구자석 전동기의 운전온도와 사용 시간에 따른 전동기 수명을 예측하기 위하여 고정자 권선의 절연 열화에 기인한 전동기 토크 손상식을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a motor torque damage equation due to insulation deterioration of the stator windings was proposed to predict the motor lifetime according to the operating temperature and operating time of a permanent magnet motor.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, to predict the motor lifetime according to the operating temperature and operating time of a permanent magnet motor, an equation for motor torque damage due to insulation deterioration of the stator winding is proposed.

data.source_sentence: 최근 운송, 가전 및 전력변환 등에 관련한 전기기기 및 장치에서 전기 사용량이 증가하면서 전기적 원인에 기인한 사고가 빈번히 발생하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, as electricity usage increases in electric devices and devices related to transportation, home appliances, and power conversion, accidents caused by electrical causes have frequently occurred.
data.target_sentence: In recent years, as electricity consumption of electric devices and devices related to transportation, home appliances, and power conversion increases, accidents due to electrical causes frequently occur.

data.source_sentence: 2020년에 발간된 소방청 통계 연보에 따르면 2010년부터 2019년까지 10년간 화재 발생 원인분석 결과로 전기적 원인의 화재가 매년 약 10,000 건을 넘나들며 화재의 주요 원인 중 하나로 대두되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the National Fire Agency's statistical annual report published in 2020, as a result of analyzing the cause of fire for 10 years from 2010 to 2019, more than 10,000 fires of electricity are emerging as one of the main causes of fire.
data.target_sentence: According to the statistical annual report published by the National Fire Service in 2020, as a result of analyzing the causes of fires for 10 years from 2010 to 2019, more than 10,000 electrical fires are emerging as one of the main causes of fires.

data.source_sentence: 전기적 원인에 의한 세부 발화요인의 현황을 고찰해 보면, 화재 요인으로 대두되는 미확인 단락을 제외하면 절연 열화(insulation aging)에 의한 단락이 23.6%로 가장 높은 비중을 차지한다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the current status of detailed firing factors due to electrical causes, except for unidentified short circuits that emerge as fire factors, short circuits caused by insulation aging account for the highest proportion at 23.6%.
data.target_sentence: When looking at the detailed status of ignition factors due to electrical causes, short circuits due to insulation aging account for the highest rate at 23.6%, excluding unidentified short circuits that appear as ignition factors.

data.source_sentence: 절연 열화는 기계적, 전기적, 열적 및 환경적 요인 등 다양한 인자에 의해 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Insulation degradation is caused by various factors such as mechanical, electrical, thermal, and environmental factors.
data.target_sentence: Insulation deterioration is caused by various factors such as mechanical, electrical, thermal, and environmental factors.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 절연 열화에 의한 사고를 사전에 예방하기 위해서는 절연 제품에 대한 수명 예측(life prediction)과 신뢰성 향상이 요구되며 더불어 제품에 대한 효과적인 절연 예측 방법이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to prevent accidents caused by the insulation degradation in advance, life prediction and reliability improvement for insulating products are required, and an effective insulation prediction method for the products is required.
data.target_sentence: In order to prevent accidents caused by insulation deterioration in advance, it is necessary to predict the lifespan of insulation products and improve reliability, and an effective insulation prediction method for products is required.

data.source_sentence: 기존 연구에서는 전기기기 및 장치를 구성하는 전선이나 케이블의 절연 열화를 예측하기 위해 주로 가속시험(acceleration test)이 시행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the previous research, an acceleration test was mainly conducted to predict the insulation degradation of the wires or cables constituting electric devices and devices.
data.target_sentence: In previous studies, acceleration tests were mainly performed to predict the deterioration of insulation of wires or cables constituting electrical devices and devices.

data.source_sentence: 가속시험은 주로 온도, 습도 및 전압 등과 같은 주어진 환경에 의한 절연재료의 물성 변화에 따른 전선이나 케이블 자체의 절연 수명 예측에 국한되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Acceleration tests are mainly limited to predicting the insulation life of a wire or cable itself according to changes in the physical properties of an insulating material due to a given environment such as temperature, humidity, and voltage.
data.target_sentence: Acceleration testing is mainly limited to predicting the insulation life of a wire or cable itself according to changes in the physical properties of insulation according to a given environment, such as temperature, humidity, and voltage.

data.source_sentence: 실제 다양한 운전조건에서 다수의 내부 구성요소들 사이의 상호작용으로 동작하는 전기기기나 장치의 성능저하 정도와 이에 따른 수명 예측을 단순히 전선이나 케이블만의 절연 가속시험 결과로 유추하기는 매우 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, it is very difficult to infer the degree of performance degradation and life expectancy prediction of electrical equipment or devices that operate due to the interaction between multiple internal components under various operating conditions simply from the results of an accelerated insulation test for wires or cables.
data.target_sentence: In fact, it is very difficult to infer the degree of degradation in performance and life expectancy of electric devices or devices operating due to the interaction between various internal components under various operating conditions only from the results of the accelerated insulation test for wires or cables.

data.source_sentence: 권선 온도의 상승은 권선 절연저항의 감소와 더불어 발생하는 누설전류의 증가에 따라 공극의 유효 자기장의 크기가 감소하게 되어 전동기의 출력 토크의 저하를 초래하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: An increase in the winding temperature causes a decrease in the effective magnetic field of the air gap according to an increase in leakage current generated along with a decrease in the winding insulation resistance, resulting in a decrease in the output torque of the motor.
data.target_sentence: An increase in the winding temperature decreases the effective magnetic field of the air gap in accordance with an increase in the leakage current that occurs along with a decrease in the winding insulation resistance, thereby reducing the output torque of the motor.

data.source_sentence: 운전온도에 따른 고정자 권선 절연저항이 전동기성능에 미치는 영향을 분석하여 대상 전동기에 적용 가능한 절연 열화식을 유도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By analyzing the effect of the stator winding insulation resistance on the motor performance according to the operating temperature, an insulation degradation equation applicable to the target motor was derived.
data.target_sentence: By analyzing the effect of the stator winding insulation resistance on the motor performance according to the operating temperature, an insulation degradation equation applicable to the target motor was derived.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과를 활용하여 전동기 운전온도와 사용 시간에 따른 전동기 성능 및 수명과 관련된 토크 손상식을 도출함으로써 영구자석 전동기의 수명을 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Using this result, the lifespan of the permanent magnet motor was predicted by deriving the torque damage equation related to the motor performance and lifespan according to the operating temperature and operating time of the motor.
data.target_sentence: Using this result, the lifespan of the permanent magnet motor was predicted by deriving a torque damage equation related to the performance and lifespan of the motor according to the operating temperature and operating time of the motor.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 영구자석 전동기의 운전온도 해석을 위해 열해석 프로그램인 FFF1을 사용하였고 권선 열화에 따른 전동기 성능 분석을 위해서는 전자장 해석 프로그램인 FFF2를 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, FFF1, a thermal analysis program, was used to analyze the operating temperature of the permanent magnet motor, and FFF2, an electromagnetic field analysis program, was used to analyze the motor performance due to winding degradation.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the operating temperature of a permanent magnet motor was analyzed using the thermal analysis program FFF1, and the motor performance due to winding deterioration was analyzed using FFF2.

data.source_sentence: 해석대상 전동기의 모의시험 장치 구축을 통해 전동기 성능 저하와 관련된 권선 열화조건을 모사함으로써 전동기 사용 시간과 운전온도에 따른 권선 절연저항식을 정립하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By simulating the winding deterioration condition related to the deterioration of the motor performance through the construction of a simulation test device for the motor to be analyzed, the winding insulation resistance equation according to the operating time and operating temperature of the motor was established.
data.target_sentence: The winding insulation resistance equation was established according to the operating time and operating temperature of the motor by simulating the deterioration state of the windings related to the deterioration of the motor performance through the construction of a simulation test device for the motor to be analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 전동기의 고 정자 권선의 절연 열화 모델링을 위하여 Fig. 1과 같이 A상권선을 구성하는 4개의 코일에 각각 절연 저항(R)과 절연 콘덴서(C)를 병렬로 추가한 등가회로에 상전원을 인가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For modeling insulation deterioration of the stator winding of the motor, Fig. As shown in 1, the phase power was applied to the equivalent circuit in which the insulation resistance (R) and the insulation capacitor (C) were added to each of the four coils constituting the A-phase winding.
data.target_sentence: This studys intends to model the insulation deterioration of the stator winding of the motor. To this end, as shown in Fig. 1, phase power was applied to an equivalent circuit in which an insulation resistance (R) and an insulation capacitor (C) were added in parallel to each of the four coils constituting the A-phase winding.

data.source_sentence: 주변 온도를 20 °C로 설정하고 공기 냉각방식을 채용한 경우 전동기 운전 시간에 따른 전동기 고정자, 회전자 및 권선의 온도 변화는 Fig. 3과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: When the ambient temperature is set to 20°C and the air cooling method is adopted, the temperature changes of the electric stator, rotor, and winding according to the electric motor operation time are shown in Fig. 3.
data.target_sentence: When the ambient temperature is set to 20°C and the air cooling method is adopted, the temperature changes of the stator, rotor and winding according to the operating time of the motor are shown in Fig. 3.

data.source_sentence: 해석결과 전동기 정상 운전온도는 115 °C에 도달함을 확인하였고 전동기 한계 운전온도는 권선 절연 등급 B종의 허용 최고 온도인 130 °C이다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was confirmed that the normal operating temperature of the motor reached 115°C, and the limit operating temperature of the motor was 130°C, which is the maximum allowable temperature of type B of winding insulation.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the analysis, it was confirmed that the normal operating temperature of the motor reached 115°C, and the limiting operating temperature of the motor was 130°C, the maximum allowable temperature of type B winding insulation.

data.source_sentence: 온도에서 장시간 운전은 전동기 고정자 권선의 절연물 열화를 점진적으로 가속시켜 전동기 성능에 영향을 주고 결국에는 전동기 수명을 좌우하는 핵심요소로 대두된다.
data.mt_sentence: Long-time operation at temperature gradually accelerates the deterioration of the insulation of the stator winding of the motor, affecting the performance of the motor, and eventually emerges as a key factor influencing the life of the motor.
data.target_sentence: Long-time operation at high temperature gradually accelerates the insulation deterioration of the stator winding of the motor, which affects the performance of the motor, and eventually emerges as a key factor affecting the life of the motor.

data.source_sentence: 전동기 수명 예측을 위해서는 우선 운전온도와 사용 시간에 대한 정확한 권선 절연물에 대한 열화 저항식의 정립이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: To predict the life of an electric motor, it is required to establish a degradation resistance formula for winding insulation with respect to an operation temperature and use time.
