data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 식 (1)과 같은 온도와 시간의 함수로 표현된 고정자 권선 절연 저항식을 채용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the stator winding insulation resistance equation expressed as a function of temperature and time as shown in Equation (1) was adopted.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, the stator winding insulation resistance equation expressed as a function of temperature and time as in Equation (1) is adopted.

data.source_sentence: 위 식에서 r2는 권선 한계 절연저항을 의미하고 본 논문에서는 대상 전동기 토크를 10% 감소시키는 절연저항 값인 0.2 kΩ으로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In the above equation, r2 means the winding limit insulation resistance, and in this paper, it is set to 0.2 kΩ, which is the insulation resistance value that reduces the torque of the target motor by 10%.
data.target_sentence: In the above formula, r2 means the winding limit insulation resistance, and in this paper, the insulation resistance value that reduces the torque of the target motor by 10% was set to 0.2kΩ.

data.source_sentence: 동기전동기에서 10%의 토크 감소는 공극자속을 형성하는 고정자권선의 자화전류 감소만을 의미하기 때문에 실제 누설전류와 자화전류의 합인 권선 전류를 보상하기 위해서는 전동기 제어기에서 정격전류의 10%를 훨씬 상회하는 상전류를 강제공급해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In a synchronous motor, a torque reduction of 10% means only a decrease in the magnetizing current of the stator winding forming the air gap flux. Therefore, in order to compensate for the winding current, which is the sum of the actual leakage current and the magnetizing current, it is necessary to significantly exceed 10% of the rated current in the motor controller. The phase current must be forced.
data.target_sentence: In a synchronous motor, a 10% torque reduction means only a reduction in the magnetizing current of the stator winding that forms air gap flux. Therefore, in order to compensate for the winding current, which is the sum of the actual leakage current and the magnetizing current, the motor controller must forcibly supply a phase current far exceeding 10% of the rated current.

data.source_sentence: 과도 전류를 인가하여 전동기를 운전할 경우 권선 절연 등급에서 허용하는 최고 온도를 넘게 되어 급격한 권선 절연열화가 진행된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the motor is operated by applying an excessive current, the maximum temperature allowed by the winding insulation class is exceeded, and the winding insulation deteriorates rapidly.
data.target_sentence: If the motor is operated by applying an overcurrent, the winding insulation will rapidly deteriorate as the maximum temperature allowed by the winding insulation class is exceeded.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 전동기 토크와 연계하여 정립한 고정자 권선 절연 저항식을 전동기 사용 시간과 운전온도에 대해 도시한 그림으로 운전온도가 증가할수록 사용 시간에 대한 권선 절연저항이 급격히 감소하는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 illustrates the stator winding insulation resistance equation established in connection with the motor torque, and it can be seen that the winding insulation resistance for the time of use rapidly decreases as the operating temperature increases.

data.source_sentence: 식 (1)에 사용한 절연 상수, r1과 r2의 타당성을 검증하기 위하여 Fig. 1과 같이 구성된 각 상의 전동기 절연 등가회로의 절연 저항 (R)에 각 절연 상수 값을 적용하여 전동기 성능을 분석하였다.

data.source_sentence: 권선 열화로 의한 누설전류의 발생으로 공극 자기장의 감소는 결국 전동기 토크 감소를 초래한다.

data.target_sentence: In Fig. 6, the motor torque waveform was compared when there was no insulation resistance in the winding equivalent circuit of Fig. 1 and when the insulation resistance was set to 500 kΩ.

data.mt_sentence: In both cases, the motor torque waveform is consistent and the average torque value of steady state, 4.66 Nm, is generated, confirming that 500 Kω is suitable as the initial insulation constant in the stator winding insulation resistance equation (1).

data.source_sentence: Fig. 7은 등가회로에서 절연 저항을 0.2 kΩ으로 설정한 경우로 전동기 정격 토크보다 약 10% 감소한 평균 토크 4.13 Nm가 발생하여 식 (1)의 한계 절연저항 상수값으로 타당함을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. Fig. 7 shows that when the insulation resistance is set to 0.2 kΩ in the equivalent circuit, the average torque, which is about 10% less than the rated torque of the motor, is 4.13 Nm, and it is confirmed that it is valid as the limiting insulation resistance constant value of Equation (1).

data.mt_sentence: In this paper, based on the torque performance analysis of the permanent magnet synchronous motor, the winding deterioration resistance equation and the torque performance damage index were established to express the deterioration of the stator winding insulation resistance as a function of operating temperature and operating time.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, based on the torque performance analysis of a permanent magnet synchronous motor, the winding deterioration resistance equation and torque performance damage index were established to express the deterioration of the stator winding insulation resistance as a function of operating temperature and operating time.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 강자성 공명(ferromagnetic resonance) 실험을 이용하여 위상 절연체(Topological Insulator)인 Bi2Se3와 NiFe 강자성 박막으로 이뤄진 다층박막 구조에서 스핀 펌핑 효과를 연구하였다.

data.source_sentence: 소자들의 작동 원리의 기반이 되는 스핀 토크 효율은 소자를 구성하는 물질들과 밀접한 관련이 있으며, 스핀 토크 효율을 올리기 위한 많은 노력들이 이뤄지고 있다.

data.target_sentence: Spin torque efficiency, which is the basis of the operating principle of the device, is closely related to the material constituting the device, and much effort is being made to increase the spin torque efficiency.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 스핀 토크를 스핀 궤도토크(spin orbit torque)라고 부르며, 그 생성 원인으로 스핀홀 효과(spin Hall effect)와 라쉬바 효과(Rashba effect)를 꼽고 있다.

data.mt_sentence: Using this equation, the effective magnetization values of each sample could be obtained, and the results are summarized in Table 1.
data.target_sentence: Using this formula, the effective magnetization value of each sample could be obtained, and the results are summarized in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 동일한 실험 조건에서 얻은 실험 결과들로부터, 식 (1)을 이용하여 분석하여 얻은 선폭 △H과 이때 입력된 마이크로파 주파수를 함께 그래프로 나타낸 실험 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the experimental results obtained under the same experimental conditions, and the line width △H obtained by analyzing using Equation (1) and the microwave frequency input at this time.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the experimental results obtained under the same experimental conditions, the line width ΔH analyzed using Equation (1), and the microwave frequency input at this time.

data.source_sentence: 각각의 실험 결과는 식 (3)을 이용하여 분석하였으며, 식 (3)은 다음과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Each experimental result was analyzed using Equation (3), and Equation (3) is as follows.
data.target_sentence: Each experimental result was analyzed using Equation 3, and Equation 3 is as follows.

data.source_sentence: 여기서, △H0는 비균질 넓어짐(inhomogeneous broadening)으로서, 박막의 그레인(grain) 크기 분포나 구조, 자기 이방성값의 분포, 시료의 구조적 결함 등과 관련이 있는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, ΔH0 is inhomogeneous broadening, which is known to be related to the grain size distribution or structure of the thin film, the distribution of magnetic anisotropy values, and structural defects of the sample.
data.target_sentence: Here, ΔH0 is a non-uniform expansion, which is known to be related to the particle size distribution or structure of the thin film, the distribution of magnetic anisotropy values, and structural defects of the sample.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 스핀 펌핑과 관련된 자기 감쇄 계수(magnetic damping constant) α만 비교하기 위해서, 선폭에서 비균질 넓어짐을 제외한 △H-△H0 값을 분석하였으며, 이를 통해 얻은 자기 감쇄 계수(magnetic damping constant)를 Table I에 정리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in order to compare only the magnetic damping constant α related to spin pumping, the value of △H-△H0 excluding inhomogeneous widening in the line width was analyzed, and the magnetic damping constant obtained through this was summarized in Table I.
data.target_sentence: In this study, in order to compare only the magnetic attenuation constant α related to spin pumping, the values of ΔH-ΔH0 excluding the non-uniform expansion of line width were analyzed, and the obtained magnetic attenuation constants are summarized in Table 1.

data.source_sentence: 이는 Bi2Se3의 거친 표면 위에 증착된 NiFe의 하부층이 강자성 특성을 잃어버리는 상태가 된 것으로 이해할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This can be understood as a state in which the lower layer of NiFe deposited on the rough surface of Bi2Se3 loses its ferromagnetic properties.
data.target_sentence: This can be understood as a state in which the lower layer of NiFe deposited on the rough surface of Bi2Se3 loses its ferromagnetic properties.

data.source_sentence: Bi2Se3와 같은 위상 절연체나 Pt, W과 같은 중금속 등이 강자성체와 인접했을 때 스핀 펌핑현상으로 인해 강자성체의 감쇄 계수가 늘어난다는 것이 잘 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is well known that when a topological insulator such as Bi2Se3 or a heavy metal such as Pt or W is adjacent to a ferromagnetic material, the attenuation coefficient of the ferromagnetic material increases due to the spin pumping phenomenon.
data.target_sentence: It is well known that when a topological insulator such as Bi2Se3 or a heavy metal such as Pt or W is adjacent to a ferromagnetic material, the damping coefficient of the ferromagnetic material increases due to the spin pumping phenomenon.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 위상 절연체인 Bi2Se3와 강자성체인 NiFe사이에 1 nm 두께의 MgO 층을 삽입하였을 때 생기는 현상을 CPW 기반의 강자성 공명 측정을 이용하여 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research analyzed the phenomenon that occurs when a 1 nm thick MgO layer is inserted between Bi2Se3 as a phase insulator and NiFe as a ferromagnetic material, using CPW-based ferromagnetic resonance measurement.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a phenomenon that occurs when a 1 nm thick MgO layer is inserted between Bi2Se3, a topological insulator, and NiFe, a ferromagnetic material, is analyzed using CPW-based ferromagnetic resonance measurement.

data.source_sentence: 위상 절연체인 Bi2Se3 위에 바로 NiFe을 증착하였을 경우 강자성 특성이 불활성되는 층이 생성된다는 것을 알게 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that when NiFe was deposited directly on the topological insulator, Bi2Se3, a layer in which the ferromagnetic properties were deactivated was formed.
data.target_sentence: It was found that the direct deposition of NiFe onto the topological insulator Bi2Se3 formed a layer in which the ferromagnetic properties were deactivated.

data.source_sentence: MgO를 증착할 경우 Bi2Se3의 표면의 거침 문제도 해결할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: When MgO was deposited, the problem of surface roughness of Bi2Se3 could also be solved.
data.target_sentence: When MgO is deposited, the problem of surface roughness of Bi2Se3 can also be solved.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 위상 절연체 Bi2Se3를 이용한 스핀 소자 제작 시 강자성 층에 불활성 층의 형성을 피하면서 좋은 성능의 소자 구조를 층착하는 새로운 방법을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: This study shows a novel method for stratifying a high-performance device structure while avoiding the formation of an inert layer on a ferromagnetic layer when fabricating a spin device using a phase insulator Bi2Se3.
data.target_sentence: This study demonstrates a novel method for layering high-performance device structures while avoiding the formation of an inert layer on the ferromagnetic layer when fabricating spin devices using the topological insulator Bi2Se3.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM(Slipring-less Winding Excited Synchronous Machine)은 가격이 저렴하고 견고한 회전자 구조를 가지는 장점 때문에 전기자동차와 e-모빌리티(e-Mobility)의 구동 장치 등으로 연구되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: SWE-SM (Slipring-less Winding Excited Synchronous Machine) is being researched as a driving device for electric vehicles and e-mobility because of its low price and the advantages of having a robust rotor structure.
data.target_sentence: SWE-SM (Slipring-less Winding Excited Synchronous Machine) is being studied as a driving device for electric vehicles and e-mobility due to its low price and robust rotor structure.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 SWE-SM의 토크 특성을 개선하기 위해 다목적 최적설계를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a multi-purpose optimal design was performed to improve the torque characteristics of SWE-SM.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, a multi-purpose optimal design was performed to improve the torque characteristics of SWE-SM.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM의 토크 특성과 역기전력은 유한요소법과 아키오법(Arkkio’s Method)을 이용하여 계산하고 분석하였으며 코어 재질의 비선형성을 고려하여 정확도를 높였다.
data.mt_sentence: The torque characteristics and back electromotive force of SWE-SM were calculated and analyzed using the finite element method and Arkkio's method, and the accuracy was increased by considering the nonlinearity of the core material.
data.target_sentence: The torque characteristics and counter electromotive force of SWE-SM were calculated and analyzed using the finite element method and the Arkkio method, and the accuracy was improved by considering the nonlinearity of the core material.

data.source_sentence: 평균 토크를 증가시키며 동시에 코깅 토크를 감소시키기 위해 가중치법을 적용한 다목적함수를 설정하고 모터를 최적화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to increase the average torque and reduce the cogging torque at the same time, a multi-objective function to which the weighting method is applied was set and the motor was optimized.
data.target_sentence: In order to increase the average torque and reduce the cogging torque, a multi-purpose function with a weighted method was set and the motor was optimized.

data.source_sentence: 목적함수의 다양한 가중치 비율을 테스트하고 최적해를 분석하여 파레토 최적해들의 균일성을 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The uniformity of Pareto optimal solutions was investigated by testing various weight ratios of the objective function and analyzing the optimal solution.
data.target_sentence: The uniformity of the Pareto optimal solution was investigated by testing various weight ratios of the objective function and analyzing the optimal solution.

data.source_sentence: 설계자의 선호도에 따라 가중치를 조정하여 설계 목표를 만족시키며 SWE-SM의 평균 토크와 코깅 토크를 효율적으로 최적화할 수 있음을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It is confirmed that the weight can be adjusted according to the designer's preference to satisfy the design objective and to efficiently optimize the average torque and cogging torque of SWE-SM.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the weight can be adjusted according to the designer's preference to efficiently optimize the average torque and cogging torque of SWE-SM and satisfy the design purpose.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM은 VFRM(Variable Flux Reluctance Machine)이라고도 불리며 기존의 SRM(Switched Reluctance Motor)에 비해 회전자 극 수의 선정에 자유도가 높으며 상용 3상 인버터의 사용이 가능하고 토크 밀도는 높은 장점이 있어 많은 분야에 사용할 수 있을 것으로 기대되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: SWE-SM, also known as VFRM (Variable Flux Reliance Machine), is expected to be used in many fields because it has a higher degree of freedom in selecting the number of rotor poles, can use commercial three-phase inverters, and has high torque density.
data.target_sentence: SWE-SM, also known as Variable Flux Reliance Machine (VFRM), offers more freedom of choice of the number of rotor poles, allows the use of commercial three-phase inverters, and provides high torque density.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM은 희토류 자석을 사용하지 않기 때문에 기본적으로 IPMSM에 비해서는 평균 토크가 낮고 코깅토크는 높은 특성을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Since SWE-SM does not use rare earth magnets, it basically has a lower average torque and a higher cogging torque than IPMSM.
data.target_sentence: Because SWE-SM does not use rare earth magnets, it has lower average torque and higher cogging torque than IPMSM.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM의 토크 특성을 개선하기 위해서는 평균 토크를 증가시키면서 동시에 토깅 토크를 감소시켜야 하는데 이 2개의 설계 목표는 서로 상충관계에 있기 때문에 다목적 최적화를 고려해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: To improve the torque characteristics of SWE-SM, it is necessary to increase the average torque and reduce the toging torque at the same time, and since these two design goals are in conflict with each other, multi-purpose optimization should be considered.
data.target_sentence: In order to improve the torque characteristics of SWE-SM, it is necessary to increase the average torque while reducing the toggling torque, and since these two design goals are at odds, a multi-purpose optimization should be considered.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 다목적 최적화 문제에서는 여러 개의 목적함수가 서로 상충관계에 있으므로 다수의 최적해가 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general multi-objective optimization problems, there are multiple optimal solutions because several objective functions are in conflict with each other.
data.target_sentence: A typical multi-objective optimization problem has multiple optimal solutions because multiple objective functions collide.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 다른 임의의 지점보다 종합적으로 비교해서 열등하지 않음이 보장된 최적해를 파레토 최적해(Pareto optimal point)라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, the optimal solution that is guaranteed not to be inferior to other random points is called the Pareto optimal point.
data.target_sentence: Here, the optimal solution that is guaranteed not to be inferior to any other point is called the Pareto optimal point.

data.source_sentence: 파레토 최적해를 찾는 방법 중 가중치법(weighted sum method)은 여러 개의 목적함수에 가중치를 적용하고 하나의 선형 합으로 변환하여 단일 목적함수로 만든 후 최적해를 구하는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the methods for finding the Pareto optimal solution, the weighted sum method applies weights to several objective functions, converts them into a single linear sum, and makes a single objective function, and then finds the optimal solution.
data.target_sentence: Among the methods for finding the Pareto optimal solution, the weighted sum method is a method to find an optimal solution by applying weights to several objective functions and transforming them into a single linear sum.

data.source_sentence: 가중치법은 비교적 간단하게 프로그래밍할 수 있으며 직관적인 이해가 쉽다는 장점이 있지만 파레토 최적해 경계(Pareto optimal front)가 볼록(convex)하지 않은 경우에는 모든 해를 찾을 수 없는 단점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the weighting method has the advantage of being relatively simple to program and easy to understand intuitively, it has the disadvantage that all solutions cannot be found if the Pareto optimal front is not convex.
data.target_sentence: The weighting method has the advantage of being relatively simple to program and intuitively easy to understand, but has the disadvantage that all solutions cannot be found unless the Pareto optimal line is convex.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 다목적 최적화를 적용하여 SWE-SM를 설계하고 토크 특성을 개선하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper designs SWE-SM and improves torque characteristics by applying multi-purpose optimization.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we design SWE-SM and apply multi-purpose optimization to improve torque characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 최적 설계는 유한요소법 시뮬레이션을 기반으로 진행하였으며 토크와 역기전력을 계산하고 분석할 때 코어 재질의 비선형성을 고려하여 정확도를 높였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optimal design was based on the finite element method simulation, and the accuracy was improved by considering the nonlinearity of the core material when calculating and analyzing torque and counter electromotive force.
data.target_sentence: The optimal design was based on the finite element method simulation, and the accuracy was improved by considering the nonlinearity of the core material when calculating and analyzing the torque and counter electromotive force.

data.source_sentence: 다목적함수는 가중치법을 이용하여 설정하였으며 다양한 가중치 비율을 테스트하여 파레토 최적해들이 균일하게 분포하는지 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The multipurpose function was set using the weight method, and various weight ratios were tested to confirm that the Pareto optimal solutions were uniformly distributed.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the Pareto optimal solution was uniformly distributed by setting the multipurpose function using the weighting method and testing various weight ratios.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM은 자계를 만드는 계자 권선과 전기자 권선이 고정자 슬롯에 위치하며 회전자는 권선이나 영구자석 없이 단일 철심으로 이루어져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In SWE-SM, field windings and armature windings that make magnetic fields are located in the stator slot, and the rotor consists of a single iron core without windings or permanent magnets.
data.target_sentence: In SWE-SM, the field winding and the armature winding that create the magnetic field are located in the stator slot, and the rotor is composed of a single iron core without windings or permanent magnets.

data.source_sentence: 계자 권선은 직류 전류로 여자되며 공극에 계자 권선의 극 수(S1)와 동일한 극 수를 갖는 고정자계를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The field winding is excited with a direct current and generates a stator magnetic field with the same number of poles as the number of poles (S1) of the field winding in the air gap.
data.target_sentence: The field windings are excited with direct current and create a stator magnetic field with the number of poles in the air gap equal to the number of poles of the field winding (S1).

data.source_sentence: 이 고정자계는 S2의 극 수를 갖는 회전자 돌극의 릴럭턴스 차이에 의해 변조되며 회전자가 ωr의 각속도로 회전할 경우 2p 극 수를 갖는 전기자 권선과 자기적으로 결합하는 회전자계를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: This stator field is modulated by the difference in the reluctance of the rotor salient poles with the number of poles of S2, and when the rotor rotates at an angular speed of ωr, it generates a rotating magnetic field that magnetically couples with the armature winding with the number of poles of 2p.
data.target_sentence: This stator field is modulated by the difference in reluctance of the salient poles of the rotor with the number of poles S2. When the rotor rotates at an angular velocity of ωr, it generates a rotating magnetic field that is magnetically coupled to the armature winding having 2p poles.

data.source_sentence: 돌극 회전자는 고정자의 계자 권선과 전기자 권선을 자기적으로 결합시키며 S1 극 수의 고정자계로부터 2p 극 수의 회전자계를 발생시키는 극변환기 역할을 한다고 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The salient pole rotor magnetically couples the field winding and the armature winding of the stator, and it can be seen as a pole converter that generates a rotating magnetic field of 2p number of poles from the stator magnetic field of S1 number of poles.
data.target_sentence: The salient pole rotor magnetically couples the field windings of the stator and the armature winding, and can be viewed as a pole converter that generates a rotating magnetic field of 2p poles from the stator magnetic field of S1 poles.

data.source_sentence: 디자인은 견고한 회전자 구조 제작과 고정자의 능동 냉각을 용이하게 해준다.
data.mt_sentence: The design facilitates the fabrication of a robust rotor structure and active cooling of the stator.
data.target_sentence: This design facilitates the fabrication of a robust rotor structure and active cooling of the stator.

data.source_sentence: 고정자에서 계자 권선에 의해 6개의 N극과 6개의 S극이 번갈아가며 만들어지는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that 6 N poles and 6 S poles are alternately made by the field winding in the stator.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that 6 N poles and 6 S poles are alternately made by the field winding of the stator.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM을 설계할 때 고정자와 회전자의 설계변수는 다음식을 만족해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: When designing SWE-SM, the design parameters of the stator and rotor must satisfy the following equation.
data.target_sentence: When designing SWE-SM, the design parameters of the stator and rotor must satisfy the following equation.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 S1, S2, p, q는 각각 고정자 치의 수, 회전자 극 수, 고정자 상당 전기자 권선의 극 쌍수, 고정자 상당 극당 슬롯 수를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, S1, S2, p, and q mean the number of stator values, the number of rotor poles, the number of polar pairs of armature windings corresponding to the stator, and the number of slots per pole corresponding to the stator.
data.target_sentence: Here, S1, S2, p, and q mean the number of stator values, the number of rotor poles, the number of pole pairs of the armature winding corresponding to the stator, and the number of slots per pole corresponding to the stator.

data.source_sentence: 균형이 발생할 수 있으며 p = 1일 경우 전기자 권선의 극 쌍수가 1이 되므로 전기자 권선에 의한 회전자계가 일부 고정자 치에 집중되어 고정자 철심의 자기 포화가 심해질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Balance may occur, and when p=1, the pair of poles of the armature winding becomes 1, and thus the rotor field by the armature winding is concentrated in some stator values, and thus the magnetic saturation of the stator iron core may be intensified.
data.target_sentence: Equilibrium may occur, and when p=1, a pair of poles of the armature winding becomes 1, and the rotor magnetic field by the armature winding is concentrated on some stator values, so that the magnetic saturation of the stator iron core can be strengthened.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM의 구동 토크 특성을 계산할 때는 계자 권선뿐만 아니라 전기자 권선에도 3상 전류를 인가하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: When calculating the driving torque characteristics of SWE-SM, three-phase current should be applied not only to the field winding but also to the armature winding.
data.target_sentence: When calculating the driving torque characteristics of SWE-SM, three-phase current must be applied to the armature winding as well as the field winding.

data.source_sentence: 이 때 전기자 전류의 초기 위상각에 따라 토크 특성이 달라진다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the torque characteristics vary according to the initial phase angle of the armature current.
data.target_sentence: At this time, the torque characteristics vary according to the initial phase angle of the armature current.

data.source_sentence: 평균 토크가 최대가 되는 전류 위상각 β를 다음과 같이 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The current phase angle β at which the average torque becomes the maximum was calculated as follows.
data.target_sentence: The current phase angle β at which the average torque is maximum was calculated as follows.

data.source_sentence: 전기자 전류의 초기 위상각을 0o로 설정한 뒤, 전기자전류를 인가하고 회전자가 1회전하는 동안 회전자의 위치마다 구동 토크를 계산한다.
data.mt_sentence: After setting the initial phase angle of the armature current to 0o, apply the armature current and calculate the driving torque for each position of the rotor during one rotation of the rotor.
data.target_sentence: After setting the initial phase angle of the armature current to 0o, the driving torque for each position of the rotor is calculated during one rotation of the rotor by applying the armature current.

data.source_sentence: SWE-SM의 토크 특성과 역기전력은 유한요소법 기반의 COMSOL Multiphysics 소프트웨어와 아키오법을 이용하여 계산하고 분석하였으며 코어 재질의 비선형성을 고려하여 해석의 정확도를 높였다.
data.mt_sentence: The torque characteristics and counter electromotive force of SWE-SM were calculated and analyzed using COMSOL Multiphysics software and Akio method based on the finite element method, and the accuracy of the analysis was improved by considering the nonlinearity of the core material.
data.target_sentence: The torque characteristics and back electromotive force of SWE-SM were calculated and analyzed using the finite element method-based COMSOL Multiphysics® software and Akio method, and the accuracy of the analysis was improved by considering the nonlinearity of the core material.

data.mt_sentence: To achieve the design goal of increasing the mean torque and simultaneously decreasing the cogging torque, we established a multipurpose function with a weighting method and obtained a unique Pareto optimization for various weighting ratios.

data.source_sentence: 설계 조건에 따라 회전자의 투자율은 달라질 수 있기 때문에 폴 피스와 브릿지 영역의 투자율을 고려하는 것은 전자기 해석의 정확도 및 범용성의 확대를 위해서 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the magnetic permeability of the rotor may vary depending on design conditions, it is important to consider the magnetic permeability of the pole piece and bridge area to expand the accuracy and versatility of electromagnetic analysis.
data.target_sentence: Since the magnetic permeability of the rotor may vary depending on the design conditions, it is important to consider the magnetic permeability of the pole piece and the bridge area in order to expand the accuracy and versatility of electromagnetic analysis.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 회전자의 폴 피스 및 브릿지 영역의 투자율을 고려한 IPMSM의 전자장 특성 해석에 관한 연구를 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a study on the electromagnetic field characteristic analysis of IPMSM considering the magnetic permeability of the pole piece and bridge area of the rotor is presented.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a study on the electromagnetic field characteristics analysis of IPMSM considering the magnetic permeability of the pole piece and the bridge area of the rotor is presented.

data.source_sentence: 전자기 해석을 위한 해석 영역은 영구자석 영역, 같은 반경 내에 존재하는 폴 피스와 브릿지 영역, 공극, 슬롯오프닝, 슬롯으로 제시된다.
data.mt_sentence: The analysis area for electromagnetic analysis is presented as a permanent magnet area, a pole piece and a bridge area that exist within the same radius, a gap, a slot opening, and a slot.
data.target_sentence: The analysis area for electromagnetic analysis is presented as a permanent magnet area, a pole piece and a bridge area, a gap, a slot opening, and a slot that exist within the same radius.

data.source_sentence: 경계 조건을 바탕으로 각 영역의 해석 해를 도출하고, 이를 바탕으로 전자기 특성 해석을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the boundary conditions, analysis solutions for each area are derived, and electromagnetic characteristics analysis is performed based on this.
data.target_sentence: Based on boundary conditions, analysis solutions for each area are derived, and electromagnetic wave characteristic analysis is performed based on this.

data.source_sentence: 해석결과의 타당성은 FE해석과의 비교를 통하여 해석 결과의 타당성을 검증하였으며, 기존의 제시된 해석적 방법과 비교하여 해석의 정확도 향상을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: The validity of the analysis result was verified through comparison with the FE analysis, and the accuracy of the analysis was improved compared to the existing presented analytical method.
data.target_sentence: The validity of the analysis results was verified through comparison with the FE analysis, and the accuracy of the analysis was improved compared to the previously presented analysis method.

data.source_sentence: IPMSM은 회전자 내부에서 기계적 구조로 인하여 브릿지 영역이 필수적으로 존재하며 기계적 안정성과 전자기 성능의 개선을 위해 브릿지와 폴 피스를 고려한 해석이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: IPMSM essentially has a bridge region due to its mechanical structure inside the rotor, and interpretation considering bridges and pole pieces is important to improve mechanical stability and electromagnetic performance.
data.target_sentence: Due to the mechanical structure inside the rotor, the IPMSM has a bridge area in nature, and in order to improve the mechanical stability and electromagnetic performance, it is important to analyze the bridge and the pole piece.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 IPMSM의 회전자 폴 피스와 브릿지 영역의 비투자율을 고려한 subdomain법을 이용한 전자기 특성 해석방법을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: This study presents an electromagnetic characteristic analysis method using the subdomain method considering the non-investment rate of the rotor pole piece and bridge region of IPMSM.
data.target_sentence: In this study, an electromagnetic characteristic analysis method using the subdomain method considering the relative permeability of the rotor pole piece and the bridge region of IPMSM is presented.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1과 같이 바(bar) 타입의 영구자석이 매입된 IPMSM의 실제 모델과 극 좌표계를 기반으로 하는 단순화된 해석 모델을 나타낸다.

data.target_sentence: Analysis solutions derived from boundary conditions can be applied to the analysis of electromagnetic performance such as magnetic flux density, closed magnetic flux, induced electromotive force and torque based on electromagnetic field theory.

data.source_sentence: 전자장 이론 및 미분 방정식을 이용하여 모든 영역의 라플라스 방정식 및 푸아송 방정식을 경계 조건에 따라 계산된 일반 해를 푸리에 급수 형태로 나타낸다.

data.mt_sentence: Although the effectiveness of the treatment method has been proven, various side effects exist.
data.target_sentence: Although the treatment method has been proven effective, various side effects exist.

data.source_sentence: 최근 이러한 부작용을 최소화하기 위하여 국소적인 하이퍼써미아를 이용한 암 치료법이 개발되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, cancer treatment using topical hyperthermia has been developed to minimize these side effects.
data.target_sentence: Recently, cancer treatment using local hyperthermia has been developed to minimize these side effects.

data.source_sentence: 국소적 하이퍼써미아 방법으로는 초음파, 침습형 바늘과 라디오 주파수를 이용한 방법, 자성 나노입자를 이용한 방법이 대표적이다.
data.mt_sentence: Representative examples of local hyperthermia methods include ultrasound, a method using an invasive needle and radio frequency, and a method using magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Representative examples of local hyperthermia include ultrasound, a method using invasive needles and high frequency waves, and a method using magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 약물치료와 방사선치료의 부작용만큼 심각하지는 않지만 하이퍼써미아의 경우 환부 인근의 정상세포가 열에 의해 손상을 받는 부작용은 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Although it is not as serious as the side effects of drug treatment and radiation treatment, there are side effects in which normal cells near the affected area are damaged by heat.
data.target_sentence: Although not as severe as the side effects of medication or radiation therapy, there is a side effect of heat damage to normal cells near the affected area.

data.source_sentence: 환부에만 표적화하여 42 °C 이상의 발열을 할 수 있는 방법이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: There is a need for a method that can target only the affected area and cause fever of 42 °C or higher.
data.target_sentence: A method that can induce a high temperature of 42 degrees or higher by targeting only the affected area is needed.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 자성 나노입자의 발열을 이용하는 경우에도 정상세포가 손상이 되는 문제점은 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Even when the heat of general magnetic nanoparticles is used, there is a problem that normal cells are damaged.
data.target_sentence: Even if the heat of ordinary magnetic nanoparticles is used, there is a problem that normal cells are damaged.

data.source_sentence: 자기하이퍼써미아를 위한 자성 나노입자는 미국식약청(FDA)의 허가를 받은 Fe3O4를 이용하여 임상에 적용할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic nanoparticles for self-hyperthermia can be applied to clinical trials using Fe3O4 approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
data.target_sentence: Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for clinical application of magnetic nanoparticles for self-thermal treatment using Fe3O4 approved in the United States.

data.source_sentence: 산화철이 25 nm 이상의 크기에서는 다자화(multi domain) 형태가 되어 히스테리시스 손실에 의하여 발열이 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the iron oxide has a size of 25 nm or more, the iron oxide becomes a multi-domain form, and thus heat is generated due to hysteresis loss.
data.target_sentence: If the size of the iron oxide is 25 nm or more, the iron oxide becomes multi-domain and heat is generated by hysteresis loss.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자들이 정렬이 되어있는 경우와 분산이 되어 있는 경우 발열 특성은 바뀌게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the magnetic nanoparticles are aligned and dispersed, the exothermic characteristics are changed.
data.target_sentence: When magnetic nanoparticles are aligned and dispersed, their exothermic properties change.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자들을 이용하여 AMF를 인가하게 되면 각각의 발열 메커니즘에 의하여 자성 나노입자는 발열을 하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When AMF is applied using magnetic nanoparticles, the magnetic nanoparticles generate heat by each heating mechanism.
data.target_sentence: When AMF is applied using magnetic nanoparticles, the magnetic nanoparticles generate heat by their respective heating mechanisms.

data.source_sentence: MRI 시스템과 같이 환자가 장비 속으로 들어가서 몸전체에 AMF를 인가하게 되면 혈관으로 주입된 모든 자성 나노입자가 발열하게 되어 환부뿐만 아니라 정상세포의 손상이 발생된다.
data.mt_sentence: As in the MRI system, when a patient enters the equipment and applies AMF to the entire body, all the magnetic nanoparticles injected into the blood vessel generate heat, causing damage to normal cells as well as the affected area.
data.target_sentence: As with the MRI system, when a patient enters the equipment and applies AMF to the body, all the magnetic nanoparticles injected into the blood vessels generate heat, damaging normal cells as well as the affected area.

data.source_sentence: 문제를 해결하기 위하여 국소적 구동 코일을 사용하여 AMF를 인가하는 방법이 제시되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To solve the problem, a method of applying AMF using a local driving coil is presented.
data.target_sentence: To solve this problem, a method of applying AMF using a local driving coil is presented.

data.source_sentence: 이런 문제를 해결하기 위해 마그네틱 마이크로/나노 로봇 제어 기술을 이용하여 능동적으로 표적화하는 기술이 개발되어 넓은 자기장 분포에서도 국소적으로 표적화할 수 있어 정상세포의 손상을 감소시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To solve this problem, an active targeting technology using magnetic micro/nano robot control technology has been developed, which enables local targeting even in a wide magnetic field distribution, thereby reducing damage to normal cells.
data.target_sentence: To solve this problem, active targeting technology using magnetic micro/nano robot control technology has been developed, enabling local targeting even in a wide magnetic field distribution, thereby reducing damage to normal cells.

data.source_sentence: 로봇제어 기술을 이용하여 몸속에 퍼져 있는 모든 나노입자를 독립적으로 표적화하는 것은 불가능하여 완벽한 문제해결은 되지 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: It is impossible to independently target all nanoparticles spread in the body using robot control technology, so it is not a perfect solution.
data.target_sentence: It is not a perfect solution as it is impossible to independently target all nanoparticles spread throughout the body with robotic control technology.

data.source_sentence: 최근 자성 나노입자를 이용한 자기하이퍼써미아의 근본적인 해결을 하기 위해 몸 전체를 자기장 환경에 노출시키면서 인위적으로 자기장이 없는 영역을 만들어 그 부위에만 발열을 시키는 선택적 하이퍼써미아 방법이 개발되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, in order to solve the fundamental problem of magnetic hyperthermia using magnetic nanoparticles, a selective hyperthermia method has been developed that artificially creates an area without a magnetic field while exposing the entire body to a magnetic field environment and generates heat only in that area.
data.target_sentence: Recently, in order to solve the fundamental problem of magnetothermal therapy using magnetic nanoparticles, selective hyperthermia has been developed that artificially creates an area without a magnetic field while exposing the whole body to a magnetic field environment and generates heat only in that area.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 하이퍼써미아 시스템은 자성 나노입자의 온도 제어가 불가능하지만 외부 정적 자기장을 이용하여 나노입자의 발열 온도를 제어하는 방법이 개발되었으며 정적 자기장을 이용해 나노입자의 정렬 상태를 제어할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the general hyperthermia system cannot control the temperature of magnetic nanoparticles, a method has been developed to control the heating temperature of nanoparticles using an external static magnetic field, and the alignment state of nanoparticles can be controlled using the static magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: A general thermotherapy system cannot control the temperature of magnetic nanoparticles, but a method of controlling the heating temperature of nanoparticles using an external static magnetic field has been developed, and the orientation state of nanoparticles can be controlled using a static magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 자기하이퍼써미아를 위한 자성 나노입자의 제작 방법, 형상 및 크기에 따른 발열 특성과 발열 방법에 대한 다양한 방법론을 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper introduces various methodologies for heating characteristics and heating methods in accordance with the manufacturing method, shape, and size of magnetic nanoparticles for magnetic hyperthermia.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we introduce various methodologies for the manufacturing method of magnetic nanoparticles for magnetic thermotherapy, heating characteristics according to shape and size, and heating method.

data.source_sentence: 하이퍼써미아에 사용되는 대표적인 자성 나노입자는 Fe3O4로써 본 재료는 임상 적용 가능하며 FDA 승인을 획득한 재료이다.
data.mt_sentence: A representative magnetic nanoparticle used in hyperthermia is Fe3O4, which is clinically applicable and FDA-approved.
data.target_sentence: The representative magnetic nanoparticles used in hyperthermia are Fe3O4, which is clinically applicable and has FDA approval.

data.source_sentence: 산화철을 제작하는 방법은 수열 합성법과 고온 열분해법으로 크게 두 가지로 나누어진다.
data.mt_sentence: Methods for producing iron oxide are largely divided into two methods: hydrothermal synthesis and high-temperature pyrolysis.
data.target_sentence: There are two main methods for producing iron oxide: hydrothermal synthesis and high-temperature pyrolysis.

data.source_sentence: 두 종류의 방법에서도 합성하는 재료와 프로세서에 따라서 구체적인 제작방법은 다양하다.
data.mt_sentence: Even in the two types of methods, the specific manufacturing method varies depending on the material and process to be synthesized.
data.target_sentence: Even with both types of methods, the specific manufacturing method depends on the material and process being synthesized.

data.source_sentence: 수열 합성법은 고온 열 분해법과 비교하면 1회 합성 시 높은 수율이 보장된다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared to the high-temperature pyrolysis method, the hydrothermal synthesis method ensures a high yield in one synthesis.
data.target_sentence: Compared to high-temperature pyrolysis, hydrothermal synthesis guarantees a high yield in one synthesis.

data.source_sentence: 산화철의 모양 및 크기의 제어가 어려우며 균질한 산화철 제작이 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: It is difficult to control the shape and size of iron oxide, and it is difficult to produce a homogeneous iron oxide.
data.target_sentence: It is difficult to control the shape and size of iron oxide, and it is difficult to produce uniform iron oxide.

data.source_sentence: 고온 열분해법은 균일한 산화철 제작이 가능하며 상대적으로 크기 모양의 제어가 용이하다.
data.mt_sentence: The high-temperature pyrolysis method enables uniform iron oxide production and relatively easy control of size and shape.
data.target_sentence: The high-temperature pyrolysis method enables uniform iron oxide production and relatively easy size and shape control.

data.source_sentence: 나노입자 크기의 분포를 균일하기 위해서는 산화철의 생성 및 성장 시간을 최소화해야한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to uniformize the distribution of the nanoparticle size, it is necessary to minimize the generation and growth time of iron oxide.
data.target_sentence: In order to uniformly distribute the size of nanoparticles, it is necessary to minimize the generation and growth time of iron oxide.

data.source_sentence: 크기의 제어를 위하여 반응시간의 조절이 필요하므로 균일성과 요구하는 크기를 제작하기 위하여 최적 조건을 찾아야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since it is necessary to adjust the reaction time to control the size, optimal conditions should be found to produce uniformity and required size.
data.target_sentence: In order to adjust the size, it is necessary to control the reaction time, so it is necessary to find the optimum conditions for uniformity and desired size.

data.source_sentence: 고온 열분해법으로 제작된 산화철의 수율은 매우 낮다.
data.mt_sentence: The yield of iron oxide produced by the high-temperature pyrolysis method is very low.
data.target_sentence: The yield of iron oxide produced by high-temperature pyrolysis is very low.

data.source_sentence: 1회 제작 시 제작되는 양은 수열 합성법에 비교 시 매우 적지만 물리적 특성과 발열 특성은 매우 뛰어나다.
data.mt_sentence: The amount produced at one time is very small compared to the hydrothermal synthesis method, but the physical and exothermic properties are very excellent.
data.target_sentence: The amount produced at one time is very small compared to the hydrothermal synthesis method, but it has excellent physical and exothermic properties.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 자기하이퍼써미아에 적용하기 위한 초상자성체특성을 가지는 산화철의 포화 자화는 50 emu/g 이상이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, saturation magnetization of iron oxide having superparamagnetic properties for application to magnetic hyperthermia requires 50 emu/g or more.
data.target_sentence: In general, saturation magnetization of iron oxide with superparamagnetic properties for application to magnetic hyperthermia requires 50 emu/g or more.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 산화철을 분석하기 위하여 XRD(X-rayDiffraction)분석법, VSM(Vibration Sample Magnetometer), 투과전자현미경(Transmission electron microscope)을 이용하여 결정구조, 자성 특성, 형상 및 크기를 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to analyze the produced iron oxide, the crystal structure, magnetic properties, shape and size are analyzed using XRD (X-ray diffraction) analysis, VSM (Vibration Sample Magnetometer), and transmission electron microscope.
data.target_sentence: To analyze the generated iron oxide, the crystal structure, magnetic properties, shape and size are analyzed using XRD (X-ray diffraction) analysis, VSM (Vibration Sample Magnetometer), and transmission electron microscope.

data.source_sentence: Fe3O4의 반응 조건을 변화하는 경우 다양한 형상으로 산화철을 제작할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the reaction conditions of Fe3O4 are changed, iron oxide can be manufactured in various shapes.
data.target_sentence: By changing the reaction conditions of Fe3O4, various types of iron oxide can be produced.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1은 반응조건에 따른 형상과 크기 변화의 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1 is the result of changes in shape and size according to reaction conditions.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the results of changes in shape and size according to reaction conditions.

data.source_sentence: 솔벤트의 농도 차이 또는 알칼리성 환경의 제어를 통하여 산화철의 형상 제어가 가능하고 반응시간을 제어하는 경우 산화철의 크기를 제어할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The shape of iron oxide can be controlled by controlling the concentration difference of the solvent or the alkaline environment, and when the reaction time is controlled, the size of the iron oxide can be controlled.
data.target_sentence: The form of iron oxide can be controlled by controlling the concentration difference of the solvent or the alkaline environment, and the size of the iron oxide can be controlled by controlling the reaction time.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 자기하이퍼써미아를 위해 사용되는 Fe3O4는 30nm 이하의 작은 크기를 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, Fe3O4 used for magnetic hyperthermia uses a small size of 30 nm or less.
data.target_sentence: In general, Fe3O4 used for autothermal therapy uses a small size of 30 nm or less.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 자성 나노입자의 상태에 따른 발열메커니즘을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the exothermic mechanism according to the state of the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows the heating mechanism according to the state of the magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 일자구와 다자구를 가지는 초상자성체의 두 발열 메커니즘을 보여주고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Two heating mechanisms of a superparamagnetic material with a single sphere and a multimagnetic sphere are shown.
data.target_sentence: Two exothermic mechanisms of a superparamagnetic material with a single sphere and multiple magnetic spheres are shown.

data.source_sentence: 다자구 자성 나노입자의 경우 고주파 교류 자기장에 의해 자구의 변화가 발생하며 이때 히스테리시스 손실에 의하여 나노입자가 발열하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of multi-magnetic nanoparticles, the magnetic domain is changed by a high-frequency alternating magnetic field, and at this time, the nanoparticles generate heat due to hysteresis loss.
data.target_sentence: In the case of multimagnetic nanoparticles, the magnetic domain is changed by a high-frequency alternating magnetic field. At this time, the nanoparticles generate heat due to hysteresis loss.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 자기하이퍼써미아에 사용되는 초상자성체의 경우 닐 운동과 브라우니언 운동의 조합에 의해 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in the case of superparamagnetic materials used in magnetic hyperthermia, it is determined by the combination of Neil motion and Brownian motion.
data.target_sentence: In the case of superparamagnetic materials commonly used in autothermal therapy, it is determined by a combination of Neil and Brownian motions.

data.source_sentence: 발열을 위한 닐 이완 시간과 브라우니언 이완 시간은 다음과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Neil relaxation time and Brownian relaxation time for fever are as follows.
data.target_sentence: The Neil relaxation time and Brownian relaxation time for exotherm are:

data.source_sentence: 각각의 기호는 초기시간, 이방성 상수, 나노입자의 부피, 볼츠만 상수, 점성, 유체역학량, 온도를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Each symbol means initial time, anisotropic constant, volume of nanoparticles, Boltzmann constant, viscosity, fluid dynamics, and temperature.
data.target_sentence: Each symbol stands for initial time, anisotropy constant, volume of nanoparticles, Boltzmann constant, viscosity, hydrodynamics and temperature.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자는 크기의 변화에 따라서 닐 효과와 브라우니언 효과가 다르게 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The Neil effect and the Brownian effect appear differently depending on the size change of the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: The Neil effect and the Brown effect appear differently depending on the size change of the magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3은 자성 나노입자의 크기에 따른 두 효과의 의존성을 나타내고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3 shows the dependence of the two effects according to the size of the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the dependence of the two effects on the size of magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 나노입자의 크기에 따른 발열 메커니즘은 나노입자의 크기가 클수록 브라우니언 효과에 의존하는 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the heating mechanism according to the size of the nanoparticles depends on the Brownian effect as the size of the nanoparticles increases.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the heating mechanism according to the size of the nanoparticles depends on the Brownian effect as the size of the nanoparticles increases.

data.source_sentence: 상대적으로 크기가 크며 다자구를 가지는 자성 나노입자는 히스테리시스 에너지 손실이 열로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic nanoparticles having a relatively large size and multiple magnetic spheres show hysteresis energy loss as heat.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic nanoparticles with a relatively large size and multiple magnetic spheres exhibit hysteresis energy loss as heat.

data.source_sentence: μ0는 자유공간의 투자율이며 M(H)는 자성나노입자의 자화를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Μ0 is the permeability of free space and M(H) is the magnetization of magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: μ0 is the permeability of free space and M(H) is the magnetization of the magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 마그네틱 하이퍼써이마는 자성 나노입자에 고주파 교류 자기장을 인가하여 나노입자의 발열을 유도한다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic hyperthermia induces heat generation of the nanoparticles by applying a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field to the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: In magnetothermal therapy, a high-frequency alternating magnetic field is applied to magnetic nanoparticles to induce heat generation of the nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4(a)는 몸 전체에 고주파 자기장을 인가하는 경우 체내에 분포되어 있는 모든 자성 나노입자에서 발열이 발생되며 암세포뿐만 아니라 정상세포의 손상까지 발생하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4(a) shows that when a high-frequency magnetic field is applied to the entire body, heat is generated in all magnetic nanoparticles distributed in the body, and damage to normal cells as well as cancer cells occurs.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 4(a) shows that when a high-frequency magnetic field is applied to the whole body, heat is generated in all magnetic nanoparticles distributed in the body, and damage occurs to normal cells as well as cancer cells.

data.source_sentence: 몸전체에 자기장을 노출하는 경우의 문제점을 해결하기 위하여 Fig. 4(b)와 같이 국소적 자기장을 몸 표면 근처에서 노출시키는 방법이 제시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to solve the problem of exposing the magnetic field to the entire body, a method of exposing the local magnetic field near the body surface was presented as shown in Fig. 4(b).
data.target_sentence: In order to solve the problem of exposing the body to the magnetic field, a method of exposing the local magnetic field near the body surface as shown in Fig. 4(b) was presented.

data.source_sentence: 완벽하게 표적화는 불가능하며 코일에서 거리가 멀어지면 자기장의 세기가 낮아지는 문제점이 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Perfect targeting is impossible, and there is a problem that the strength of the magnetic field decreases when the distance from the coil increases.
data.target_sentence: Perfect targeting is impossible, and there is a problem that the strength of the magnetic field decreases as the distance from the coil increases.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4(c)는 기존의 하이퍼써이마를 위한 구동방식의 근본적인 문제를 해결하기 위해 제시된 새로운 방법의 하이퍼써이마 구동방식이다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 4(c) shows a new HyperTherma driving method proposed to solve the fundamental problem of the existing HyperTherma driving method.

data.source_sentence: 이 방식은 몸 전체를 고주파 교류 자기장에 노출을 시키면서 정적 경사자기장을 발생시켜 자기장이 발생하지 않는 영역을 형성하여 그 영역 내에서 자성 나노입자를 발열하게 하는 방식이다.
data.mt_sentence: This method generates a static gradient magnetic field while exposing the entire body to a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field, forming an area in which a magnetic field does not occur, and heating magnetic nanoparticles within the area.
data.target_sentence: In this method, the whole body is exposed to a high-frequency alternating magnetic field to form an area where no magnetic field is generated, and a static gradient magnetic field is generated while heating the magnetic nanoparticles in the area.

data.source_sentence: 외부에서 인가된 경사 자기장의 세기에 자성 나노입자들은 포화되어 고주파 교류 자기장에 노출되어도 발열을 하지 않는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is a method in which magnetic nanoparticles are saturated with the intensity of an externally applied inclined magnetic field and do not generate heat even when exposed to a high-frequency alternating current magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: This is a method in which the magnetic nanoparticles are saturated with the intensity of the gradient magnetic field applied from the outside and heat is not generated even when exposed to a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 자기장이 발생하지 않는 영역을 자기장 자유 영역(Field-freeregion)이라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: A region where no magnetic field is generated is called a field-free region.
data.target_sentence: A region where no magnetic field is generated is called a magnetic field-free region.

data.source_sentence: FFR의 최초 개념은 자성 나노입자의 위치 검출(Magneticparticle image MPI) 개발을 위해 적용되었다[26,27].
data.mt_sentence: The first concept of FFR was applied to the development of magnetic nanoparticle position detection (Magneticparticle image MPI) [26,27].
data.target_sentence: The first concept of FFR was applied to the development of magnetic nanoparticles image MPI [26,27].

data.source_sentence: FFR은 전자석을 이용하거나 영구자석을 이용하여 발생할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: FFR can be generated using electromagnets or permanent magnets.
data.target_sentence: FFRs can be created using electromagnets or permanent magnets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 전자석 기반의 FFR을 이용한 표적형 하이퍼써미아의 예시이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 is an example of a targeted hyperthermia using an electromagnet-based FFR.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5 is an example of targeted hyperthermia using an electromagnet-based FFR.

data.source_sentence: FFR 영역에 있는 자성 나노입자만이 충분한 발열을 하게 되며 그 외의 영역에서는 포화상태가 되어 발열이 억제된다.
data.mt_sentence: Only magnetic nanoparticles in the FFR region generate sufficient heat, and in other regions, they become saturated and heat generation is suppressed.
data.target_sentence: Only the magnetic nanoparticles in the FFR region generate sufficient heat, and in other regions, they are saturated and heat generation is suppressed.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6의 경우 영구자석을 이용하여 FFR을 생성하고 영구자석의 위치와 간격을 조절하여 FFR의 위치제어 및 면적을 제어하는 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of Fig. 6, it is the result of controlling the location and area of the FFR by generating FFR using a permanent magnet and adjusting the position and interval of the permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: In case of Fig. 6, the FFR is generated using a permanent magnet and the position and area of the FFR are adjusted by adjusting the position and spacing of the permanent magnets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6(a)는 두 개의 영구자석을 이용하여 FFR을 생성하고 하이퍼써미아를 위한 실험 세팅과 사용된 두 자석을 이용한 FFR 시뮬레이션 및 두 자석 간의 거리에 따른 자기장의 세기를 나타내고 있다.

data.target_sentence: Fig. 6(a) shows the distance between two magnets and the strength of the magnetic field according to the thermotherapy experiment setup, FFR simulation using two magnets, and the two permanent magnet experiment setups.

data.source_sentence: 두 자석은 같은 극이 서로 마주 보고 있어 중심부에 FFR이 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: The two magnets have the same poles facing each other, resulting in FFR in the center.
data.target_sentence: Both magnets have identical poles facing each other, resulting in an FFR in the center.

data.source_sentence: AMF 발생을 위한 코일은 내경 6 cm이며 13개의 홀더에 산화철 나노입자가 세팅되어 있다.

data.target_sentence: The coil for AMF generation has an inner diameter of 6 cm and iron oxide nanoparticles are set in 13 holders.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6(b)는 두 영구자석을 대칭되게 거리를 조절하여 FFR의 면적을 제어하여 발열 면적을 조절하는 결과이다.

data.target_sentence: Fig. 6(b) is the result of adjusting the heating area by adjusting the area of the FFR by symmetrically adjusting the distance between the two permanent magnets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 6(c)의 경우 영구자석을 비대칭적으로 이동시키며 회전시켜 FFR의 위치를 조절하여 발열 타깃지점을 변경하는 결과이다.

data.target_sentence: In the case of Fig. 6(c), it is the result of changing the heating target point by adjusting the position of the FFR by moving and rotating the permanent magnet asymmetrically.

data.source_sentence: 두 영구자석을 이용하여 FFR의 크기 조절과 위치 조절이 가능하여 표적화된 하이퍼써이마가 가능하다.

data.target_sentence: By using two permanent magnets, the size and position of the FFR can be adjusted, so the desired thermal treatment is possible.

data.source_sentence: 외부에서 인가되는 자기장의 세기는 자성 나노입자의 포화 지점의 최대 80% 수준까지 필요하다.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자와 고주파 자기장을 이용한 하이퍼써미아는 개념적으로 암 치료를 위한 획기적인 방법이다.

data.target_sentence: Hyperthermia using magnetic nanoparticles and high-frequency magnetic fields is a conceptually groundbreaking cancer treatment method.

data.source_sentence: 앞서 설명한 것과 같이 표적지 이외의 곳에 있는 자성 나노입자의 발열에 의한 정상세포의 손상이 가장 큰 문제점이다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, the biggest problem is damage to normal cells due to heat generation of magnetic nanoparticles other than the target site.

data.target_sentence: In particular, targeting technology using FFR is a representative solution.

data.target_sentence: For targeted thermotherapy using FFR, the development of magnetic nanoparticles with very good magnetic properties should be preceded.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자의 발열은 모양, 구조, 표면 상태 등 다양한 변수에 의존한다.

data.target_sentence: The exothermic heat of magnetic nanoparticles depends on various variables such as shape, structure, and surface condition.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자의 특성이 고려된 장치가 개발되더라도 자성 나노입자의 발열량을 제어할 수 있어야 한다.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 상용화된 하이퍼써이마 장치는 온도 제어가 불가능하다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 정부(과학기술정보통신부, 산업통상자원부, 보건복지부, 식품의약품안전처)의 재원으로범부처전주기의료기기연구개발사업단의 지원을 받아 수행된 연구이다(과제고유번호:KMDF_PR_20200901_0130).

data.source_sentence: 보정기의 위상지연각 분산특성과 전기장 투과율비의 파장의존성을 고려하여 시료에 입사하는 빛의 편광상태를 최적화하기 위한 편광자의 방위각과 편광자측 보정기의 방위각 조합들을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the phase delay angle dispersion characteristics of the calibrator and the wavelength dependence of the electric field transmittance ratio, we present the azimuth combination of the polarizer and the polarizer side corrector to optimize the polarization state of light incident on the sample.
data.target_sentence: We present an azimuth combination of a polarizer and a compensator on the polarizer side to optimize the polarization state of light incident on the sample, taking into account the phase retarder angular dispersion characteristics of the calibrator and the wavelength dependence of the electric field transmittance.

data.source_sentence: 시료로부터 출사하는 빛의 스톡스상수들을 빠르고 정확하게 측정할 수 있는 검광자의 방위각과 검광자측 보정기의 방위각 조합들, 그리고 출사하는 빛의 스톡스상수들을 구하는 수학적 표현들을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: We present mathematical expressions for finding the Stokes constants of the light emitted from the sample, the combinations of the azimuth angle of the analyzer and the azimuth angle of the compensator on the side of the analyzer that can quickly and accurately measure the Stokes constants of the light emitted from the sample.
data.target_sentence: Combinations of the azimuth angle of the analyzer and the azimuth angle of the analyzer side compensator, which can quickly and accurately measure the Stokes constants of the light emitted from the sample, and mathematical expressions for obtaining the Stokes constants of the emitted light are presented.

data.source_sentence: 편광상태의 제어, 측정 및 분석에 기반한 타원법(ellipsom-etry)은 그 고유한 장점으로 인하여 물질의 광학적 물성의 연구나 표면의 상태 또는 박막의 정밀 측정 등에 매우 유용하다.
data.mt_sentence: The ellipsom-etry based on the control, measurement and analysis of polarization state is very useful for the study of optical properties of a material or precise measurement of a surface state or thin film due to its unique advantage.
data.target_sentence: Elliptometry, which is based on the control, measurement and analysis of polarization states, is very useful for the study of optical properties of materials or for precise measurement of surface states or thin films due to its unique advantages.

data.source_sentence: 움효과를 관찰하고 이를 고려한 측정이론을 제시하여 MME측정의 정확도를 향상시켰다.

data.source_sentence: 식 (11)에서 p, g 그리고 dc는 광흡수 위상지연자의 흡수상수들과 위상지연각으로 이상적인 위상지연자의 경우 p = 1, g =p/4가 된다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 2 illustrates this characteristic of a composite phase retarder.

data.source_sentence: 선편광자와 그림 2와 같은 위상지연 특성을 가진 복합위상지연자를 통과한 빛의 스톡스벡터는 식 (15)를 이용하여 구할 수 있는데 몇 가지 대표적인 (P, C)의 조합에 대응되는 스톡스벡터들을 표 1에 정리하였다.

data.source_sentence: MME에서 편광상태를 측정한다는 것은 스톡스벡터의 스톡스상수들을 결정하는 것을 말하는데 스톡스 상수들을 결정하는 고전적인 방법에서는 빛을 사분파장 위상지연자와 검광자를 연속으로 통과시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Measuring the polarization state in MME means determining the Stokes constants of the Stokes vector. In the classic method of determining Stokes constants, light is passed through a quarter-wave retarder and an analyzer in succession.
data.target_sentence: Measuring the polarization state in the MME means determining the Stokes constant of the Stokes vector, and the classical method of determining the Stokes constant allows light to pass continuously through a quadrant wavelength phase retarder and detector.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 사분파장위상지연조건을 만족하지 않으며 광흡수가 있는 위상지연자와 검광자를 사용하여 스톡스 상수를 결정하는 방법을 구체적으로 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, a method for determining the Stokes constant using an analyzer and a phase delay with light absorption that does not satisfy the quadrant wavelength phase delay condition is presented in detail.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a method for obtaining the Stokes constant using an analyzer and a phase delay method with light absorption that do not satisfy the quadrant wavelength phase delay condition are presented in detail.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 MP(2A)와 MC(2C)는 각각 방위각이 A인 검광자의 뮬러행렬과 방위각이 C인 위상지연자의 뮬러행렬로서 이들은 각각 아래 식과 같이 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, MP(2A) and MC(2C) are the Mueller matrix of the analyzer whose azimuth is A and the Mueller matrix of the phase delay whose azimuth is C, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Here, MP(2A) and MC(2C) are the Mueller matrix of the analyzer with azimuth A and the Mueller matrix of the phase delay with azimuth C, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 여기에서 S0, S1, S2, S3는 입사광의 스톡스 상수들로서 이들은 I(A, C)로 표현되는 빛의 세기 조합으로부터 결정할 수 있는데이 스톡스 상수들을 결정할 수 있게 하는 빛의 세기 조합은 다수 존재한다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, S0, S1, S2, and S3 are the Stokes constants of incident light, and they can be determined from the light intensity combination expressed by I(A, C), and there are a number of light intensity combinations that allow the Stokes constants to be determined.
data.target_sentence: Here, S0, S1, S2, and S3 are the Stokes constants of the incident light. There are a number of light intensity combinations that make it possible to determine the Day-Stokes constants that can be determined from the light intensity combination represented by I(A, C).

data.mt_sentence: If the light source has polarization dependence, these effects are corrected as follows.
data.target_sentence: If the light source has polarization dependence, these effects are corrected as follows:

data.source_sentence: 한편으로는 편광의존성이 있는 광원에서 방출되는 빛을 편광자만을 통과시킬 때 측정되는 빛의 세기의 역수를 식 (15)의 우측항에 있는 상수 I0에 편광자의 방위각의 함수로 곱하는 방법, 즉 직접적인 수치보정방법을 적용할 수도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, the inverse of the intensity of light measured when light emitted from a polarization-dependent light source passes only through the polarizer is multiplied by the constant I0 in the right-hand term of Equation (15) as a function of the polarizer's azimuth, i.e. a direct numerical correction method.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, when the light emitted from the polarization-dependent light source passes through only the polarizer, multiplying the inverse of the measured light intensity by the right-hand constant I0 in Equation (15) gives the azimuth angle of the polarizer, that is, a direct numerical correction method.

data.source_sentence: 불완전한 위상지연자를 보정기로 사용하는 경우에도 시료의 뮬러행렬을 측정할 수 있게 하는 자유형 구동방식의 뮬러행렬타원계를 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: We present a free-form driving type Mueller matrix ellipsometer that can measure the Muller matrix of a sample even when an incomplete phase lag is used as a compensator.
data.target_sentence: We present a free-form driven Mueller matrix ellipsometer that can measure the Muller matrix of a sample even when an imperfect phase difference is used as a compensator.

data.source_sentence: 가상현실(virtual reality) 구현을 위한 헤드마운트 디스플레이는 사용자의 눈과 가까이 위치하고, 화면의 위치가 고정되어 있기 때문에 좁은 시야각이 소비전력 측면에서 유리하다.
data.mt_sentence: The headmount display for virtual reality implementation is located close to the user's eyes and the position of the screen is fixed, so the narrow viewing angle is advantageous in terms of power consumption.
data.target_sentence: The head-mounted display for realizing virtual reality is located close to the user's eyes, and since the position of the screen is fixed, it is advantageous in terms of power consumption to have a narrow viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 이 구조는 기존의 불필요한 광손실을 제거한 고효율 LCD로서의 활용이 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: This structure is expected to be utilized as a high-efficiency LCD that eliminates unnecessary light loss.
data.target_sentence: This structure is expected to be utilized as a high-efficiency LCD that eliminates unnecessary light loss.

data.source_sentence: 헤드마운트 디스플레이(head-mounted display, HMD)는 사람의 눈앞 근거리에 위치하고 눈을 덮는 공간 내부에 배치되기 때문에 일반적인 디스플레이와 다른 특성을 필요로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: A head-mounted display (HMD) requires different characteristics from a general display because it is located close to the person's eyes and is placed inside the space that covers the eyes.
data.target_sentence: HMD (Head Mounted Display) is located close to the human eye and is located inside the space that covers the eye, so it requires different characteristics from the general display.

data.source_sentence: 2–3인치 내외의 작은 화면에 고화질을 구현해야 하기 때문에 4K 이상의 고해상도가 필요하고, 고정된 위치 때문에 좁은 시야각이 필요하며, 휴대성을 위해 저소비 전력 구동이 필요하다(그림 1).
data.mt_sentence: A high resolution of 4K or higher is required because high-definition is to be implemented on a small screen of about 2-3 inches, a narrow viewing angle is required due to a fixed location, and low power consumption is required for portability (Figure 1).
data.target_sentence: High resolution of 4K or higher is required because high definition must be implemented on a small screen of around 2–3 inches. In addition, a narrow viewing angle is required due to the fixed position, and a low power consumption drive is required for portability (Figure 1).

data.source_sentence: HMD 내부는 밀폐된 공간이므로 시야각 이외의 방향에서의 불필요한 빛의 누설을 최소화해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the inside of the HMD is an enclosed space, unnecessary light leakage from directions other than the viewing angle should be minimized.
data.target_sentence: Since the inside of the HMD is an enclosed space, unnecessary light leakage from directions other than the viewing angle should be minimized.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 LCD의 BLU 구조 최적화를 통하여 HMD의 협시야각을 구현하는 시뮬레이션을 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, a simulation was performed to realize the narrow viewing angle of the HMD through the optimization of the BLU structure of the LCD.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, a simulation was performed to realize the narrow viewing angle of the HMD through the optimization of the BLU structure of the LCD.

data.source_sentence: 역프리즘 필름의 형상을 단면과 이중면 구조에 대해 각각 최적화함으로써, 이중면 역프리즘 필름의 경우 집광 효과로 인해 단면 역프리즘 구조 대비 최대 휘도가 14% 향상된 결과를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: By optimizing the shape of the reverse prism film for the cross-sectional and double-sided structures, the maximum luminance of the double-sided inverse prism film was improved by 14% due to the condensing effect.
data.target_sentence: By optimizing the shape of the inverted prism film for single-sided and double-sided structures, the maximum luminance of the double-sided inverted prism film was improved by 14% due to the light collecting effect.

data.source_sentence: 입사된 광에너지 대비 출광된 광에너지 비율을 나타내는 광효율의 경우, 최적 구조에서 좌우 40도의 시야각 조건으로 약 70%의 광효율을 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of light efficiency, which represents the ratio of emitted light energy to incident light energy, about 70% of light efficiency was obtained under the condition of a viewing angle of 40 degrees left and right in the optimal structure.
data.target_sentence: In the case of light efficiency, which represents the ratio of emitted light energy to incident light energy, in the optimal structure, about 70% of light efficiency was obtained at a left and right viewing angle of 40 degrees.

data.source_sentence: 결과 는 역프리즘 구조의 BLU를 최적화함으로써 협시야각 특성이 개선된 HMD용으로의 활용 가능성을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: The results suggest the possibility of utilization for HMD with improved angina-visual characteristics by optimizing BLU of inverse prism structure.
data.target_sentence: The results suggest the possibility of using HMD with improved angina-visual characteristics by optimizing the BLU of the inverted prism structure.

data.source_sentence: LED 근방의 빛 에너지가 크기 때문에, 산란 패턴의 크기와 간격을 위치에 따라 조절하면 LGP 상면에 출광되는 빛의 분포를 균일하게 만들 수 있다(그림 2(a), 그림 3(b)).
data.mt_sentence: Due to the large light energy near the LED, the size and spacing of the scattering pattern can be adjusted according to the location to make the distribution of light emitted on the top of the LGP uniform (Fig. 2(a) and Fig. 3(b).
data.target_sentence: Since the light energy near the LED is large, adjusting the size and spacing of the scattering pattern according to the position can make the distribution of light emitted on the upper surface of the LGP uniform (Fig. 2(a), Fig. 3(b)).

data.source_sentence: BLU 구조가 간단할수록 광손실이 줄어들기 때문에 역프리즘을 적용한 방식이 효율이 높다.
data.mt_sentence: The simpler the BLU structure, the lower the light loss, so the method using the inverse prism is more efficient.
data.target_sentence: The simpler the BLU structure, the less optical loss, so the method using an inverted prism is more efficient.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(d)–2(f)는 위 구조의 BLU에 대해 측정된 휘도 분포도를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 2(d)–2(f) show the measured luminance distribution for the BLU of the above structure.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(d)-2(f) shows the measured luminance distribution for the BLU of the above structure.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(e)와 그림 2(f)를 비교하면 역프리즘을 적용한 방식이 효율이 높을 뿐만 아니라, 시야각 분포가 상하는 좁고 좌우가 넓은 특징을 보이기 때문에 HMD에 더 적합한 방식임을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Comparing Fig. 2(e) and Fig. 2(f), it can be seen that the method applying the inverted prism is more suitable for HMD because it has high efficiency, and the viewing angle distribution is narrow at the top and bottom and wide at the left and right.
data.target_sentence: Comparing Fig. 2(e) with Fig. 2(f), the method using the inverted prism has higher efficiency. In addition, since the viewing angle distribution is narrow at the top and wide at the left and right, it can be seen that this method is more suitable for HMD.

data.source_sentence: BLU의 광분포는 각 구성 요소의 특성에 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The light distribution of BLU is affected by the characteristics of each component.
data.target_sentence: The light distribution of BLU is affected by the characteristics of each part.

data.source_sentence: 여기서는 산란 패턴의 형상을 구형(sphere)을 기반으로 하고 그 절단면의 위치에 따라 볼록한 정도를 가변하였고, 그 형상을 D, h로 나타내었다(그림 3).
data.mt_sentence: Here, the shape of the scattering pattern is based on a sphere, and the degree of convexity is varied according to the position of the cut surface, and the shape is indicated by D and h (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: Here, the shape of the scattering pattern was based on a sphere, and the degree of convexity varies depending on the position of the cut surface, and the shape is shown as D and h (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 동일한 단면적을 갖도록 일정한 D값에 대해서 h값을 다르게 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The h value was set differently for a constant D value to have the same cross-sectional area.
data.target_sentence: Different values of h were set so that constant D values had the same cross-sectional area.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 D/h = 2–14 범위에서 LGP에서 출광된 빛의 분포를 시뮬레이션하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the distribution of light emitted from LGP was simulated in the range of D/h = 2–14.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the distribution of light emitted from a light guide plate was simulated in the range of D/h = 2–14.

data.source_sentence: N = 107개의 ray를 이용하였을 때, 상대 오차는 5% 이내로 수렴하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When N = 107 rays were used, the relative error converged within 5%.
data.target_sentence: When N = 107 rays were used, the relative error converges within 5%.

data.source_sentence: LGP 중앙에서 휘도 분포를 구하고, 방출된 광속(luminous flux)를 계산하여 상대적 광효율(relative optical efficiency)을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The luminance distribution was obtained at the center of the LGP, and the relative optical efficiency was obtained by calculating the emitted luminous flux.
data.target_sentence: The luminance distribution was obtained from the center of the light guide plate, and the relative light efficiency was obtained by calculating the luminous flux.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3(b)에서LGP 상면으로 출광된 광량 분포를 나타내며 LED가 있는 일부 영역을 제외하고 균일한 값을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3(b) shows the light intensity distribution emitted to the top of the LGP and has uniform values except for some areas with LEDs.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3(b) shows the distribution of light intensity emitted to the upper part of the light guide plate, and has a uniform value except for a portion with some LEDs.

data.source_sentence: 도각 q, 방위각 ϕ)은 그림 2에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The angle q and azimuth angle )) are shown in Figure 2.
data.target_sentence: Degree angle q, azimuth angle ϕ) are shown in Fig. 2.

data.source_sentence: D/h값이 작은 경우, 빛이 넓은 각도 범위로 분포하다가, D/h값이 증가할수록 점차 좁아지는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the D/h value is small, it can be seen that light is distributed in a wide angle range, and then gradually decreases as the D/h value increases.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that when the D/h value is small, the light is distributed over a wide angular range and gradually decreases as the D/h value increases.

data.source_sentence: 이는 bump의 형상이 구형에 가까워질수록 산란 각도 분포가 넓어지기 때문이고, 반대로 bump 형상이 납작한 형태가 될수록 전반사각에서 좁은 각도범위로 산란되기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because the scattering angle distribution widens as the shape of the bump approaches the sphere, and on the contrary, as the shape of the bump becomes flat, it scatters in a narrow angle range at the overall angle.
data.target_sentence: This is because the scattering angle distribution becomes wider as the shape of the bump approaches a sphere, and conversely, as the shape of the bump becomes flatter, the scattering occurs in a narrow angular range at all angles.

data.source_sentence: LGP 상에 전반사되어 진행하는 빛의 각도별 휘도 변화를 상세히 비교하기 위해 그림 4(a)의 백색 점선표시 방향으로의 휘도 변화를 그림 4(e)에 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to compare the luminance change for each angle of the total reflected and propagating light on the LGP in detail, the luminance change in the direction indicated by the white dotted line in Fig. 4(a) is shown in Fig. 4(e).
data.target_sentence: In order to compare the luminance change for each angle of total reflected light and propagated light in the light guide plate, the luminance change in the direction of the white dotted line in Fig. 4(a) is shown in Fig. 4(e).

data.source_sentence: D/h > 10인 경우각 휘도 분포에 큰 변화가 없었다.
data.mt_sentence: When D/h > 10, there was no significant change in each luminance distribution.
data.target_sentence: When D/h > 10, there was no significant change in each luminance distribution.

data.source_sentence: 이후 분석은 측정값에 대응되는 D/h = 10인 산란 패턴 형상으로 고정한 후 시뮬레이션을 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After that, the analysis was fixed in a scattering pattern shape with D/h = 10 corresponding to the measured value, and then the simulation was performed.
data.target_sentence: After that, the simulation was performed after fixing the analysis in the form of a scattering pattern with D/h = 10 corresponding to the measured value.

data.source_sentence: 역프리즘 구조는 그림 2(f)에서 보이듯 가로 시야각이 넓고, 상하 시야각이 좁은 광분포 때문에 HMD에 적합하며 구조가 간단하기 때문에 형상의 변화에 대한 광분포 변화를 직접적으로 설계에 반영할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 2(f), the inverse prism structure is suitable for HMD due to the wide horizontal viewing angle and narrow vertical viewing angle, and the simple structure allows direct reflection of the change in the light distribution for the shape change.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 2(f), the inverted prism structure is suitable for HMD and has a simple structure because it has a wide horizontal viewing angle and a narrow vertical viewing angle. Therefore, the change in light distribution for the change in shape can be directly reflected in the design.

data.source_sentence: 각 경사면의 경사각은 β, g이고, 수평에 대해서 각도 α로 입사된 ray는 굴절및 반사 조건을 이용하여 역 프리즘 시트의 상면으로 나온다.
data.mt_sentence: The inclination angles of each inclined surface are β and g, and the ray incident at an angle α with respect to the horizontal comes out to the upper surface of the inverted prism sheet using refraction and reflection conditions.
data.target_sentence: The inclination angles of each inclined plane are β and g, and the light rays incident at the angle α with respect to the horizontal plane come out to the upper surface of the inverted prism sheet using refraction and reflection conditions.

data.source_sentence: 각 계면에서의 굴절 및 반사조건은 아래의 식으로 나타낼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Refraction and reflection conditions at each interface can be expressed by the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The refraction and reflection conditions at each interface can be expressed by the following equations:

data.source_sentence: 역프리즘의 형태를 결정하는 인자는 β와 g이며, 아래에 놓인 LGP 상면으로 빠져나온 빛의 각도 α로부터 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: The factors determining the shape of the inverted prism are β and g, and it is determined from the angle α of the light exiting the upper surface of the LGP lying underneath.
data.target_sentence: The factors determining the shape of the inverted prism are β and g, and it is determined from the angle α of the light emitted from the upper surface of the light guide plate lying below.

data.source_sentence: 그림 6은 위의 역프리즘 구조를 그림 4의 도광판 bump 형상 4(a)–4(d)에 적용한 시뮬레이션 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 6 shows the simulation result of applying the above inverted prism structure to the bump shape 4(a)–4(d) of the light guide plate in Fig. 4.
data.target_sentence: Figure 6 is the simulation result of applying the above inverted prism structure to the light guide plate bump shape 4(a)–4(d) in Figure 4.

data.source_sentence: 역프리즘에 의해 LGP에서 나온 빛이 위로 꺾여서 중앙(정면)으로 분포하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The light emitted from the LGP is bent upward by the inverted prism and distributed to the center (front).
data.target_sentence: The light emitted from the light guide plate is bent upwards by an inverted prism and distributed to the center (front).

data.source_sentence: 그림 4(a)–4(d)에서 LGP의 휘도 분포가 좁아지는 것처럼, 여기서도 그림 6(a)에서 그림 6(d)로 갈수록 중앙부의 광분포가 좁아지는 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Just as the luminance distribution of LGP in Fig. 4(a)–4(d) narrows, it can be seen that the light distribution in the center narrows from Fig. 6(a) to Fig. 6(d).
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 4(a)-4(d), the light distribution in the center becomes narrower from Fig. 6(a) to Fig. 6(d) as the luminance distribution of the light guide plate becomes narrower.

data.source_sentence: 이는 LGP에 서 출광된 빛 중 일부가 역프리즘의 B면에서 반사되지 않고, 역프리즘의 윗면에서 전반사 각도를 깨고 바로 빠져나온다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that some of the light emitted from the LGP is not reflected from the B surface of the inverted prism, but exits immediately after breaking the total reflection angle from the upper surface of the inverted prism.
data.target_sentence: This means that a part of the light emitted from the light guide plate is not reflected from the B side of the inverted prism and exits immediately after breaking the total reflection angle at the top of the inverted prism.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4에서 D/h값이 커질수록 빛이 좁은 각도 범위로 분포하기 때문에 그림 6의 2차 subpeak의 세기도 점차 감소하는 경향을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: In Fig. 4, as the D/h value increases, the light is distributed in a narrow angle range, so the strength of the secondary subpeak in Fig. 6 tends to gradually decrease.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 4, as the D/h value increases, the intensity of the secondary subpeak in Fig. 6 gradually decreases because the light is distributed in a narrow angular range.

data.source_sentence: 이로써 D/h가 증가하면 중앙으로 집중하는 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, as D/h increases, it is possible to focus on the center.
