data.target_sentence: As a result, as D/h increases, it is possible to focus on the center.

data.source_sentence: 이 실험을 통해 빛 효율이 증가할 것을 예상할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this experiment, it can be expected that the light efficiency will increase.
data.target_sentence: It can be expected that the light efficiency will increase through this experiment.

data.source_sentence: 표 1은 본 구조의 최대 휘도와 광효율, 즉 총 광에너지 중, 정면으로 빠져나오는 광에너지 비율을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 shows the maximum luminance and light efficiency of the structure, that is, the ratio of light energy flowing out in front of the total light energy.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 shows the maximum luminance and luminous efficiency of the structure, that is, the ratio of light energy flowing forward rather than total light energy.

data.source_sentence: 경사면 B를 두 개의 면으로 분리하여 서로 다른 각으로 반사시키면 퍼지는 빛을 수렴하도록 만들 수 있고, 이를 통해 시야각을 더욱 좁게 할 뿐만 아니라 휘도 또한 증가할 것을 예상할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the inclined plane B is separated into two planes and reflected at different angles, the diffused light can be made to converge.
data.target_sentence: By dividing the B slope into two sides and reflecting them at different angles, it can be expected that the diffused light can be converged to increase the luminance and narrow the viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7에 이중각을 적용한 역프리즘 구조를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows an inverted prism structure to which a double angle is applied.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the inverted column structure to which the double angle is applied.

data.source_sentence: B면을 두 개의 면으로 나누어 각각 g, g’로 지정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Plane B was divided into two planes and designated as g and g', respectively.
data.target_sentence: Plane B is divided into two planes, designated g and g' respectively.

data.source_sentence: 그림 8은 이중각 역프리즘 구조를 적용한 휘도 분포를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 8 shows the luminance distribution to which the double-angle inverted prism structure is applied.
data.target_sentence: 8 shows the luminance distribution to which the double angle prism structure is applied.

data.source_sentence: 그림 8(a)–8(d)에서 이중각 역프리즘 구조를 적용한 경우 중앙의 휘도 분포가 좌우로 더욱 확장되었으며, 중앙 최대 휘도값은 증가한 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In Fig. 8(a)–8(d), when the double-angle inverted prism structure is applied, the central luminance distribution is further expanded to the left and right, and it can be seen that the central maximum luminance value is increased.
data.target_sentence: In Fig. 8(a)-8(d), it can be seen that when the double-angle prism structure is applied, the central luminance distribution is further expanded to the left and right, and the maximum central luminance value increases. .

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 g는 고정하고 g’를 27–33도, 즉 6도 범위에서 변경하였기 때문에 반사된 ray의 각은 최대 12도 범위에서 변하게 되며, 최대 휘도 각도는 g’값에 따라 중심(정면)에서 위쪽으로 10도 이내로 이동한다(그림 8(e)).
data.mt_sentence: In this study, since g is fixed and g' is changed in the range of 27–33 degrees, that is, 6 degrees, the angle of the reflected ray changes in the range of up to 12 degrees, and the maximum luminance angle moves within 10 degrees from the center (front) depending on the value of g' (Fig. 8(e).
data.target_sentence: In this study, since g is fixed and g' is changed in the range of 27–33 degrees, that is, 6 degrees, the angle of the reflected ray changes in the range of up to 12 degrees. The maximum luminance angle moves within 10 degrees upward from the center (front) according to the g' value (Fig. 8(e)).

data.source_sentence: 정확한 시뮬레이션을 위해서는 g 와 g’을 함께 최적화하여 최대 휘도가 중심(정면)에 위치하도록 해야 하지만, 최대 휘도 변화는 거의 없다.
data.mt_sentence: For accurate simulation, g and g' should be optimized together so that the maximum luminance is located at the center (front), but there is little change in the maximum luminance.
data.target_sentence: For accurate simulation, g and g' should be optimized together so that the maximum luminance is in the center (front), but there is little change in the maximum luminance.

data.source_sentence: 이상의 결과는 이중각 역프리즘 구조가 정면 휘도 증가에 기여할 뿐만 아니라 좌우 시야각을 넓게 함을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The above results show that the double-angle inverted prism structure not only contributes to an increase in frontal luminance but also widens the left and right viewing angles.
data.target_sentence: The above results show that the double-angle prism structure not only contributes to an increase in frontal luminance, but also widens the left and right viewing angles.

data.source_sentence: LGP의 하면 bump 형상과 결합하여 좁은 시야각을 가지는 HMD용 디스플레이로의 응용이 가 능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Combined with the lower bump shape of LGP, it can be applied to a display for HMD with a narrow viewing angle.
data.target_sentence: Combined with the lower bump shape of the light guide plate, it can be applied to HMD displays with a narrow viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 광시야각에 최적화된 일반적인 LCD를 HMD에 적합한 좁은 시야각을 위한 광학 설계 결과를 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the results of optical design for a narrow viewing angle suitable for a general LCD optimized for a wide viewing angle were studied.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the optical design results for a narrow viewing angle suitable for a general LCD optimized for a wide viewing angle were studied.

data.source_sentence: BLU의 LGP 하부면 산란 패턴의 형상과 역프리즘 구조를 각각 최적화함으로써 기존 대비 상하 시야각은 좁게 하면서도정면 휘도를 향상할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: By optimizing the shape of the LGP bottom scattering pattern of the BLU and the reverse prism structure, it was possible to improve the front luminance while narrowing the vertical viewing angle compared to the previous one.
data.target_sentence: By optimizing the shape of the scattering pattern under the light guide plate and the inverse prism structure of the BLU, it was possible to narrow the vertical viewing angle and improve the front luminance compared to the existing ones.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과로부터 BLU의 산란 패턴의 형상이 좁은 시야각을 구현하는 주요 인자로 작용함을 알 수 있고, BLU의 휘도 향상은 이중각 역프리즘 구조로 개선할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: From the results, it can be seen that the shape of the scattering pattern of the BLU acts as a major factor for implementing a narrow viewing angle, and the improvement of the luminance of the BLU can be improved by a double-angle inverse prism structure.
data.target_sentence: As a result, it can be seen that the shape of the scattering pattern of the BLU acts as a major factor for implementing a narrow viewing angle, and it can be seen that the luminance improvement of the BLU can be improved by the double-angle inverse prism structure.

data.source_sentence: 이는 기존 구조에서 정면이 아닌 측면 방향으로 분포한 빛을 억제함으로써 가능함을 알게 되었으며 고효율 HMD 디스플레이로의 활용이 기대된다.
data.mt_sentence: It was found that this is possible by suppressing light distributed in the lateral direction rather than the front in the existing structure, and it is expected to be used as a high-efficiency HMD display.
data.target_sentence: This is expected to be utilized as a high-efficiency HMD display as it has been found that this is possible by suppressing the light scattered in the lateral direction instead of the front in the existing structure.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 고성능 Nd-Fe-B 자석 제조의 핵심인 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 미세구조 제어기술에 대해 보고한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper reports the microstructure control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase, which is the core of high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnet manufacturing.
data.target_sentence: This paper reports the microstructure control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase, which is the key to manufacturing high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnets.

data.source_sentence: 열처리 동안에 Cu-첨가 자석에서 일어나는 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 결정구조 변화 분석을 통해, 보자력 향상에 필수적인 Nd-산화물의 결정구조 및 이의 안정화 기구를 밝혔다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the analysis of the crystal structure change of the Nd-rich triple point phase and the grain boundary phase occurring in the Cu-added magnet during heat treatment, the crystal structure of Nd-oxide essential for improving the coercive force and its stabilization mechanism were revealed.
data.target_sentence: The crystal structure and stabilization mechanism of Ndoxide essential for coercive force improvement were investigated by analyzing the crystal structure change of the Ndrich triple point phase and the crystal structure change of the grain boundary phase occurring in the Cuadded magnet during the heat treatment process.

data.source_sentence: Cu-첨가 자석 내에 준안정 Nd-rich 상의 형성을 극대화할 수 있는 열처리 공정을 개발함으로써 자석의 보자력을 더욱 향상시킬 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The coercive force of the magnet could be further improved by developing a heat treatment process that maximizes the formation of a metastable Nd-rich phase in the Cu-added magnet.
data.target_sentence: The magnet's coercivity can be further enhanced by developing a heat treatment process that maximizes the formation of metastable Nd-rich phases in Cu-doped magnets.

data.source_sentence: SEM, EPMA 및 HR-TEM을 이용한 면밀한 미세구조 분석을 통해 Cu-첨가 자석의 구조/화학적 결점을 파악함으로써, 이를 효율적으로 보완할 수 있는 금속 원소 첨가 공정을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The structure/chemical defects of Cu-added magnets were identified through close microstructure analysis using SEM, EPMA, and HR-TEM, and a metal element addition process was developed to compensate them efficiently.
data.target_sentence: Structural/chemical defects of Cu-added magnets were identified through precise microstructure analysis using SEM, EPMA, and HR-TEM, and a metal element addition process was developed to effectively compensate for them.

data.source_sentence: 잔류자화의 감소를 최소화하면서 Cu-첨가 자석의 보자력을 성공적으로 향상시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: We have successfully improved the coercive force of Cu-added magnets while minimizing the reduction in residual magnetization.
data.target_sentence: We have successfully improved the coercive force of Cuadded magnets while minimizing residual magnetization reduction.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 축적된 미세구조 분석 결과를 토대로, 고가의 희토류 사용량을 최소화 하면서 Nd-Fe-B 영구자석의 보자력을 극대화할 수 있는 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 제어기술의 개발 방향을 제시해 보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of microstructure analysis accumulated so far, the direction of development of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary structure/chemical control technology that can maximize the beam power of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets while minimizing the use of expensive rare earths.
data.target_sentence: Based on the microstructure analysis results accumulated so far, the use of expensive rare earths is minimized. At the same time, we would like to present the development direction of the structure/chemical control technology of the Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase that can maximize the coercive force of the Nd-Fe-B permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 구동모터의 효율을 극대화하기 위해서는 모터 내 Nd-Fe-B 자석의 자기적 특성 개선이 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to maximize the efficiency of the driving motor, it is essential to improve the magnetic properties of the Nd-Fe-B magnet in the motor.
data.target_sentence: In order to maximize the efficiency of the driving motor, it is essential to improve the magnetic properties of the Nd-Fe-B magnet in the motor.

data.source_sentence: 모터의 구동온도(150~200 °C) 범위 내에서의 자석의 자속밀도 손실을 최소화하기 위해 자석의 보자력 특성을 향상시키는 것이 가장 중요한데, 현재 Nd-Fe-B 자석에서 구현되는 보자력은 이론값(67 kOe)의 25% 수준에 불과하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to minimize loss of magnetic flux density of a magnet within a driving temperature (150°C to 200°C) of a motor, it is most important to improve the holding force characteristics of the magnet, and the holding force implemented in the Nd-Fe-B magnet is only 25% of a theoretical value (67 kOe).
data.target_sentence: It is most important to improve the coercive force characteristics of the magnet to minimize the magnetic flux density loss of the magnet within the operating temperature range of the motor (150 ~ 200 °C). Currently, the coercive force realized in Nd-Fe-B magnets is only 25% of the theoretical value (67 kOe).

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B 자석에 중희토류를 첨가하면, 중희토류 원자와 Fe 원자간의 반강자성결합(antiferromagnetic coupling)으로 인해 자석의 잔류자화 및(BH)max 특성이 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: The addition of heavy rare earths to the Nd-Fe-B magnet reduces the residual magnetization and (BH)max properties of the magnet due to the antiferromagnetic coupling between the heavy rare earth atoms and Fe atoms of Fe.
data.target_sentence: The addition of heavy rare earth to Nd-Fe-B magnets reduces the residual magnetization and (BH)max properties of the magnet due to the antiferromagnetic bonding between the heavy rare earth atoms and Fe atoms in Fe.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는, 친환경 자동차, 드론 등의 고부가가치 산업에서의 희토류 자원에 대한 수요 급증과 중국의 자원무기화가 맞물려, Nd-Fe-B 자석 산업에서의 경희토류 및 중희토류 원소의 사용은 더욱 제한적이 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, the use of light earth and heavy earth elements in the Nd-Fe-B magnet industry has become more limited due to the rapid increase in demand for rare earth resources in high value-added industries such as eco-friendly vehicles and drones and China's resource weaponization.
data.target_sentence: Recently, the rapid increase in demand for rare earth resources in high value-added industries such as eco-friendly cars and drones is coupled with China's resource weaponization. Therefore, the use of light and medium rare earth elements in the Nd-Fe-B magnet industry has become more limited.

data.source_sentence: 중희토류 및 경희토류의 사용량을 저감하면서 Nd-Fe-B 자석의 보자력을 향상시킬 수 있는 기술 개발이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is required to develop a technology that can improve the coercive force of Nd-Fe-B magnets while reducing the amount of heavy and light rare earths.
data.target_sentence: It is required to develop a technology that can reduce the amount of medium and light rare earths while improving the coercive force of Nd-Fe-B magnets.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B 자석의 보자력 발생 기구(i.e., 계면에서의 역자구핵생성 억제 및 2:14:1 상간의 자기교환결합 약화)를 고려하면, 희토류 원소의 사용량을 최소화하면서 Nd-Fe-B 자석의 보자력을 향상시키기 위해서는 다음 3가지의 미세구조제어기술이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the mechanisms for generating Nd-Fe-B magnets (i.e., inhibition of reverse autologous nucleation at interfaces and weakening of self-exchange bonds between 2:14:1 phases), the following three microstructural techniques are important to improve the Nd-Fe-B magnets' visibility while minimizing the use of rare earth elements.
data.target_sentence: The coercive force generation mechanism of Nd-Fe-B magnets (i.e., inhibition of inverse magnetic nucleation at the interface and weakening of the magnetic exchange coupling between 2:14:1 phases) is considered. Then, in order to improve the coercive force of Nd-Fe-B magnets while minimizing the amount of rare earth elements, the following three microstructure control technologies are important.

data.source_sentence: 주목해야 할 점은, (ii), (iii)을 통해 고보자력을 얻기 위해서는 (i)의 미세구조 구현이 필수적으로 선행되어야 한다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It should be noted that the implementation of the microstructure of (i) must be preceded in order to obtain high visibility through (ii) and (iii).
data.target_sentence: It should be noted that in order to obtain high visibility through (ii) and (iii), the implementation of the microstructure of (i) must be preceded.

data.source_sentence: Nd-rich 액상의 입계 침투 효과 이외에, Nd-산화물 관점에서의 열처리된 자석의 보자력 향상 효과에 대한 해석이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to the grain boundary penetration effect of the Nd-rich liquid phase, it is necessary to analyze the coercive force improvement effect of the heat-treated magnet from the viewpoint of Nd-oxide.
data.target_sentence: It is necessary to analyze the coercive force improvement effect of the heat-treated magnet as well as the grain boundary penetration effect of the Nd-rich liquid phase from the viewpoint of Nd-oxide.

data.source_sentence: 아직까지도 열처리 동안에 자석에서 일어나는 Nd-산화물 형태의 삼중점상 및 입계상의 결정구조 변화에 대한 이해가 부족하고, 이에 대한 기구가 명확히 규명되지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: There is still a lack of understanding of the changes in the crystal structure of the triple point phase and grain boundary phase in the form of Nd-oxide occurring in the magnet during heat treatment, and the mechanism for this has not been clearly identified.
data.target_sentence: The understanding of the crystal structure changes of the triple-point and grain boundary phases of the Ndoxide type generated in the magnet during the heat treatment process is still insufficient, and the mechanism for this is not clearly known.

data.source_sentence: 열처리에 의한 Cu-첨가 자석 내 미세구조 변화의 근원을 이해하면, 자석의 미세구조적 결점을 파악할 수 있고, 이를 보완함으로써 Cu-첨가 자석의 보자력을 극대화할 수 있는 실마리를 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By understanding the source of microstructural changes in Cu-added magnets due to heat treatment, microstructural defects of magnets can be identified, and by complementing them, a clue can be obtained to maximize the coercive force of Cu-added magnets.
data.target_sentence: Understanding the source of microstructural changes in Cu-doped magnets by heat treatment can identify microstructural defects in magnets. By supplementing this, a clue to maximize the coercive force of the Cu-doped magnet can be obtained.

data.source_sentence: Cu-첨가 자석의 미세구조적 취약점을 밝힘으로써 Cu-첨가 자석에서 구현되는 보자력에 한계가 나타나는 이유를 명확히 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By revealing the microstructural weakness of the Cu-added magnet, it was clarified why there is a limit to the holding force implemented in the Cu-added magnet.
data.target_sentence: By revealing the microstructural weaknesses of Cu-doped magnets, it became clear why there is a limit to the holding force realized in Cu-doped magnets.

data.source_sentence: 이를 기반으로, Nd-Fe-B 소결자석의 보자력을 극대화할 수 있는, Nd-rich 융점 강하 원소를 활용한 미세구조 최적화 방안을 제시하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on this, a microstructure optimization method using an Nd-rich melting point depressant element that can maximize the coercive force of the Nd-Fe-B sintered magnet was proposed.
data.target_sentence: Based on this, a microstructure optimization method using the Ndrich melting point depressant element that can maximize the coercive force of the NdFeB sintered magnet was proposed.

data.source_sentence: 이와는 달리, (ii)로 표시된 Nd-rich 상은 Nd-Fe-B 소결자석의 보자력 향상에 필수적인 상으로 분류된다.
data.mt_sentence: On the contrary, the Nd-rich phase indicated by (ii) is classified as an essential phase for improving the coercive force of the Nd-Fe-B sintered magnet.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, the Nd-rich phase represented by (ii) is classified as an essential phase for improving the coercive force of the Nd-Fe-B sintered magnet.

data.source_sentence: ab-plane 입계상의 경우에는 자석의 보자력 향상에 크게 기여하지 못한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of the ab-plane grain boundary phase, it does not significantly contribute to the improvement of the coercive force of the magnet.
data.target_sentence: In the case of the ab-plane grain boundary phase, it does not significantly contribute to the improvement of the magnet's coercive force.

data.source_sentence: Nd-rich 삼중점상과 입계상에서는 열처리 동안에 어떠한 미세구조적 변화가 일어날까?
data.mt_sentence: What microstructural changes occur during heat treatment in the Nd-rich triple point phase and the grain boundary phase?
data.target_sentence: What microstructural changes occur during heat treatment in Nd-rich triple point and grain boundary phases?

data.source_sentence: 열처리 이후에 자석의 보자력이 ~4 kOe 증가하였다(not shown here).
data.mt_sentence: After heat treatment, the magnet's coercive force increased by ~4 kOe (not shown here).
data.target_sentence: After heat treatment, the magnet's coercive force increased by ~4 kOe (not shown here).

data.source_sentence: 주목해야할 점은, Nd-Fe-B 자석에 Cu를 첨가하면 열처리 이후에 더높은 보자력이 구현된다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It should be noted that the addition of Cu to the Nd-Fe-B magnet realizes higher coercive force after heat treatment.
data.target_sentence: It should be noted that the addition of Cu to the Nd-Fe-B magnet achieves higher coercive force after heat treatment.

data.source_sentence: Cu-free 자석의 경우 열처리 이후에 10 kOe의 보자력을 나타 낸 반면, Cu-첨가 자석의 경우에는 열처리 이후에 19.5kOe의 매우 높은 보자력을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The Cu-free magnet showed a coercive force of 10 kOe after heat treatment, whereas the Cu-added magnet showed a very high coercive force of 19.5 kOe after heat treatment.
data.target_sentence: The Cu-free magnet showed a coercive force of 10 kOe after heat treatment, whereas the Cu-added magnet showed a very high coercive force of 19.5 kOe after heat treatment.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3b에서 볼 수 있듯이, Cu 첨가 자석의 입계상에서는 Cu의 응집 또한 관찰이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be seen in Fig. 3b, aggregation of Cu is also observed at the grain boundary of the Cu-added magnet.
data.target_sentence: Fig. As can be seen from 3b, Cu aggregation was observed at the grain boundary of the Cu-added magnet.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3(c)에서 볼 수 있듯이, 이러한 산화물형태의 Nd-rich 상에서 Cu의 분포 또한 불균질하게 나타나며 산화물에 대한 Cu의 응집도 차이로 인해 안정화되는 결정구조가 다르다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Fig. 3(c), the distribution of Cu on the oxide-type Nd-rich is also nonuniform, and the crystal structure to be stabilized is different due to the difference in the agglomeration of Cu with respect to the oxide.
data.target_sentence: As shown in FIG. 3(c), the distribution of Cu for oxide-type Nd-rich is also non-uniform, and the crystal structure to be stabilized is different due to the difference in the mass of Cu with respect to oxide.

data.source_sentence: 다음 section III-2에서는 열처리에 의한 Cu 첨가 자석 내 산화물 형태의 Nd-rich삼중점상 및 입계상의 결정구조 변화와, 이와 보자력간의 상관관계에 대해 면밀히 다뤄보도록 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the next section III-2, the changes in the crystal structure of the Nd-rich triple point phase and the grain boundary phase in the oxide form in the Cu-added magnet by heat treatment and the correlation between this and the coercive force will be discussed in detail.
data.target_sentence: In the next section III-2, the crystal structure change of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase in the form of oxides in Cu-doped magnets by heat treatment and the correlation between this and coercive force will be discussed in detail.

data.source_sentence: 열처리 이후 (b)의 Nd-rich 삼중점상의 결정구조를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The crystal structure of the Nd-rich triple point phase in (b) is shown after heat treatment.
data.target_sentence: The crystal structure of the Nd-rich triple point phase is shown in (b) after heat treatment.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5(b)와 같이 거대한 삼중점상 형태의 c-Nd2O3의 형성은 계면에너지만으로는 설명되지 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Fig. 5(b), the formation of c-Nd2O3 in the form of a large triple-point phase is not explained by interface energy alone.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 5(b), the formation of c-Nd2O3 in the form of a large triple-point phase cannot be explained by the interfacial energy alone.

data.source_sentence: 850 °C 열처리 동안의 보자력 증가폭은 0.1 kOe에 불과 하다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The coercive force increase during the 850 °C heat treatment was only 0.1 kOe.
data.target_sentence: During the 850 °C heat treatment, the coercive force increase was only 0.1 kOe.

data.source_sentence: 이전 연구결과에 따르면, 자석의 Cu 함량을 증가시킬수록 Nd-rich 입계상의 연속성은 향상 되지만 보자력은 점차 감소한다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the previous research results, as the Cu content of the magnet is increased, the continuity of the Nd-rich grain boundary improves but the holding force gradually decreases.
data.target_sentence: According to the results of previous studies, as the Cu content of the magnet increases, the continuity of the Nd-rich grain boundaries improves, but the holding force gradually decreases.

data.source_sentence: Cu는 Nd-rich 상의 융점 및 상변태 온도에 지대한 영향을 미치기 때문에, 자석의 Cu 함량을 고려한 열처리 공정 개발을 통해서 더 높은 보자력을 구현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since Cu has a significant effect on the melting point and the phase transformation temperature on the Nd-rich phase, higher bracing force may be implemented through the development of a heat treatment process in consideration of the Cu content of the magnet.
data.target_sentence: Since Cu has a great effect on the melting point and phase transformation temperature of the Nd-rich phase, a higher bracing force can be realized through the development of a heat treatment process that considers the Cu content of the magnet.

data.source_sentence: Al-Cu 동시 첨가 자석의 삼중점상은 화학조성적으로 크게 3가지(A, B, C)로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The triple point phase of the Al-Cu simultaneously added magnet can be divided into three main types (A, B, and C) in chemical composition.
data.target_sentence: The triple point phase of a magnet to which Al-Cu is simultaneously added can be roughly divided into three types (A, B, and C) in terms of chemical composition.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 주목해야 할 점은 Al이 4.2 at.% 고용된 C 상의 출현이다.
data.mt_sentence: What should be noted here is the emergence of phase C in which Al is 4.2 at.% employed.
data.target_sentence: What should be noted here is the appearance of phase C in which 4.2 at.% Al is used.

data.source_sentence: h-Nd2O3로 형성되어야 하는 Cu의 응집도가 낮은 삼중점상의 결정구조가 Al의 고용으로 인해 c-Nd2O3로 변태 되었다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is that the crystal structure of the triple point phase with low aggregation degree of Cu, which should be formed of h-Nd2O3, is transformed into c-Nd2O3 due to the solid solution of Al.
data.target_sentence: This is because the crystal structure of the triple point phase with low aggregation degree of Cu, which should be formed of h-Nd2O3, is transformed into c-Nd2O3 by the solid solution of Al.

data.source_sentence: Cu-첨가 자석의 미세구조적 결점이었던 Cu의 응집도가 낮은 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 특성이, Al-Cu 동시 첨가를 통한 Al의 선택적 고용으로 인해 효율적으로 개선될 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Structural/chemical properties of the Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase with low cohesiveness of Cu, which were microstructural defects of Cu-added magnets, could be efficiently improved due to the selective dissolution of Al through the simultaneous addition of Al-Cu.
data.target_sentence: The structural/chemical properties of the Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase with low Cu agglomeration, which were microstructural defects of Cu-doped magnets, could be efficiently improved by the selective solubility of Al through the simultaneous addition of Al-Cu.

data.source_sentence: 자석의 보자력 향상에 필수적인 준안정 c-Nd2O3는, Cu, Al을 비롯한 금속 원소의 과량고용으로 인해 안정화된다.
data.mt_sentence: Metastable c-Nd2O3, which is essential for improving the coercive force of a magnet, is stabilized due to excessive solidification of metal elements including Cu and Al.
data.target_sentence: Metastable c-Nd2O3, which is essential for improving the coercive force of magnets, is stabilized due to excessive solidification of metal elements such as Cu and Al.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 현재까지 필자가 얻은 연구 결과를 중심으로 Nd-Fe-B 자석 내 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 제어기술을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the structure/chemical control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase in Nd-Fe-B magnet is proposed based on the research results obtained so far.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, based on the research results so far, we propose a structure/chemical control technique for Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase in Nd-Fe-B magnets.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 주목해야 할 점은, 결정학적 상관관계에 따라 오로지 h-Nd2O3만이 Cu 응집을 통해 c-Nd2O3로 변태된다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: It should be noted here that, according to the crystallographic correlation, only h-Nd2O3 is transformed into c-Nd2O3 through Cu aggregation.
data.target_sentence: It should be noted here that only h-Nd2O3 is converted to c-Nd2O3 via Cu aggregation according to the crystallographic correlation.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따라, 중간열처리의 온도를 850°C에서 790°C로 낮춤으로써 최종 열처리 이전에 h-Nd2O3가 형성되도록 유도하여, 최종 열처리 이후의 자석의 보자력을 성공적으로 향상시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, by lowering the temperature of the intermediate heat treatment from 850 °C to 790 °C, h-Nd2O3 was induced to form before the final heat treatment, and the coercive force of the magnet after the final heat treatment was successfully improved.
data.target_sentence: Therefore, by lowering the intermediate heat treatment temperature from 850°C to 790°C, the formation of h-Nd2O3 was induced before the final heat treatment, and the coercive force of the magnet was successfully improved after the final heat treatment.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B계 영구 자석은 자기 특성이 우수하여 산업 전반에 사용되고 있지만 희토류 자원 수급 및 가격 문제는 지속적으로 대두되고 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although Nd-Fe-B-based permanent magnets have excellent magnetic properties and are used throughout the industry, the problems of supply and demand and price of rare earth resources are continuously emerging.
data.target_sentence: Nd-Fe-B-based permanent magnets are used throughout the industry due to their excellent magnetic properties, but the problem of supply and demand of rare earth resources and price problems are continuously emerging.

data.source_sentence: 최근 친환경 자동차 시장의 급격한 성장과 함께 Nd-Fe-B계 영구 자석에 사용되는 희토류 자원 수급 불안정성은 더욱 심화되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: With the recent rapid growth of the eco-friendly automobile market, the instability in supply and demand of rare earth resources used in Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets is intensifying.
data.target_sentence: With the recent rapid growth of the eco-friendly automobile market, supply and demand instability of rare earth resources used for Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets is deepening.

data.source_sentence: 중희토류 금속 또는 Nd를 저감하고도 고특성을 지니는 영구 자석을 제조하기 위해서는 내부 결정립을 단자구 크기까지 미세화하고, 결정립계를 비자성상으로 균일하고 연속적으로 형성시키는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to manufacture a permanent magnet with high properties while reducing heavy rare earth metals or Nd, it is important to refine the internal crystal grains to the size of a single sphere, and to uniformly and continuously form the grain boundaries in a non-magnetic phase.
data.target_sentence: In order to manufacture a permanent magnet with high properties while reducing heavy rare earth metals or Nd, it is important to refine the internal crystal grains to the size of a single sphere and to uniformly and continuously form grain boundaries in the non-magnetic phase.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형공정법으로 제조된 자석은 결정립 크기가 약 300 nm 정도로 미세하여 일반 소결 자석에 비해 높은 보자력을 확보할 수 있어 희토류 저감형 영구자석으로써 잠재력이 매우 크다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnet manufactured by the hot deformation process has a fine grain size of about 300 nm, so it can secure a higher coercive force compared to a general sintered magnet, so it has great potential as a rare earth reduction type permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: The magnet manufactured by the hot deformation method has a fine particle size of about 300 nm, so it can secure a higher coercive force compared to a general sintered magnet, so it has great potential as a rare earth reduced type permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 중희토류 금속을 사용하지 않거나 Nd를 저감하고도 고특성 지니는 Nd-Fe-B계 영구자석을 개발하기 위한 열간 변형 공정 기술에 대한 전반적인 연구 개발 동향에 대해서 기술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper seeks to describe the overall R&D trends on the hot deformation process technology to develop an Nd-Fe-B system permanent magnet that does not use heavy earth metals or reduces Nd.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we intend to describe the overall R&D trend for hot deformation process technology to develop Nd-Fe-B type permanent magnets that do not use heavy earth metals or reduce Nd.

data.source_sentence: 현재 산업의 발달과 함께 인간의 에너지 소비는 급속하게 증가하고 있으며, 이와 더불어 매장된 화석에너지의 자원 부족 및 과도한 사용으로 인한 기후변화 문제가 지속적으로 대두되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: With the development of industry, human energy consumption is rapidly increasing, and in addition, climate change problems due to insufficient resources and excessive use of buried fossil energy continue to emerge.
data.target_sentence: Human energy consumption is rapidly increasing with the development of industry, and climate change problems due to insufficient resources and excessive use of buried fossil energy are continuously emerging.

data.source_sentence: 최근 이러한 에너지 및 환경 문제를 해결하기 위해 기존에 사용하던 화석에너지를 친환경 에너지로 대체하는 방향으로 산업은 변화되고 있고, 특히, 하이브리드/전기 자동차와 같은 친환경 모빌리티 산업이 크게 성장하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to solve these energy and environmental problems, the industry is changing in the direction of replacing fossil energy with eco-friendly energy. In particular, eco-friendly mobility industries such as hybrid/electric vehicles are growing significantly.
data.target_sentence: In order to solve these energy and environmental problems, the industry is changing in the direction of replacing fossil energy with eco-friendly energy, and in particular, the eco-friendly mobility industry such as hybrid/electric vehicles is growing significantly.

data.source_sentence: 친환경 자동차의 핵심 부품 중 하나인 모터의 고효율화/소형화를 위해서 고특성 영구자석이 필수적으로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: High-characteristic permanent magnets are essential for high efficiency/minimization of motors, which are one of the core components of eco-friendly vehicles.
data.target_sentence: High-performance permanent magnets are essential for high efficiency/minimization of motors, which are one of the key components of eco-friendly vehicles.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B계 영구자석은 지금까지 알려진 영구자석 소재 중 가장 높은 최대 자기에너지적 [(BH)max]을 지닌다.
data.mt_sentence: Nd-Fe-B-based permanent magnets have the highest maximum magnetic energy [(BH)max] among permanent magnet materials known so far.
data.target_sentence: The Nd-Fe-B type permanent magnet has the highest maximum magnetic energy [(BH)max] among permanent magnet materials known so far.

data.source_sentence: 현재 고효율 모터에 사용되는 Nd-Fe-B 영구자석은 보자력을 향상시키기 위해 Dy, Tb와 같은 중희토류 금속을 첨가하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets currently used in high-efficiency motors contain heavy rare earth metals such as Dy and Tb to improve coercive force.
data.target_sentence: Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets currently used in high-efficiency motors contain rare earth heavy metals such as Dy and Tb to improve coercive force.

data.source_sentence: Dy 또는 Tb가 첨가되면 주상의 Nd 일부가 Dy 또는 Tb로 치환되면서 자기 이방성 에너지가 향상되어 보자력이 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When Dy or Tb is added, a part of Nd of the columnar is substituted with Dy or Tb, thereby improving magnetic anisotropic energy and increasing self-resisting force.
data.target_sentence: When Dy or Tb is added, a part of Nd in the columnar shape is replaced with Dy or Tb, so that the magnetic anisotropy energy is improved and the magnetoresistance is increased.

data.source_sentence: Dy와 Tb는 Fe와 반강자성 결합(antiferromagnetic coupling)을 하기 때문에 잔류자화와 최대 자기에너지적이 오히려 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Because Dy and Tb have an antiferromagnetic coupling with Fe, residual magnetization and maximum magnetic energy are rather reduced.
data.target_sentence: Dy and Tb have an antiferromagnetic bond with Fe, so the residual magnetization and maximum magnetic energy are somewhat reduced.

data.source_sentence: 자원 수급에 있어 희토류 금속 대부분은 중국에서 생산되고 있는데, 그 중에서도 중희토류 금속은 중국 남부 지역에서만 분리, 정제되고 있기 때문에 자원 수급이 불안정하고 다른 희토류 금속에 비해 가격이 상당히 높다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of resource supply and demand, most of the rare earth metals are produced in China, and among them, the heavy rare earth metals are separated and refined only in southern China, so the supply and demand of resources is unstable and the price is considerably higher than other rare earth metals.
data.target_sentence: In terms of resource supply and demand, most of the rare earth metals are produced in China. Among them, the heavy rare earth metals are separated and refined only in southern China, so the supply and demand of resources is unstable and the price is much higher than other rare earth metals.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 첨가되는 중희토류 금속 양을 저감하거나 중희토류 금속을 사용하지 않고도기존과 동일한 특성을 지니는 자석을 개발하고자 하는 연구가 많이 수행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, many studies have been conducted to develop magnets having the same characteristics as the existing ones without reducing the amount of heavy rare earth metals added or using heavy rare earth metals.
data.target_sentence: Recently, many studies have been conducted to develop magnets having the same characteristics as conventional magnets without reducing the amount of heavy rare earth metals added or using heavy rare earth metals.

data.source_sentence: 이에 최근 Nd 저감형 영구자석을 개발하기 위한 연구가 주목받고 있으며, Ce은 Nd를 저감하기 위해 활용되는 대표적인 금속이다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, research to develop Nd-reducing permanent magnets has recently attracted attention, and Ce is a representative metal used to reduce Nd.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, research to develop a permanent magnet that reduces Nd has recently been attracting attention, and Ce is a representative metal used to reduce Nd.

data.source_sentence: 현재 Ce의 가격은 Nd 가격의 약 1/40 수준으로 Nd의 일부를 Ce으로 대체할 경우 희토류 자원 수급 문제뿐만 아니라 부품의 가격 경쟁력 확보도 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The current price of Ce is about 1/40 of that of Nd, and if a part of Nd is replaced with Ce, it is possible to secure price competitiveness of parts as well as supply and demand problems of rare earth resources.
data.target_sentence: The current price of Ce is about 1/40 of that of Nd, and if a part of Nd is replaced with Ce, it is possible to secure the price competitiveness of parts as well as the supply and demand problem of rare earth resources.

data.source_sentence: Ce2Fe14B 상의 포화자화(Ms), 큐리온도(Tc), 이방성 자계(HA)등 고유 자기 특성은 Nd2Fe14B 자석에 비해 매우 낮아 치환양이 증가할수록 자석의 특성은 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Intrinsic magnetic characteristics such as saturated magnetization (Ms), curie temperature (Tc), and anisotropic magnetic field (HA) on Ce2Fe14B are much lower than those of Nd2Fe14B magnets, and thus the characteristics of the magnets are greatly reduced as the displacement amount increases.
data.target_sentence: Ce2Fe14B's intrinsic magnetic properties such as saturation magnetization (Ms), Curie temperature (Tc), and anisotropic magnetic field (HA) are much lower than that of Nd2Fe14B magnets, and as the amount of displacement increases, the properties of the magnet are greatly deteriorated.

data.source_sentence: 일반 소결 자석은 합금을 기계적으로 분쇄한 후 일방향 자장 하에서 가압하여 성형하고, 이 성형체를 다시 1000°C 이상의 고온에서 소결하여 제조하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: A general sintered magnet is molded by mechanically pulverizing an alloy and then pressing it under a one-way magnetic field, and is produced by sintering the molded body again at a high temperature of 1000°C or higher.
data.target_sentence: A general sintered magnet is manufactured by mechanically pulverizing an alloy, forming it by pressing under a unidirectional magnetic field, and sintering the compact again at a high temperature of 1000° C. or higher.

data.source_sentence: 소결 동안결정립은 초기 분말 크기의 1.5배 이상으로 성장되게 되는데, 합금 분쇄 시 분말의 산화 문제와 입자 미세화에 따른 성형의 어려움으로 sub-micron 크기 이하로 결정립을 미세화하기 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: During sintering, the crystal grains grow to 1.5 times or more of the initial powder size, and it is difficult to refine the grains to a sub-micron size or less due to the oxidation problem of the powder during alloy pulverization and the difficulty in forming due to particle refinement.
data.target_sentence: During sintering the grains grow to at least 1.5 times the initial powder size. It is difficult to refine crystal grains below the sub-micron size due to the oxidation problem of powder during alloy grinding and the difficulty of molding due to particle refinement.

data.source_sentence: 소결 자석에서 결정립 미세화를 통한 보자력 증강에는 한계가 있음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that there is a limit to the enhancement of coercive force through grain refinement in sintered magnets.
data.target_sentence: This means that there is a limit to improving the coercive force through grain refinement in the sintered magnet.

data.source_sentence: 본 고에서는 Nd-Fe-B계 영구자석의 열간 변형 공정과 관련한 지금까지의 연구 결과를 바탕으로 자기 특성 및 미세조직 최적화를 위한 핵심 기술에 대해 서술하고, 향후 연구 방향에 대해 논의하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the research results related to the hot deformation process of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets, this paper will describe the core technologies for magnetic characteristics and microstructure optimization and discuss future research directions.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, based on the research results related to the hot deformation process of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets, core technologies for optimizing magnetic properties and microstructure are explained and future research directions are discussed.

data.source_sentence: 중희토류 금속을 첨가하지 않고 고보자력 Nd-Fe-B 자석을 제조하기 위해서는 자석의 결정립을 단자구 크기까지 미세화하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to manufacture a high-coercive Nd-Fe-B magnet without adding heavy rare earth metal, it is important to refine the crystal grains of the magnet to the size of a single sphere.
data.target_sentence: In order to manufacture Nd-Fe-B magnets with high coercive force without adding heavy rare earth metals, it is important to refine the crystal grains of the magnets into a single sphere size.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 열간변형 자석은 등방성의 나노결정립 자분을 650~850°C 온도 범위에서 가압 소결하여 고밀도의 성형체로 제조한 후 동일 온도 범위에서 열간 변형하여 이방성 벌크자석으로 제조된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, hot deformable magnets are manufactured as anisotropic bulk magnets by hot deforming isotropic nanocrystal grains into a high-density compact by pressure sintering at a temperature range of 650 to 850 °C, and then hot deforming in the same temperature range.
data.target_sentence: In general, hot deformable magnets are manufactured by hot deforming isotropic nanocrystal grains in a temperature range of 650 to 850° C., hot deforming them into high-density compacts, and then hot deforming them in the same temperature range to produce anisotropic bulk magnets.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 공정법은 변형 방식에 따라 크게 다이업셋 법, 후방 압출법, 전방 압출법으로 나뉘며, Fig. 1에 공정 모식도를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The hot deformation process is largely divided into a die-upset method, a rear extrusion method, and a front extrusion method according to the deformation method, and Fig. 1 shows the process schematic diagram.
data.target_sentence: The hot deformation process is largely divided into die upset method, back extrusion method and front extrusion method according to the deformation method. Figure 1 shows the process schematic.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 공정 단계별 자석의 SEM 이미지와 모식도를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the SEM image and schematic diagram of the magnet for each process step.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows the SEM image for each process step and a schematic diagram of the magnet.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 가압 소결(hot-press) 자석에 압력을 가하면서 변형을 주면 변형량이 늘어남에 따라 점차 결정립의 c-축이(단축) 가압 방향에 수평하게 정렬되면서 잔류자화가 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: When a strain is applied while applying pressure to the manufactured hot-press magnet, as the amount of strain increases, the c-axis of the crystal grains (short axis) are aligned horizontally in the pressing direction, and the residual magnetization increases.
data.target_sentence: When a deformation is applied while applying pressure to the manufactured hot-pressed magnet, the c-axis (short axis) of the crystal grains is horizontally aligned in the compression direction as the amount of deformation increases, and the residual magnetization increases.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석의 결정립 이방화와 관련하여 두 가지 메커니즘이 고려되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Two mechanisms were considered regarding grain anisotropy in hot-deformed magnets.
data.target_sentence: Two mechanisms were considered regarding the grain anisotropy of hot-deformed magnets.

data.source_sentence: Nd2Fe14B 주상의 탄성계수 차이에 의해 결정립 c-축이 가압방향으로 배향되는 것이라는 주장이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is argued that the c-axis of the grains is oriented in the pressing direction due to the difference in the elastic modulus of the Nd2Fe14B columnar phase.
data.target_sentence: It is claimed that the c-axis of the grains is oriented in the press direction due to the difference in elastic modulus on the Nd2Fe14B column.

data.source_sentence: Nd2Fe14B 주상은 c-축에 평행한 탄성계수가 a-축에 평행한 탄성계수보다 낮기 때문에 (001) 면의 슬립 변형이 일어나면서 결정립의 c-축이 가압방향으로 변형된다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Because the Nd2Fe14B columnar phase has a lower elastic modulus parallel to the c-axis than the elastic modulus parallel to the a-axis, slip deformation of the (001) plane occurs and the c-axis of the grains is deformed in the pressing direction.
data.target_sentence: Because the Nd2Fe14B columnar phase has a lower elastic modulus parallel to the c-axis than the modulus parallel to the a-axis, slip deformation of the (001) plane occurs and the c-axis of the grains deforms in the indentation direction.

data.source_sentence: 주상의 슬립변형은 1000°C 이하 온도에서 절대 일어날 수 없다.
data.mt_sentence: Slip deformation of the columnar phase can never occur at temperatures below 1000°C.
data.target_sentence: Slip deformation in columnar phases can never occur at temperatures below 1000 °C.

data.source_sentence: 이 메커니즘은 AAA가 발표한 인장 변형 공정을 통한 결정립 이방화 결과를 설명할 수 없다.
data.mt_sentence: This mechanism cannot explain the grain anisotropy results through the tensile strain process published by AAA.
data.target_sentence: This mechanism cannot explain the grain anisotropy results through the tensile strain process published by AAA.

data.source_sentence: AAA 주장이 옳다고 가정하면, 인장 변형에서 결정립의 c-축이 인장 방향으로 늘어나야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming the AAA argument is correct, in tensile strain, the c-axis of the grains should stretch in the tensile direction.
data.target_sentence: Assuming that AAA's argument is correct, the c-axis of the grains should expand in the tensile direction during tensile deformation.

data.source_sentence: 실제 실험 결과에서는 결정립은 단조 변형과 마찬가지로 a-축 방향으로 길게 늘어났으며 c-축은 인장 방향과 수직하게 정렬되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the actual experimental results, the grains were elongated in the a-axis direction as in forging deformation, and the c-axis was aligned perpendicular to the tensile direction.
data.target_sentence: In the actual experimental results, the grains were elongated in the a-axis direction as in forging deformation, and the c-axis was aligned perpendicular to the tensile direction.

data.source_sentence: 판상 결정립의 변형 과정에서 인가되는 외부 압력에 의해 c-축이 가압방향에 평행하게 회전되며 배향된다고 주장하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was argued that the c-axis is rotated and oriented parallel to the pressing direction by the external pressure applied during the deformation of the plate-shaped grains.
data.target_sentence: It was argued that the c-axis is rotated by the external pressure applied when the plate-shaped crystal grains are deformed and oriented parallel to the pressing force.

data.source_sentence: 결정립계의 액상의 Nd-rich 상은 결정립 회전을 위한 윤활제역할을 하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The liquid Nd-rich phase of the grain boundary serves as a lubricant for grain rotation.
data.target_sentence: The Nd-rich liquid phase of the grain boundary acts as a lubricant for grain rotation.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 공정 중 변형률 및 변형 속도에 따른 자석의 미세 조직과 자기 특성 변화를 살펴보았다.
data.mt_sentence: Changes in the microstructure and magnetic properties of magnets according to strain and strain rate during the hot deformation process were investigated.
data.target_sentence: Changes in the microstructure and magnetic properties of magnets according to strain and strain rate during hot deformation were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 변형초기에는 변형 속도가 느릴수록 시료에 응력이 작게 걸리는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the early stage of deformation, it can be seen that the slower the deformation speed, the smaller the stress is applied to the sample.
data.target_sentence: In the early stages of deformation, it can be seen that the slower the deformation rate, the smaller the stress applied to the specimen.

data.source_sentence: 0.001 s-1의 속도로 상대적으로 느리게 변형한 시료의 경우 변형률 0.7 이상에서 급격하게 응력이 증가되고 0.9 근처에서 더이상 변형이 일어나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a sample deformed relatively slowly at a rate of 0.001 s-1, the stress increased rapidly at a strain rate of 0.7 or higher, and no further deformation occurred near 0.9.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a specimen deformed relatively slowly at a rate of 0.001 s-1, the stress increased rapidly at a strain rate of 0.7 or higher, and no further deformation occurred near 0.9.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 변형률, 변형시간 및 변형 속도에 따른 자기 특성변화를 나타낸 그래프이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 is a graph showing changes in magnetic properties according to strain, strain time, and strain rate.
data.target_sentence: 4 is a graph showing changes in magnetic properties according to strain, strain time, and strain.

data.source_sentence: 초반 변형률이 0.5일 때, 빠르게 변형을 진행한 자석에 비해 느리게 진행한 자석의 결정립이 일방향으로 더 잘 배열되었고, 이로 인해 잔류자화가 상대적으로 높은 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the initial strain is 0.5, it can be seen that the crystal grains of the slow-advancing magnet are better aligned in one direction compared to the fast-deforming magnet, and thus the residual magnetization is relatively high.
data.target_sentence: When the initial strain is 0.5, it can be seen that the crystal grains of the slow magnet are better aligned in one direction compared to the rapidly deformed magnet, and thus the residual magnetization is relatively high.

data.source_sentence: 자석의 보자력은 변형 속도가 빠를수록 더 우수한 경향을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The coercive force of the magnet showed a better tendency as the deformation rate increased.
data.target_sentence: The coercive force of the magnet showed a better trend as the strain increased.

data.source_sentence: 어두운 콘트라스트가 주상이고 밝은 콘트라스트는 Nd-rich 상을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The dark contrast represents the main phase and the bright contrast represents the Nd-rich phase.
data.target_sentence: A dark contrast indicates a dominant phase and a bright contrast indicates a phase rich in Nd.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 빠르게 변형을 진행한 시료의 경우 자석 내부 Nd-rich 상이 입계를 따라 연속적이고 균일하게 분포하고 있는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, in the case of a sample that was quickly deformed, it could be verified that the Nd-rich phase in the magnet is continuously and uniformly distributed along the grain boundary.
data.target_sentence: First, in the case of the rapidly deformed sample, it was confirmed that the Nd-rich phase of the magnet was continuously and uniformly distributed along the grain boundary.

data.source_sentence: Nd-rich 상은 열간 변형 공정 중 결정립의 c-축이 가압 방향과 평행하게 회전할 수 있도록 윤활제 역할을 하게 되는데, 이러한 Nd-rich 입계상의 부재는 결정립의 배향을 억제하면서 변형 중 큰 응력을 발생시키는 원인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The Nd-rich phase serves as a lubricant so that the c-axis of the grain may rotate in parallel with the pressing direction during the hot deformation process, and the member of the Nd-rich grain boundary suppresses the orientation of the grains and generates high stress during the deformation.
data.target_sentence: The Nd-rich phase acts as a lubricant so that the c-axis of the grains rotates parallel to the press direction during hot deformation, and the absence of Nd-rich grain boundaries suppresses the orientation of grains, resulting in high stress during deformation.

data.source_sentence: 결정립 계면에 불균질하고 흐리게 형성된 Nd-rich 상은 이웃한 결정립 간의 자기적 상호작용을 차폐할 수 없을 뿐만 아니라, Nd-rich 상이 크게 뭉쳐있는 부분에서는 국소 반자장이 생성되기 때문에 보자력이 크게 감소된다.
data.mt_sentence: The non-homogeneous and blurred Nd-rich phase at the grain interface cannot shield the magnetic interaction between neighboring grains, and the coercive force is greatly reduced because a local anti-magnetic field is generated in the portion where the Nd-rich phase is largely agglomerated.
data.target_sentence: The Nd-rich phase formed inhomogeneously and hazy at the grain interface cannot shield the magnetic interaction between neighboring grains. In addition, the coercive force is greatly reduced because a local demagnetizing field is generated in the region where the Nd-rich phase is greatly aggregated.

data.source_sentence: 고특성의 열간 변형 자석을 제조하기 위해서는 공정 중 발생할 수 있는 입계상의 squeeze-out을 최대한 억제할 수 있도록 공정조건을 정밀하게 제어하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to manufacture a hot deformation magnet with high characteristics, it is important to precisely control the process conditions to suppress the grain boundary squeeze-out as much as possible that may occur during the process.
data.target_sentence: In order to manufacture a hot-deformed magnet with high characteristics, it is important to precisely control the process conditions so as to minimize the grain boundary squeeze-out that may occur during the process.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석의 자기 특성을 저하시키는 원인 중 하나가 초기 분말 계면에서 관찰되는 수 마이크로 크기의 비정상 결정립 성장이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the causes of degrading the magnetic properties of hot-deformed magnets is the growth of abnormal grains of several microns observed at the initial powder interface.
data.target_sentence: One of the causes of deterioration of the magnetic properties of hot-deformed magnets is the growth of abnormal grains of several microns observed at the initial powder interface.

data.source_sentence: 분말 계면에서 나타나는 비정상 결정립 성장은 일반적으로 hot-press 단계에서 생성되기 시작하여 열간변형 공정 중 더 크게 성장하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The abnormal grain growth at the powder interface generally starts to be generated in the hot-press step and grows larger during the hot deformation process.
data.target_sentence: In general, abnormal grain growth at the powder interface begins to occur during the hot pressing step and grows larger during the hot deformation process.

data.source_sentence: 비정상 결정립 성장이 일어난 영역에서 역자구 핵생성이 비교적 쉽게 일어나는 것으로 보고되고 있고, 따라서 보자력 역시 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is reported that reverse magnetic domain nucleation occurs relatively easily in the region where abnormal grain growth has occurred, and thus the coercive force is also greatly reduced.
data.target_sentence: It is reported that in the region where abnormal grain growth occurs, reverse magnetic domain nucleation occurs relatively easily, and the coercive force is also greatly reduced.

data.source_sentence: 비정상 결정립 성장을 억제하는 가장 쉬운 방법은 hot-press 및 열간 변형 공정 온도 제어하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The easiest way to suppress abnormal grain growth is to control the hot-press and hot-strain process temperature.
data.target_sentence: The easiest way to suppress abnormal grain growth is to control the hot press and hot strain process temperature.

data.source_sentence: 공정 온도를 낮추게 되면 상기 언급한 분말 계면에서의 결정립 성장이 나타나지않는다.
data.mt_sentence: When the process temperature is lowered, grain growth at the above-mentioned powder interface does not appear.
data.target_sentence: When the process temperature is lowered, grain growth at the powder interface as described above does not appear.

data.source_sentence: 낮은 온도에서는 결정립 형상 변형 및 배향에 대한 구동력이 감소될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: At low temperatures, driving force for grain shape deformation and orientation may be reduced.
data.target_sentence: At low temperatures, the driving force for morphological deformation and orientation of grains may be reduced.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 온도 제어를 통한 결정립 성장 억제와 높은 결정립 배향도를 동시에 확보하기 위해 고안된 2단계 변형 공정이 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A two-stage deformation process designed to suppress grain growth through hot deformation temperature control and ensure high grain orientation at the same time has been reported.
data.target_sentence: A two-step deformation process designed to suppress grain growth and at the same time ensure high grain orientation through high-temperature deformation temperature control has been reported.

data.source_sentence: 분말 계면 결정립성장을 억제할 수 있는 또 다른 방법으로, WC, Nb와 같은 고융점 내화 물질 첨가하는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As another method for suppressing the grain growth at the powder interface, there is a method of adding a high melting point refractory material such as WC or Nb.
data.target_sentence: Another method of suppressing grain growth at the powder interface is to add a high melting point refractory material such as WC or Nb.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형자석 제조 시 분말 계면에는 다량의 Nd-rich 응집체가 형성된다.
data.mt_sentence: When manufacturing a hot deformed magnet, a large amount of Nd-rich aggregates are formed at the powder interface.
data.target_sentence: When manufacturing hot-deformed magnets, large amounts of Nd-rich agglomerates are formed at the powder interface.

data.source_sentence: 실제 WC가 첨가된 자석에서 비정상 결정립성장이 나타나지 않았으며(Fig. 8), 첨가하지 않은 자석에 비해 보자력과 잔류자화가 모두 향상되는 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, no abnormal grain growth was observed in the magnet to which WC was added (Fig. 8), and both the coercive force and the residual magnetization were improved compared to the magnet without the addition of WC.
data.target_sentence: In fact, no abnormal grain growth was observed in the WC-added magnet (Fig. 8), both coercive force and residual magnetization were improved compared to the magnet without WC.

data.source_sentence: 이와 유사하게, 초기 합금 제조 시 미량의 Nb 금속을 첨가한 연구도 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Similarly, studies have been reported in which trace amounts of Nb metal were added during initial alloy preparation.
data.target_sentence: Similarly, studies in which trace amounts of Nb metal were added during initial alloy preparation have been reported.

data.source_sentence: 보고에 따르면, Nb를 소량 첨가함으로써, 분말계면 결정립 성장이 억제되었고, 이와 더불어 입계상의 Nd 농도가 증가하여 인접한 결정립 간의 자기적 차폐능이 개선되어 제조된 자석의 자기 특성이 크게 개선되는 결과를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the report, by adding a small amount of Nb, grain growth at the powder interface was suppressed, and the magnetic shielding ability between adjacent grains was improved by increasing the concentration of Nd in the grain boundary phase, thereby significantly improving the magnetic properties of the manufactured magnet. .
data.target_sentence: According to the report, grain growth at the powder interface was suppressed by adding a small amount of Nb. In addition, as the Nd concentration of the grain boundary phase increased, the magnetic shielding ability between adjacent crystal grains was improved, resulting in greatly improved magnetic properties of the manufactured magnet.

data.source_sentence: 자석의 고보자력 달성을 위해서는 결정립을 단자구 크기까지 미세화시키고, 균일하고 연속적인 비자성 입계상을 형성시키는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to achieve the high coercive force of the magnet, it is important to refine the crystal grains to the size of a single sphere and to form a uniform and continuous non-magnetic grain boundary phase.
data.target_sentence: In order to obtain a high coercive force of the magnet, it is important to refine the crystal grains to the size of a single sphere and to form a uniform and continuous nonmagnetic grain boundary phase.

data.source_sentence: 결정립 크기와 관련하여, 열간 변형 자석은 약 300 nm 직경의 판상 결정립을 형성하는데, 이 크기는 Nd2Fe14B 상의 단자구 크기와 유사하다.
data.mt_sentence: Regarding the grain size, the hot-deformed magnet forms plate-like grains with a diameter of about 300 nm, which is similar to the size of the single sphere on Nd2Fe14B.
data.target_sentence: Regarding the grain size, the hot-strained magnets form plate-shaped particles with a diameter of about 300 nm, similar to the single spherical size of Nd2Fe14B.

data.source_sentence: 실제 열간변형 자석의 보자력은 16~18 kOe 수준으로 기대 보다 다소 낮은 값을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The coercive force of the actual hot-deformed magnet is 16~18 kOe, which is slightly lower than expected.
data.target_sentence: The coercive force of an actual hot-deformed magnet is 16-18 kOe, which is slightly lower than expected.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 높은 농도의 Fe를 포함하는 강자성 입계에 의한 결정립 사이의 자기적 교환 결합에 기인한 것으로, 고보자력화를 위해서는 제조된 자석의 결정립계면의 조성 수정이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: This is due to magnetic exchange bonding between crystal grains by a ferromagnetic grain boundary including high concentration of Fe, and it is necessary to modify the composition of the crystal grain interface of the prepared magnet for high magnetic flux.
data.target_sentence: This is due to magnetic exchange coupling between crystal grains due to ferromagnetic grain boundaries containing a high concentration of Fe, and it is necessary to correct the crystal grain interface composition of the manufactured high magnetic flux magnet.

data.source_sentence: 입계확산 공정은 Nd-Fe-B계 자석의 보자력 향상을 위해 이용되는 대표적인 공정 기술이다.
data.mt_sentence: The grain boundary diffusion process is a representative process technology used to improve the coercive force of Nd-Fe-B-based magnets.
data.target_sentence: The grain boundary diffusion process is a representative process technology used to improve the coercive force of NdFeB-based magnets.

data.source_sentence: 소결자석에서는 중희토류가 함유된 Dy-H 또는 Dy-F 화합물이 많이 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In sintering magnets, Dy-H or Dy-F compounds containing heavy rare earths are widely used.
data.target_sentence: Dy-H or Dy-F compounds containing heavy rare earth are widely used for sintered magnets.

data.source_sentence: 결정립 크기가 미세한 열간 변형 자석의 경우, 소결자석에 비해 결정립 성장 구동력이 크기 때문에 융점이 낮은 Nd-Cu, Nd-Al, Pr-Cu 등의 경희토류 기반 공정 합금이 확산물질로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of hot-deformed magnets with fine grain sizes, light rare earth-based eutectic alloys such as Nd-Cu, Nd-Al, and Pr-Cu, which have a low melting point, are used as diffusion materials because of greater grain growth driving force than sintered magnets.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a hot deformed magnet having a fine grain size, the driving force for crystal grain growth is greater than that of a sintered magnet. For this reason, light rare earth-based eutectic alloys such as Nd-Cu, Nd-Al, and Pr-Cu with low melting points are used as diffusion materials.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 9는 열간변형 자석의 확산물질별 자기 특성을 비교 분석한 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 9 is the result of comparing and analyzing the magnetic characteristics of each diffusion material of the hot-deformed magnet.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 9 shows the results of comparative analysis of the magnetic properties of each diffusion material of the hot-deformed magnet.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Al 합금을 확산 처리한 후 자석의 보자력이 초기 1.3 T에서2.5 T로 크게 향상되었으며, 상온에서는 가장 높은 보자력을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: After diffusion treatment of the Nd-Al alloy, the magnet's coercive force was greatly improved from 1.3 T to 2.5 T, and it exhibited the highest coercive force at room temperature.
data.target_sentence: After diffusion treatment of the Nd-Al alloy, the magnet's coercive force was greatly improved from 1.3T to 2.5T, and it exhibited the highest coercive force at room temperature.

data.source_sentence: 온도에 따른 보자력 변화 그래프를 살펴보면, Nd-Al을 확산 처리한 자석의 보자력 감소가 Nd-Cu를 확산 처리한 자석보다 급격하게 감소됨을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the coercive force change graph according to temperature, it can be seen that the reduction in coercive force of the Nd-Al diffusion-treated magnet is sharply reduced compared to the Nd-Cu diffusion-treated magnet.
data.target_sentence: Looking at the graph of coercive force change according to temperature, it can be seen that the reduction in the coercive force of the Nd-Al diffusion treated magnet is sharply decreased compared to that of the Nd-Cu diffusion treated magnet.

data.source_sentence: 150°C 이상의 온도에서는 Nd-Cu 확산 자석의 보자력이 Nd-Al을 확산 자석의 보자력과 역전되어 가장 높은 보자력을 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: At a temperature above 150°C, the coercive force of the Nd-Cu diffusion magnet was reversed with that of the Nd-Al diffusion magnet, showing the highest coercive force.
data.target_sentence: At a temperature above 150°C, the coercive force of the Nd-Cu diffusion magnet was reversed with that of the Nd-Al diffusion magnet, showing the highest coercive force.

data.source_sentence: 고온에 사용이 필요한 자석의 경우, Nd-Al보다 Nd-Cu 합금이 보다 효과적임을 시사한다.
data.mt_sentence: This suggests that Nd-Cu alloys are more effective than Nd-Al in the case of magnets that need to be used at high temperatures.
data.target_sentence: This suggests that Nd-Cu alloys are more effective than Nd-Al for magnets that must be used at high temperatures.

data.source_sentence: 앞서 기술한 바와 같이 열간 변형 자석의 보자력 향상을 위해, Nd-Cu와 같은 저융점 합금을 이용한 입계확산 공정이 필수적으로 이용된다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, in order to improve the coercive force of the hot-deformed magnet, a grain boundary diffusion process using a low-melting-point alloy such as Nd-Cu is essentially used.
data.target_sentence: As described above, in order to improve the coercive force of the hot deformable magnet, a grain boundary diffusion process using a low melting point alloy such as Nd-Cu is essentially used.

data.source_sentence: 과도한 확산 공정에 의한 자석 내 비자성 상분율 증가는 급격한 잔류자화 감소를 초래한다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in the non-magnetic phase fraction in the magnet due to the excessive diffusion process leads to a rapid decrease in residual magnetization.
data.target_sentence: When the nonmagnetic phase fraction of a magnet increases due to an excessive diffusion process, the residual magnetization decreases sharply.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석에 Nd-Cu를 확산할 경우, 확산 물질이 c-면을 따라 확산되면서 c-축 방향으로 부피 팽창이 크게 일어난다고 보고되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When Nd-Cu is diffused to a hot-deformed magnet, it is reported that the diffusion material diffuses along the c-plane, resulting in a large volume expansion in the c-axis direction.
data.target_sentence: It is reported that when Nd-Cu diffuses into a hot-deformed magnet, the diffusion material diffuses along the c-plane, resulting in large volume expansion in the c-axis direction.

data.source_sentence: 적용한 자석의 결정립 배향은 확산 처리 전 자석보다도 오히려 증가하게 되고, 최종적으로 고보자력/고잔류자화를 동시에 가지는 자석으로 제조할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The crystal grain orientation of the applied magnet increased rather than that of the magnet before diffusion treatment, and finally, it could be manufactured as a magnet with high-boosting force/high-residual magnetization at the same time.
data.target_sentence: The grain orientation of the applied magnet was increased compared to the magnet before the diffusion treatment, and finally, a magnet with high elevated pressure/high residual magnetization could be manufactured.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀에서는 확산 물질로 NdHx 및 Cu 나노 분말을 혼합하여 사용하는 새로운 방식의 공정법을 도입하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research team introduced a new process method using a mixture of NdHx and Cu nanopowder as a diffusion material.
data.target_sentence: Our research team introduced a new process method using a mixture of NdHx and Cu nanopowder as a diffusion material.

data.source_sentence: Cu 나노 분말은 일반적으로 표면에 나노미터 두께의 산화물 층을 형성하고 있는데, 이 산화물 층은 수소 분위기에서 쉽게 환원되는 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Cu nanopowders generally form a nanometer-thick oxide layer on the surface, which is known to be easily reduced in a hydrogen atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: Copper nanopowders generally form a nanometer-thick oxide layer on the surface, which is known to be easily reduced in a hydrogen atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 방출된 수소는 Cu 나노 분말 표면 산화 층을 환원하는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The released hydrogen is capable of reducing the Cu nanopowder surface oxide layer.
data.target_sentence: The released hydrogen can reduce the Cu nanopowder surface oxide layer.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과, Nd-Cu 확산량이 증가될수록 보자력은 향상되었으나, 비자성상 분율이 증가하면서 잔류자화는 확산된 양만큼 감소되는 결과를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was obtained that the coercive force improved as the Nd-Cu diffusion amount increased, but the residual magnetization decreased by the diffusion amount as the nonmagnetic phase fraction increased.
data.target_sentence: As a result of the experiment, it was found that the coercive force was improved as the NdCu diffusion amount increased, but the residual magnetization decreased by the diffusion amount as the nonmagnetic phase fraction increased.

data.source_sentence: 입계 확산 공정에 있어 적은 양의 확산으로 높은 보자력을 달성하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the grain boundary diffusion process, it is important to achieve a high coercive force with a small amount of diffusion.
data.target_sentence: In the grain boundary diffusion process, it is important to obtain a high coercive force with a small amount of diffusion.

data.source_sentence: 열처리 온도가 낮아질수록 확산 속도가 느려 다량의 Nd-Cu 확산을 위해서는 상대적으로 긴 시간이 요구된다.
data.mt_sentence: The lower the heat treatment temperature, the slower the diffusion rate, so a relatively long time is required for the diffusion of a large amount of Nd-Cu.
data.target_sentence: The lower the heat treatment temperature, the slower the diffusion rate, so it takes a relatively long time to diffuse a large amount of Nd-Cu.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 600°C 온도에서 1시간 동안 입계 확산 처리함으로써, 보자력 21.2 kOe, 잔류자화 13.0 kG를 지니는 고특성 자석으로 제조하는데 성공하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we succeeded in manufacturing high-performance magnets with coercive force 21.2 kOe and residual magnetization 13.0 kG by performing grain boundary diffusion treatment at 600 °C for 1 hour.
data.target_sentence: In this study, a high-performance magnet with a coercive force of 21.2 kOe and a residual magnetization of 13.0 kG was successfully manufactured by performing grain boundary diffusion treatment at 600 °C for 1 hour.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 11에 NdHx와 Cu 나노 분말을 이용하여 확산 처리된 자석과 다른 문헌에 보고된 Nd-Cu 합금 입계 확산 연구 결과들을 Nd-Cu 입계확산 함량에 따른 보자력 증가분에 대한 그래프로 정리하여 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 11 summarizes the results of the Nd-Cu alloy grain boundary diffusion study reported in other literature and magnets diffused using NdHx and Cu nanopowder as graphs for the increase in visibility according to the Nd-Cu grain boundary diffusion content.
data.target_sentence: Figure 11 summarizes the results of Nd-Cu alloy grain boundary diffusion studies reported in other literatures and the increase in visibility according to the Nd-Cu grain boundary diffusion content as graphs of magnets diffused using NdHx and Cu nanopowders.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 11로부터 본 연구팀에서 개발한 확산 공정법이 다른 공정법에 비해 보다 효율적인 방법임을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: From Fig. 11, it can be confirmed that the diffusion process method developed by this research team is more efficient than other process methods.
data.target_sentence: In Figure 11, it can be seen that the diffusion process method developed by this research team is more efficient than other process methods.

data.source_sentence: Nd 저감형 열간 변형 자석을 제조하는 기술에 대해 알아보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: We would like to learn about the technology for manufacturing Nd-reduced hot deformed magnets.
data.target_sentence: I want to learn about Nd reduction hot deformed magnet manufacturing technology.

data.source_sentence: 최근, 희토류 자원 수급 및 가격 문제 해결을 위해 Nd 저감형 Nd-Fe-B 자석 개발을 위한 연구가 활발하게 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, research for the development of Nd-Fe-B magnets has been actively conducted to solve the supply and demand of rare earth resources and price problems.
data.target_sentence: Recently, research on the development of Nd-Fe-B magnets has been actively conducted to solve the problem of supply and demand of rare earth resources and price problems.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀에서는 자석에 사용되는 Nd를 Ce 또는 Ce/La으로 치환한 열간 변형 자석을 제조하고 치환량 및 치환 물질에 따른 자석의 자기 특성 및 미세 조직 변화를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This research team manufactured a hot-deformed magnet in which Nd used in the magnet was replaced with Ce or Ce/La, and investigated the magnetic properties and microstructure changes of the magnet according to the displacement amount and substances.
data.target_sentence: The research team manufactured a hot-deformed magnet in which Nd used in magnets was replaced with Ce or Ce/La, and investigated the magnetic properties and microstructure changes of the magnet according to the amount of displacement and material.

data.source_sentence: Ce 치환량이 증가할수록 자석의 보자력 및 잔류자화가 감소되며, Ce/La이 동시에 첨가된 자석의 경우 가장 낮은 자기 특성을 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: As the amount of Ce substitution increased, the coercive force and residual magnetization of the magnet decreased, and the magnet to which Ce/La was added simultaneously showed the lowest magnetic properties.
data.target_sentence: As the amount of Ce substitution increased, the coercive force and residual magnetization of the magnet decreased, and the magnet to which Ce/La was added simultaneously showed the lowest magnetic properties.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 자석의 미세조직을 살펴보면, Ce, Ce/La을 치환한 자석의 내부 결정립 종횡비와 배향도가 감소됨을 확인할 수 있다(Fig. 12(b~c)).
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the microstructure of the manufactured magnet, it can be seen that the internal grain aspect ratio and orientation degree of the magnet substituted for Ce and Ce/La are reduced (Fig. 12(b~c)).
data.target_sentence: Examining the microstructure of the fabricated magnet, it can be seen that the internal grain aspect ratio and orientation of the magnet replaced with Ce and Ce/La decreased (Fig. 12(b~c)).

data.source_sentence: 결정립 형상 및 배향도 변화는 고함량 Ce 첨가에 의해 형성되는 REFe2 상과 REFe2 상형성에 의해 얇고 불균질해진 RE-rich 입계상이 원인인 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: Changes in grain shape and orientation appear to be caused by the REFe2 phase formed by the addition of high Ce content and the RE-rich grain boundary phase, which is thin and heterogeneous by the REFe2 phase formation.
data.target_sentence: The change in grain shape and orientation appears to be caused by the REFe2 phase formed by the addition of high Ce content and the thin and non-uniform RE-rich grain boundary phase by the REFe2 phase formation.

data.source_sentence: REFe2 상의 큐리온도는 -46°C로 상온에서 상자성을 나타내기 때문에 생성량이 증가할수록 자석의 포화 자화 및 잔류자화가 감소되게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the Curie temperature on REFEe2 is -46°C, which exhibits paramagnetic properties at room temperature, saturated magnetization and residual magnetization of the magnet decrease as the amount of production increases.
data.target_sentence: The Curie temperature of REFEe2 is -46°C, which shows paramagnetic properties at room temperature, so the saturation magnetization and residual magnetization of the magnet decrease as production increases.

data.source_sentence: 기존 소결자석은 극미세 분말의 자장 성형, 고온 소결 공정을 통해 이방 벌크 자석으로 제조되기 때문에 REFe2와 같은 2차 상에 의한 특성 저하가 크지 않다.
data.mt_sentence: Existing sintered magnets are manufactured as anisotropic bulk magnets through magnetic field molding and high-temperature sintering process of ultrafine powder, so there is no significant deterioration in properties due to secondary phases such as REFe2.
data.target_sentence: Existing sintered magnets are manufactured as anisotropic bulk magnets through magnetic field shaping of ultra-fine powder and high-temperature sintering process, so there is no significant deterioration in physical properties due to secondary phases such as REFe2.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석은 판상으로 변형된 결정립의 c-축이 공정 중 가압 방향과 평행하게 배향되기 위해서는 윤활제 역할을 하는 액상의 입계상의 유무, 균질한 분포가 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order for the c-axis of the plate-shaped deformed crystal grains to be oriented parallel to the pressing direction during the process of a hot deformable magnet, it is important to have a liquid phase boundary phase, which acts as a lubricant, and to have a homogeneous distribution.
data.target_sentence: In order for the c-axis of the plate-shaped strained crystal grains to be oriented parallel to the press direction during the processing of the hot strain magnet, it is important to have a boundary phase of the liquid phase that acts as a lubricant and to have a uniform distribution.

data.source_sentence: 앞서 기술한 바와 같이 REFe2 상의 융점은 열간 변형 공정 온도보다 높기 때문에 공정 중 고상의 석출물로 존재하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, since the melting point of the REFe2 phase is higher than the hot deformation process temperature, it exists as a solid precipitate during the process.
data.target_sentence: As mentioned above, the melting point of the REFe2 phase is higher than the hot deformation process temperature, so it is present as a solid precipitate in the process.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 고상의 2차 상은 결정립의 배향을 방해할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: These solid secondary phases can interfere with the orientation of the grains.
data.target_sentence: These solid secondary phases can interfere with the orientation of the particles.

data.source_sentence: La을 첨가하게 되면 RE-rich 상의 젖음성이 감소되어 액상의 RE-rich 상이 입계가 아닌 삼중점에 쉽게 응집되고 입계의 RE-rich 상은 La을 첨가하지 않은 자석보다 오히려 더 불균질하게 분포하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When La was added, the wettability of the RE-rich phase was reduced, so that the liquid RE-rich phase was easily aggregated at the triple point rather than the grain boundary.
data.target_sentence: The addition of La reduces the wettability of the RE-rich phase, so that the liquid RE-rich phase aggregates more easily at the triple point than at the grain boundary.

data.source_sentence: 불균질한 입계상 분포는 열간 변형 자석의 배향을 방해하는 결과를 초래하며 급격한 잔류자화 감소의 원인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The heterogeneous grain boundary distribution results in interference with the orientation of the hot deformed magnet and causes a rapid decrease in residual magnetization.
data.target_sentence: The non-uniform grain boundary distribution disturbs the orientation of the hot-deformed magnet and causes a sharp decrease in the residual magnetization.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀에서는 최근 Ce이 첨가된 Nd 저감형 열간변형자석에 생성되는 비자성/고융점 REFe2 상의 생성을 억제하기 위해 초기 분말을 비정질로 제조하여 사용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this research team, in order to suppress the generation of a non-magnetic/high melting point REFe2 phase generated in an Nd-reduced hot deformation magnet to which Ce was recently added, an initial powder was prepared in an amorphous state and used.
data.target_sentence: In this research team, the initial powder was prepared and used in an amorphous state to suppress the formation of the non-magnetic/high melting point REFe2 phase that occurs in Nd-reduced hot-deformed magnets with Ce added recently.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 공정을 통해 이방성 벌크자석으로 제조되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was manufactured as an anisotropic bulk magnet through a hot deformation process.
data.target_sentence: It is made of anisotropic bulk magnets through a hot deformation process.

data.source_sentence: 제조된 자석은 결정질 분말을 사용하여 제조된 자석에 비해 월등히 우수한 보자력과 잔류 자화를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The manufactured magnets exhibited significantly superior coercive force and residual magnetization compared to magnets manufactured using crystalline powder.
data.target_sentence: The manufactured magnet exhibited significantly superior coercive force and residual magnetization compared to magnets manufactured using crystalline powder.

data.source_sentence: 결정질로 제조한 자석과 비교하여 결정립의 배향이 크게 개선되었고, 최종 제조된 자석에서 REFe2 상이 나타나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: The orientation of crystal grains was greatly improved compared to the magnets prepared from crystalline materials, and REFe2 phase was not shown in the finally prepared magnets.
data.target_sentence: The grain orientation was greatly improved compared to the magnets made of crystalline materials, and the REFe2 phase did not appear in the finally manufactured magnets.

data.source_sentence: 현재 잔류자화는 다른 연구팀에서 발표된 특성보다 조금 낮지만 보자력은 Nd의 30%를 Ce으로 치환했음에도 불구하고 15 kOe에 달하는 고보자력을 확보할 수 있었다.

data.source_sentence: 본 기술과 관련하여 국내 기업과 대학의 적극적인 관심이 필요하며, 지속적인 연구 협력을 통해 급속하게 변화되는 산업에 핵심 소재로 활용될 수 있기를 기대한다.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경은 결정구조, 화학 조성 등 일반적인 투과전자현미경 분석과 더불어 자구 구조를 관찰할 수 있는 분석기법이다.

data.target_sentence: Lorentz transmission electron microscopy is an analysis technique that can observe the magnetic domain structure along with general transmission electron microscopy analysis such as crystal structure and chemical composition.

data.source_sentence: 미세구조와 소재의 자기 특성 및 자구와의 상관 관계를 이해하는 것은 필수적이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is essential to understand the correlation between microstructure and magnetic properties and magnetic domains of materials.

data.mt_sentence: To understand the magnetic properties of various magnetic materials, it is important to understand the magnetic domain change.
data.target_sentence: To understand the magnetic properties of various magnetic materials, it is important to understand the magnetic domain change.

data.source_sentence: 자성재료의 결정구조, 화학조성, 결정립계의 분포 및 성분 등은 자구의 구성, 자구벽의 이동, 자화 반전 기구 등의 자기 구조에 영향을 주며, 이는 각기 다른 자기 특성으로 구현된다.
data.mt_sentence: The crystal structure, chemical composition, grain boundary distribution, and components of the magnetic material affect the magnetic structure, such as the composition of the magnetic sphere, movement of the magnetic sphere wall, magnetization inversion mechanism, etc., which are implemented with different magnetic properties.

data.source_sentence: 재료 내 자구 변화의 이해를 통해 자기 특성 구현 기구를 규명할수 있으며, 이를 기반으로 소재 개발 공정으로의 피드백을 통해 자기 특성을 향상시킬 수 있을 것으로 기대된다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 자기이력곡선 측정을 통한 자기 특성의 해석은 벌크 소재의 특성, 또는 분말의 경우 각각 분말의 자기 특성의 합으로 고려된다.
