data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경은 입사 전자빔과 시료에 존재하는 국부적 자화 분포와의 상호작용을 통해 자기 콘트라스트를 형성한다.
data.mt_sentence: The Lorentz transmission electron microscope forms magnetic contrast through the interaction of the incident electron beam with the local magnetization distribution present in the sample.
data.target_sentence: Lorentz transmission electron microscopy builds magnetic contrast through the interaction of an incident electron beam with the local magnetization distribution present in the sample.

data.source_sentence: 우선 투과전자현미경은 재료의 구조, 화학 조성 등의 분석에서0.1~1.0 nm 수준의 분해능을 갖으며, 자기 구조 이미징에는 2~20 nm 수준의 분해능을 보이는 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the transmission electron microscope has the advantage of having a resolution of 0.1 to 1.0 nm in the analysis of material structure and chemical composition, and showing a resolution of 2 to 20 nm in magnetic structure imaging.
data.target_sentence: First, the transmission electron microscope has the advantage of having a resolution of 0.1 to 1.0 nm in material structure and chemical composition analysis, and showing a resolution of 2 to 20 nm in magnetic structure imaging.

data.source_sentence: 투과전자현미경의 일반적인 관찰 모드는 고배율 및 고분해능의 영상을 얻기 위해 강한 세기의 대물렌즈를 이용하여 초점 거리를 최소화한다.

data.source_sentence: 강한 자장은 자성 재료를 자기포화 시키며, 시료 고유의 자기 구조에 의한 콘트라스트를 관찰할 수 없다.
data.mt_sentence: The strong magnetic field magnetically saturates the magnetic material, and the contrast due to the unique magnetic structure of the sample cannot be observed.
data.target_sentence: The strong magnetic field magnetically saturates the magnetic material, and the contrast due to the unique magnetic structure of the sample cannot be observed.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 모드에서는 대물렌즈를 끄고, 서서히 수동으로 대물렌즈의 전류값 조절을 통해 대물렌즈에서 시료에 가해지는 자기장의 세기를 조절할수 있다.

data.target_sentence: In Lorentz mode, you can adjust the strength of the magnetic field applied to the sample from the objective by turning the objective off and manually gradually adjusting the current value of the objective.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 투과전자현미경의 “free lens-control mode”를 이용하거나, 로렌츠 전용 투과전자현미경을 사용하면, 거의 자기장이 없는 환경에서 시료를 관찰할 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: If you use the 'free lens control mode' of a general transmission electron microscope or use a transmission electron microscope dedicated to Lorentz, you can observe the sample in an environment with little magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경 혹은 일반 투과전자현미경의 로렌츠 모드에서 자구를 관찰하는 원리는 전자빔이 자성 재료를 지나가기 때문에 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The principle of observing magnetic domains in the Lorentz mode of a Lorentz transmission electron microscope or a general transmission electron microscope is possible because an electron beam passes through a magnetic material.
data.target_sentence: The principle of observing the magnetic domain in the Lorentz mode of a Lorentz transmission electron microscope or a general transmission electron microscope is possible because the electron beam passes through a magnetic material.

data.source_sentence: 시료 표면의 자화는 자화방향 및 수직으로 입사되는 전자빔의 방향에 모두 수직한 방향으로 로렌츠 힘을 유도한다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization of the sample surface induces a Lorentz force in both the direction of magnetization and the direction of the perpendicularly incident electron beam.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization of the sample surface induces a Lorentz force in both the magnetization direction and the direction of the perpendicularly incident electron beam.

data.source_sentence: 시료 주위의 정전기장€과 자기장(B)에 의해 형성된 로렌츠 힘(FL)은 전자빔을 굴절시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The Lorentz force (FL) formed by the electrostatic field € and the magnetic field B around the sample refracts the electron beam.
data.target_sentence: The Lorentz force (FL) formed by the electrostatic field € and the magnetic field B around the sample refracts the electron beam.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경에서는 오직 시료 표면 상의 in-plane 자기 성분인 Bxy만 전자빔의 굴절에 영향을 주며, 수 밀리 라디안으로 브래그 각보다는 훨씬 작다.
data.mt_sentence: In the Lorentz transmission electron microscope, only Bxy, an in-plane magnetic component on the sample surface, affects the refraction of the electron beam, which is a few milliradians, much smaller than the Bragg angle.
data.target_sentence: In a Lorentz transmission electron microscope, only Bxy, the in-plane magnetic component of the sample surface, affects the refraction of the electron beam, which is a few milliradians much smaller than the Bragg angle.

data.source_sentence: 표면 상이 아닌 out-of-plane 자기 성분은 전자빔의 진행에 영향을 주지 않으며, 관찰이 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The out-of-plane magnetic component, which is not on the surface, does not affect the progression of the electron beam, and cannot be observed.
data.target_sentence: The out-of-plane magnetic component that is not on the surface does not affect the propagation of the electron beam and cannot be observed.

data.source_sentence: 굴절된 전자빔은 최종적으로 자구벽 주위에서 수렴하거나 나뉘어 지면서, 영상면에 자구의 자기 콘트라스트를 형성하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The refracted electron beam finally converges or splits around the magnetic domain wall to form the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain on the image plane.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 가장 잘 알려진 자기 도메인 이미징 기법으로 프레넬 및 포컬트 모드가 있으며, 모식도는 Fig. 1(a)~(c)에 나타낸 바와 같다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, there are Fresnel and Focalt modes as the best-known magnetic domain imaging techniques, and the mimetic diagram is as shown in Fig. 1(a) to (c).

data.source_sentence: 한 점은 시료 내 한 방향으로 자기 모멘트가 정렬된 자구의 정보를 갖고 있으며, 다른 한 점은 180o 반대방향으로 자기 모멘트가 정렬된 자구의 정보를 갖고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 포컬트 모드에서는 대물렌즈 조리개를 이용하여 앞서 로렌츠 힘에 의해 전자빔이 굴절되어 형성된 두 개의 회절점 중 하나를 후방 초점면에 위치한 대물렌즈 조리개를 이용하여 선택한다(Fig. 1(b)).
data.mt_sentence: In the focal mode, one of the two diffraction points formed by previously refracting the electron beam by the Lorentz force using the objective lens diaphragm is selected using the objective lens diaphragm located in the rear focal plane (Fig. 1(b)).
data.target_sentence: In focus mode, an objective lens diaphragm located in the posterior focal plane is used to select one of two diffraction points formed by pre-refracting an electron beam with a Lorentz force using the objective lens diaphragm (Fig. 1(b)).

data.source_sentence: 서로 상반된 자구는 어떤 회절점을 선택하는지에 따라 밝고 어두운 영역으로 이미지 상에 나타나게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The opposite magnetic domains appear on the image as bright and dark areas depending on which diffraction point is selected.
data.target_sentence: Depending on the diffraction point selected, the opposite magnetic field appears as light and dark areas in the image.

data.source_sentence: 자구 내자화 방향은 관찰되는 이미지와 조리개의 이동방향을 비교하여 파악할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization direction of the magnetic sphere may be determined by comparing the observed image with the movement direction of the aperture.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization direction of the magnetic domain can be determined by comparing the observed image with the movement direction of the diaphragm.

data.source_sentence: 포컬트 모드 이미징에서는 대물렌즈의 후방 초점면과 선택하지 않은 회절점을 가리는 조리개의 위치가 가능한 동일 평면상에 위치하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In focal mode imaging, the aperture positioning covering the rear focal plane of the objective lens and the undetermined diffraction point shall be on the same plane as possible.
data.target_sentence: In focus mode imaging, the rear focal plane of the objective and the iris position covering the undetermined diffraction point should be in the same plane as possible.

data.source_sentence: 포컬트 모드에서는 외부 자장을 가해줄 경우 전자빔과 조리개 정렬이 쉽게 어긋나고 분리된 회절점 역시 변화하기 때문에, 외부 자장 분위기에서의 동역학적 변화 관찰에는 다소 어려움이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the focal mode, when an external magnetic field is applied, the alignment of the electron beam and aperture is easily deviated and the separated diffraction point is also changed, so it is somewhat difficult to observe a dynamic change in an external magnetic field atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: In the focus mode, when an external magnetic field is applied, the electron beam and aperture are easily misaligned and the separated diffraction points are also changed, so it is somewhat difficult to observe the dynamic change of the external magnetic field atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드에서 자기 콘트라스트의 관찰은 Fig. 1(c)에 나타낸 것과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The observation of magnetic contrast in Fresnel mode is as shown in Fig. 1(c).
data.target_sentence: Magnetic contrast observation in Fresnel mode is shown in Fig. 1(c).

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경이 over-focus 또는 under-focus조건일 경우, 전자빔의 굴절이 자구벽에서 서로 수렴하거나 나뉘어지면서 밝은 선 또는 어두운 선으로 자기 콘트라스트가 나타나게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the Lorentz transmission electron microscope is under over-focus or under-focus conditions, magnetic contrast appears as a bright line or a dark line as the refraction of the electron beam converges or splits at the magnetic domain wall.
data.target_sentence: When the Lorentz transmission electron microscope is in hyperfocal or hypofocal conditions, the magnetic contrast appears as light or dark lines as the refraction of the electron beam converges or splits at the magnetic domain wall.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1(e), (f)는 자구벽의 자기 콘트라스트가 초점 조건에 따라 반전이 되는 것을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1(e) and (f) show that the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain wall is inverted depending on the focal condition.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1(e) and (f) show that the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain wall is reversed according to the focus condition.

data.source_sentence: 모식도에서 살펴본 것과 유사하게, CeC°Cu 자성재료 내에서 관찰되는 자구벽의 자기 콘트라스트 관찰 결과 (Fig. 1(g), (h))는 동일한 자구벽이 초점 조건에 따라 반전됨을 실험적으로 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Similar to that shown in the schematic diagram, the magnetic contrast observation results of the magnetic domain wall observed in the CeC°Cu magnetic material (Fig. 1(g), (h)) experimentally show that the same magnetic domain wall is inverted depending on the focal condition.
data.target_sentence: Similar to that shown in the schematic diagram, the magnetic contrast observation result of the magnetic domain wall observed in the CeC°Cu magnetic material (Fig. 1(g), (h)) experimentally identical magnetic domain walls in focal conditions.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드에서 관찰되는 자기 콘트라스트와 포컬트 모드와의 차이점은 밝거나 어두운 선이 자기 도메인 내 자화를 나타내는 것이 아닌, 자구벽의 위치를 보여주는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference between the magnetic contrast and the focal mode observed in Fresnel mode is that bright or dark lines do not represent magnetization in the magnetic domain, but show the position of the magnetic wall.
data.target_sentence: The difference between magnetic contrast and focus mode observed in Fresnel mode is that the light or dark lines represent the position of the magnetic domain walls, not the magnetization of the magnetic domain.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드에서는 자구벽의 콘트라스트를 명확히 하기 위해 상대적으로 큰 defocus를 유지해야 하기 때문에, 관찰된 이미지의 분해능은 프레넬 모드가 프레넬 모드보다는 다소 떨어진다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the Fresnel mode requires a relatively large defocus to clarify the contrast of the magnetic sphere wall, the resolution of the observed image is slightly lower than that of the Fresnel mode.
data.target_sentence: Because the Fresnel mode requires a relatively large defocus to clarify the contrast of the domain walls, the resolution of the observed image is slightly lower than that of the Fresnel mode.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드는 작동이 간편하고, 뚜렷하게 나타나는 콘트라스트가 큰 강점이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fresnel mode is easy to operate and has a great contrast that is clearly visible.
data.target_sentence: Fresnel mode is easy to operate and has great contrast that is clearly visible.

data.source_sentence: 이미지의 intensity는 투과한 전자 파동의 진폭과 위상 정보를 갖고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The intensity of the image contains the amplitude and phase information of the transmitted electromagnetic wave.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of the image includes information about the amplitude and phase of the transmitted electromagnetic wave.

data.source_sentence: 위상 변화는 시편에 의한 전기 포텐셜과 자기 벡터 포텐셜의 합과 같으며, 따라서 ∇xyΦ(x, y, x)는 시료의 전기 및 자기 포텐셜의 합을 표현하는 시료 표면에서의 전자빔 위상의 미분을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The phase change is equal to the sum of the electric potential and the magnetic vector potential by the specimen, so ∇xyΦ(x, y, x) means the differential of the electron beam phase at the specimen surface, which expresses the sum of the electric and magnetic potentials of the specimen. do.
data.target_sentence: The phase change is equal to the sum of the electric potential and the magnetic vector potential by the specimen. Therefore, ∇xyΦ(x, y, x) means the differential of the electron beam phase at the sample surface, which expresses the sum of the electric and magnetic potentials of the sample.

data.source_sentence: t와 nz는 각각 시료의 두께, 시료 표면에서 수직한 방향으로의 단위 벡터이다.
data.mt_sentence: T and nz are unit vectors in the direction perpendicular to the thickness of the sample and the sample surface, respectively.
data.target_sentence: T and nz are unit vectors in the direction perpendicular to the thickness of the sample and the sample surface, respectively.

data.source_sentence: (x, y, x)를 알 수 있다면, 시료 표면에서의 자화 M을 위의 방정식을 통해 구할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If (x, y, x) is known, the magnetization M at the sample surface can be obtained from the above equation.
data.target_sentence: Knowing f(x, y, x), the magnetization M of the sample surface can be obtained from the above equation.

data.source_sentence: 이 값은 로렌츠 투과전자현미경의 관찰 결과로 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This value can be obtained from the observation of the Lorentz transmission electron microscope.
data.target_sentence: This value can be obtained by observing a Lorentz transmission electron microscope.

data.source_sentence: 시료 표면에서의 자화 분포는 전자빔의 z 방향에 관한 위상 분포를 미분함으로써 얻을 수 있으며, 이 값은 다음과 같이 근사할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization distribution on the sample surface can be obtained by differentiating the phase distribution with respect to the z-direction of the electron beam, and this value can be approximated as follows.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization distribution of the sample surface can be obtained by differentiating the phase distribution of the electron beam in the z direction, and this value can be approximated as follows.

data.source_sentence: 자화 분포는 서로 다른 초점거리에서 관찰한 로렌츠 이미지와 TIE 방정식 이용하여 정량적으로 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization distribution can be quantitatively calculated using Lorentz images and TIE equations observed at different focal lengths.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization distribution can be quantitatively calculated using the Lorentz images observed at different focal lengths and the TIE equation.

data.source_sentence: 투과전자현미경의 Differential Phase Contrast(DPC), 차동위상 대조 기법은 전자빔 주사 시 각각 스캔 포인트에서 전자빔의 굴절을 측정하여 전자기장의 분포를 시각화하는 자기이미징 기법이다.
data.mt_sentence: Differential Phase Contrast (DPC) and differential phase contrast techniques of transmission electron microscopy are magnetic imaging techniques that visualize the distribution of electromagnetic fields by measuring the refraction of the electron beam at each scan point when scanning the electron beam.
data.target_sentence: DPC (Differential Phase Contrast) and Differential Phase Contrast technologies of transmission electron microscopes are magnetic imaging technologies that visualize the distribution of an electromagnetic field by measuring the refraction of the electron beam at each scanning point when scanning the electron beam.

data.source_sentence: DPC 기법의 원리는 주사투과전자현미경과 유사하며, 단색선의 전자빔을 위한 전계 방출형 전자총, 시편을 주사할 수 있는 수렴성 전자빔으로 구성되어 있다(Fig. 3).
data.mt_sentence: The principle of the DPC technique is similar to that of a scanning transmission electron microscope, and it consists of a field emission electron gun for a monochromatic electron beam and a converging electron beam that can scan a specimen (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: The principle of DPC technology is similar to the scanning transmission electron microscope and consists of a field emission electron gun for a monochromatic electron beam and a converging electron beam that can scan a sample (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 전자빔이 시료에 주사되면 시료 아래쪽으로는 전자빔이 시료와 상호작용 후 콘 형태로 산란이 되고, 이때 전자 파동의 위상변화는 하단에 위치한 여러 조각으로 분할된 원형 검출기에 도달한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the electron beam is scanned into the sample, the electron beam interacts with the sample and scatters in the form of a cone. At this time, the phase change of the electron wave reaches the circular detector divided into several pieces located at the bottom.
data.target_sentence: When an electron beam is injected into the sample, the electron beam interacts with the sample and is scattered in a cone shape, and the phase change of the electromagnetic wave reaches a circular detector divided into several pieces located at the bottom.

data.source_sentence: 시료가 비자성체일 경우 투과 된 전자빔 디스크의 중심부는 검출기의 중앙에 위치한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the sample is a non-magnetic material, the center of the transmitted electron beam disk is located at the center of the detector.
data.target_sentence: If the sample is a non-magnetic material, the center of the transmitted electron beam disk is located at the center of the detector.

data.source_sentence: 시료가 자성체일 경우 로렌츠 힘에 의해 전자는 굴절하게 되고, 투과 전자빔의 디스크의 위치 역시 변화한다(Fig.3(b)).
data.mt_sentence: When the sample is a magnetic material, electrons are refracted by the Lorentz force, and the position of the disk of the transmitted electron beam also changes (Fig. 3(b)).
data.target_sentence: When the sample is a magnetic material, electrons are refracted by the Lorentz force, and the disk position of the transmitted electron beam changes (Fig. 3(b)).

data.source_sentence: 여러 조각으로 분할되어 있는 검출기는 전자 신호를 측정하고, 각각 검출기에서 측정된 신호들의 차이를 이용하여 시료의 자기 정보를 분석하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The detector, which is divided into several pieces, measures an electronic signal and analyzes the magnetic information of the sample using the difference between the signals measured by the detector.
data.target_sentence: The detector divided into several measures the electronic signal and analyzes the magnetic information of the sample using the difference in the signal measured by the detector.

data.source_sentence: DPC 분석 기법은 전자빔의 크기에 영향을 받으며, 약 2~5 nm 정도의 분해능을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: The DPC analysis technique is affected by the size of the electron beam and has a resolution of about 2 to 5 nm.
data.target_sentence: The DPC analysis technique is affected by the size of the electron beam and has a resolution of about 2-5 nm.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 DPC 기법을 통해 관찰한 자기 스커미온의 자기 스핀 배열을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the magnetic spin arrangement of magnetic skyrmions observed through the DPC technique.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the magnetic spin arrangement of magnetic skyrmions observed through the DPC technique.

data.source_sentence: 출기 이미지(Fig. 4(a))를 로렌츠 굴절에 의한 수평방향, 수직방향의 이미지들을 각각 변환한다(Fig. 4(b)).
data.mt_sentence: The extraction image (Fig. 4(a)) is converted into horizontal and vertical images by Lorentz refraction, respectively (Fig. 4(b)).
data.target_sentence: Extracted image (Fig. 4(a)) is converted into a horizontal image and a vertical image by Lorentz refraction, respectively (Fig. 4(b)).

data.source_sentence: 이후 두 개의 로렌츠 굴절 이미지를 분석하여, 시료 표면의 자화 벡터, 강도, 스핀 배열 이미지를 얻을 수 있다(Fig. 4(c)).
data.mt_sentence: After analyzing two Lorentz refraction images, magnetization vector, intensity, and spin arrangement images of the sample surface can be obtained (Fig. 4(c)).
data.target_sentence: After analyzing two Lorentz refraction images, magnetization vector, intensity, and spin array images of the sample surface can be obtained (Fig. 4(c)).

data.source_sentence: 전자 홀로그래피에서 중요한 요소는 coherent 전자빔과 얇고 균일한 투과전자현미경 시료이다.
data.mt_sentence: An important element in electron holography is a coherent electron beam and a thin, uniform transmission electron microscope sample.
data.target_sentence: Critical elements in electron holography are a coherent electron beam and a thin, uniform transmission electron microscopy sample.

data.source_sentence: 전자 파동이 시료를 투과할 때, 투과 파동의 위상 변화는 시료의 자기 및 전기 포텐셜 정보를 갖고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When an electromagnetic wave passes through a sample, the phase change of the transmitted wave has magnetic and electrical potential information of the sample.
data.target_sentence: When an electromagnetic wave passes through a sample, the phase change of the transmitted wave has the magnetic and potential information of the sample.

data.source_sentence: z는 입사전자빔의 방향, x는 시료의 표면의 방향, CE는 현미경의 가속전압에 따른 상수, V는 정전기 포텐셜, B는 시료표면의 유도 자기 성분이다.
data.mt_sentence: Z is the direction of the incident electron beam, x is the direction of the surface of the sample, CE is a constant according to the acceleration voltage of the microscope, V is the electrostatic potential, and B is the induced magnetic component of the sample surface.
data.target_sentence: Z is the direction of the incident electron beam, x is the direction of the sample surface, CE is a constant dependent on the microscope's acceleration voltage, V is the constant potential, and B is the surface of the induced magnetic component of the sample.

data.source_sentence: V와 B 모두 입사 전자빔의 방향에 따라 변화하지 않기 때문에 정전기 성분과 미분을 제외하면, 시료 표면의 자기 유도 성분에 비례하는 위상 구배는 다음과 같이 표현된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since both V and B do not change with the direction of the incident electron beam, the phase gradient proportional to the magnetic induction component of the sample surface is expressed as follows, except for electrostatic and differential components.
data.target_sentence: Since both V and B do not change according to the direction of the incident electron beam, the phase gradient proportional to the magnetic induction component of the sample surface, excluding the electrostatic component and the differential component, is expressed as follows.

data.source_sentence: 위상 재구성 알고리즘의 결과에 따라 자기 구조의 전자 홀로그래피 이미지는 최대 1~2 nm까지의 분해능을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the result of the phase reconstruction algorithm, the electron holographic image of the magnetic structure can obtain a resolution of up to 1~2 nm.
data.target_sentence: According to the results of the phase reconstruction algorithm, electron holographic images of magnetic structures can achieve resolutions of up to 1-2 nm.

data.source_sentence: 전자 홀로그래피는 일반적으로 Fourier 변환 등의 위상 정보를 홀로그램에서 재구성하기 위한 알고리즘이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Electron holography generally requires an algorithm for reconstructing phase information such as a Fourier transform from a hologram.
data.target_sentence: Electron holography typically requires an algorithm to reconstruct phase information, such as a Fourier transform, from a hologram.

data.source_sentence: 전자 홀로그래피는 기준 파동과의 간섭이 필수적이므로, 시료 관찰 영역이 항상 어느 정도의 빈 공간(진공)이 있도록 하는 제한점이 있으며, 시료의 가장자리 주변에서는 표유자계도 발생이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since electron holography is essential to interfere with a reference wave, there is a limitation in that a sample observation area always has a certain empty space (vacuum), and a drift magnetic field may be generated around an edge of the sample.
data.target_sentence: Since electron holography is essential to interfere with the reference wave, there is always a constant empty space (vacuum) in the sample observation area, and there is a limit that a drift magnetic field may be generated around the edge of the sample.

data.source_sentence: Fig.5(b~d)는 전자 홀로그래피를 통해 관찰한 자기 위상 이미지에서 얻은 자기 유도맵이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5(b~d) is a magnetic induction map obtained from a magnetic phase image observed through electron holography.
data.target_sentence: Figure 5(b~d) is a magnetic induction map obtained from magnetic phase images observed through electron holography.

data.source_sentence: 자기 스커미온은 위상학적 솔리톤(topological soliton) 또는 위상학적 결함(topological defect)의 한 종류로 연속적인 벡터장에 의해서 보호되는 입자성을 띤 위상학적 객체이다.
data.mt_sentence: A magnetic skyrmion is a type of topological soliton or topological defect, and is a particulate topological object protected by a continuous vector field.
data.target_sentence: A magnetic skyrmion is a type of topological soliton or topological defect, which is a topological object with particulate nature protected by a continuous vector field.

data.source_sentence: 스커미온의 중심부와 가장자리의 자화 방향은 역 평행을 이룬다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization directions of the center and edges of the skirmion are antiparallel.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization direction of the center and edge of the skirmion is antiparallel.

data.source_sentence: 입사 전자빔이 스커미온을 가로질러 지나가면, 전자빔은 수렴하거나 분산되게 되며 defocus된 프레넬 이미지에서 원형 또는 점의 자기 콘트라스트가 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: As the incident electron beam crosses the skyrmion, the electron beam converges or diverges, resulting in a circular or dotted magnetic contrast in the defocused Fresnel image.
data.target_sentence: When an incident electron beam traverses a skyrmion, the electron beam converges or diverges, creating a circular or dotted magnetic contrast in the defocused Fresnel image.

data.source_sentence: 콘트라스트는 나선형 스핀의 방향과 defocus 값에 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The contrast is affected by the direction of the spiral spin and the defocus value.
data.target_sentence: Contrast is affected by the direction of the spiral spin and the defocus value.

data.source_sentence: 자기 스커미온의 이미징을 통해 스커미온 스핀의 나선 회전방향과 결정의 카이랄리티에의 영향 등을 파악할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through imaging of magnetic skyrmions, it is possible to understand the spiral rotation direction of the skyrmion spin and the effect on the chirality of the crystal.
data.target_sentence: Imaging of magnetic skyrmions allows us to understand the direction of spiral rotation of the skyrmion spin and its effect on the chirality of crystals.

In addition, load and no-load analysis were performed through characteristic analysis and finite element analysis according to the size of the connection part of the grain-oriented steel sheet.

data.source_sentence: TG-DSC(Thermogravimetric-differential scanning calorimetry analysis) 측정 시 나타나는 무게 감소 및 흡열 반응 특성들을 통해 나노입자의 생성 및 성장과의 연관성을 입증하였으며, TEM(Transmission Electron Microscope) 및 XRD(X-ray Diffractometer) 측정 결과 약 10 nm 직경을 가지는 구형태의 마그네타이트(magnetite)의 결정구조로 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The correlation with the generation and growth of nanoparticles was verified through the weight reduction and endothermic reaction characteristics during TG-DSC (Thermogravimetric-differential scanning calorimetry analysis) measurement, and TEM (Transmission Electron Microscope) and XRD (X-ray Diffractometer) measurements As a result, it was confirmed as a crystal structure of a spherical magnetite having a diameter of about 10 nm.
data.target_sentence: The correlation with the generation and growth of nanoparticles was verified through the weight reduction and endothermic reaction characteristics observed during thermogravimetric-differential scanning calorimetry analysis (TG-DSC). And as a result of transmission electron microscope (TEM) and X-ray diffractometer (XRD) measurement, it was confirmed as a spherical crystal structure of magnetite having a diameter of about 10 nm.

data.source_sentence: 특히 고온열분해법(thermal decomposition)과 수열합성법(hydrothermal reaction)은 매우 간단하고 균일한 크기의 결정성을 갖는 안정한 상(phase)을 제조하기 위한 방법으로 많이 이용되고 있지만 대부분 나노입자들 간 반데르발스 인력(van der Waals force)에 의해서 쉽게 뭉쳐서(aggregation) 단분산(monodisperse)된 나노입자를 제조하는데 어려움이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, thermal decomposition and hydrothermal reaction are widely used as methods for producing a very simple and stable phase with uniform size crystallinity, but most of the van der Waals methods between nanoparticles It is difficult to prepare nanoparticles that are easily aggregated by van der Waals force and are monodispersed.
data.target_sentence: In particular, thermal decomposition and hydrothermal reaction are widely used as methods for preparing a very simple and stable phase having crystallinity of uniform size. However, it is difficult to prepare monodisperse nanoparticles that are easily aggregated by the van der Waals force between most of the nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 이미 고온열분해법으로 Iron-oleate 전구체(precursor)를 이용하여 대량의 균일한 나노입자 제조 방법이 보고된 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A method for producing a large amount of uniform nanoparticles using an iron-oleate precursor has already been reported as a high-temperature pyrolysis method.
data.target_sentence: A method for mass-producing uniform nanoparticles using an iron-oleate precursor has already been reported as a high-temperature pyrolysis method.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1과 같이 Fe(acac)3 전구체와 1-hexadecanol을 계면활성제로 이용하여 다양한 반응온도(250~300°C)에서 고온열분해법을 이용하여 단분산된 서로 다른 크기를 갖는 산화철 나노입자의 합성 및 생성 메커니즘(mechanism)이 보고된 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 1, a synthesis and generation mechanism of iron oxide nanoparticles having different sizes monodispersed by high-temperature pyrolysis at various reaction temperatures (250 to 300°C) using a Fe(acac)3 precursor and 1-hexadecanol as surfactants has been reported.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 1, Fe(acac)3 precursor and 1-hexadecanol are used as surfactants. The synthesis and production mechanism of monodispersed iron oxide nanoparticles having different sizes using high-temperature pyrolysis at various reaction temperatures (250~300°C) have been reported.

data.source_sentence: 열중량분석기를 이용한 열적 특성을 확인하기 위해 반응이 진행되는 중간에 주사기를 이용하여 약 2 mL을 채취하여 알루미나 도가니(crucible)에 넣고 질소분위기에서 무게변화 및 열유속(heat flow)을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to check the thermal properties using a thermogravimetric analyzer, about 2 mL was collected using a syringe in the middle of the reaction, placed in an alumina crucible, and the weight change and heat flow were measured in a nitrogen atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: In order to check the thermal properties using a thermogravimetric analyzer, about 2 mL was collected using a syringe in the middle of the reaction, placed in an alumina crucible, and the weight change and heat flow were measured in a nitrogen atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 그 후 최종 반응온도(agingtemperature) 330°C까지 30분간 천천히 올린 후 30분간 격렬하게 교반한다.
data.mt_sentence: Thereafter, it is slowly raised to a final reaction temperature of 330°C for 30 minutes, and then stirred vigorously for 30 minutes.
data.target_sentence: After that, the reaction temperature is slowly raised to 330°C, which is the final reaction temperature for 30 minutes, and then vigorously stirred for 30 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 최종 생성물인 암갈색 용액에서 부산물(byproduct) 등의 제거 목적으로 에탄올(150 mL)과 톨루엔(30 mL)을 이용하여 세척 및 원심분리(centrifuge)를 수차례 진행한 후 약 10시간 동안 진공건조한다.
data.mt_sentence: After washing and centrifuging several times using ethanol (150 mL) and toluene (30 mL) for the purpose of removing byproducts from the final product, the dark brown solution, vacuum-dry for about 10 hours.
data.target_sentence: After washing several times with ethanol (150 mL) and toluene (30 mL) and centrifugation to remove by-products from the dark brown solution, the final product, the mixture is vacuum-dried for about 10 hours.

data.source_sentence: 최종 생성물의 결정구조를 확인하기 위해 XRD를 측정하였고, TEM 시편은 최종 건조된 시편을 소량 핵산에 초음파 세척기를 이용하여 균일하게 재분산 후 카본 코팅된 Cu-grid에 떨어뜨려 제작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: XRD was measured to confirm the crystal structure of the final product, and the TEM specimen was prepared by uniformly redispersing the final dried specimen in a small amount of nucleic acid using an ultrasonic cleaner and then dropping it on a carbon-coated Cu-grid.
data.target_sentence: XRD was measured to confirm the crystal structure of the final product, and the final dried specimen was uniformly redispersed in a small amount of nucleic acid using an ultrasonic cleaner, and then dropped on a carbon-coated Cu-grid to prepare a TEM specimen.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 본 연구에서 열적특성을 파악하기 위해 열중량분석기로 측정한 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 is the result of measurement with a thermogravimetric analyzer to understand the thermal properties in this study.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows the results measured with a thermogravimetric analyzer to understand the thermal characteristics of this study.

data.source_sentence: 열분해가 진행하는 동안 Fe-O의 결합 생성 및 부족한 산소를 지속적으로 공급하면서 330°C의 강한 흡열피크를 통해 Fe3O4 나노입자의 생성 및 성장이 진행됨을 유추할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was possible to infer that Fe3O4 nanoparticles were formed and grown through a strong endothermic peak at 330°C while the Fe-O bond was formed and insufficient oxygen was continuously supplied during thermal decomposition.
data.target_sentence: As Fe3O4 nanoparticles were formed and grown through a strong endothermic peak at 330℃, it could be inferred that Fe-O bonds were formed and oxygen was not continuously supplied during the pyrolysis process.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3은 본 연구에서 측정한 TEM 이미지를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3 shows the TEM image measured in this study.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3 shows the TEM images measured in this study.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3(b) TEM 이미지를 통해 평균 나노입자의 크기분포를 확인한 결과이며 평균 직경 9.8 ± 0.4 nm 값을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3(b) It is the result of confirming the size distribution of the average nanoparticles through the TEM image, and the average diameter value of 9.8 ± 0.4 nm was confirmed.
data.target_sentence: It is the result of confirming the size distribution of the average nanoparticles through the TEM image of FIG. 3(b), and it was confirmed that the average diameter value was 9.8 ± 0.4 nm.

data.source_sentence: 이는 AAA가 보고한 300°C에서 합성한 산화철 나노입자의 결정립 크기의 직경 7.8 ± 0.6 nm과 비교시 온도증가에 따른 결정립의 크기가 증가한 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is considered that the size of the grains increased with the increase in temperature compared to the diameter of 7.8 ± 0.6 nm of the grain size of the iron oxide nanoparticles synthesized at 300 °C reported by AAA.
data.target_sentence: It is determined that the particle size increased as the temperature increased compared to the diameter of 7.8±0.6 nm of the particle size of the iron oxide nanoparticles synthesized at 300°C reported by AAA.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 5는 직경 약 10 nm의 크기를 갖는 산화철 나노입자의 초상자성 전이현상을 관찰하기 위해 측정한 ZFC/FC의 데이터이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5 is data of ZFC/FC measured to observe the superparamagnetic transition of iron oxide nanoparticles having a diameter of about 10 nm.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5 is ZFC/FC data measured to observe superparamagnetic transition of iron oxide nanoparticles having a diameter of about 10 nm.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 5 K의 낮은 온도에서 300 K까지 온도를 올리면 열적요동(thermal fluctuation)에 의해서 산화철 나노입자의 고정된(blocked) 자기화 방향이 풀리면서(unblocked) 외부자장에 따라 자기화 방향이 정렬되어 자화도값이 커지는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, when the temperature is raised from a low temperature of 5 K to 300 K, the blocked magnetization direction of the iron oxide nanoparticles is unblocked due to thermal fluctuations, and the magnetization direction is aligned according to the external magnetic field. It can be seen that the magnetization value increases.
data.target_sentence: In general, when the temperature is raised from a low temperature of 5 K to 300 K, the blocked magnetization direction of the iron oxide nanoparticles is unblocked by thermal fluctuations. Therefore, it can be seen that the magnetization direction is aligned according to the external magnetic field, and the magnetization value increases.

data.source_sentence: 즉, TB 이하에서는 모든 Fe3O4 나노입자들은 자기화 방향이 unblocked되며 강자성을 나타내지만 TB 이상에서는 초상자성이 발현되는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, below TB, all Fe3O4 nanoparticles showed unblocked magnetization direction and showed ferromagnetism, but it was confirmed that superparamagnetism was expressed above TB.
data.target_sentence: That is, below TB, all Fe3O4 nanoparticles showed ferromagnetism without blocking the magnetization direction, but it was confirmed that superparamagnetism was expressed above TB.

data.source_sentence: TB 이하에서는 자기이방성에너지(magnetic anisotropy energy)가 열에너지보다 크기 때문에 외부 자기장이 없는 상태(B = 0) 쌍극자(dipole)들은 자기적으로 쉬운 방향(easy axis)로 정렬되어 자화값을 가지게 되며 보자력이 0이 아님을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Below TB, since the magnetic anisotropy energy is greater than the thermal energy, in the absence of an external magnetic field (B = 0), the dipoles are magnetically aligned in an easy axis to have a magnetization value, and the coercive force is It was confirmed that it is not 0.
data.target_sentence: Below TB, since the magnetic anisotropy energy is greater than the thermal energy, it was confirmed that in the absence of an external magnetic field (B=0), the dipoles are magnetically aligned with an easy axis to have a magnetization value, and the coercive force is not zero.

data.source_sentence: TB보다 높은 온도에서는 초상자성 상태이므로 열에너지가 자기이방성에너지보다 크므로 쌍극자들의 무질서도가 증가하여 Hc이 매우 작은 값을 가지는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that Hc has a very small value due to the increased disorderedness of the dipoles as the thermal energy is larger than the magnetic anisotropic energy at a temperature higher than TB.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that Hc has a very small value due to the increase in the disorder of the dipole because the thermal energy is greater than the magnetic anisotropy energy at a higher temperature than TB.

data.source_sentence: 이는 결정립 크기의 증가로 인해 표면에 위치하는 원자수의 변화에 의한 표면효과의 영향으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: This is considered to be the effect of the surface effect due to the change in the number of atoms located on the surface due to the increase in the grain size.
data.target_sentence: This is thought to be the influence of the surface effect due to the change in the number of atoms located on the surface due to the increase in the grain size.

data.source_sentence: PPMS를 이용하여 ZFC/FC을 외부자기장(H = 100 Oe)의 조건에서 측정한 결과 TB가 약 26 K 확인하였고 자기이력곡선을 통해 강자성 상태(5 K)와 초상자성 상태(300 K)에서 보자력(Hc)의 차이를 통해 초상자성 전이현상을 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of measuring ZFC/FC under the condition of an external magnetic field (H = 100 Oe) using PPMS, TB was confirmed to be about 26 K, and the coercive force in the ferromagnetic state (5 K) and superparamagnetic state (300 K) through the hysteresis curve. The superparamagnetic transition was observed through the difference in (Hc).
data.target_sentence: As a result of measuring ZFC/FC in an external magnetic field (H = 100 Oe) using PPMS, TB was confirmed to be about 26K, and the coercive force in the ferromagnetic state (5K) and superparamagnetic state (5K) was 300 K) hysteresis. A superparamagnetic transition was observed through the curve and through the difference in (Hc).

data.source_sentence: EDFA에 입력되는 광신호 입력을 −30 dBm과 −10 dBm으로 각각 설정하여 증폭기가 소 신호 영역과 포화 영역에서 동작할 때의 성능을 실험적으로 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By setting the optical signal input to the EDFA to −30 dBm and −10 dBm, respectively, the performance of the amplifier operating in the small signal region and the saturation region was experimentally compared.
data.target_sentence: By setting the optical signal input to the EDFA as -30dBm and -10dBm, the performance of the amplifier operating in the small signal region and the saturation region was experimentally compared.

data.source_sentence: FSO 시스템은 기존의 마이크로웨이브 기반 무선통신 시스템과 비교해 보면 반송주파수가 105배 정도 높으므로 넓은 대역폭을 제공할 수 있는 장점을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: Compared with the existing microwave-based wireless communication system, the FSO system has an advantage of providing a wide bandwidth because the carrier frequency is about 105 times higher.
data.target_sentence: The FSO system has the advantage of providing a wide bandwidth because the carrier frequency is about 105 times higher than that of the existing microwave-based wireless communication system.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 경제적인 대용량 FSO 시스템을 효율적으로 구현하기 위한 연구가 꾸준하게 증가하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, research for efficiently implementing economical large-capacity FSO systems has been steadily increasing.
data.target_sentence: Recently, research to efficiently implement an economical large-capacity FSO system has been steadily increasing.

data.source_sentence: 추가적으로는 태양광에 의한 잡음과 대기 외란에 의한 신호 요동 현상 등이 대표적으로 극복해야 하는 단점이다.
data.mt_sentence: Additionally, noise caused by sunlight and signal fluctuations caused by atmospheric disturbance are representative disadvantages that must be overcome.
data.target_sentence: In addition, noise caused by sunlight and signal fluctuations caused by atmospheric disturbance are typical disadvantages that must be overcome.

data.source_sentence: 단점 중 대기 외란에 의한 신호 요동을 억제하기 위하여 개구 평균(ap-erture averaging) 기법 등에 대한 연구 결과가 보고된 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among the shortcomings, research results on ap-erture averaging techniques have been reported to suppress signal fluctuations caused by atmospheric disturbance.
data.target_sentence: Among the shortcomings, research results on the aperture averaging technique to suppress signal fluctuations due to atmospheric disturbance are being reported.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 큰 광신호 입력에 의해 EDFA를 이득 포화 영역에서 동작시키게 되면 광신호 변동에 대해서 일정한 광 출력을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the EDFA is operated in the gain saturation region by such a large optical signal input, a constant optical output can be obtained in response to optical signal fluctuations.
data.target_sentence: If the EDFA is operated in the gain saturation region by such a large optical signal input, a constant optical output can be obtained according to the optical signal fluctuation.

data.source_sentence: 이득 포화 영역에서는 입력 광신호의 세기가 감소하게 되면 증폭기 이득이 증가하고, 입력 광신호의 세기가 증가하는 경우에는 증폭기 이득이 감소하기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because, in the gain saturation region, when the intensity of the input optical signal decreases, the gain of the amplifier increases, and when the intensity of the input optical signal increases, the gain of the amplifier decreases.
data.target_sentence: This is because, in the gain saturation region, when the intensity of the input optical signal decreases, the gain of the amplifier increases, and when the intensity of the input optical signal increases, the gain of the amplifier decreases.

data.source_sentence: 이 중에서 전광 방식 AGC EDFA는 비교적 간단하게 자동 이득 제어 기능을 구현할 수 있는 장점을 갖고 있어 많이 활용되는 방식이다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, the all-optical AGC EDFA has the advantage of being able to implement the automatic gain control function relatively simply, so it is widely used.
data.target_sentence: Among them, the all-optical AGC EDFA has the advantage of being able to implement the automatic gain control function relatively simply and is widely used.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 전광 AGC EDFA의 신호 요동 억제 및 입출력 신호 전달 주파수 특성 영향을 측정하여 FSO시스템에서의 활용 가능성을 확인한다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, suppression of signal fluctuation of all-optical AGC EDFA and the effect of input/output signal transmission frequency characteristics are measured to confirm the possibility of application in FSO system.
data.target_sentence: Through this, the influence of signal fluctuation suppression and input/output signal transmission frequency characteristics of all-optical AGC EDFA was measured to confirm the applicability to the FSO system.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1은 실험에 사용된 전광 AGC EDFA의 성능 평가를 위한 실험 구성도를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 1 shows the experimental configuration for the performance evaluation of the all-optical AGC EDFA used in the experiment.
data.target_sentence: Figure 1 shows the experimental setup for performance evaluation of the all-optical AGC EDFA used in the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 첫 번째 광 커플러(50:50 OC)를 통과한 광신호 입력은 EDFA에 입력되어 증폭된 후, 두 번째 광 커플러(90:10 OC)에서 출력과 피드백(feedback) 광으로 분리된다.
data.mt_sentence: The optical signal input passing through the first optical coupler (50:50 OC) is input to the EDFA, amplified, and then separated into an output and feedback light by the second optical coupler (90:10 OC).
data.target_sentence: The optical signal input through the first optical coupler (50:50 OC) is input to the EDFA, amplified, and then separated into output light and feedback light by the second optical coupler (90:10 OC).

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 전광 이득 루프에서 피드백되는 ASE 광 전력에 의한 시스템 성능을 비교하여 평가할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it is possible to compare and evaluate the system performance by the ASE optical power fed back from the all-optical gain loop.
data.target_sentence: This enables comparative evaluation of system performance with the ASE optical power fed back from the all-optical gain loop.

data.source_sentence: 마지막으로 두 번째 광 커플러를 통과한 증폭기 전체 출력은 파장 가변 OBPF (tunable OBPF)를 통과한 후 오실로 스코프를 이용하여 신호 세기 변동을 측정한다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, the entire output of the amplifier passing through the second optocoupler passes through a tunable OBPF (tunable OBPF), and then the signal strength variation is measured using an oscilloscope.
data.target_sentence: Finally, the entire output of the amplifier that has passed through the second optocoupler passes through a tunable OBPF (tunable OBPF) and then measures the change in signal strength using an oscilloscope.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2는 실험에 사용된 AOM의 삽입 손실을 측정한 결과를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows the results of measuring the insertion loss of the AOM used in the experiment.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows the result of measuring the insertion loss of the AOM used in the experiment.

data.source_sentence: 입력 광신호 전력이 −20 dBm 이하인 경우에는 소 신호(small signal) 영역으로 증폭기 이득이 거의 일정하며, 전력이 −20 dBm보다 커지는 경우 증폭기 이득이 포화(saturation)되기 시작한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the input optical signal power is less than −20 dBm, the amplifier gain is almost constant in the small signal region, and when the power is greater than −20 dBm, the amplifier gain starts to be saturated.
data.target_sentence: When the input optical signal power is less than -20dBm, the amplifier gain is almost constant in the small signal region, and when the power is greater than -20dBm, the amplifier gain starts to saturate.

data.source_sentence: 즉 이득 포화 영역에서는 신호 전력의 크기가 커질수록 증폭기 이득은 감소하는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: That is, it can be seen that the gain of the amplifier decreases as the magnitude of the signal power increases in the gain saturation region.
data.target_sentence: That is, it can be seen that the gain of the amplifier decreases as the signal power increases in the gain saturation region.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 전광 AGC EDFA의 신호 요동 억제 현상을 증폭기 이득 특성의 2개 영역인 소 신호 영역(small-signal region)과 포화 영역(saturation region)에서 측정하여 그 성능을 비교한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the signal fluctuation suppression phenomenon of the all-optical AGC EDFA was measured in two regions of the amplifier gain characteristics, the small-signal region and the saturation region, and the performance was compared.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the signal fluctuation suppression of the all-optical AGC EDFA was measured and the performance was compared in the small signal region and the saturation region, which are two regions of amplifier gain characteristics.

data.source_sentence: EDFA에서 발생하는 ASE 광 파워는 다음과 같은 식으로 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The ASE optical power generated by EDFA may be calculated by the following equation.
data.target_sentence: The ASE optical power generated by the EDFA can be calculated by the following equation.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 nsp는 자발 방출 계수(spontaneous emission factor), hvs는 광자 에너지, Dv는 증폭기 이득 대역폭, G는 증폭기 이득을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, nsp represents the spontaneous emission factor, hvs represents photon energy, Dv represents amplifier gain bandwidth, and G represents amplifier gain.
data.target_sentence: where nsp is the natural emission coefficient, hvs is the photon energy, Dv is the amplifier gain bandwidth, and G is the amplifier gain.

data.source_sentence: 식 (1)에 따라 ASE 광 파워 변화량(DPASE)은 이득 변화량(DG)에 비례하여 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: According to Equation (1), the ASE optical power change amount DPASE increases in proportion to the gain change amount DG.
data.target_sentence: According to Equation 1, the ASE optical power variation DPASE increases in proportion to the gain variation DG.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3의 EDFA 이득 특성을 고려하면 소 신호 영역에서는 입력 광 신호가 변화하는 경우에도 이득의 변화가 적으므로 ASE 광 파워 변화는 적다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the EDFA gain characteristics in Figure 3, in the small signal region, the gain change is small even when the input optical signal changes, so the ASE optical power change is small.
data.target_sentence: Considering the EDFA gain characteristics in Figure 3, in the small signal region, the gain change is small even if the input optical signal changes, so the ASE optical power change is small.

data.source_sentence: 이에 비해 포화 영역에서 동작하는 EDFA에서는 입력 광 신호의 변화에 비례하여 ASE 광 파워가 변화하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In contrast, in the EDFA operating in the saturation region, the ASE optical power changes in proportion to the change in the input optical signal.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, in the EDFA operating in the saturation region, the ASE optical power changes in proportion to the change in the input optical signal.

data.source_sentence: 전광 AGCEDFA에서는 증폭기에서 발생하는 ASE 광을 피드백하여 증폭기 출력 광을 일정하게 유지하게 되므로, ASE 광 파워의 변동은 증폭기 출력 특성 변화를 유발할 것으로 예측된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the all-optical AGCEDFA, the ASE light generated from the amplifier is fed back to keep the amplifier output light constant, so it is expected that the fluctuation of the ASE optical power will cause a change in the amplifier output characteristics.
data.target_sentence: All-optical AGCEDFA feeds back the ASE light generated by the amplifier to keep the amplifier output light constant, so it is expected that the amplifier output characteristics will change due to the fluctuation of the ASE light power.

data.source_sentence: 그림 4는 구현된 전광 AGC EDFA를 통해 증폭된 광신호와 AGC 루프를 통해 레이징하는 ASE 광의 변동을 측정한 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 4 shows the measurement results of the optical signal amplified through the implemented all-optical AGC EDFA and the variation of the ASE light lasing through the AGC loop.
data.target_sentence: Figure 4 shows the results of measuring the amount of change of the optical signal amplified through the implemented all-optical AGC EDFA and the ASE light emitted through the AGC loop.

data.source_sentence: 이 측정을 위해서는 EDFA에 입력되는 광신호 전력을 −30 dBm으로 유지하여 소 신호 영역에서 증폭기가 동작하도록 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For this measurement, the optical signal power input to the EDFA was maintained at −30 dBm and the amplifier was set to operate in the small signal region.
data.target_sentence: For this measurement, the optical signal power input to the EDFA was maintained at -30 dBm and the amplifier was set to operate in the small signal region.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1에 나타난 바와 같이 EDFA의 출력을 90:10 광 커플러를 통과시킨 후 파장 가변 광 대역 통과 필터(tunable OBPF)를 이용하여 측정하고자 하는 신호광 또는 피드백 ASE 파장으로 선택하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 1, after passing the output of the EDFA through a 90:10 optical coupler, a wavelength tunable optical bandpass filter (tunable OBPF) was used to select the signal light or feedback ASE wavelength to be measured.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 1, after passing the output of the EDFA through a 90:10 optocoupler, a tunable optical bandpass filter (tunable OBPF) was used to select the signal light or feedback ASE wavelength to be measured.

data.source_sentence: 선택된 파장의 광은 포토 다이오드로 수신한 후 오실로스코프를 이용하여 신호 변동량을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After the light of the selected wavelength was received by the photodiode, the amount of signal variation was measured using an oscilloscope.
data.target_sentence: After receiving the light of the selected wavelength with a photodiode, the amount of change in the signal was measured using an oscilloscope.

data.source_sentence: 결과는 EDFA의 입력이 −30 dBm으로 낮은 레벨이어서 신호 변동에 따른 전력 요동 자체가 작아 이에 의해 발생하는 ASE 광의 변동이 작게 되는 것과 관련이 있는 것으로 유추할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 전광 AGC EDFA를 이용하여 자유 공간 광통신(FSO) 시스템에서의 대기 외란에 의한 광신호 요동 억제 특성을 실험적으로 검증하였다.

data.source_sentence: 정확한 코드로 디코딩된 펄스의 중심에서 자기상관 피크 값은 어긋난 파장 호핑 코드 및 스펙트럼 위상 코드로 디코딩된 경우의 최대 교차상관 레벨에 비하여 3배 이상으로 관측되었다.

data.source_sentence: OCDMA 네트워크 시스템은 다음과 같은 몇 가지 장점을 제공한다.
data.mt_sentence: The OCDMA network system provides several advantages as follows.
data.target_sentence: OCDMA network systems offer several advantages:

data.source_sentence: 코딩 과정이 모두 광학적으로 수행되므로 액세스 지연 시간이 최소화되고, 비동기(asynchronous)방식으로 작동하기 때문에 네트워크 시스템을 매우 간단하게 만들 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the coding process is all optically performed, the access latency is minimized, and the network system can be made very simple because it operates in an asynchronous manner.
data.target_sentence: Since the coding process is all done optically, the connection delay is minimized, and the network system can be very simple because it operates asynchronously.

data.source_sentence: 사용자의 추가 및 삭제가 용이하기 때문에, 필요에 따라 네트워크 용량을 유연하게 조절할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since it is easy to add and delete users, the network capacity can be flexibly adjusted as needed.
data.target_sentence: It is easy to add and delete users, giving you the flexibility to adjust the network capacity according to your needs.

data.source_sentence: 인코히어런트 시간 확산 일차원 OCDMA 시스템은 구현이 간단하기 때문에 많은 관심을 끌었지만, 제한된 코드 용량, 낮은 대역폭 효율 및 상대적으로 열악한 자기 상관 및 교차 상관 특성의 단점을 내재하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Incoherent time-spreading one-dimensional OCDMA systems have attracted much attention because of their simple implementation, but have inherent disadvantages of limited code capacity, low bandwidth efficiency, and relatively poor autocorrelation and cross-correlation characteristics.
data.target_sentence: Incoherent time-spreading one-dimensional OCDMA systems have attracted much attention because of their simple implementation. However, it has inherent disadvantages of limited code capacity, low bandwidth efficiency, and relatively poor autocorrelation and cross-correlation characteristics.

data.source_sentence: 인코히어런트 일차원 OCDMA 네트워크에서의 상대적으로 불리한 특성은 코딩 과정이 시간 영역 및 스펙트럼 영역 모두에서 수행되는 코히어런트 이차원OCDMA 시스템을 통하여 개선될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The relatively unfavorable nature of incoherent one-dimensional OCDMA networks can be improved through coherent two-dimensional OCDMA systems in which the coding process is performed in both the time domain and the spectral domain.

data.source_sentence: 코히어런트 이차원 OCDMA 시스템에서는 상관 특성, 주파수 효율, 용량, 보안 및 분산 측면에서 추가적인 특성 개선을 얻는다.
data.mt_sentence: In a coherent two-dimensional OCDMA system, additional characteristic improvements are obtained in terms of correlation characteristics, frequency efficiency, capacity, security and dispersion.

data.source_sentence: 스펙트럼위상 인코딩/디코딩을 위하여 마이크로 링 공진기 기반 광학 OCDMA 인코더/디코더가 시현된 바 있는데, 이 인코더/디코더는 매우 컴팩트하고 신속하게 재구성 가능하며, 정확한 주파수 선택 및 위상 제어가 가능하다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 우리나라의 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신 시스템의 링크 가용성을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the link availability of Korea's satellite-ground downstream wireless optical communication system was analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the link availability of the satellite terrestrial downstream wireless optical communication system in Korea was analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 주요 5개 도시(서울, 부산, 대구, 대전, 광주)의 최근 10년간의 기상 데이터를 활용했으며, 대기의 흡수 및 산란 손실과 신틸레이션 손실, 그리고 에어로졸 손실을 모두 고려하여 링크 가용성을 이론적으로 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: We used meteorological data for the last 10 years of five major cities (Seoul, Busan, Daegu, Daejeon, and Gwangju), and theoretically predicted link availability by considering both atmospheric absorption and scattering losses, scintillation losses, and aerosol losses. .
data.target_sentence: We used meteorological data for the last 10 years of five major cities (Seoul, Busan, Daegu, Daejeon, and Gwangju), and theoretically predicted link availability by considering atmospheric absorption and scattering loss, glare loss, and aerosol loss.

data.source_sentence: 지상 기지국이 주요 5개 도시 중 한 곳에 위치하며, 대기 손실에 20 dB의 링크 버짓을 할당할 것을 전제한 경우 우리나라 위상-지상 하향 무선 광통신 링크의 가용성은 45–70%로 예측되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the terrestrial base station is located in one of the five major cities and a link budget of 20 dB is allocated to the standby loss, the availability of the phase-to-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication link in Korea is estimated to be 45–70%.
data.target_sentence: It is assumed that the terrestrial base station is located in one of the five major cities and allocates a link budget of 20 dB to the standby loss. In this case, the availability of the phase-to-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication link in Korea was estimated to be 45–70%.

data.source_sentence: 3개 또는 5개 도시의 위치 다이버시티를 적용하면, 링크 가용성이 각각 90%와 97%로 크게 향상될 수 있을 것으로 예측되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Applying location diversity in three or five cities, it is predicted that link availability can be significantly improved to 90% and 97%, respectively.
data.target_sentence: It is predicted that applying location diversity to three or five cities could significantly improve link availability by 90% and 97%, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 무선 광통신 시스템은 radio frequency (RF) 통신 시스템과 달리 넓은 대역의 주파수 자원을 별도의 규제와 승인 없이 사용할 수 있고, 짧은 파장의 광 반송파를 사용하므로 위성 탑재체의 저전력화ㆍ소형화ㆍ경량화 실현이 상대적으로 용이하다.
data.mt_sentence: Unlike radio frequency (RF) communication systems, wireless optical communication systems can use wide-band frequency resources without separate regulations and approval, and use short-wavelength optical carriers, making it relatively easy to realize low power, miniaturization, and lightness of satellite payloads.
data.target_sentence: Unlike a radio frequency (RF) communication system, a wireless optical communication system can use a wide band of frequency resources without separate regulation and approval. Since a short wavelength optical carrier is used, it is relatively easy to realize low power consumption, miniaturization, and weight reduction of the satellite payload.

data.source_sentence: 위성-지상 광통신 시스템의 경우 신호가 대기권을 통과하며 대기 손실(atmospheric loss)을 겪으며, 이로 인하여 전송 성능이 크게 열화된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a satellite-terrestrial optical communication system, a signal passes through the atmosphere and suffers atmospheric loss, which greatly degrades transmission performance.
data.target_sentence: In the case of satellite terrestrial optical communication systems, the transmission performance is greatly reduced as the signal passes through the atmosphere and causes atmospheric loss.

data.source_sentence: 대기 채널의 특성으로 인해 수신 광전력이 수신 감도보다 낮아지면 요구되는 비트 오율(bit error ratio)을 충족하지 못하게 되고 통신링크는 단절(outage)된다.
data.mt_sentence: If the received optical power is lower than the reception sensitivity due to the characteristics of the standby channel, the required bit error ratio cannot be met, and the communication link is outage.
data.target_sentence: Due to the nature of the standby channel, if the received optical power is lower than the reception sensitivity, the required bit error rate is not satisfied and the communication link is broken.

data.source_sentence: 무선 광통신 시스템의 성능을 나타내는 중요한 지표 중의 하나는 링크 가용성(link availability)이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the important indicators of the performance of a wireless optical communication system is link availability.
data.target_sentence: One of the important indicators of the performance of a wireless optical communication system is link availability.

data.source_sentence: 이는 연중 링크가 단절되는 시간의 비율로, 가용성이 99%인 통신 시스템은 운용할 수 없는 시간의 합이 1년에 약 3.65일 정도라는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This is the percentage of time the link is disconnected throughout the year, which means that a communication system with 99% availability cannot operate for a total of about 3.65 days a year.
data.target_sentence: This is the percentage of time the link is down throughout the year, meaning that a communications system with 99% availability will be unavailable for a total of 3.65 days a year.

data.source_sentence: 무선 광통신 기지국을 설치할 특정 지역의 링크 가용성을 미리 예측할 수 있어야 몇 개의 기지국을 다른 지역에 추가로 설치해야 할지 등을 판단할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Link availability in a specific area where a wireless optical communication base station will be installed must be predicted in advance to determine how many base stations should be additionally installed in other areas.
data.target_sentence: It is necessary to predict in advance the link availability in a specific area where the wireless optical communication base station will be installed, and determine how many base stations should be additionally installed in other areas.

data.source_sentence: 목표한 가용성을 만족하기 위해 무선 광통신 시스템과 상호 보완하여 운용할 수 있는 통신 시스템(예: 마이크로파 통신 시스템)을 추가 활용해야 할지도 결정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is also possible to determine whether additional utilization of communication systems (e.g., microwave communication systems) that can be operated in complement with wireless optical communication systems should be made to meet the target availability.
data.target_sentence: In addition, a communication system that can operate complementary to a wireless optical communication system (eg, It is also possible to determine whether further utilization of microwave communication systems) must meet the target availability.

data.source_sentence: 링크 가용성을 낙관적으로 예측할 경우 링크 단절이 예상보다 더 빈번히 일어나므로 신뢰할 수 있는 가용성을 계산하기 위해서는 이를 보수적으로(conservatively) 분석하는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: When optimistically predicting link availability, link disconnection occurs more frequently than expected, so it is important to analyze it conservatively in order to calculate reliable availability.
data.target_sentence: When optimistically predicting link availability, link breaks occur more frequently than expected, so it is important to analyze them conservatively to calculate reliable availability.

data.source_sentence: 대기 손실의 정도는 지역별, 월별로 변화가 크기 때문에, 링크 가용성 분석은 지역별ㆍ월별로 구분되어 실시되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the degree of standby loss varies greatly by region and month, link availability analysis should be performed separately by region and month.
data.target_sentence: Since the degree of standby loss varies greatly by region and month, link availability analysis must be performed separately by region and month.

data.source_sentence: 옥외 지상 간 무선 광통신 링크의 가용성은 대기 채널에 의한 손실을 이론적으로 분석하여 예측할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The availability of an outdoor ground-to-ground wireless optical communication link can be predicted by theoretically analyzing the loss caused by the standby channel.
data.target_sentence: The availability of outdoor terrestrial to terrestrial wireless fiber optic links can be predicted by theoretically analyzing losses due to atmospheric channels.

data.source_sentence: 시계(visibility)나 강수량 데이터를 기반으로 한국, 미국, 유럽, 슬로바키아, 인도, 말레이시아 등 다양한 장소에서 옥외 지상 간 무선 광통신 시스템의 링크 가용성이 연구된 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on visibility and precipitation data, link availability of outdoor ground-to-ground wireless optical communication systems has been studied in various places, including Korea, the United States, Europe, Slovakia, India, and Malaysia.
data.target_sentence: Based on visibility and precipitation data, link availability of outdoor ground-to-terrestrial wireless optical communication systems in various regions such as Korea, USA, Europe, Slovakia, India and Malaysia was studied.

data.source_sentence: 비교적 최근에 와서야 대기의 액체수함량(liquid water content) 데이터를 활용하며 위성-지상 하향 링크의 가용성을 분석한 결과가 발표되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Only relatively recently, the results of analyzing the availability of satellite-terrestrial downlinks using atmospheric liquid water content data were published.
data.target_sentence: Only relatively recently was the analysis of the availability of satellite terrestrial downlinks published using atmospheric liquid moisture content data.

data.source_sentence: 참고문헌은 각각 그리스와 미 대륙에서 시행된 것으로, 대기에 구름이 있는 경우(액체수함량 > 0) 통신이 불가한 것으로 판단하여 링크 가용성을 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The references were implemented in Greece and the U.S. continent, respectively, and link availability was predicted by judging that communication was impossible when there were clouds in the atmosphere (liquid water content > 0).
data.target_sentence: The reference was implemented in Greece and the Americas, respectively, and link availability was predicted by judging that communication was impossible when there were clouds in the atmosphere (liquid moisture > 0).

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 우리나라를 대표하는 5개의 도시(서울, 부산, 대구, 대전, 광주)에 지상기지국이 설치되었다고 가정하고 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신 시스템의 링크 가용성을 이론적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, it is assumed that terrestrial base stations are installed in 5 cities representing Korea (Seoul, Busan, Daegu, Daejeon, and Gwangju), and the link availability of the satellite-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system is theoretically analyzed.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, it is assumed that terrestrial base stations are installed in five cities representing Korea (Seoul, Busan, Daegu, Daejeon, and Gwangju), and the link availability of the satellite terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system is analyzed theoretically.

data.source_sentence: 유럽중기예보센터(ECMWF)가 측정한 지난 10년간의 기상 데이터를 활용하였으며, 보다 정확한 가용성 예측을 위해 액체수함량 별 최대 개수밀도(number concen-tration)를 예상하여 광전력의 흡수 및 산란 손실을 보수적으로 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Meteorological data of the past decade measured by the European Center for Medium-Term Forecasting (ECMWF) were used, and the absorption and scattering loss of photovoltaic power was conservatively calculated by predicting the maximum number concen-tration by liquid water content for more accurate usability prediction.
data.target_sentence: Meteorological data for the past 10 years measured by the European Center for Medium-term Forecasting (ECMWF) were used. For a more accurate prediction of availability, absorption and scattering losses of optical power were conservatively calculated by estimating the maximum number concen-tration for each liquid water content.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 기존 연구결과와 달리 신틸레이션과 에어로졸이 각각 유발하는 광전력 변화와 감쇠까지 포함하여 가용성을 분석하였으며, 도시별 위치 다이버시티(sitediversity) 기술 적용에 따른 가용성 변화도 함께 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Unlike most existing research results, the availability was analyzed by including the light power change and attenuation caused by scintillation and aerosol, respectively, and the availability change due to the application of sitediversity technology for each city was also predicted.
data.target_sentence: Unlike most of the existing research results, the usability was analyzed by including the light power change and attenuation caused by flashes and aerosols, respectively, and the availability change due to the application of site diversity technology for each city was also predicted.

data.source_sentence: 저자가 아는 한 우리나라 위성-지상 하향 광통신 시스템의 링크 가용성을 분석한 결과는 본 논문이 최초이며, 또한 위치 다이버시티 기술을 적용한 분석도 처음이다.

data.source_sentence: 정확한 링크 가용성 계산을 위해 액체수함량별로 야기되는 최대 흡수 및 산란 손실을 예상 및 활용하여, 흡수 및 산란 손실의 확률 분포함수를 구하였다.

data.source_sentence: 대기 난류가 유발하는 광전력 변화와 에어로졸 손실은 구름이나 안개에 의한 흡수 및 산란 손실과 독립이라는 가정 하에 신틸레이션, 에어로졸 손실까지 포함하있다.
data.mt_sentence: Under the assumption that the optical power change and aerosol loss caused by atmospheric turbulence are independent of absorption and scattering loss caused by clouds or fog, scintillation and aerosol loss are included.

data.source_sentence: 손실에 대한 분포를 단일 함수로 피팅할 수 없었기 때문에 맑은 날(0–3 dB의 손실)은 별도의 이산 분포로 표현하였으며, 3 dB 손실보다 큰 경우에는 연속 함수로 피팅하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이는 여름에 대기의 흡수 및 산란 손실이 높은 구름이 낀 날이 많다는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that in summer there are many cloudy days with high absorption and scattering losses in the atmosphere.
data.target_sentence: This means that in summer there are many cloudy days with high absorption and scattering losses in the atmosphere.

data.source_sentence: 두 번째 그래프에서 평균은 지역 또는 월별로 뚜렷한 상관관계를 보이지 않았는데, 이는 링크 가용성은 도시별, 월별로 나누어 분석해야 더정확한 값을 구할 수 있다는 사실을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: In the second graph, the average did not show a clear correlation by region or month, which shows that link availability needs to be analyzed separately by city and month to obtain a more accurate value.

data.source_sentence: 마지막 그래프를 보면 강수량이 적은 봄, 겨울에도 표준편차가 대체적으로 높은데, 이로써 여름이 아니더라도 흡수 및 산란 손실이 높은 흐린 날이 여전히 있음을 확인할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 대기 손실에 할당한 링크 버짓에 따른 도시별, 월별 링크 가용성 계산 결과는 그림 8과 같다.

data.source_sentence: 링크 버짓을 높게 할당할수록, 운용 시간 중 요구 비트 오율을 충족하는 시간의 비율이 높아지는 것을 확인할 수 있다.

data.target_sentence: Similarly, when the link budget is 20dB, link availability showed the highest value in February and the lowest value in August, and the two showed a difference of about 22%.

data.mt_sentence: Availability differed greatly depending on the city combination even though the number of cities to which the location diversity was applied was the same, and Daejeon and Gwangju showed the highest availability in the case of the two city location diversity.
data.target_sentence: Even if the number of cities to which location diversity is applied is the same, the availability varies greatly depending on the city combination. In the case of location diversity, Daejeon and Gwangju show the highest availability.

data.source_sentence: 대기 감쇠에 20 dB의 버짓을 할당할 경우 7월의 최적 링크 가용성은 그림 10과 같이 위치 다이버시티 도시 개수가 증가함에 따라 96.85%까지 향상된다.
data.mt_sentence: When a 20 dB budget is allocated for atmospheric attenuation, the optimal link availability in July improves to 96.85% as the number of location diversity cities increases, as shown in Figure 10.
data.target_sentence: If a 20 dB budget is allocated for atmospheric attenuation, the optimal link availability in July improves to 96.85% as the number of location diversity cities increases, as shown in Figure 10.

data.source_sentence: 5개 도시 모두에서 위치 다이버시티를 적용할 경우, 링크 가용성의 월간 변화를 분석한 결과는 그림 11과 같다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 11 shows the results of analyzing monthly link availability changes when location diversity is applied to all five cities.

data.source_sentence: 버짓이 20 dB일 경우에 요구되는 발산각은 4.46 μrad로 분석되었으며, 이때 흡수 및 산란 손실은 11.5 dB, 신틸레이션 손실은 5.5 dB, 그리고 에어로졸 손실은 3 dB로 예측되었다.

data.target_sentence: When the budget is 20dB, the required divergence angle was analyzed to be 4.46μrad, and absorption and scattering loss were predicted to be 11.5dB, scintillation loss to be 5.5dB, and aerosol loss to be 3dB.

data.source_sentence: 발산각에 따른 기하광학적 손실은 33 dB로 나타났으며, 이 경우의 7월의 링크 가용성은 위치 다이버시티를 적용하는 도시의 수별로 그림 10에 제시된 바와 같다.
