data.target_sentence: The geometric optical loss according to the divergence angle was 33 dB, and the link availability in July in this case is shown in Figure 10 by the number of cities with location diversity applied.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 1 Gb/s급 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신 시스템을 구현하기 위해서는 신호를 sub-milliradian 수준의 협소한 발산각으로 전송해야 한다는 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This shows that in order to implement a 1 Gb/s-class satellite-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system, signals must be transmitted with a narrow divergence angle of sub-milliradian level.
data.target_sentence: This shows that in order to implement a 1Gb/s-class satellite terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system, it is necessary to transmit a signal with a narrow divergence angle of less than milliradian.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 대기 채널에서의 구름에 의한 흡수 및 산란손실, 신틸레이션 손실, 그리고 에어로졸 손실을 고려하여 우리나라 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신 시스템의 링크 가용성을 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the link availability of Korea's satellite-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system is analyzed considering the absorption and scattering loss, scintillation loss, and aerosol loss due to clouds in the atmospheric channel.
data.target_sentence: In this paper, we analyze the link availability of Korea's satellite terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system considering absorption and scattering loss, glare loss, and aerosol loss due to clouds in the atmospheric channel.

data.source_sentence: 보다 정확하게 링크 가용성을 계산하기 위해 최대 개수밀도를 예상 및 활용하는 새로운 손실 모델을 제시하였으며, 우리나라의 5개 대표 도시에서 10년간 측정된 기상 데이터를 분석해 구한 확률 분포 함수를 활용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to more accurately calculate link availability, a new loss model that predicts and utilizes the maximum number density was presented, and a probability distribution function obtained by analyzing meteorological data measured for 10 years in five major cities in Korea was used.
data.target_sentence: In order to more accurately calculate link availability, a new loss model that predicts and utilizes the maximum number density was presented, and a probability distribution function obtained by analyzing meteorological data measured over a 10-year period in five major domestic cities was used.

data.source_sentence: 도시별 위치 다이버시티 기술 적용에 따른 가용성 향상도 함께 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Availability improvement due to the application of location diversity technology for each city was also predicted.
data.target_sentence: It was also expected to improve availability by applying location diversity technology to each city.

data.source_sentence: 구름에 의한 흡수 및 산란손실은 도시별, 월별로 큰 차이를 보였으며, 링크 가용성도 이와 같이 크게 변화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Absorption and scattering loss due to clouds showed large differences by city and month, and link availability also changed significantly.
data.target_sentence: Absorption and scattering losses by clouds varied significantly by city and month, and link availability also changed significantly.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 비에 의한 강우 감쇠나 위성의 진동 등이 유발하는 송수신기의 지향 정확도에 의한 손실(pointingloss)을 포함하지 않았기 때문에, 실제 링크 가용성은 본 연구결과에서 제시한 링크 가용성보다 다소 낮을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since this study does not include the loss (pointingloss) caused by the transceiver's orientation accuracy caused by rain attenuation or satellite vibration, the actual link availability may be slightly lower than the link availability presented in this study.
data.target_sentence: Actual link availability may be slightly lower than the link availability presented in this study because this study does not include pointingloss due to transceiver orientation accuracy due to rain attenuation or satellite vibrations.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 방위사업청과 국방과학연구소가 지원하는 미래전투체계 네트워크기술 특화연구센터 사업의 일환으로 수행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: This study was conducted as part of the Future Combat System Network Technology Specialized Research Center project supported by the Defense Acquisition Program Administration and the Defense Science Research Institute.
data.target_sentence: This study was carried out as part of the Future Combat System Network Technology Specialized Research Center project supported by the Defense Acquisition Program Administration and the Defense Science Research Institute.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 원자 단위 조작을 통해 표면 위 자성 원자 나노 구조를 만들고, 이를 통한 기억 및 연산 소자의 소형화 연구는 STM을 이용한 연구 분야의 한 축으로 자리잡았다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, through atomic unit manipulation, magnetic atomic nanostructures are made on the surface, and the research on miniaturization of memory and computing devices has become one of the pillars of the research field using STM.
data.target_sentence: In addition, research on the formation of magnetic atomic nanostructures on the surface through atomic unit manipulation and the miniaturization of memory and computing devices has become one of the pillars of the research field using STM.

data.source_sentence: 이 글에서는 먼저 전자스핀공명(electron spin resonance, ESR)을 STM에 결합하여 두 가지 실험 방법의 장점인 높은 에너지 분해능과 공간 분해능을 이용한 단일 원자의 스핀공명 실험연구들을 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this article, we first introduce spin resonance experimental studies of a single atom using high energy resolution and spatial resolution, which are the advantages of two experimental methods by combining electron spin resonance (ESR) with STM.
data.target_sentence: In this article, by combining electron spin resonance (ESR) and STM, we first introduce the study of spin resonance experiments on a single atom using high energy resolution and spatial resolution, which are the advantages of the two experimental methods.

data.source_sentence: 최근 양자 센싱(quantum sensing), 양자 시뮬레이션(quantumsimulation), 양자 컴퓨팅(quantum computing) 등을 아우르는 양자 기술의 발전 과정에서, 양자 점(quantum dots), 반도체 불순물, 절연체 스핀 결함 등의 고체-기반 양자비트(qubit) 연구도 진보를 거듭해 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In the recent development of quantum technology encompassing quantum sensing, quantum simulation, and quantum computing, solid-based quantum bits such as quantum dots, semiconductor impurities, and insulator spin defects, etc. (qubit) research has also made progress.
data.target_sentence: With the recent advances in quantum technology encompassing quantum sensing, quantum simulation, and quantum computing, solid-state quantum bits (qubits) studies such as quantum dots, semiconductor impurities, and insulator spin defects are also being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 표면 위 개별 원자/분자스핀은 또 다른 고체-기반 양자비트 플랫폼을 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The individual atom/molecular spins on the surface could provide another solid-state-based quantum bit platform.
data.target_sentence: The individual atom/molecular spins on the surface could provide another solid-state-based quantum bit platform.

data.source_sentence: 원자 정밀도로 여러 양자비트 구조물을 만들고 양자비트들 사이 상호작용을 조작할 수 있다는 장점이 있어, 상향식(bottom-up)으로 ~1 nm 스케일 양자비트 계를 설계할수 있다는 점에서 매우 특별한 물리계이다.
data.mt_sentence: It has the advantage of being able to create multiple quantum bit structures with atomic precision and manipulate the interactions between quantum bits, making it a very special physical system in that it is possible to design a ~1 nm scale quantum bit system in a bottom-up manner.
data.target_sentence: It has the advantage of being able to create multiple quantum bit structures with atomic precision and manipulate the interactions between the quantum bits. It is a very special physical system in that it can design ~1 nm scale quantum bit systems in a bottom-up manner.

data.source_sentence: 표면에 놓인 원자는 주변 환경과의 상호작용으로 인하여 양자 특성이 쉽게 변하기 때문에, 양자 정보 공정을 위해 필요한 스핀의 양자 결맞음(quantum coherence)에 대한 연구는 기존의 접근을 넘어서는 기술적인 진보를 요구한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the quantum properties of atoms placed on the surface are easily changed due to interactions with the surrounding environment, the study of quantum coherence of spins required for quantum information processing requires technological advances beyond conventional approaches.
data.target_sentence: Since the quantum properties of atoms placed on the surface are easily changed due to their interactions with the surrounding environment, the study of quantum coherence of spins required for quantum information processing requires technological advances beyond existing approaches.

data.source_sentence: 나아가, 표면 위 단일 원자/분자 스핀을 개별 양자비트로 사용하면서, STM-기반 나노구조화를 통해 상호작용하는 여러 양자비트에 대해서 양자 컴퓨팅의 기본이 되는 양자 게이트 조작도 시도해 볼 수 있을 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, using a single atom/molecular spin on the surface as individual quantum bits, quantum gate manipulation, which is the basis of quantum computing, could be attempted for multiple quantum bits interacting through STM-based nanostructuring.
data.target_sentence: In addition, by using single atom/molecular spins on the surface as individual quantum bits, it is possible to attempt quantum gate manipulation, which is the basis of quantum computing, for multiple quantum bits interacting via STM-based nanostructures.

data.source_sentence: 1980년대 STM의 발명으로 처음으로 원자 단위의 정확도로 금속 또는 반도체 표면의 3차원 형상을 측정하는게 가능해졌다.
data.mt_sentence: The invention of STM in the 1980s made it possible for the first time to measure the three-dimensional shape of a metal or semiconductor surface with atomic-level accuracy.
data.target_sentence: The invention of STM in the 1980s made it possible for the first time to measure the three-dimensional shape of a metal or semiconductor surface with atomic-level accuracy.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1a에서 보이는 바와 같이 STM 실험은 뾰족한 금속 탐침과 원자 수준으로 깨끗한 표면의 시료로 구성되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. As shown in 1a, the STM experiment consists of a pointed metal probe and a sample with an atomic level clean surface.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 1a, the STM experiment consists of a pointed metal probe and a sample with an atomic-level clean surface.

data.source_sentence: STM 탐침은 압전체에 고정되어 있으며, 압전체에 전압을 인가하여 탐침의 x, y, z 방향 움직임을 원자 수준으로 조절한다.
data.mt_sentence: The STM probe is fixed to the piezoelectric body, and by applying a voltage to the piezoelectric body, the movement of the probe in the x, y, and z directions is controlled at the atomic level.
data.target_sentence: The STM probe is fixed to the piezoelectric body, and by applying a voltage to the piezoelectric body, the movement of the probe in the x, y, and z directions is controlled at the atomic level.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따른 탐침의 움직임을 기록함으로써 시료 표면 형상을 영상화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The surface shape of the sample is imaged by recording the movement of the probe accordingly.
data.target_sentence: In accordance with this, the movement of the probe is recorded to image the surface shape of the sample.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1b는 STM의 공간분해능을 보여주는 전형적인 표면구조 데이터이며, 단결정 Ag(100) 표면에 증착한 두 원자층 두께의 산화마그네슘(MgO) 표면 위에 철(Fe) 원자들이 놓인 시료로부터 얻은 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1b is typical surface structure data showing the spatial resolution of STM, obtained from a sample in which iron (Fe) atoms are placed on the surface of magnesium oxide (MgO) having a thickness of two atomic layers deposited on the surface of single crystal Ag (100).
data.target_sentence: Figure 1b is typical surface structure data showing the spatial resolution of STM obtained from a sample where iron (Fe) atoms are placed on a magnesium oxide (MgO) surface with two atomic layer thicknesses deposited on a single surface. Crystalline Ag (100).

data.source_sentence: 두 개의 큰 구 모양 형상은 철 원자들이며, 잘 정렬된 사각 패턴 내 작은 돌기들은 산화마그네슘의 산소 원자들이다.
data.mt_sentence: The two large spherical shapes are iron atoms, and the small projections in the well-ordered square pattern are oxygen atoms of magnesium oxide.
data.target_sentence: The two large spherical shapes are iron atoms and the small, well-ordered, square pattern of small projections are the oxygen atoms of magnesium oxide.

data.source_sentence: 물질 표면의 전자 밀도는 표면의 물리적인 변화뿐만 아니라, 에너지에 따라서도 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The electron density on the surface of a material changes not only with the physical change of the surface, but also with energy.
data.target_sentence: The electron density on the surface of a material changes with energy as well as with physical changes on the surface.

data.source_sentence: STS는 표면의 원자, 분자, 또는 나노 구조체의 전기적, 자기적 특성을 연구하기 위하여 널리 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: STS is widely used to study the electrical and magnetic properties of atoms, molecules, or nanostructures on the surface.
data.target_sentence: STS is widely used to study the electrical and magnetic properties of atomic, molecular or nanostructures on surfaces.

data.source_sentence: 표면에 놓인 자성 원자에 자기장을 인가하면 원자의 스핀 상태 에너지는 Zeeman 에너지에 의해 분리된다.
data.mt_sentence: When a magnetic field is applied to a magnetic atom placed on the surface, the spin state energy of the atom is separated by the Zeeman energy.
data.target_sentence: When a magnetic field is applied to a magnetic atom placed on a surface, the spin state energy of the atom is separated by the Zeeman energy.

data.source_sentence: STM 탐침을 표면의 원자 위에 위치 시킨 후, 전압을 인가하면, 전압에 해당하는 에너지를 가진 터널링 전자가 원자를 통해 흐르게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: After placing the STM probe on an atom on the surface, when a voltage is applied, tunneling electrons with energy corresponding to the voltage flow through the atom.
data.target_sentence: When an STM probe is placed on an atom on a surface and then a voltage is applied, it tunnels electrons with energy corresponding to the voltage to flow the atom.

data.source_sentence: IETS에서 전도성이 급증하는 전압은 외부 자기장이 증가함에 따라 함께 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: In IETS, the voltage at which the conductivity surges increases with the increase of the external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: In IETS, the voltage at which a conduction surge occurs increases as the external magnetic field increases.

data.source_sentence: 같은 원리로 얇은 절연체 박막은 기판의 전자로부터 표면 분자를 전기적으로 분리함으로써 분자의 전자 궤도를 시각화하기 위해서도 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: By the same principle, thin insulator thin films are also used to visualize electron orbitals of molecules by electrically separating surface molecules from electrons on the substrate.
data.target_sentence: On the same principle, thin insulator films are used to visualize the electron orbitals of molecules by electrically separating the surface molecules from the electrons on the substrate.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 STM 탐침의 전자 상태가 스핀 편극된(spin-polarized)경우, 나노 구조체의 스핀 상태를 분석하고 선택적으로 들뜬 상태로 유도하는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, when the electronic state of the STM probe is spin-polarized, it is possible to analyze the spin state of the nanostructure and selectively induce it to an excited state.
data.target_sentence: Here, when the electronic state of the STM probe is spin-polarized, the spin state of the nanostructure can be analyzed to selectively induce the excited state.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 STM 탐침을 이용하여 자성 원자를 하나씩 배열함으로서, 스핀에 기반한 논리 게이트(logic gate) 또는 자기저장소자를 원자 단위로 제작할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, by arranging magnetic atoms one by one using an STM probe, a spin-based logic gate or magnetic storage device can be fabricated in atomic units.
data.target_sentence: In addition, by arranging magnetic atoms one by one using STM probes, spin-based logic gates or magnetic storage devices can be fabricated atomically.

data.source_sentence: 양자 결맞음(quantum coherence) 특성은 양자 정보 처리information processing)와 양자 검출(quantumsensing)을 위하여 중요한 요소이며, 전자 또는 핵 스핀의 결맞음 특성은 스핀 공명 기술을 이용하여 측정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The quantum coherence property is an important factor for quantum information processing and quantum sensing, and the coherence property of an electron or nuclear spin can be measured using a spin resonance technique.
data.target_sentence: The quantum coherence property is an important factor in quantum information processing and quantum sensing, and the coherence property of an electron or nuclear spin can be measured using a spin resonance technique.

data.source_sentence: 스핀 자기모멘트가 전자기파와 공명 반응할 때 에너지의 흡수와 방출이 일어나며, 이는 물질 또는 생체분자의 자성 구조를 영상화하기 위해 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the spin magnetic moment resonates with electromagnetic waves, energy is absorbed and released, which is used to image the magnetic structure of materials or biomolecules.
data.target_sentence: When a spin magnetic moment resonates with an electromagnetic wave, energy is absorbed and released, which is used to image the magnetic structure of a material or biomolecule.

data.source_sentence: 단일 원자/분자 스핀의 경우 스핀 위치에 대한 원자 스케일의 정확한 접근이 필요하고 스핀 앙상블 시료와 비교해서 매우 높은 신호 민감도를 요구하므로 기존 방법으로는 측정이 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: For single-atomic/molecular spins, accurate access to the atomic scale to the spin position is required and very high signal sensitivity is required compared to spin ensemble samples, making measurements impossible with conventional methods.
data.target_sentence: For single atom/molecular spins, precise access to the atomic scale of the spin position is required, and very high signal sensitivity compared to spin ensemble samples is not possible with conventional methods.

data.source_sentence: ESR 측정에서는 ‘라비주파수’ Rabi, ‘열적완화시간’ T1, ‘결맞음시간’ T2에 의해 결정되는 공명선 폭에 의해서 에너지분해능이 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: In ESR measurement, the energy resolution is determined by the resonance line width determined by the 'Rabi frequency' Rabi, the 'thermal relaxation time' T1, and the 'coherence time' T2.
data.target_sentence: In ESR measurements, the energy resolution is determined by the resonance linewidth determined by the 'Rabi frequency' Rabi, the 'thermal relaxation time' T1 and the 'interference time' T2.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3a는 STM 터널 접합 내에 놓인 단일 원자 스핀에 대한 ESR 측정 원리를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3a shows the ESR measurement principle for a single atom spin placed within an STM tunnel junction.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3a shows the principle of ESR measurement for a single atom spin located within an STM tunnel junction.

data.source_sentence: 이 자기장은 Btip의 원자스핀 위치에 따른 변화량과 인가된 고주파 전압의 크기 VRF에 비례한다.
data.mt_sentence: This magnetic field is proportional to the amount of change according to the atomic spin position of the Btip and the magnitude of the applied high-frequency voltage VRF.
data.target_sentence: This magnetic field is proportional to the amount of change according to the atomic spin position of the Btip and the magnitude of the applied high frequency voltage (VRF).

data.source_sentence: STM은 RF 전압을 인가하기 전 스핀이 ‘열적 기저 상태’일 때와 RF 전압을 인가한 후 ‘공명상태’일 때의 터널 자기저항(tunneling magnetoresistance)의 차이를 터널링 전류 신호의 변화로 측정하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: STM measures the difference in tunneling magnetoresistance when the spin is in the 'thermal ground state' before applying the RF voltage and when the spin is in the 'resonance state' after applying the RF voltage as a change in the tunneling current signal. .
data.target_sentence: STM measures the difference in tunneling magnetoresistance by changing the tunneling current signal when the spin is in the 'thermal ground state' before applying the RF voltage and when the spin is in the 'resonance state' after applying the RF voltage.

data.source_sentence: 이 때 스핀기대치의 양자화 축방향 성분 <Z>가 직류 터널 전도도 tun(= Itun/VDC)에 비례해서 측정되며, 측정 신호는 구동 주파수에 대해서 로렌치안(Lorentzian) 형태로 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, the quantization axial component of the spin expectation<Z> is measured in proportion to the DC tunnel conductivity tun (= Itun/VDC), and the measured signal appears in Lorentzian form with respect to the driving frequency.
data.target_sentence: In this case, the quantization axis component of the spin expectation<Z> is measured proportional to the DC tunnel conductance tun(= Itun/VDC), and the measured signal appears in Lorentzian form with respect to the driving frequency.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3c는 산화마그네슘 표면 위 증착된 단일 철 원자에서 측정한 ESR 스펙트럼들이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3c is the ESR spectrum measured for a single iron atom deposited on the magnesium oxide surface.
data.target_sentence: 3C is an ESR spectrum measured for a single iron atom deposited on a magnesium oxide surface.

data.source_sentence: 원자 스핀은 S = 2이며, 스핀 기저 상태 "0>와 들뜸 상태 "1>은 스핀자기양자수 mS가 각각 +2와 2일 때이다.
data.mt_sentence: The atomic spin is S = 2, and the spin ground state "0> and the excited state "1> are when the spin magnetic quantum number mS is +2 and 2, respectively.
data.target_sentence: The atomic spin is S = 2, and the spin ground state "0> and excited state "1> are when the spin magnetic quantum number mS is +2 and 2, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 철 원자스핀의 공명 주파수가 Zeeman 에너지 때문에 외부 자기장에 선형적으로 변화하는 것을 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the resonant frequency of the iron atom spin changes linearly with the external magnetic field due to the Zeeman energy.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the resonant frequency of the spin of an iron atom is linearly changed according to the external magnetic field by the Zeeman energy.

data.source_sentence: 높은 에너지와 공간 분해능의 조합으로 ESR-STM은 표면원자간의 쌍극자 상호작용과 같이 약한 상호작용을 측정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The combination of high energy and spatial resolution allows ESR-STM to measure weak interactions, such as dipole interactions between surface atoms.
data.target_sentence: The combination of high energy and spatial resolution allows ESR-STM to measure weak interactions such as dipole interactions between surface atoms.

data.source_sentence: STM 탐침을 이용한 원자 조작을 통해, Fe 원자(sensor)를 측정하고자 하는 원자(target) 근처에 위치시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: Through atomic manipulation using an STM probe, the Fe sensor is located near the target to be measured.
data.target_sentence: Through atomic manipulation with the STM probe, the Fe sensor is positioned near the object to be measured.

data.source_sentence: 표적 원자근처의 Fe 원자에서 측정한 ESR 스펙트럼에서 두개의 피크(peak)를 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Two peaks can be seen in the ESR spectrum measured at the Fe atom near the target atom.
data.target_sentence: Two peaks can be seen in the ESR spectrum measured from the Fe atom near the target atom.

data.source_sentence: 표적 원자의 스핀 상태는 측정 온도에 의해 결정되는 열적 점유율(thermal population)에 따라 두 스핀 상태를 오가게 되고, 그에 따라 Fe 센서 원자가 감지하는 상호작용이 변하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin state of the target atom alternates between the two spin states according to a thermal population determined by the measured temperature, and the interaction sensed by the Fe sensor atoms changes accordingly.
data.target_sentence: The spin state of the target atom alternates between the two spin states depending on the thermal population determined by the measured temperature, and the interactions the Fe sensor atoms sense change accordingly.

data.source_sentence: 표적 원자 스핀의 방향 변화로 인해 Fe 원자에서 측정한 ESR 신호가 두개의 피크로 분리되어 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the change in the direction of the spin of the target atom, the ESR signal measured at the Fe atom appears as two peaks.
data.target_sentence: Due to the change in the spin direction of the target atom, the ESR signal measured at the Fe atom appears as two peaks.

data.source_sentence: 그 피크의 분리 진동수 f는 두 원자 간의 상호작용 크기에 따라서 정해진다.
data.mt_sentence: The separation frequency f of the peak is determined by the size of the interaction between the two atoms.
data.target_sentence: The separation frequency f of the peak is determined by the size of the interaction between the two atoms.

data.source_sentence: 자기 쌍극자 상호작용 모델을 이용한 거리 의존성 분석에서, 0.1 B(Bohr magneton) 보다 높은 정밀도로 표적 원자의 자기 모멘트(magnetic moment)를 결정할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the distance dependence analysis using the magnetic dipole interaction model, it was possible to determine the magnetic moment of the target atom with a higher precision than 0.1 B (Bohr magneton).
data.target_sentence: In the distance dependence analysis using the magnetic dipole interaction model, the magnetic moment of the target atom could be determined with higher precision than 0.1B (Bohr magneton).

data.source_sentence: Ti 이합체(dimer)의 경우에, 이러한 교환 상호작용이 더욱 우세하게 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of Ti dimers, this exchange interaction is more dominant.
data.target_sentence: For Ti dimers, these exchange interactions are more prevalent.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 높은 정확도로 근처의 원자 스핀의 자기 모멘트를 감지하는 ESR-STM은 복잡한 나노 구조체나 생체분자 내의 스핀 분포를 조사하는데도 적용 가능할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: ESR-STM, which detects the magnetic moment of a nearby atomic spin with such high accuracy, will also be applicable to investigate the spin distribution in complex nanostructures or biomolecules.
data.target_sentence: ESR-STM, which detects the magnetic moment of a near atomic spin with such high accuracy, can also be applied to investigate spin distribution in complex nanostructures or biomolecules.

data.source_sentence: 최근 '펄스-ESR'을 접목한 STM에서 단일 원자/분자 스핀을 결맞게 제어한 연구 결과가 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a study result of coherently controlling single atom/molecular spin in STM grafted with 'pulse-ESR' was reported.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a study result of consistent control of single atom/molecular spin in STM grafted with 'pulse-ESR' was reported.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3과 4에서 소개한 ESR 스펙트럼 측정에서는 일반적으로 스핀의 양자 결잃음 시간 T2*보다 훨씬 길게 고주파 전압을 인가하면서 ESR 신호를 측정하는 소위 ‘연속파-ESR(continuouswave ESR)’ 방법을 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: ESR spectral measurements introduced in Figures 3 and 4 generally use the so-called continuous wave ESR (continuous wave ESR) method, which measures ESR signals while applying a high-frequency voltage much longer than the spin's quantum loss time T2*.
data.target_sentence: The ESR spectral measurements presented in Figures 3 and 4 use the so-called continuous wave ESR (continuous wave ESR) method, which measures the ESR signal while applying a high-frequency voltage that is usually much longer than the quantum loss time T2* of the spin.

data.source_sentence: 이 연속파-ESR에서는 스핀 운동은 T2* 시간을 지나면서 급속히 결맞음 상태를 잃어버리고 스핀 동력학적 관점에서 정상상태(steady state)에 이르게 되다.
data.mt_sentence: In this continuous wave-ESR, the spin motion rapidly loses coherence over time T2* and reaches a steady state in terms of spin dynamics.
data.target_sentence: In this continuous wave ESR, the spin motion quickly loses coherence with time T2* and reaches a steady state in terms of spin dynamics.

data.source_sentence: 연속파-ESR에서는 스핀이 RF 전압을 인가하기 전의 ‘열적 기저 상태’일 때와 RF 전압을 인가한 후 ‘정상상태’일 때 의 STM 터널 자기저항(magnetoresistance)의 차이를 터널링 전류 신호의 변화로 측정하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In continuous wave ESR, the difference in STM tunnel magnetoresistance between the 'thermal base state' before the RF voltage is applied and the 'normal state' after the RF voltage is applied is measured as the change in the tunneling current signal.
data.target_sentence: In continuous wave ESR, the difference in STM tunnel magnetoresistance between the 'thermal ground state' before the RF voltage application and the 'steady state' after the RF voltage is applied is measured as a change in the tunneling current signal.

data.source_sentence: 스핀자기모멘트를 양자비트(qubit)로 활용하기 위해서는 스핀 양자 상태의 중첩(superposition) 및 얽힘(entanglement)에 대한 제어 및 측정이 결잃음 시간 내에 이루어져야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to utilize the spin magnetic moment as a quantum bit (qubit), control and measurement of the superposition and entanglement of the spin quantum state must be performed within the decoherence time.
data.target_sentence: In order to utilize the spin magnetic moment as quantum bits (qubits), control and measurement of superposition and entanglement of spin quantum states must be performed within the decoherence time.

data.source_sentence: 이를 위해서, 특정 스핀 상태로의 조작에 필요한 시간 동안만 RF 전압을 인가하는 ‘펄스-ESR’ 방법을 적용한다.
data.mt_sentence: To this end, the 'pulse-ESR' method is applied to apply an RF voltage only for a time required for operation into a specific spin state.
data.target_sentence: To this end, the 'pulse-ESR' method is applied to apply the RF voltage only for the time required for operation in a specific spin state.

data.source_sentence: 기본적인 실험 구성은 연속파-ESR에서와 같지만, RF 전압을 스핀 상태의 조작을 위한 시간만큼만 인가한다.
data.mt_sentence: The basic experimental setup is the same as in the continuous wave-ESR, but the RF voltage is applied only as long as the time for manipulation of the spin state.
data.target_sentence: The basic experimental setup is the same as the continuous wave ESR, but the RF voltage is applied only for a time that can manipulate the spin state.

data.source_sentence: 이런 RF 펄스 조작은 통상 임의파형발생기(Arbitrary waveform generator; AWG)로부터 만들고 출력한 펄스 파형으로 RF파 발생기(RF wavegenerator)의 신호 출력을 제어해서 얻는다.

data.source_sentence: 이는 미시 물리계의 성질을 규명하는 역할을 넘어서 새로운 실험 기술 정립을 통해 양자 특성 연구에 또 다른 플렛폼을 형성하는 과정이다.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀(graphene)은 독특한 물리적 성질로 인하여 나노전자소자에 응용에 최적의 2차원 소재로 인식되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Graphene has been recognized as an optimal two-dimensional material for application to nanoelectronic devices due to its unique physical properties.
data.target_sentence: Graphene is recognized as an optimal two-dimensional material for application to nanoelectronic devices due to its unique physical properties.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 전자분산관계(electron dispersion relation)를 스핀에 의존하게 제어하는 것은 스핀기반 로직소자(spin-based logic device) 개발에 있어서 매우 중요하다.

data.target_sentence: Controlling the electron dispersion relationship of graphene in a spin-dependent manner is very important in the development of spin-based logic devices.

data.source_sentence: 특히, 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 상호작용(spin-orbit interaction)을 강화시킨다면 강자성체(ferromagnet) 없이 스핀편향(spin polarization)을 생산하거나 검출하는 것이 가능하게 될 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, if the spin-orbit interaction is enhanced in graphene, it will be possible to produce or detect spin polarization without a ferromagnet.
data.target_sentence: In particular, if the spin-orbit interaction is enhanced in graphene, spin polarization can be generated or detected without a ferromagnetic material.

data.source_sentence: 최근 그래핀에 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 인가시키고 그로 인한 수송특성을 다양한 형태의 소자에서 연구한 결과들이 활발히 발표되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, the results of applying a spin-orbital interaction to graphene and studying the transport characteristics thereof in various types of devices are being actively published.
data.target_sentence: Recently, the results of applying spin-orbit interactions to graphene and studying their transport properties in various devices have been actively published.

data.source_sentence: 본 리뷰에서는 그래핀 스핀트로닉스 연구에 대한 최근의 발전을 스핀-궤도 상호작용과 그에 따른 수송특성에 중점을 두어 논하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this review, recent developments in graphene spintronics research are discussed, focusing on spin-orbit interactions and their transport properties.
data.target_sentence: This review discusses recent advances in graphene spintronics research focusing on spin-orbit interactions and their transport properties.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀(graphene)은 선형의 전자분산관계(electron dispersionrelation)로 인한 우수한 전기적 성질과 단일원자 층의 궁극적인 2차원 소재로서 차세대 나노전자소자 응용에 있어서 많은 관심을 받아왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Graphene has attracted much attention in the application of next-generation nanoelectronic devices as the ultimate two-dimensional material with excellent electrical properties and single atomic layer due to a linear electron dispersion relation.
data.target_sentence: Graphene is attracting a lot of attention for the application of next-generation nanoelectronic devices as the ultimate two-dimensional material with excellent electrical properties and single atomic layer due to its linear electron dispersion relationship.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 스핀트로닉스(spintronics) 응용 연구는 초기에는 전자스핀 전달 매개체로서 탁월한 성능을 지니는 것에 초점이 맞춰졌었다.
data.mt_sentence: Research on the spintronics application of graphene was initially focused on having excellent performance as an electron spin transport medium.
data.target_sentence: Research on the spintronic applications of graphene was initially focused on having excellent performance as an electron spin transport medium.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 높은 전자이동도(electron mobility)와 낮은 스핀-궤도 상호작용(spin-orbitinteraction)으로 스핀산란(spin diffusion) 거리가 수십 m까지 이른다는 보고도 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has also been reported that the spin diffusion distance reaches several tens of m due to graphene's high electron mobility and low spin-orbit interaction.
data.target_sentence: There are also reports that spin diffusion distances reach tens of m due to graphene's high electron mobility and low spin-orbit interactions.

data.source_sentence: 최근의 스핀트로닉스 연구에 있어서 스핀-궤도 상호작용의 중요성과 활용도가 날로 부각되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In recent spintronics research, the importance and utility of spin-orbit interaction has been highlighted day by day.
data.target_sentence: In recent spintronics research, the importance and usefulness of spin-orbit interactions are being emphasized day by day.

data.source_sentence: 스핀-궤도 상호작용은 스핀전류(spin current)와 전하전류간의 상호 변환을 가져다 줄 수 있기에 강자성체(ferromagnet) 없이 스핀전류를 생성하거나 또는 주입된 스핀전류를 전하전류로 변환시켜주는 등 다양한 활용도를 가져다 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Spin-orbit interactions can lead to interconversion between spin current and charge current, so they can be used in various ways, such as generating spin current without a ferromagnet or converting injected spin current into charge current.
data.target_sentence: Spin-orbit interaction can lead to mutual conversion of spin current and charge current, so it can be utilized in various ways, such as generating a spin current without a ferromagnetic material or converting an injected spin current into a charge current.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 그래핀의 스핀트로닉스 연구에 있어서 스핀궤도 상호작용과 그에 수반하는 수송특성과 관련하여 그동안 진행되어 왔던 동향에 대해서 간단히 소개하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we would like to briefly introduce the trends that have been conducted in relation to the spin orbital interaction and the accompanying transport characteristics in the spintronics study of graphene.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we would like to briefly introduce the trends carried out in relation to the spin orbital interactions and their transport properties in the spintronics study of graphene.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 인위적으로 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 인가시킨 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 상호작용의 세기 및 스핀 이완(spin relaxation)에 대한 정보를 얻기 위해 가장 쉽게 접근할 수 있는 대표적인 실험으로서 저온에서의 자기수송(Magnetotransport) 특성 분석이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In graphene to which spin-orbit interactions are artificially applied, magnetic transport at low temperature is the most easily accessible representative experiment to obtain information on the strength of spin-orbit interactions and spin relaxation. Magnetotransport) characterization.
data.target_sentence: Characterization of magnetic transport at low temperature in graphene to which spin-orbit interactions are artificially applied is the most easily accessible representative experiment to obtain information on the strength and spin relaxation of spin-orbit interactions.

data.source_sentence: 스핀-궤도 상호작용이 강하게 작용하는 경우에는 Fig.1(b)와 같이 전하의 스핀이 각각의 운동량과 결합하여 닫힌 경로에서 반대방향의 위상으로 인하여 닫힌 고리구조를 깨는 간섭이 일어나게 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a strong spin-orbit interaction, as shown in Fig. 1(b), the spin of the charge is combined with each momentum to cause the interference to break the closed ring structure due to the opposite phase in the closed path.
data.target_sentence: In the case of strong spin-orbit interactions, as shown in Fig. 1(b), the spin of the charge combines with the angular momentum, causing the interference to break the closed ring structure due to the opposite phase of the closed path.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2(a)는 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질과 이중 접합된그래핀을 도식적으로 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2(a) schematically shows graphene double-bonded to a transition metal dichalcogenide material.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 (a) schematically shows the graphene double-bonded to the transition metal dichalcogenide material.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2(b)는 이중 접합을 통한 근접효과가 적용되어 있는 그래핀에서의 전계 효과 트랜지스터(Field-effect transistor) 특성으로 게이트 전압에 따른 저항 변화를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2(b) shows the resistance change according to the gate voltage as the characteristics of the field-effect transistor in graphene to which the proximity effect through the double junction is applied.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(b) shows the resistance change according to the gate voltage as the characteristics of the field effect transistor in graphene to which the proximity effect through double junction is applied.

data.source_sentence: 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질(WSe2)의 저항은 그래핀보다 훨씬 높아, 전하 수송이 대부분 그래핀에서 이루어지고 그래핀의 디락(Driac) 밴드구조 특성에 따라 저항 값이 변하는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The resistance of the transition metal dichalcogenide material (WSe2) is much higher than that of graphene, so it can be seen that most of the charge transport is performed in graphene, and the resistance value changes according to the Driac band structure characteristics of graphene.
data.target_sentence: Since the resistance of the transition metal dichalcogenide material (WSe2) is much higher than that of graphene, most of the charge transport is performed in graphene, and it can be seen that the resistance value changes according to the Driac band structure characteristics of graphene.

data.source_sentence: 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질의 근접 효과로 증가된 스핀궤도 상호작용은 weak anti-localization을 유도하며 자기전도도 측정과 분석으로 그 크기를 추정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The increased spin orbital interaction due to the proximity effect of the transition metal dichalcogenide material induces weak anti-localization, and its size can be estimated by measuring and analyzing magnetic conductivity.
data.target_sentence: The increase in spin orbital interactions due to the proximity effect of transition metal dichalcogenide materials induces weak antilocalization, and its size can be estimated by measuring and analyzing the magnetic conductivity.

data.source_sentence: 기판 위 그래핀에서 측정된 스핀 이완 시간 (~100 ps)보다 수 백배 짧은 시간이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is several hundred times shorter than the spin relaxation time (~100 ps) measured in graphene on a substrate.
data.target_sentence: It is hundreds of times shorter than the measured spin relaxation times (~100 ps) for graphene on substrate.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 그래핀만 있는 단일 구조보다 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 지니고 있는 물질과 적층 구조를 이룬 그래핀에서의 스핀-궤도 상호작용의 세기는 최소100배 이상 크게 증가되는 것이 보고되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: As such, it has been reported that the strength of spin-orbit interaction in graphene having a layered structure with a material having a stronger spin-orbit interaction than in a single structure having only graphene is increased by at least 100 times.
data.target_sentence: As such, it has been reported that graphene having a layered structure and a material having a stronger spin-orbit interaction increase the strength of spin-orbit interaction at least 100 times compared to a single structure made of graphene alone.

data.source_sentence: 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질과 이중 접합에 의한 근접효과로 그래핀의 높은 전하 이동성과 같이 고유의 장점은 유지된 채로 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용이 그래핀으로 유도되는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be confirmed that a strong spin-orbit interaction is induced in graphene while maintaining its inherent advantages such as high charge mobility of graphene due to the proximity effect due to the double junction with the transition metal dichalcogenide material.
data.target_sentence: It can be confirmed that strong spin-orbit interactions are induced in graphene while maintaining inherent advantages such as high charge mobility of graphene due to the proximity effect due to the double bond with the transition metal dichalcogenide material.

data.source_sentence: 앞서 언급한대로, 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 결합을 증가시키기 위한 또 다른 대표적인 방법은 불순물을 그래핀에 흡착 시키는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: As mentioned earlier, another representative method for increasing spin-orbit coupling in graphene is to adsorb impurities onto graphene.
data.target_sentence: As mentioned above, another representative method to increase the spin-orbit coupling in graphene is to adsorb impurities to the graphene.

data.source_sentence: 불순물 흡착은 또 다시 화학적 방법(chemisorb)과 물리적 방법(physical adsorption)으로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Impurity adsorption can be further divided into a chemical method (chemisorb) and a physical method (physical adsorption).
data.target_sentence: Impurity adsorption can be further divided into chemical methods (chemisorb) and physical methods (physical adsorption).

data.source_sentence: 그래핀에 수소가 화학적으로 흡착이 되면 Fig. 3(a)에서처럼 혼성 sp3 오비탈이 형성되어 국소적으로 스핀-궤도 결합이 강화된다.
data.mt_sentence: When hydrogen is chemically adsorbed on graphene, Fig. As in 3(a), a hybrid sp3 orbital is formed to locally strengthen the spin-orbit coupling.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 3(a), when hydrogen is chemically adsorbed on graphene, a hybrid sp3 orbital is formed and the spin-orbital bond is locally strengthened.

data.source_sentence: 플루오린 역시 혼성 sp3 오비탈이 형성되지만 수소와 다르게 플루오린 스스로의 스핀-궤도 결합이 더 큰 영향을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fluorine also forms a hybrid sp3 orbital, but unlike hydrogen, fluorine's own spin-orbital bond has a greater effect.
data.target_sentence: Fluorine also forms hybrid sp3 orbitals, but unlike hydrogen, the spin-orbital bonding of fluorine itself has a greater effect.

data.source_sentence: DFT(density functionaltheory)에 의해 예측된 스핀-궤도 결합은 플루오린이 화학적으로 흡착된 그래핀에서 가장 큰 값을 가지며, 수소가 흡착된 그래핀보다 10배 이상 큰 값을 가지는 것으로 계산되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-orbit coupling predicted by the density functional theory (DFT) was calculated to have the largest value in graphene where fluorine was chemically adsorbed, and a value more than 10 times greater than that of graphene where hydrogen was adsorbed.
data.target_sentence: The spin-orbit coupling predicted by DFT (Density Functional Theory) was calculated to have the largest value in graphene to which fluorine is chemically adsorbed, and to have a value more than 10 times higher than that in graphene to which hydrogen is adsorbed.

data.source_sentence: 금은 무거운 원소 중에 하나로 스핀-궤도 결합이 큰 물질이며 금 입자들이 그래핀 표면에 물리적으로 흡착이 되면 공간반전 대칭이 깨져 고유한 스핀-궤도 결합 혹은 라쉬바 스핀-궤도 결합이 강화될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Gold is one of the heavy elements and is a material with large spin-orbit bonds, and when gold particles are physically adsorbed to the graphene surface, spatial inversion symmetry can be broken, which can strengthen unique spin-orbit bonds or Rashba spin-orbit bonds.
data.target_sentence: Gold is one of the heavy elements and has a large spin-orbital bond. When gold particles are physically adsorbed on the graphene surface, spatial antisymmetry is broken, and unique spin-orbital bonds or Raschwa spin-orbits can be strengthened. bond.

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 결합의 증가는 스핀홀 효과(spin Hall effect, SHE)의 비국소적 수송(nonlocaltransport) 실험으로 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in spin-orbit coupling in impurity-adsorbed graphene can be confirmed by nonlocal transport experiments with spin Hall effect (SHE).
data.target_sentence: The increase in spin-orbit coupling in graphene adsorbed with impurities can be confirmed by a nonlocal transport experiment using the spin Hall effect (SHE).

data.source_sentence: 스핀 홀 효과는 스핀-궤도 결합과 베리 곡률(Berry curvature)에 의한 비정상 속도(anomalous velocity)에 의해서 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-hole effect is caused by spin-orbit coupling and an abnormal velocity by the Berry curvature.
data.target_sentence: The spin Hall effect is caused by spin-orbit coupling and abnormal velocities due to Berry curvature.

data.source_sentence: 스핀 홀 효과는 Fig. 3(b)와 같이 H 형태의 소자로 강자성체 없이도 스핀전하 변환 효과를 전기적인 신호로 관측할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin hole effect is an H-type device as shown in Figure 3(b), and the spin charge conversion effect can be observed with an electrical signal without a ferromagnetic material.
data.target_sentence: The spin Hall effect is an H-type device, as shown in Figure 3(b), and the effect of converting a spin charge into an electrical signal without a ferromagnetic material can be observed.

data.source_sentence: 이때 발생한 스핀 전류의 스핀 분극은 그래핀 표면에 수직인 방향으로 분극(z 방향)된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the spin polarization of the generated spin current is polarized in a direction perpendicular to the graphene surface (z direction).
data.target_sentence: At this time, the spin polarization of the generated spin current is polarized in a direction perpendicular to the graphene surface (z direction).

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서의 스핀 홀 효과에 의한 스핀전류의 Hanle spin precession을 보여주는 연구 결과는 가장 먼저 수소가 화학적으로 흡착된 그래핀에서 2013년에 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The study result showing the Hanle spin precession of spin current due to the spin Hall effect in graphene adsorbed with impurities was first reported in 2013 in graphene to which hydrogen is chemically adsorbed.
data.target_sentence: The research result showing the Hanle spin precession of spin current due to the spin Hall effect in graphene adsorbed with impurities was first reported in 2013 in graphene chemically adsorbed with hydrogen.

data.source_sentence: 수소가 흡착된 그래핀 소자에서 측정된 스핀 홀 각은 0.18이었으며 이때 스핀-궤도 결합은 2.5 meV로 순수한 그래핀보다 1000배 이상 증가되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin hole angle measured in the hydrogen-adsorbed graphene device was 0.18, when the spin-orbit coupling was 2.5 meV, which was increased by more than 1000 times than pure graphene.
data.target_sentence: The spin hole angle measured in the hydrogen adsorption graphene device was 0.18 when the spin-orbital coupling was 2.5 meV, which was more than 1000 times higher than that of pure graphene.

data.source_sentence: 이후 같은 그룹에서 구리가 물리적으로 흡착된 CVD(chemical vapour deposition) 합성방식의 그래핀에서도 스핀 홀 효과와 그에 따른 스핀세차 신호를 보고하였으며 이때 측정된 스핀 홀 각은 0.17, 스핀-궤도 결합은 14.4 meV로 각각 관측되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Afterwards, graphene of the chemical vapor deposition (CVD) synthesis method, in which copper was physically adsorbed in the same group, reported the spin hole effect and the resulting spin washing signal, and the measured spin hole angle was 0.17 and the spin-orbit coupling was 14.4 meV, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Afterwards, the same group reported the spin Hall effect and the resulting spin precession signal in graphene synthesized by chemical vapor deposition (CVD) in which copper was physically adsorbed. At this time, the measured spin Hall angle was 0.17 and the spin-orbit coupling was observed to be 14.4 meV, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 2015년 그래핀 스핀 소자를 연구하는 몇몇 그룹에 서 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀 소자의 전하 중립점에서 측정되는 비국소적 저항은 스핀 홀 신호가 아니라는 실험 결과를 발표하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In 2015, several groups studying graphene spin devices published experimental results that the non-local resistance measured at the charge neutral point of the graphene device adsorbed with impurities is not a spin-hole signal.
data.target_sentence: In 2015, several groups researching graphene spin devices published experimental results indicating that the specific local resistance measured at the charge neutral point of a graphene device adsorbed with impurities is not a spin Hall signal.

data.source_sentence: 2016년에 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서 비국소적 저항 신호의 논란에 의미 있는 이론 결과가 AAA에 의해 발표되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In 2016, meaningful theoretical results were published by AAA for the controversy over non-local resistance signals in graphene adsorbed with impurities.
data.target_sentence: In 2016, AAA published meaningful theoretical results on the controversy over the non-localized resistance signal of dopant adsorbed graphene.

data.source_sentence: 1년 뒤인 2017년에는 이렇게 예측한 이론적 결과와 유사한 실험 결과가 발표되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A year later, in 2017, experimental results similar to these predicted theoretical results were announced.
data.target_sentence: A year later, in 2017, experimental results similar to these prediction theory results were published.

data.source_sentence: 해당 연구에서는 금을 물리적으로 그래핀에 흡착한 후 앞선 실험과 같이 H 형태의 소자를 이용하여 비국소적 저항을 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, after physically adsorbing gold to graphene, as in the previous experiment, non-local resistance was measured using an H-type device.
data.target_sentence: In this study, as in the previous experiment, the specific local resistance was measured using an H-type device after gold was physically adsorbed onto graphene.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과 Fig. 4(a)에서처럼 전하 중립점이 아닌 특정한 전하 농도에서 비국소적 저항이 크게 나타날 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, as shown in Fig. 4(a), non-local resistance may be large at a specific charge concentration other than the charge neutral point.
data.target_sentence: As a result, as shown in FIG. 4( a ), the specific local resistance may increase at a specific charge concentration other than the charge neutral point.

data.source_sentence: 저항과 관계없이 어느 특정 게이트에서만 스핀 홀 신호가 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: A spin-hole signal appeared only at any particular gate regardless of the resistance.
data.target_sentence: Spin Hall signals only appear at certain gates, regardless of resistance.

data.source_sentence: 2 K에서 측정된 스핀 세차 신호를 식(2)로 피팅하여 얻은 스핀 홀 각은 0.09이며 이때 스핀 궤도결합 에너지는 약 9 meV이다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin hole angle obtained by fitting the spin wash signal measured at 2 K into equation (2) is 0.09, and the spin orbital coupling energy is about 9 meV.
data.target_sentence: By substituting the spin wash signal measured at 2K into Equation (2), the obtained spin Hall angle is 0.09, and the spin orbital coupling energy is about 9 meV.

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서 게이트 전압에 따라 스핀 홀 신호에 변화가 있는 원인에 대해서는 현재까지 정확히 밝혀진 것은 없다.
data.mt_sentence: The cause of the change in the spin Hall signal according to the gate voltage in graphene to which impurities are adsorbed has not been accurately identified so far.
data.target_sentence: The cause of the change in the spin Hall signal according to the gate voltage in graphene adsorbed with impurities has not yet been precisely identified.

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서 나타나는 비국소적 저항 신호에 밸리 자유도가 주는 효과를 함께 고려해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The effect of valley degrees of freedom on non-local resistance signals appearing in graphene adsorbed with impurities should be considered.
data.target_sentence: The effect of valley degrees of freedom on the non-localized resistance signal exhibited by impurity adsorbed graphene must be considered.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀 기반 반데르발스 이종접합 구조에서의 스핀전하변환(Spin-charge conversionheterostructure)에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Spin-charge conversion heterostructure in graphene-based van der Waals heterojunction structure will be described.
data.target_sentence: A spin-charge conversion heterostructure in a graphene-based van der Waals heterojunction structure will be described.

data.source_sentence: 연구들은 Fig. 5(a, b)와 같이 비국소적 스핀 밸브 소자(Non-local spin valve device) 구조를 이용하여, 그래핀에서 증가된 스핀-궤도 상호작용에 기인하는 전하전류와 스핀전류 간의 상호 변환에 대하여 주로 연구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Using a non-local spin valve device structure as shown in Fig. 5(a, b), the studies mainly studied the interconversion between charge current and spin current due to increased spin-orbit interaction in graphene.
data.target_sentence: Interconversion between charge current and spin current due to the increased spin-orbit interaction in graphene was mainly studied using the non-local spin valve device structure as shown in Fig. 5(a, b).

data.source_sentence: 이때 측정된 신호는 Fig. 6(b)와 같이 처음의 자화방향에 따라 신호가 반전되어 나오는 곡선을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the measured signal shows a curve in which the signal is inverted according to the initial magnetization direction as shown in Figure 6(b).
data.target_sentence: At this time, the measured signal shows a curve in which the signal is inverted according to the initial magnetization direction as shown in Fig. 6(b).

data.source_sentence: 같은 실험에서 x축 방향의 자기장의 세기를 키운다면 Co의 자화 방향이 결국에는 x축 방향을 갖게 되며 결국 x축으로 편향된 스핀전류가 채널을 통해 흐르기 때문에 스핀 갈바닉 효과를 측정할 수 있게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In the same experiment, if the strength of the magnetic field in the x-axis direction is increased, the magnetization direction of Co will eventually have the x-axis direction, and the spin galvanic effect can be measured because the spin current deflected to the x-axis flows through the channel.

data.source_sentence: 인체의 산-염기 항상성이 유지되지 않는다면 급성 폐 질환, 호흡성 산증, 뇌질환, 저산소증 등을 유발한다고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If the body's acid-base homeostasis is not maintained, it is known to cause acute lung disease, respiratory acidosis, brain disease, and hypoxia.
data.target_sentence: If the body's acid-base homeostasis is not maintained, it is known to cause acute lung disease, respiratory acidosis, brain disease, and hypoxia.

data.source_sentence: 산-염기 항상성을 조절하는 데는 체내 면역세포들이 기여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Immune cells in the body contribute to controlling acid-base homeostasis.
data.target_sentence: The body's immune cells contribute to regulating acid-base homeostasis.

data.source_sentence: 면역세포가 염증을 인지하였을 때 염증 매개 분자를 방출하며 세포외 pH는 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When immune cells recognize inflammation, they release inflammatory mediators and the extracellular pH decreases.
data.target_sentence: When immune cells recognize inflammation, they release inflammatory mediators and decrease the extracellular pH.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 다양한 면역세포 중 대식세포의 세포외 산성 환경 개선에 대한 펄스자기장의 효과를 밝히고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This study aims to reveal the effect of pulsed magnetic fields on improving the extracellular acidic environment of macrophages among various immune cells.
data.target_sentence: The purpose of this study is to elucidate the effect of pulsed magnetic field on the improvement of the extracellular acidic environment of macrophages among various immune cells.

data.source_sentence: 대식세포에 인위적으로 염증을 유도하기 위해 LPS를 사용하였으며 LPS 처리 후 세포 모양을 관찰하였다.

data.target_sentence: Inflammation was artificially induced in macrophages using LPS, and the morphology of the cells was observed after LPS treatment.

data.source_sentence: 세포 모양 관찰 결과 대식세포가 활성화됨에 따라 가지 모양으로 뻗어가는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of observing the cell shape, it was confirmed that the macrophage expanded in a branched shape as the macrophages were activated.
data.target_sentence: As a result of observing the morphology of the cells, it was confirmed that the macrophages expanded into branches as the macrophages were activated.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장에 세기에 따른 세포외 pH 측정 실험에서 2700 G의 세기일 때 세포외 산성 환경이 가장 크게 개선됨을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the extracellular pH measurement experiment according to the intensity of the pulsed magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular acidic environment was most significantly improved at the intensity of 2700 G.
data.target_sentence: In the extracellular pH measurement experiment according to the intensity of the pulsed magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular acid environment was the most improved at the intensity of 2700G.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장을 인가한 후 시간에 따른 pH 측정 실험에서는 18 h 시간이 지난 후 세포 외 pH가 가장 효과가 좋은 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In the pH measurement experiment according to time after applying the pulsed magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular pH was the most effective after 18 h.
data.target_sentence: In a time-dependent pH measurement experiment after applying a pulsed magnetic field, the extracellular pH was found to be most effective after 18 hours.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장은 체내 염증 완화 및 산-염기 항상성 조절에 영향을 주어 세포 외 산성 환경을 개선해 주는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The pulsed magnetic field is believed to improve the extracellular acidic environment by affecting the alleviation of inflammation in the body and the regulation of acid-base homeostasis.
data.target_sentence: The pulsed magnetic field is believed to improve the extracellular acid environment by influencing the relief of inflammation in the body and regulation of acid-base homeostasis.

data.source_sentence: 인체의 항상성 유지는 교감신경, 부교감신경과 같은 호르몬계의 정상적인 조절로 이루어지며 끊임없는 외부환경의 자극으로부터 체내의 체온, pH, 삼투압, 혈중농도와 같은 생리적상태를 안정된 상태로 유지하여 인체의 평형을 이루는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Maintaining the body's homeostasis consists of normal control of the hormone system such as sympathetic nerves and parasympathetic nerves, and maintains the body's physiological conditions such as body temperature, pH, osmotic pressure, and blood concentration in a stable state from constant external stimuli.
data.target_sentence: Maintaining the homeostasis of the body consists of normal regulation of the hormonal system such as the sympathetic and parasympathetic nerves, and maintains the physiological conditions of the body such as body temperature, pH, osmotic pressure, and blood concentration in a stable state from constant external stimuli.

data.source_sentence: 인체에서 산-염기 항상성 유지는 호흡과 적혈구 내 헤모글로빈 등으로 체내에 산소와 이산화탄소를 운반하여 산-염기평형을 유지한다.
data.mt_sentence: Maintaining acid-base homeostasis in the human body maintains acid-base equilibrium by transporting oxygen and carbon dioxide into the body through breathing and hemoglobin in red blood cells.
data.target_sentence: Maintenance of acid-base homeostasis in the body maintains acid-base equilibrium by transporting oxygen and carbon dioxide into the body through respiration and hemoglobin in red blood cells.

data.source_sentence: 산소를 방출한 헤모글로빈에 이산화탄소 분자가 결합하여 폐로 운반될 때 이산화탄소와 결합된 헤모글로빈은 혈장과 적혈구에서 물과 결합해 수소와 중탄산이온을 만들게 되어 체내의 pH 변화를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: When carbon dioxide molecules are combined with oxygen-releasing hemoglobin and transported to the lungs, hemoglobin combined with carbon dioxide combines with water in plasma and red blood cells to form hydrogen and bicarbonate ions, causing a change in pH in the body.
data.target_sentence: When carbon dioxide molecules combine with oxygen-releasing hemoglobin and transported to the lungs, carbon dioxide-bound hemoglobin combines with water in plasma and red blood cells to form hydrogen and bicarbonate ions, which change the body's pH.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 과정에서 산-염기의 불균형이 지속되면 혈액 내 H+ 이온이 과도하게 증가 또는 감소하게 되고 급성 폐 질환, 호흡근 기능성장애, 뇌질환, 저산소증 등을 유발한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this process, if the acid-base imbalance continues, H+ ions in the blood increase or decrease excessively, causing acute lung disease, respiratory muscle dysfunction, brain disease, and hypoxia.
data.target_sentence: If acid-base imbalance continues in this process, H+ ions in the blood increase or decrease excessively, causing acute lung disease, respiratory muscle dysfunction, brain disease, and hypoxia.

data.source_sentence: 인체 내에서의 산-염기 항상성 유지는 건강과 연결되는 중요한 지표 중 하나이다.
data.mt_sentence: Maintaining acid-base homeostasis in the human body is one of the important indicators linked to health.
data.target_sentence: Maintaining acid-base homeostasis in the human body is one of the important indicators of health.

data.source_sentence: 염증반응은 체내에 외상이나 병원체가 감지되었을 때 신체조직 손상에 반응하는 과정으로 염증반응이 진행되는 동안 호중구(neutrophils), 대식세포(macrophage) 등의 면역세포다.
data.mt_sentence: Inflammatory reactions are processes that respond to damage to body tissues when trauma or pathogens are detected in the body, and are immune cells such as neutrophils and macrophages during inflammatory reactions.
data.target_sentence: Inflammation is a process that responds to damage to body tissues when trauma or pathogens are detected in the body, and immune cells such as neutrophils and macrophages during the inflammatory response.

data.source_sentence: 체내의 염증반응이 제대로 작용하지 않으면 조직이 손상되어 질병을 일으키지만 반대로 염증 매개 분자들의 과도한 방출은 류머티즘 관절염, 패혈증과 같은 병을 야기한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the inflammatory response in the body does not work properly, tissue is damaged and causes diseases, but on the contrary, excessive release of inflammatory mediators causes diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis and sepsis.
data.target_sentence: If the inflammatory response in the body is not performed properly, the tissue is damaged and causes diseases, but on the contrary, excessive secretion of inflammatory mediators causes diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis and sepsis.

data.source_sentence: 세포외 pH 변화는 선택적 투과의 특성을 지닌 세포막이 가지고 있는 Na+/H+ 펌프에 의해 조절된다.
data.mt_sentence: The extracellular pH change is regulated by the Na+/H+ pump of the cell membrane with the property of selective permeation.
data.target_sentence: Extracellular pH changes are regulated by Na+/H+ pumps in the cell membrane with selective permeation properties.

data.source_sentence: 이는 Na+/H+펌프가 활성과 억제를 반복하며 세포 내액과 외액에 있는 H+ 이온의 개수가 조절되어 pH의 변화를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: This causes the Na+/H+ pump to repeatedly activate and inhibit, and the number of H+ ions in the intracellular and external fluids is regulated, resulting in a change in pH.
data.target_sentence: This causes the Na+/H+ pumps to be repeatedly activated and inhibited, and the number of H+ ions in the intracellular and external body fluids is modulated to alter the pH.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 생체 외(in-vitro) 실험을 진행하여 세포 외 산성 환경을 만들기 위해 LPS를 사용하여 대식세포에 염증을 인위적으로 유도하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, inflammation was artificially induced in macrophages using LPS to create an extracellular acidic environment by conducting an in-vitro experiment.
data.target_sentence: In this study, an extracellular acidic environment was created by artificially inducing inflammation in macrophages using LPS through an in vitro experiment.

data.source_sentence: LPS(Lipopolysaccharide)는 세포에 염증을 유도하는 그람 음성 박테리아 세포막 성분이자 병리학적 반응을 일으키는 면역체계의 강력한 활성화제이다.
data.mt_sentence: LPS (Lipopolysaccharide) is a cell membrane component of Gram-negative bacteria that induces inflammation in cells and is a powerful activator of the immune system that causes pathological responses.
data.target_sentence: LPS (Lipopolysaccharide) is a cell membrane component of Gram-negative bacteria that causes inflammation in cells, and is a powerful activator of the immune system that causes pathological responses.

data.source_sentence: LPS에 의해 대식세포가 자극되면 대식세포 표면의 단일 단백 수용체인 TLR(Toll-like receptor)이 자극되고 신호전달물질인 MAPK(mitogen-activated protein kinase)의 활성화를 유도하여 대식세포를 활성화시킨다고 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It is known that when macrophages are stimulated by LPS, TLR (Toll-like receptor), a single protein receptor on the surface of macrophages, is stimulated and induces activation of MAPK (mitogen-activated protein kinase), a signal transducer to activate macrophages. .
data.target_sentence: When macrophages are stimulated by LPS, TLR (Toll-like receptor), a single protein receptor on the surface of macrophages, is stimulated, which is known to induce activation of mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK), a signal transducer that activates macrophages.

data.source_sentence: 자기장 자극은 인체에 유도되는 전류로 인해 치료 효과를 보는 비침습적 치료방법으로 이미 신경, 근육질환 및 통증 치료에 다양하게 쓰이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Magnetic field stimulation is a non-invasive treatment method that has a therapeutic effect due to electric current induced in the human body, and is already used in various ways to treat nerve and muscle diseases and pain.
data.target_sentence: Magnetic field stimulation is a non-invasive treatment method that has a therapeutic effect by an electric current induced in the human body, and has already been used in various ways to treat nerve and muscle diseases and pain.

data.source_sentence: 교류자기장을 혈관에 자극하였을 때 혈관노화도가 감소되었으며, 정자기장을 자극하여 세포의 ALP 활성도를 측정하면 세포 활성도가 증가되는 것으로 보아 골조직의 형성 및 개조에 영향을 미칠 것이라 보고되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It has been reported that vascular aging was reduced when an alternating magnetic field was stimulated on blood vessels, and cell activity was increased when ALP activity was measured by stimulating a static magnetic field, which would affect the formation and remodeling of bone tissue.
data.target_sentence: It has been reported that stimulating an alternating magnetic field in blood vessels reduces vascular aging, and measuring ALP activity stimulates a static magnetic field to increase cell activity, thereby affecting the formation and remodeling of bone tissue.

data.source_sentence: 펄스 자기장 자극 시간에 따른 생체신호 효과 검증에 대한 선행연구의 결과에 따라 펄스 자기장을 인체에 가했을 때 3 min이 적절하다고 판단되어 모든 실험에서 자기장 자극 인가 시간은 3 min.로 고정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the results of previous studies on the verification of the biosignal effect according to the pulsed magnetic field stimulation time, 3 min was judged to be appropriate when a pulsed magnetic field was applied to the human body, and the magnetic field stimulation application time was fixed at 3 min. in all experiments.
data.target_sentence: According to the results of previous studies on the verification of the biosignal effect according to the pulsed magnetic field stimulation time, 3 minutes was judged to be appropriate when the pulsed magnetic field was applied to the human body, and the magnetic field stimulation application time was fixed to 3 minutes in all experiments.

data.source_sentence: 펄스 자기장에 따른 세포외 pH 측정 대식세포에 염증을 유도하기 위해 LPS(1g/ml)를 각 세포에 동시 처리하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to induce inflammation of extracellular pH measurement macrophages according to pulsed magnetic fields, LPS (1 g/ml) was simultaneously treated on each cell.
data.target_sentence: Measurement of extracellular pH according to pulsed magnetic field In order to induce inflammation of macrophages, each cell was treated with LPS (1 g/ml) at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 대식세포에 염증이 유도되어 pH가 낮아지면 형태학적으로 세포의 모양도 변화된다고 알려져 있으므로 본 연구에서는 대식세포가 활성화가 되었을 때 가지 모양으로 뻗어가는 것을 시간에 따라 관찰하여 대식세포에 염증이 유도된 것을 거시적으로 검증하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since it is known that the shape of the cell changes morphologically when the pH decreases due to inflammation of the macrophages, this study macrophages were macroscopically verified by observing over time that the macrophages extend into branches when activated.
data.target_sentence: Since it is known that the morphology of cells changes when the pH decreases due to inflammation of macrophages, in this study, macrophages were macroscopically verified by observing branch expansion when macrophages were activated.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 대식세포가 염증으로 인해 충분하게 활성화되는 시간은 24 h으로 판단되어 LPS를 처리한 각 세포를 24 h 동안 배양하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, the time for which macrophages were sufficiently activated due to inflammation was determined to be 24 h, and each LPS-treated cell was cultured for 24 h.
data.target_sentence: Through this, the time when macrophages were sufficiently activated due to inflammation was determined to be 24 hours, and each LPS-treated cell was cultured for 24 hours.

data.source_sentence: pH 측정은 25°C에서 모두 동일하게 측정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The pH measurement was carried out in the same manner at 25°C.
data.target_sentence: The pH measurement was performed in the same manner at 25°C.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1에서 Raw cell 264.7의 평균 크기는 약 10~20m로 보이며 LPS로 인해 염증이 유도된 후 시간이 경과함에 따라 세포가 활성화되어 가지 모양으로 길게 뻗어 나가는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In Figure 1, the average size of Raw cell 264.7 appeared to be about 10-20m, and it was confirmed that cells were activated and extended into branches over time after inflammation was induced by LPS.
data.target_sentence: In Figure 1, the average size of raw cell 264.7 is about 10-20 m, and it was confirmed that the cells were activated and expanded into branches over time after inflammation was induced by LPS.

data.source_sentence: 마지막 관찰 시간인 24 h에는 세포의 본래 형태인 원형 모양으로 변하며 세포의 개수가 줄어들었다.
data.mt_sentence: At the last observation time of 24 h, the original shape of the cells changed to a circular shape and the number of cells decreased.
data.target_sentence: At 24 hours, the last observation time, the original shape of the cells changed to a circular shape, and the number of cells decreased.

data.source_sentence: LPS를 처리하지 않고 펄스 자기장을 인가하지 않은 대조군의 pH는 7.21으로 정상 pH를 보여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: The pH of the control group not treated with LPS and not applying a pulsed magnetic field was 7.21, showing a normal pH.
data.target_sentence: The pH of the control group that was not treated with LPS and did not apply a pulsed magnetic field was 7.21, showing a normal pH.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과로 보아 세포에 염증이 유도되면 대식세포 외 pH는 산성을 띠게 된다는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: From this result, it was confirmed that when inflammation is induced in the cells, the extracellular pH of macrophages becomes acidic.
data.target_sentence: From this result, it was confirmed that the extracellular pH of macrophages was acidified when inflammation was induced in the cells.

data.source_sentence: 펄스 자기장 자극은 LPS 처리한 대식세포의 산성 환경을 개선한다는 것을 보여주는데, 그 중 자기장 세기가 2700 G일 때 가장 효과가 있는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: Pulse magnetic field stimulation shows that it improves the acidic environment of LPS-treated macrophages, of which it is believed to be most effective when the magnetic field strength is 2700 G.
data.target_sentence: Pulsed magnetic field stimulation has been shown to improve the acidic environment of LPS-treated macrophages, among which it is considered to be most effective when the magnetic field strength is 2700 G.

data.source_sentence: 펄스 자기장 자극에 의해 대식세포 외 산성 환경이 개선될 수 있었던 원인은 세포막에 있는 Na+/H+ 펌프가 강한 자기장 자극에 의해 활성화되어 H+ 이온의 활발한 이동으로 pH 항상성 회복에 효과가 있다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for the improvement of the extracellular acidic environment by pulsed magnetic field stimulation is that Na+/H+ pumps in the cell membrane are activated by strong magnetic field stimulation, which is thought to be effective in restoring pH homeostasis through active movement of H+ ions.
data.target_sentence: The reason for the improvement of the extracellular acidic environment by the pulsed magnetic field stimulation is that the Na+/H+ pump in the cell membrane is activated by the strong magnetic field stimulation, which is thought to be effective in restoring pH homeostasis through the active movement of H+ ions.

data.source_sentence: 한편으로 펄스자기장을 이용한 항염증 개선의 의료기기 개발을 위해 자기장의 pH 항상성 회복 효과가 가장 뚜렷하게 나타나는 시간을 알아보는 것이 중요하다고 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, it is considered important to find out the time when the effect of restoring the pH homeostasis of the magnetic field appears most clearly for the development of anti-inflammatory medical devices using a pulsed magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, for the development of anti-inflammatory medical devices using a pulsed magnetic field, it is considered important to find a time when the effect of restoring the pH homeostasis of the magnetic field appears most clearly.

data.source_sentence: LPS 인가군의 세포 외 pH는 대조군에 비해 9.68% 감소하였는데, 이는 LPS가 세포에 염증을 유도하여 산성화가 되었음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: The extracellular pH of the LPS-applied group was reduced by 9.68% compared to the control group, which means that the LPS was acidified by inducing inflammation in the cells.
data.target_sentence: The extracellular pH of the LPS-applied group was reduced by 9.68% compared to the control group, indicating that the LPS was acidified by inducing intracellular inflammation.

data.source_sentence: 자기장 자극 후 2~5시간 경과될 때는 자기장보다는 LPS가 세포에 미치는 효과가 큰 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: When 2 to 5 hours have elapsed after magnetic field stimulation, it is judged that the effect of LPS on cells is greater than that of magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: When 2 to 5 hours have elapsed after magnetic field stimulation, it is judged that the effect of LPS on cells is greater than that of magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 18시간 경과 후 대조군에 비해 세포 외 pH의 감소율이 가장 작게 나타난 것으로 보아 세포 외 산성 환경이 다른 시간에 비해 가장 효과적으로 개선되었다는 의미이다.
data.mt_sentence: After 18 hours, the decrease in extracellular pH was the smallest compared to the control, indicating that the extracellular acidic environment was most effectively improved compared to other times.
data.target_sentence: After 18 hours, the decrease in extracellular pH was the smallest compared to the control, indicating that the extracellular acidic environment was most effectively improved compared to other times.

data.source_sentence: LPS 처리 후 세포 외 환경이 산성화되었음을 확인하였으며 자기장을 인가했을 때 pH가 증가한 것이 관찰되었다.
data.mt_sentence: It was confirmed that the extracellular environment was acidified after LPS treatment, and an increase in pH was observed when a magnetic field was applied.
data.target_sentence: It was confirmed that the extracellular environment was acidified after LPS treatment and an increase in pH was observed when a magnetic field was applied.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구의 결과를 바탕으로 면역세포의 산-염기 항상성 조절을 위해 약물치료로 인한 부작용을 줄일 수 있도록 펄스 자기장을 이용한 의료기기 개발의 기초를 마련하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of this study, we intend to lay the foundation for the development of medical devices using pulsed magnetic fields to reduce the side effects caused by drug treatment for the regulation of acid-base homeostasis of immune cells.
data.target_sentence: Based on the results of this study, we intend to lay the foundation for the development of medical devices using a pulsed magnetic field to reduce side effects caused by drug treatment for regulating acid-base homeostasis of immune cells.

data.source_sentence: 아민기에 항체가 붙어 있는 MNPs의 경우는 외부자기장에 따라 초기 자기저항값, 자기저항비, 그리고 용액보자력은 각각 0.74 M, 1.6%, 그리고 200 Oe이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of MNPs having an antibody attached to an amine group, the initial magnetoresistance value, the magnetoresistance ratio, and the solution coercive force are 0.74 M, 1.6%, and 200 Oe, respectively, depending on the external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: MNP 용액에 분산제가 충분히 첨가된 덱스트란 MNPs를 용액에서 완전히 분리하는데 매우 강한 자기장하에서 10시간 이상 소요된다.
data.mt_sentence: It takes more than 10 hours under a very strong magnetic field to completely separate dextran MNPs from which the dispersant is sufficiently added to the MNP solution.
data.target_sentence: It takes more than 10 hours under a very strong magnetic field to completely separate dextran MNP with sufficient dispersant added to the MNP solution.

data.source_sentence: 2 mg/mL 농도를 유지한 덱스트란 MNP 용액의 경우 외부자기장에 따라 자기저항값, 자기저항비, 그리고 용액보자력은 각각 1.43 M, 0.2%, 그리고 260 Oe로 대칭적인 나비날개 형태의 자기저항곡선을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a dextran MNP solution with a concentration of 2 mg/mL, the magnetic resistance value, the magnetic resistance ratio, and the solution bearing force are 1.43 M, 0.2% and 260 Oe, respectively, depending on the external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a dextran MNP solution maintained at a concentration of 2 mg/mL, it is related to the magnetoresistance value, the magnetoresistance ratio, and the solution coercive force according to the external magnetic field. The magnetoresistance curves in the form of butterfly wings are symmetrical at 1.43 M, 0.2%, and 260 Oe, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 본 실험 결과는 자기장을 조절함으로서 면역치료용 항체 개발용MNPs를 표적으로 유도하는 것이 가능함을 보여준다.

data.target_sentence: The results of this experiment show that it is possible to induce MNPs for the development of targeted immunotherapeutic antibodies by controlling the magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 나노입자는 일반적으로 0.1~100 nm 크기 범위의 입자를 말하며, 여기서 입자는 벌크 대응물과 완전히 새로운 물리화학적 특성을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: Nanoparticles generally refer to particles in the size range of 0.1 to 100 nm, where they exhibit entirely new physicochemical properties with their bulk counterparts.
data.target_sentence: Nanoparticles generally refer to particles in the size range of 0.1 to 100 nm, where they exhibit entirely new physicochemical properties with their bulk counterparts.

data.source_sentence: 최근까지 나노입자들이 진단 및 치료 응용을 위해 광범위하게 탐구되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Until recently, nanoparticles have been extensively explored for diagnostic and therapeutic applications.
data.target_sentence: Until recently, nanoparticles have been extensively studied for diagnostic and therapeutic applications.

data.source_sentence: 조영제로 나노입자를 진단용으로 사용하는 경우 이미징의 특이성과 감도를 크게 향상시킬 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 즉, Fig. 7와 같이 자기저항곡선으로부터 보자력과 자기저항비는 자기저항 특성으로 반영된 것으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: In other words, as shown in Figure 7, it is considered that the complementary force and the magnetic resistance ratio from the magnetic resistance curve are reflected as magnetic resistance characteristics.
data.target_sentence: That is, as shown in FIG. 7, it is considered that the coercive force and the magnetoresistance ratio are reflected as magnetoresistance characteristics from the magnetoresistance curve.

data.source_sentence: 나노입자의 코어에 Fe3O4를 실리카와 덱스트란으로 코팅된 아민기 표면을 갖는 평균 직경이 약 50 nm 이내인 MNPs가 담겨 있는 PBS × 1과 ddH2O 용액의 자기저항 특성을 조사한다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetoresistance properties of PBS × 1 and ddH2O solution containing MNPs with an average diameter of about 50 nm or less with an amine-group surface coated with silica and dextran with Fe3O4 on the core of nanoparticles are investigated.
data.target_sentence: The magnetoresistance properties of PBS × 1 and ddH2O solutions containing MNPs having an average diameter of about 50 nm or less along with the surface of amine groups coated with silica and dextran with Fe3O4 on the core of nanoparticles were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 용액 안에서 MNPs의 간격을 일정하게 유지하는 역할을 하는 분산제가 충분히 첨가된 덱스트란으로 코팅된 경우의 MNPs를 완충용액에서 완전히 분리하는데 매우 강한 자기장 하에서 10시간 이상 소요되는 특징을 가진다.
data.mt_sentence: It takes more than 10 hours under a very strong magnetic field to completely separate MNPs from the buffer solution when coated with dextran sufficiently added with a dispersant that maintains a constant gap between MNPs in the solution.
data.target_sentence: It takes more than 10 hours to completely separate the MNPs from the buffer solution under very strong magnetic fields when coated with dextran with sufficient addition of dispersant to keep the constant spacing between the MNPs in solution.

data.source_sentence: 자기저항곡선에서 보여준 특성들은 외부자기장 세기에 따라 MNPs의 이동으로 일어난 공간에서 예상되는 움직임에 따라 이 경로 정도의 많음과 적음으로 인해 나타난 현상으로 사료된다.
data.mt_sentence: The characteristics shown in the magnetoresistance curve are considered to be a phenomenon that occurs due to the abundance or lack of this path according to the expected movement in the space caused by the movement of the MNPs according to the external magnetic field strength.
data.target_sentence: The characteristics shown in the magnetoresistance curve are thought to be caused by the abundance or lack of this path according to the expected movement of the MNP due to the movement of the MNP according to the strength of the external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 결과는 용액 안에서 서로 다른 면역치료용 항체가 MNPs의 표면에 붙어 있으며 자기장에 따라 표적으로 유도하는데 조절이 가능할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The results show that different antibodies for immunotherapy are attached to the surface of MNPs in the solution and can be adjusted to guide them to the target depending on the magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The results show that various antibodies for immunotherapy can be tuned to attach to the surface of MNPs in solution and guide them to the target according to the magnetic field.
